[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum tsha bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du byang 
[\[1b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/_khyod kyi rigs kyi lha rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can rgyun du gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin mo dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[1b.3\]]gyi sde dpon chen mo dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_zla ba nyid dang /_zhi bar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i thabs de rnams kyang dgug pa'i ched du/_sngags 'di mnga' bdag tu bya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[1b.4\]]'dir gnod sbyin thams cad dgug par byed pa'i sngags chen po'i tshig rnams ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsarba se na sa ta ye/_na ma Ar+yA 
[\[1b.5\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma ha sa twa ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_yak+Sha dzrim+b+ha na muk+tA ya/_sarbaM yak+ShaM hr-i da yaM/_gu h+ya a d+hi pa tA ya b+ha ga bAn Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]hr-i da ya/_ma nu sma ra/_sat+ya ma nu sA la/_tad+ya thA shI le shI la ba ti dA ni pra ye shan+te satwA dar+Sha nan ta thA ga ta sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na dar+Sha na ma ma sa raM pra yats+tshe sarba satwA hi tAr+thA ya swA hA/_stobs chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i gsang sngags 'di 
[\[2a.2\]]gsungs pa dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang du gnas pa bkug nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las phyag na rdo rjes gsang ba'i dbang po phran tshegs ma yin pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po 
[\[2a.3\]]dang ldan pas tshig 'di smras so/_/sems can gyi don la brtson par sems pas gang la la sgrol ma sgrub pa de'i dngos grub nges par byin cig phyed phyed rtag tu phan pas bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis de dran par byas nas lha mo sgrol ma 'di 
[\[2a.4\]]lus can rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya'o/_/gang bdag gi bka' mi byed na phyag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_rdo rje 'chang ba stobs chen pos mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sngon 
[\[2a.5\]]ma can 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa gnod sbyin thams cad 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pa tsam gyis gdug pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o/_/de nas 'di sgrub pa'i thabs brjod par bya ste/_sngar gsungs 
[\[2a.6\]]pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_pad+ma'i sdong bu phyag na bsnams pa/_phyag na pad+ma g.yang gzhi nag po 'phyang ba/_gos dkar po can skyil krung gis bzhugs 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/_rgyal ba dang /_rnam par rgyal ba dang /_rtag tu ri bo dang /_gsang ldan gyi bu dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_bzang 'gro'i bu dang /_
[\[2b.2\]]byams pa'i bu dang /_dpa' bo bzang po'i bu dang /_tshangs pa dang /_chu la sems te de lta bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mang po 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_khug ma dang sa bon gyis gang ba phyag na bsnams pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams nye bar 'dug 
[\[2b.3\]]par bya'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su rnam par rgyal ba'i mtha' dang /_sdong po dang /_rnam rgyal thob pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_mkha' lding rgyal po zhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 'di rnams thams cad sngar bzhin kha dog ljang gu'o/_/bcom 
[\[2b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi g.yas su rig pa 'dzin pa yang lag na spos phor thogs pa sngar bzhin no/_/rgyu skar skag la 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas ras ris ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_phyogs gtsang ma gzhan du bzhugs su gsol nas/_
[\[2b.5\]]sngags 'dis spyan drang bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na maHyak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dza ye bi dza ye a gu ru e hi e hi s+thA nAM/_A kra ma/_bi dza ye/_
[\[2b.6\]]ba ha shAn+ti ka ra swA hA/_sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das dang gnod sbyin thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya na maHsarba yak+Sha se na pa ta ye na mo na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA 
[\[2b.7\]]ru Ni kA ya/_ra ra ra ra shAn+ti bi dza ye swA hA/_'dis dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o/_/zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]zho dang 'o ma'i zan gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams la zho dang bu ram dbul bar bya'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su bris pa rnams la til dang til gyi thug pa dbul 
[\[3a.2\]]bar bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul lo/_/dri tsan+dan dbul lo/_/phreng ba sna ma'i me tog dbul bar bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i sde dpon rnams la thang chu lnga'i bdug pa dang /_ka ra bI ra dkar po'i 
[\[3a.3\]]me tog go/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su sra rtsi pog gi bdug pa dang /_a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog dbul bar bya'o/_/de ltar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas dus gsum du de bzhin du mchod pa bya zhing 'o ma dang /_
[\[3a.4\]]nas zan bza' zhing pad+ma dkar po re re la yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/_/de ltar ji srid 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar bris pa'i gnod sbyin thams cad rdzu 'phrul ston par byed do/_/ras ris 'gul ba dang /_
[\[3a.5\]]me tog g.yo ba thun mtshams su mthong ngo /_/de nas grub par 'gyur te gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' la yang grub bo zhes pa'i sgra thos so/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog stsol bar byed do/_/tshol ba de gnod sbyin gyi bka' byed par 
[\[3a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/ma grub na las thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rmi lam du gnod sbyin rnams dge ba dang mi dge ba mthong ba sbyin par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[3a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa gnod sbyin thams cad kun tu 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'byung 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]po'i bdag po lha'i bu dbang ldan la smras pa/_lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po can khyod kyis rigs bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po bshad par bya'o/_/de la sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams ni 'jig 
[\[3b.2\]]rten pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags su yang dag par 'dod do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_I sha na ku la ma btu yi Sh+ya mi/_b+ha ga ba te/_Ar+ya a ba 
[\[3b.3\]]lo ki te shwa ra te dza na ra ra ra ra ra bi pu tsi bi pu tsi/_bra ma thA/_pra ma pra ma tha/_pra ma thA/_gardza gardza gardza/_Ti Ti Ti/_sa sa sa/_u u u/_la la la/_tsa tsa tsa/_A gats+tsha a gats+tsha/_b+ha ga bA na/_A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_pa ra ma hr-i da yaM/_d+hA ra yi Sh+ya ti i 
[\[3b.4\]]shwo rA s+ya bi po ma ti twAM pra sAM tha/_ba raM nge yaM/_sarba satwA hi ti/_d+hu taM/_ba ra/_yak+Sha ya/_sarka ra/_mu ni mu ni/_a pra ti ha ta/_bI t+yo kr-i ta ha ti kr-i ta yak+Sha kr-i ta/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/_dbang ldan gyi rigs kun nas 'dren pa'i 
[\[3b.5\]]sngags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhal nas gsungs pa lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis smras pa/_sa stengs kyi mi sems can gyi don 'dod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa sgrub pa'i don du sngags 'di rab tu gsungs so/_/gang 'di 
[\[3b.6\]]sgrub pa'i sgrub pa po gang la la dngos grub 'dod pa la khyod kyis de la mchog sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i bsam pa can bye ba phrag bcu dang /_rang gis rab tu gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sa stengs su sgrub pa la lha rnams 'gugs pa rab 
[\[3b.7\]]tu brjod pa'i sngags 'di stobs chen po sgrub pa dang /_rig pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can gyi sgrol ma de'i gzi brjid dang stobs sbyin par bya zhing /_'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis skyobs shig_/de nas 'di'i sgrub pa'i cho gar 'gyur te/_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba/_phyag na pad+ma g.yas kyis mchog sbyin pa/_phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba/_spyi bor 
[\[4a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 
[\[4a.3\]]bri bar bya'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su dbang ldan la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams bri bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe mig gsum pa'o/_/sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris 'di'i steng gi phyogs kyi cha rnams su bzhag nas/_nag po'i bcu bzhi pa nas 
[\[4a.4\]]brtsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya zhing 'di nyid kyis 'bum bzlas par bya ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dkar po'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing a ga ru 
[\[4a.5\]]dang tu ruSh+ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'o ma dang lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing kha dog thams cad du snang ba thams cad 'dod pa'i rigs la zho dang bu ram gyi bza' ba dang /_gu gul gyi bdug pa 
[\[4a.6\]]dbul bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma dbul zhing /_dge slong rnams la yon dang bcas pa'i ston mo dbul lo/_/phyugs bdag rnams la zho zan dbul zhing de'i zhi ba thob par bya'o/_/ji srid du zla ba nya ba'i bar du dus gsum 
[\[4a.7\]]du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma dbang ldan gyi mig 'phro bar byed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/'dir dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung ba de nas me tog phreng ba dbul bar bya zhing /_gu gul gyi 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]bdug pa dbul lo/_/gang dka' thub pa rnams kyis ji ltar byung ba zos nas yon dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas thams cad byed do/_/me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_dri dang /_gos la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags nas gang la byin pa de bran nyid du nye bar 
[\[4b.2\]]gnas so/_/rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar zho dang mar dang 'o thug gis sbyin sreg bya ste/_'bum phrag gcig gi mthar rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtsug phud 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan 
[\[4b.3\]]mo gsum thun gsum du til dang /_til gyi thug pa'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun gsum du dang po btsas pa'i 'o ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rnyed do/_/phyugs kyi bdag 
[\[4b.4\]]po rnams dbang du bya bar 'dod na thal ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur te/_zhag bdun thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de ji srid 'jig rten pa'i las las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sa'i steng gi mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad byed de/_sngags 'di 
[\[4b.5\]]la the tshom med do/_/'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dbang ldan gyi rigs kun tu 'ong ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems 
[\[4b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du sems can la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'jug par byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rjes 
[\[4b.7\]]su dran nas gsungs pa/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo bid+yA rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bi shud+d+ha pra ba/_kaR+Sha kar+Sha b+ha shi She bi d+yA d+ha ra gu h+ye ka ma nu smA ra bud+d+ha sat+ye na d+harma satwA na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na/_Ar+ya a ba 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]lo ki te shwa ra satwe na/_sid+h+ya n+tA me man+t+ra pa dA phaT phaT yA/_/mu ni mu nA ya/_sa ma tha sa mA ya/_ud+d+ha raM te ko ka rA n+te ma nu smA ra Ta/_hr-i da ta sa kA rA To TaM/_ka Ta Te swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa 'jug par byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal 
[\[5a.2\]]po chen po bzlas pas gdug pa de thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/_gdon dang rig pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/_mdor na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs 
[\[5a.3\]]dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_sku mdog dkar po/_ral pa dud kha/_bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa/_phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams pa/_gser gyi them skas bzang po la 'jug bzhin pa bri bar bya'o/_/ngang pa dang /_
[\[5a.4\]]bya ku ra ba dang /_ngur pa dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_ne tso la sogs pa rab tu bsngags pa'i bya rnams g.yas kyi g.yas su 'jug pa skor ba byed pa bri bar bya'o/_/mi'am ci gnyis glu len bzhin pa bri bar bya ste/_g.yon pas rna ba 'gebs pa bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[5a.5\]]sgrub pa po yang 'og tu kha phyogs pa spos phor lag na thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jug par byed bzhin pa la lta bar byed pa/_pus mo btsugs pa/_g.yas kyi 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od kyis mnan pa bri bar bya'o/_/rnam pa de 
[\[5a.6\]]lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas/_sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol te/_yang dag par brtsam par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_dzA ti hu ti ma ma a ba tA d+ya swA hA/_
[\[5a.7\]]dkyil 'khor gyi sngags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya mu ne mu ne swA hA/_'dis thams cad byed pa ste/_'bum phrag lngar bzlas ba bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/mthar zho dang 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg bya'o/_/mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa ste/_dpag tu med pa bzlas pas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ras ris rab tu 'gul na sa chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/mi 'gul na yul 
[\[5b.2\]]gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pas gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma 'bum phrag bcu dbul bar bya ste grong rnyed do/_/stong phrag sum cu dbul bar bya ste grong lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor bas rtag tu 
[\[5b.3\]]'dod cing dran par byed na de dbul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par byung ba'i 'jug par byed bzhin pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs 
[\[5b.4\]]so//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin pas bcom ldan 'das la rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i 
[\[5b.5\]]rgyal po chen por don chen po rmad du byung ba sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/_phra mo thams cad sel bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad srung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsungs par gyur to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[5b.6\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_/ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M g+haT+Ta ni phu ma ta na swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po thogs pa med pa las thams cad pa/_sangs rgyas bye 
[\[5b.7\]]ba phrag bcus gnang ba/_mngon par mdzes pa srung ba la/_rtag pa kho nar mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas 'di sgrub pa'i mchod par 'gyur te/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'di nyid kyi dri dang bdug pa la sogs phul nas 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bye ba bzlas par bya'o/_/rgyal srid chen po rnyed do/_/'bum phrag bcur bzlas na gser stong rnyed do/_/mchod rten gyi drung du dkyil 'khor stong nye bar byugs nas dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa phul te 'bum bzlas na gang 'dod pa'i rgyal 
[\[6a.2\]]po de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/chu klung chen po dang /_chu gling dang /_mchod rten bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o/_/rgyal srid chen po rnyed de don chen po yang dag par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sngags 'di rtag tu dran 
[\[6a.3\]]par byed pa de ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rjes su yi rang zhing /_rab tu bsngags la thams cad du son pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa 
[\[6a.4\]]yi ge bcu ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du spyi bor mngon par 
[\[6a.5\]]dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo ak+Sho b+h+ya ya/_tad+ya thA/_na mo bi muk+ta/_dar+Sha nA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo gam+b+hi ra g+ho Sha ya/_
[\[6a.6\]]ta thA ga tA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ku mA ri/_ku mA ri/_ma no dza be Shu nA dza ye/_sha ra da bi dza yA ya/_duM du b+hi swa rA ya/_de bi de bi de bi pU dzi tA ya/_na ma skr-i ta gardza tA 
[\[6a.7\]]ya/_ra ra la la kha gA ya swA hA/_ba ru NA ya swA hA/_a pra ti ha ta/_ba da nA ya swA hA/_brah+ma shwa ra g+ho Sha ru tra ya swA hA/_bi sa ti/_sa ti rA dzA ya swA hA/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_mUr+d+hA nA ba ra Na swA hA/_ma ma kar+yaM ku ru swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa spyi 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen por bdag gi spyi bor skyes pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag du mas gsungs pa/_sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gis mngon par dbang bskur bar/_mngon par bskur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag 
[\[6b.2\]]med kyi gnas su gyur pa/_las phran tshegs thams cad myur du bklags pas grub pa'o/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gso sbyong la gnas pas 'bum bzlas so/_/glags tshol 
[\[6b.3\]]ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar sa ga'i nyi ma la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang /_me tog la sogs pa phul nas kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_
[\[6b.4\]]ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_pad+ma la bzhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med thub pa la thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa lag na spos phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/rnam 
[\[6b.5\]]pa de lta bu phyogs sam nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyi nang der 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas mchod rten gyi drung du ras ris bzhugs su gsol te/_de la 'di nyid kyis thams cad byas la 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/_/
[\[6b.6\]]mthar mtshan mo smyung bar gnas te ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad la re re la yongs su bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bsnun par bya'o/_/de lta bu thun gsum du 'bum phrag gcig byas pa'i mthar bcom ldan 
[\[6b.7\]]'das kyis mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig pa 'dzin pa nyid lus 'bar bar byed dam/_ras ris 'gul ba dang ldeg pa dang mar me'i rtse mo 'phel na rgyal srid do/_/gal te sgrub pa byed par 'dod na thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/_smra ba'i mchog 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]nyid dam/_mig sman dang /_ldong ros dang /_gi wang la byas pa ras ris kyi spyan sngar thams cad sgrub par byed na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang 
[\[7a.2\]]ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 
[\[7a.3\]]'dzin gyi rgyal po gsungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'od dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na mo bi pa sh+yAM/_shi khI/_bi shwa b+huHna ma Ar+ya a ba 
[\[7a.4\]]lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA shAn+ta pra b+hA ya/_pra mu di ta/_kA pa tsa nA ya ni t+yo tA ba/_tsit+ta ya/_b+ha ga bA na hr-i da ya ma nu sma ra/_a tsi sh+ma t+yaM lo kA d+hA to/_/sarba bo d+hi satwA sar+Sha t+ma d+h+ye b+hA Shi taM/_buN+D+ha sat+yaM/_d+harma sat+yaM/_saMg+ha 
[\[7a.5\]]sat+yaM/_a nA g+ha mi sat+yaM/_sro ta A ba n+ni sat+yaM/_yak+Sha sat+yaM/_kush+mA N+DA sat+yaM/_bUrba bo d+hi satwAM/_hr-i da ya ma nu sma ra he he he he he twe twe twe twe twe ra ra ra ra ra la la la la la o~M kA ra pra b+he b+he b+h+yaM pany+tsa ya b+ha shri taM kalpa sarba bud+d+ha sa rA dza taM twa me ba/_rak+ShaM baM da twA si ra swa pra NA mya haM kha ga kha ga_/
[\[7a.6\]]bi dza a sa ra dza ti ya swA hA/_a ba lo ki te shwa rA bi dza ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po las phran tshegs rnams thams cad bklags pas grub pa'o/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur te/_ring bsrel 
[\[7a.7\]]dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du'am/_ri'i rtse mo'am/_rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram mam/_chu'i dbus sam/_gling du 'o ma dang zan za bas 'di nyid kyis thams cad byas la 'bum bzla bar bya ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mig 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]sman dang ldong ros dang gi wang ste de rnams gcig tu byas la a shwat+tha'i 'dab mas btums te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas nas thun gsum du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rdzas la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig kho nar bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bar 
[\[7b.2\]]gyur pa dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_'bar bar gyur na grub pa yin te/_dang pos ni dbang du byed do/_/gnyis pas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gsum pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[7b.3\]]'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan 
[\[7b.4\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom par byed bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen por rtog pa'i rgyal por pad+ma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_na maHsu brna ba b+ha 
[\[7b.5\]]sA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_sam+m+ya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/_beSh+Ti ko Ti yak+Sha pa ri bri ti ya na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ut+d+d+ha dz+dza Ta/_pra dz+wa li ta ya/_pad+ma a b+hA saHta thA ga tA ba tsa ne na twa ya b+ha shI taM/_
[\[7b.6\]]kalpaM/_sarba k+ShA ya/_kIrta nA ya/_sarba satwA hi ta/_a nu karta/_sarba satwA pa ra dzi tA ya/_sarba satwA hi tAr+thA ya/_sarba sid+d+hA/_tsa tA ya ga niHna ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+ha ma ni d+ha ma ni/_b+hu r+b+hu ba/_o~M o~M o~M o~M/_/bi pu ri ri/_pu ne swA hA/_bi dza 
[\[7b.7\]]ya pa Ta pa Ta kA ra swA hA/_ma hA ya sha a nu mu ne swA hA/_a pra ti ha ta pa tsa ne swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po pad+ma kun tu snang bas de bzhin du bdag gi snying po 'di gang de dran pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'jigs pa 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]chen po thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang nyin mtshan gsum du 'di byas nas de yun ring po nas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrub 
[\[8a.2\]]thabs kyi cho ga ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa phul nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas zla ba bcu gnyis su 'o ma bcu gnyis dang /_zho bcu gnyis dang /_bum pa gang ba bcu 
[\[8a.3\]]gnyis dang /_sbrang rtsi'i bum pa bcu gnyis dang /_til dang thug pa'i bum pa bcu gnyis dang /_kuSh+mA N+Da'i kham phor bcu gnyis su bdug pa dang /_kham phor bcu gnyis su pad+ma dang /_slong mo'i zas bcu gnyis bza' bar bya'o/_/de nas srod der de lta bu la sogs 
[\[8a.4\]]pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas de nas gur gum byugs la der ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog dang mtshungs pa'i sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba phul nas mchod rten gyi spyan sngar nag po'i bcu bzhi'am/_zla ba nya ba la lag pa g.yas pas ral gri bzung nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 
[\[8a.5\]]'dug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar grub pa'i mtshan ma nam mkha' nas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur te skad cig de nyid la lha'i lus 'khor dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa chen 
[\[8a.6\]]por gnas so/_/de nas ral gri 'gul lam/_mchod rten g.yo bar byed na mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yang na gang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba de 'grub ste/_dngos grub kyi yul rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen 
[\[8a.7\]]brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las nges par skyes pa pad+ma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]phyug slar yang yangs ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dpe byad brgyad cus rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba 
[\[8b.2\]]lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_o~M dri dza TA ya/_na maHka maN+Da lu ha stA ya/_na maHpad+ma bi b+hu Shi tA ya/_na maHpad+ma yA nA yA/_na maHpad+ma ha stA yA/_na mo maN+Da la shi khA ya/_na mo a shI t+ya nU byaM dza na/_lak+Sha NA ya/_na mo 
[\[8b.3\]]a su rA/_re kuny+tsi tA ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dpe byad brgyad cu'i rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po sgrol ma'i rtog pa don chen po sbyin pa ste gang la la 'di dran par byed pa de'i don thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs 
[\[8b.4\]]kyi cho ga ni rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung ngam/_chu gling ngam/_rgya mtsho'i chu gling du gang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas te/_srog shing btsugs nas dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor pas re re'i spyan 
[\[8b.5\]]sngar stong phrag brgyad bzlas bar bya'o/_/ji srid du mchod rten stong phrag brgyad po rdzogs kyi bar du'o/_/gal te phyis mchod rten 'bar nas chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'bar na grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas las thams cad du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[8b.6\]]rgyal po 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po'am/_bud med dam/_skyes pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na mchod rten gyi spyan sngar dri la sogs pa phul nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o/_/nyi ma bdun thun gsum du byas na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang blangs pa de rnyed do/_/
[\[8b.7\]]'jigs pa la dam tshig la gnas te bzlas pa byas na 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/las phra mo rnams bklags pa tsam gyis grub ste/_las thams cad byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dpe byad brgyad cu'i rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan 
[\[9a.2\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po yon tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[9a.3\]]kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bi mu k+ti te dze/_a b+ha ya d+harma/_ra si gu na sA ga ra pad+me ma na si/_prah+me n+d+ra pra ti pan+na ma ho t+ya na/_tad+ya thA/_dA ma na/_dA ma ni/_tu ru tu ru/_tiSh+tha tiSh+tha/_ma d+hu ma d+hu/_mad d+hi/_mad d+hi/_sarba kA t+yaM ku ru swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yon 
[\[9a.4\]]tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba/_sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad sbyin pa/_gang rig pa'i rgyal po yon tan rgyan 'di rtag tu dran par 'gyur ba de dus ring por mi thogs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur 
[\[9a.5\]]te/_sngar brjod pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med thub pa'i ras ris 'drir gzhug go/_/'dab ma stong pa la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa 
[\[9a.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma la bzhugs pa sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o/_/de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa pus mo btsugs pa ste/_sngar bzhin no/_/ring bsrel dang 
[\[9a.7\]]bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris de bzhugs su gsol nas/_tshes grangs dang /_byed pa dang /_yud tsam dge bas gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa dang /_byams pa la gnas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te zla ba nya la stong phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o/_/'dis 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]sngon du bsnyen pa byas na mchod rten de nyid la pad+ma re re la yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o/_/nyi ma re re la stong dbul bar bya ste/_gang tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid bcu gnyis kyi bar du'o/_/mtshan mo gsum du 
[\[9b.2\]]smyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma dkar po stong phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o/_/ras ris kyi phreng ba g.yo ba dang /_mar me 'phel te gzhan du 'phro bar byed na 'di ni dngos 
[\[9b.3\]]grub kyi mtshan ma ste rgyal srid chen po rnyed do/_/ma grub na yul rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las nges par skyes pa yon tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i 
[\[9b.4\]]rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chen po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rtog 
[\[9b.5\]]pa'i rgyal po chen po der bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_po d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[9b.6\]]kA ru Ni kA ya/_ud+d+ha pra dz+wa li ta dza TA ya su khA bat+yaM/_pra mo tsa te/_tad+ya thA/_b+ha ga ba to/_a mi tA b+hA sA ya/_pA dA mU le/_ma ma tsa hr-i da ya/_pra ti gr-ih+Na b+ha ga bA na/_ma ma a nu/_kam+pa mu sa tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sA d+hu sa d+huM/_suSh+Thu pa ri Sh+ya mi ti laM g+ha lang+g+ha dz+yo tiSh+pa pa 
[\[9b.7\]]ti/_bi b+hu d+ha pad+ma ha sta ya su me su me/_bi su ma gi ri gi ri Ni swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa/_bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o/_/'di'i cho ga ni bla gab med par shing 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gcig gi 'og tu bum pa tsam gyi mchod rten byas nas de'i spyan sngar a ga ru 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gang gi don du sbyin sreg byas pa de'i mchog rnyed do/_/rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mchod rten 
[\[10a.2\]]gyi spyan sngar lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas pa lA sha'i me la nyi ma gsum la lan bdun thun mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang gi phyogs su yungs kar khrag gis btags pa 
[\[10a.3\]]rnams seng ldeng gi me la yungs kar dang seng ldeng btags pa rnams kyi nyi ma gsum du thun mtshams gsum du stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi bye ma la mchod rten sor bzhi tsam mam/_mtho gang tsam mam/_
[\[10a.4\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam pa brgyad lhag pa'i stong byas la srog shing phul te mchod pa la sogs pa'i tshogs re re'i spyan sngar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya ste/_ji srid stong rtsa brgyad gnas pa na dong tse stong stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho'i 
[\[10a.5\]]ngogs su mchod rten re re'i spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas stong phrag brgya bzlas na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/_mchog ci 'dod pa de stsol bar mdzad cing gang tshol ba de rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma 
[\[10a.6\]]sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin 
[\[10a.7\]]du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dpa' bo ldan ma zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so//_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shi ri bi si ri smr-i ti ba tsa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]ne/_te dzo ba d+ha ni ha ra ha ra a mu kaM me ba sa mA gats+tsha tu ra ma ni/_bi ra ma Ni/_bi ra bA si/_mi ni sau/_ta mu ta khe pA ti bar+Na swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa dpa' bo dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad rjes su srung 
[\[10b.2\]]bar byed pa/_rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams kyi gang dpa' ba dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'di rtag tu dran pa de nor gyi dngos grub nges par de'i brtson pa dang bcas pa dang /_de'i 'dod pa las 'grub bo/_/'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags 
[\[10b.3\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi wang gis 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_pad+ma'i gdan la phyag na pad+ma ste/_g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o/_/de'i g.yas su sgrub pa po ste sngar bzhin no/_/ras ris de 
[\[10b.4\]]ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang bdug pa dang /_phreng ba phul nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas par zla ba nya ba la 'o thug gi kham phor bcu gnyis phul nas a ga ru'i bdug spos dbul lo/_/de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par 
[\[10b.5\]]bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad kyi dngos grub ni 'di nyid kyi cho gas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/phyi nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te sna ma'i me tog re re la yongs su bzlas nas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bya'o/_/
[\[10b.6\]]de lta bu nyi ma bdun du thun gsum du ji srid stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyi ma bdun pa la gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar a ga ru nag po 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do/_/ma grub na grong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags 
[\[10b.7\]]ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dpa' bo ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po de nyid sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA 
[\[11a.2\]]ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_dIp+ta ping+ga le ha ri ping+ga le a so ni tA d+ha drA le hi e hi/_ma ma pa raM pra yats+tsha swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/_mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po'o/_/de nas 'di'i 
[\[11a.3\]]cho ga ni/_ras sam 'bras bu can la sen rtsis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_pad+ma'i gdan la pad+ma'i phyag can/_mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o/_/sgrub pa po yang sngar bzhin no/_/de'i spyan sngar thun gsum du mar gyis btags 
[\[11a.4\]]pa'i tsan+dan dmar po'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser brgya rnyed do/_/'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do/_/'dir pad+ma rA ga 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma 
[\[11a.5\]]hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_yi ge ts+tshi twe tsa pa ri pra Na/_ai shra t+yaM/_da dA ti/_me badzri Ni/_g+hi Ni/_mo ha ni/_mo ha dza/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_a b+ha ya pra di/_a b+ha ya pra di/_la la la la/_la la la la swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma rA ga sbyin pa'i sngags so/_/
[\[11a.6\]]'di'i cho ga ni tsan+dan dmar pos 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya'o/_/de'i spyan sngar mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i me tog dmar po sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/_pad+ma rA ga brgyad rnyed do/_/zas kyi sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[11a.7\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pra byA ka rI/_pra b+ha kA ri/_dz+yo ti Sh+ma ti su tsi bi mu tsA ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/_zas gos sbyin pa'i sngags so/_/'di'i cho ga ni khrag dang 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]ba bla las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya'o/_/de'i spyan sngar mar gyis btags pa'i 'o thug gi sbyin sreg ji srid 'bum phrag gcig byas na gnas thams cad du zas gos rnyed do/_/'di ni dngul sbyin par 'gyur te/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[11b.2\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/_b+ha na g+ha na/_ha TA ya/_sA da ya/_sA da ya/_e hi e hi/_phu phu phu phu/_g+hu g+hu/_phu ra swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa dngul sbyin pa'i sngags 
[\[11b.3\]]te/_'di'i cho ga ni/_gur gum gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_de'i spyan sngar zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i nA ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg 'bum byas na dngul brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir 
[\[11b.4\]]gser rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo b+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ga ru ru pha ra ba ra/_ba ri li swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste gser sbyin pa'i sngags so/_/
[\[11b.5\]]'di'i cho ga ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mal+li ka'i me tog re re la yongs su bzlas nas mchod rten gyi drung du gtor bar bya'o/_/thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad gtor na zla ba'i nang du gser brgya rnyed do/_/ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni ras la bcom 
[\[11b.6\]]ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_phyag na spyi blugs bsnams pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ras ris nges grong ngam dgon par a shwa t+tha'i shing gi 'og tu gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhugs nas sra rtsi 
[\[11b.7\]]pog gi sreg blugs 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na bcom ldan 'das kyis myur du rgyal srid stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa de rnams lnga po tsam ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bsgoms nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i 
[\[12a.2\]]rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por o~M yig rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+h+yA s+ya ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha s+ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_
[\[12a.3\]]tad+ya thA/_a muk+te/_a muk+te/_tsats+tsha da ne/_mA d+he ni mA d+he ni/_su ru d+hi/_ru ta mA ya/_d+ha rI/_hu hu/_hu hu/_ma tha ma tha ma tha/_o~M ra pra mu kha/_pA la pA la/_ma hA pA ri pA la/_te dza/_na ma stu te/_sarba duSh+Ta twaM bA si sA tA Ni mA ne swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa 
[\[12a.4\]]ste/_'khor ba'i sna thag grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gang 'di rtag tu dran par byed na 'khor bar yun ring du mi 'khor ro/_/bzlas pa nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga po rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni sngar brjod pa'i 
[\[12a.5\]]ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_kun nas 'od 'bar ba/_pad+ma phyag na bsnams pa/_g.yas par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o/_/sgrub pa po yang dag pa'i lus kyi mgo bos bdug pa sreg pa cha byad dang rnam 
[\[12a.6\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas ras ris de sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pa 'di nyid kyis phul la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med 
[\[12a.7\]]pa lnga po rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/'bum phrag drug bzlas pas dam bcas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa sha za dang srin po rnams 'ching bar 'dod na ku sha'i sna thag gis bskor nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te gdug pa gang na gnas pa'i 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]shing ngam khyim la sogs pa la dkri bar bya'o/_/gdug pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa'i sems dang sems can rnams zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i mig sman sgrub par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg 
[\[12b.2\]]blugs byas nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bzhag nas du ba 'thul na de rnams rgyal ba'i spyan dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/lo stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma dkar po 'bum phrag gsum dbul bar bya'o/_/rgyal srid rnyed do/_/
[\[12b.3\]]ma grub na yul rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa/_'khor ba'i sna thag grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//
[\[12b.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por yi ge bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[12b.5\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_da sha ni/_ka ra Ni/_bi ka ra Ni/_bi d+hu li/_bI la ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa yi ge bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rtag tu 
[\[12b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcu gcig la'ang 'di bdag gis sngon bshad pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas gser rnyed do/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni sgrub pa'i ched du 'gyur te/_sngar brjod pa'i ras ris nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma dang pa li ka bsres pas 'drir gzhug ste/_pad+ma'i gdan la 
[\[12b.7\]]bzhugs pa/_bsam gtan sgom pa/_phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa/_sku mdog dkar po'o/_/sgrub pa po yang sngar bzhin no/_/ras ris dang po'i gnas su bzhag nas/_'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/ri'i rtse mor nyi ma gsum du mi bza' bar stong phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya ste/_gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngar brjod pa bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[13a.2\]]spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar po'i zhogs ma dang bcas pa 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do/_/ma grub na grong rnyed de yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin pa la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa 
[\[13a.3\]]'dod cing don du gnyer ba sbyin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[13a.4\]]ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por ras ris kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ka Te ni ka Te/_
[\[13a.5\]]ka TAM ka Te/_dz+yo ti/_tiSh+ma tI/_bi pu le swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa ras ris kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'o/_/rtag tu bzlas pas don sbyin par byed cing sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa grub par yang 'gyur ro/_/yang 'di'i cho 
[\[13a.6\]]ga ni sngar brjod pa'i ras ris la 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_dar 
[\[13a.7\]]dkar po'i stod g.yogs can/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen thob pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor bar byed pa'o/_/de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su pa Ta'i shing la so so so sor bzhag nas 'di nyid kyis dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul la 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te/_me tog dkar po stong 
[\[13b.2\]]phrag brgyad la re re la yongs su bzlas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du dbul bar bya'o/_/dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad po de rnams gcig tu gnas par 'gyur te/_'di ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o/_/'di dag phye mar byas nas gzhan sha la 
[\[13b.3\]]dang bsres te rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po'am/_gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis gdungs pa la byin na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/phye ma des mtshan ma dang ldan pa mo la rdul btab na bu rnyed do/_/tho rangs bdag nyid kyi spyi bor phye ma des rdul 
[\[13b.4\]]btab na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gang 'dod pa de thams cad phye ma des byed do/_/grol bar byed na nye bar gzhag pa'i nad dam/_khrag 'dzag pa'am/_mtshan mar gdol pa'am/_de bzhin du dug la sogs pa thams cad la 'thung du bcug pa'am/_cung 
[\[13b.5\]]zad byug par sbyin par bya ste/_nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir ras kyi gnas kyi phye ma'i cho ga ni nA ga ge sar dang /_tsan+dan dang /_da ma na ka dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang /_pu shel tse dang /_ru rta dang /_me tog brgya pa ste/_'di rnams cha mnyam par 
[\[13b.6\]]sbyar nas phye mar byed du gzhug go/_/'di ni ras ris kyi gnas kyi phye ma ste brgya phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags nas gang la btung ba la sogs par byin pa de dbang du 'gyur te/_bran nyid du nye bar gnas pa dang /_mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_gnyis mnyam du 
[\[13b.7\]]rnyed cing rab tu 'jug go/_/de bzhin du 'jigs pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma dkar po 'bum phrag gsum dbul bar bya ste yul chen po rnyed do/_/arga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas pad+ma dmar pos 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid chen po rnyed do/_/ma grub 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]na grong khyer chen po rnyed do/_/til gyi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na grong gcig rnyed do/_/'bum phrag lnga sbyin sreg byas na nor sbyin pa dang mchog sbyin par byed cing /_de dbang du byed do/_/dung la brgya bzlas pa nyid kyis don thams cad thob par 
[\[14a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud chen po ras ris kyi gnas yongs su rdzogs so//_//slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs 
[\[14a.3\]]pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du pad+ma'i mtha' zhes pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bya dza ni/_be dza ni/_be dza ha te/_pad+ma ShaN+Da ni/_
[\[14a.4\]]pA sI ni bud+d+he/_bud+d+hA ya/_pa raM pa rA ya/_sarba ga ti bi dza yA ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa pad+ma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen po ste 'di rtag tu bzlas pas phyir bzlog par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub 
[\[14a.5\]]thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi bang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_pad+ma la bzhugs pa thams cad dkar po ral pa gyen du brdzes pa phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang /_g.yas pas ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'i phyag 
[\[14a.6\]]go/_/de nas ras ris gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol nas 'di nyid kyis dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad bya zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te bcom ldan 
[\[14a.7\]]'das la me tog stong phrag brgyad la lan re bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bsnun par bya'o/_/de ltar ji srid du stong phrag brgyad cu rdzogs pa'i mthar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas srod nas brtsams te bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha' las grub bo zhes pa'i tshig 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]'byung ste/_gal te mngon par 'dod pa de rnyed do/_/rgyal po dang gang dbang du byed par 'dod na sna ma'i phreng ba yongs su blangs nas me tog de re re la mngon par bsngags nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dbul te/_nyin zhag bdun thun gsum du dbul bar byas na dbang du 'gyur 
[\[14b.2\]]ro/_/bram ze dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar pa lA sha'i me la nyin zhag bdun thun gsum du g.yang gzhi nag po'i pags pas sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar bi la ba'i me la u dum bA ra'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na zhag gsum gyis 
[\[14b.3\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dmangs rigs dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i me la lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thun mong ba'i bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na me de la nas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dge slong ngam bram ze dbang du bya bar 
[\[14b.4\]]'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi me la dU ra ba'i sbyin sreg thun gsum nyi ma bdun du byas na bdun pa la dbang du 'gyur te/_gang dbang du bya ba de la zla ba gcig tu bzlas pas de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa 
[\[14b.5\]]yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa pad+ma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[14b.6\]]gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por pad+ma gzi brjid ces bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[14b.7\]]da ma ne da ma ne/_shAn+te shAn+te/_mA na se/_bi dza ye/_dza ye ba he/_an g+he/_a Narge/_dar+sha ne/_a pra ti hi ha ta/_sA sa ne/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_bi dza ya ba he/_ma ba ba raM/_sho b+ha ne/_ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_rA ya swA hA/_'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa pad+ma gzi brjid ces bya 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'o/_/'di rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te/_le brgan rtsi'i chu dang 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras ris 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[15a.2\]]dkar po ral pa gyen du brdzes pa phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o/_/de nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhugs nas/_'di nyid kyi dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa sreg cing 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/_/
[\[15a.3\]]de nas tsan+dan dkar po zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar la btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum bya'o/_/de ma thag tu rgyal srid rnyed do/_/ma grub na grong gcig go/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar pa lA sha'i 'am/_a ga ru mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na gos bye ba brgya 
[\[15a.4\]]rnyed do/_/le brgan rtsi'i sreg blugs 'bum byas na gter mthong ngo /_/gang bstan pa zla ba gcig tu bzlas na de'i don rnyed do zhes pa ste 'dod pas nye bar gzhag pa ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang 
[\[15a.5\]]ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa pad+ma gzi brjid ces bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal por dpal be'u 
[\[15a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ba su ra/_ma ra/_ba na/_g+hu g+hu/_naM pa raM/_pA ra ya naM/_e hi e hi/_bu d+h+ya bud+h+ya/_bo d+h+ya ye swA hA/_
[\[15a.7\]]'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/_dpal be'u zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dran pa tsam gyis nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/_/'di'i cho ga ni gur gum dang bsres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_pad+ma la bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/_g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_thugs kar dpal be'u'i mtshan mas brgyan pa'o/_/g.yas su gur gum gyis dpal be'u bri bar bya'o/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ras ris zhal 
[\[15b.2\]]nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas/_mchod rten de nyid kyis bdug pa bsregs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te/_nA ga ge sar re re la yongs su bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar bsnun par bya'o/_/
[\[15b.3\]]de lta bu zla bar rdzogs par byas na gter chen po mthong bar byed do/_/nyi ma bdun gyis gser stong rnyed do/_/phyogs kyi yul rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dpal 
[\[15b.4\]]be'u zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por mi 
[\[15b.5\]]'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_go pa ti ba ti/_tsa ra pa ti pa ti/_sha sa ni/_sha si ni/_b+hU b+hU/_tsi li ci li tsi lpa ya swA hA/_
[\[15b.6\]]'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste/_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rtag tu bzlas pas sa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni ras la li khri'i phye ma dang bsres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[15b.7\]]'drir gzhug par bya ste/_ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa/_gzhogs su son pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o/_/de nas ras ris de ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la/_mchod rten gyi byang du 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bzhugs nas 'di nyid kyis ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas so/_/mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas srod nas brtsams nas bzlas par bya/_nam mkha' las grub po zhes pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur te gang 
[\[16a.2\]]du mchod pa der char lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma grub na yul rnyed do/_/de'i spyan sngar pa lA sha'i me la klu shing gi me tog mar la btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na dngul 'bum rnyed do/_/dong tse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen 
[\[16a.3\]]brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa'i mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[16a.4\]]'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams te le'u rab 'byam bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags 
[\[16a.5\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag pa'i yul rnam par 'phro zhing rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs nas rtog 
[\[16a.6\]]pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma bsgrub par bya ba'i don du bdag gis 'chad bzhin pa'i ched du lha thams cad kun tu 'gegs kyi bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ba de la bdag gis sems can thams cad rab tu skrag par 
[\[16a.7\]]byed pa la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa bshad kyis/_kye lha'i tshogs rnams 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang /_bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad dang /_gang yang gzhan rig pa'i sde dpon rnams nyon cig_/bdag gis rig 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa'i rgyal po chen po khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal mo bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol mas gsungs pa/_rig pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag_/dbang du gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/_gsol ba 'debs pa mngon par 'du byed pa nyid de 
[\[16b.2\]]dang mthun par 'jigs pa chen po thams cad 'phrog pa dang /_skems pa dang /_gsod par byed pa/_rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir las kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi snga dro langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas shar la sogs par kun tu bltas te 
[\[16b.3\]]lag mthil la yongs su bzlas nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yang kun tu bltas nas der lag mthil la bzlas par bya'o/_/bgegs thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gdug pa'i bsam pa rnams la de bzhin du yang nyi ma so sor byas na thams cad ring por mi 
[\[16b.4\]]thogs pa kho nar thams cad zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rgyas pa can yang nyi ma nub pa'i dus tshod la de nyid kyis las bya'o/_/mngon spyod can la mtshan phyed na gnas gcig tu gtsug phud dgrol zhing lan bdun brjod cing nam mkha'i mthil du bltas nas blo rtse 
[\[16b.5\]]gcig tu bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i sems can mngon spyod can gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang lha'i tshogs dang /_'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang /_log par 'dren pa'i tshogs rnams kyang 'di skad ces bdag gis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i 
[\[16b.6\]]rgyal po gsang chen gsang ba'i sbyor ba byed par 'gyur ba de'i dngos grub gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub pa po dang sngags kyi rtog pa 'dir gsungs pa'i sgrub pa pos gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar kun tu rtogs par bya'i gzhan 
[\[16b.7\]]ma yin no zhes so/_/kye lha'i tshogs rnams rig pa chen po gang ma mo'i gsang chen gsang ba rnams nyon cig_/de skyid par byed pa'i cho ga'i rig pa yang bshad par bya'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtha' kun tu 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]snang ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/_/ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pas sems can thams cad kyang skye ba brjes te stobs dang brtson 'grus dang mthu dang rnam par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 
[\[17a.2\]]gyur to/_/snyoms par zhugs pa de las dang mthu dang bcas par langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ngo /_/nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[17a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'ong ba'am 'gro bar ga la 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[17a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/phyag na rdo rje gang khyod sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta bu yongs su zhus pa legs so legs so/_/des na rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[17a.5\]]shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di nyid rab tu ston par gyur 
[\[17a.6\]]to/_/lho phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de yang sgrol ma'i rig pa 'di nyid gsungs par gyur to/_/nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[17a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med ces bya ba des kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rig pa 'di gsungs par gyur to/_/byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus mdzes zhes bya ba de yang rig pa'i 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rgyal mo 'di nyid gsungs par gyur to/_/de ltar phyogs bcu rnams su yang de lta bu la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang ldan pa de rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang snying po 'di nyid kun tu bshad par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[17b.2\]]shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[17b.3\]]dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byung gnas la rig pa 'di'i rab tu ston to/_/de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing las 'das 
[\[17b.4\]]pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen rab snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 
[\[17b.5\]]yod do/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen rab snang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rig pa 'di sems can rnams kyi don gyi ched du 
[\[17b.6\]]ngas bshad kyis mchog tu zung shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rig pa mchog tu bzung bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[17b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba so sor 'khod do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i ched dang lha dang mi rnams kyang rjes su gzung ba'i ched dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[18a.2\]]ched du sems can thams cad la bshad par bya'i mchog tu zung shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa mchog tu bzung bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang byang 
[\[18a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de gzhan ma yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dir gyur pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[18a.4\]]chen po rin chen dpal zhes pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab snang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha mo gos dkar mo dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byas pa'i gnas su rigs kyi bu rig pa 'di 'gro ba dang 'ong ba nyid kyang rigs kyi bu rig pa'i 
[\[18a.5\]]rgyal po ston par byed do/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[18a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag phyag na rdo rje la dngos grub kyi don du rig pa sbyin par bgyi'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/phyag na 
[\[18a.7\]]rdo rje bdag gis kyang gos dkar mo'i snying po'i rig pa sbyin par bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]rnams la gcig tu snying brtse ba shin tu snying brtse ba can sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu stsol cig_/thub pas gsungs pa'i rig pa ston cig_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 
[\[18b.2\]]'jig par byed pa'i me ltar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang de'i 'od zer gyis kun tu skul bar byed pa byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dpral bar spyan gsum pa byung ste/_spyan de las sna tshogs dbang 
[\[18b.3\]]du byed pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/_/'od zer de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du yang rigs kyi bu gang khyod 'di lta bu'i rig pa smras pa legs so legs so zhes pa'i tshig thos so/_/sangs 
[\[18b.4\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang pad+ma dang /_ut+pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_dri bzang ldan pa dang /_ka To ra dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rig pa'i rgyal po 
[\[18b.5\]]smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rig pa gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_ar+ha te b+h+yaH/_samya ka saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_o~M b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni trA sa trA sa ya/_b+h+r-i 
[\[18b.6\]]ku Ti/_ta Ti/_bai ta Ti/_bai ta Ti/_swe te/_dza Ti ni swA hA/_rig pa 'di gsungs ma thag tu yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma' ba dang /_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma' ba dang /_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs 
[\[18b.7\]]dma' ba dang /_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' bar gyur te/_de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te gzhal yas khang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang gdan las bskyod/_dri za rnams kha bub tu gyur/_lha ma yin rnams 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]kyi dbyangs nyams pa dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams kyi sgyu mi mgyogs pa dang /_srin po rnams kyi tru ta ta ra dang /_gdug pa rnams nye bar 'gro bar gyur to/_/ma mo'i tshogs rnams ngu 'bod kyi nyam thag pa'i nga ro dang ngu 'bod kyi klag cor smra'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[19a.2\]]du gnod sbyin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams skyabs med dpung gnyen med de/_ji srid 'og min pa'i lha'i ris rnams kyang sreg par gyur to/_/lha rnams thams cad rings pa rings par de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar lhags so/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje yang 
[\[19a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyi 'od zer rnams kyis yid tshim nas stan las 'phos te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na nye bar lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad dang /_byang 
[\[19a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnams la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad de/_ma 'jigs shig_/grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/phyag na rdo rje rab tu zhugs shig_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[19a.5\]]pa'i gtsug tor sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa tsam la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 
[\[19a.6\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbyangs su gyis shig_/de nas lha de rnams thams cad dang /_dri za dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[19a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de nas 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa nyid ngo mtshar thob nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhags so/_/nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di lta bu'i gsang sngags byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[19b.2\]]dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes gsungs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gtsug tor nas nges par 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems 
[\[19b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i mthu lha rnams kyis sngon chad ma thos pa gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/'das pa'i dus na shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[19b.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi so sor gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ces bya ba gdags pa med de/_de rnams thams cad kyang rig pa 'dzin pa 
[\[19b.5\]]skyon med pa kho na ste/_rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa las ma 'das te/_rigs kyi bu lha thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad dang /_dri za dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la 
[\[19b.6\]]sogs pa 'di rnams mdor na rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rim pa las ma 'das pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ngo 
[\[19b.7\]]nye bar song nas dga' nas gsang sngags gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsa N+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_o~M Tak+ki hU~M phaT/_'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa rig pa mchog 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gi rgyal po'i snying po rig pa'i rgyal po stong bzlas par bya'o/_/rgyud phyi ma bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'o//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha dang /_dri za dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[20a.2\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_skem byad dang /_smyo byed dang /_gnon po dang /_log 'dren thams cad dang /_thams cad nas rgyal po dang /_lha dang sgra 'am/_chu klung dang /_rgya mtshor 
[\[20a.3\]]bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_sman chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhags so/_/nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos mngon par phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas de rnams thams cad kyis bcom 
[\[20a.4\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu ba 'ga' zhig yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[20a.5\]]dpa' dang /_lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzhin bzang dag legs so/_/gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa rnams 
[\[20a.6\]]'char ba'am/_nub par 'gyur ba gdags pa dang /_gang gi dus su rig pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_lha rnams kyis de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye lha rnams rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[20a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe rig pa rnams 'char bar 'gyur te/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_dal zhing dal ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_snying stobs dang /_le lo dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_srog gcod pa dang /_
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]drag po can dang /_sred pa dang /_brkam pa rnams te/_de rnams rtag tu mar mi shes pa dang /_phar mi shes pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis rig pa'i dngos grub mi rnyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[20b.2\]]'das pa na rdzu 'phrul chen po can/_mthu chen po can/_de rnams rig pa 'dzin pa'i ming du grags par gyur to/_/de rnams thams cad kyang rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang /_rig pa'i mthu yis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[20b.3\]]rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sdig med ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag bzhi'i mnga' bdag go/_/byang phyogs su ri rab lhun po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag bcu'i mnga' bdag go/_/ri rab lhun po ri'i rgyal 
[\[20b.4\]]po'i nye logs na glang po'i sde zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_gzhon pa dkar po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_cha byad bzang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_
[\[20b.5\]]gser gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_pad+ma bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_rdo rje'i phyag ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_rin chen kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_zhags 
[\[20b.6\]]pa'i phyag rgya ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_me lce 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_sgyu 'phrul kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /_rig pa 'dzin 
[\[20b.7\]]pa'i rgyal po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di rnams rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag bcu bzhis yongs su bskor ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa de rnams thams cad kyang bud med rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu rig pa 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'dzin pa 'di rnams skye ba bdun gyi nang du rig pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba ste/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nyid du rig pa 'di'i mthus dran pa so sor rnyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i gnas su gnas pas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[21a.2\]]nas lha dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de rnams ngo mtshar thob nas bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gis mngon par gtor bar gyur to/_/de nas lha thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pas dga' ba'i 
[\[21a.3\]]don du cho ga gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' des rig sngags gsungs pa/_o~M pad+ma badzri hU~M/_snying po'o/_/ga ga na bi dA ri Ni/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/o~M b+ha ya na sa ni phaT/_mgo bo'o/_/o~M tra pa ni hU~M/_gtsug tor du'o/_/o~M ta Ti hU~M/_go cha'o/_/o~M bai ta 
[\[21a.4\]]Ti hU~M/_gur ro/_/o~M swe te dza Ti ni phaT/_ra ba'o/_/zhes pa 'di dag rig pa'i 'khor gyi lhag ma'o/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis dri dang me tog bdug pa la sogs pa'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 
[\[21a.5\]]'das ma'i ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs so/_/dang po re zhig tshad med cing skra dang bral ba'i ras bkrus pa tsan+dan dkar po dang a ga ru'i 'dab ma spang spos dang lhan cig sbyar ba bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas lan bdun bkru bar bya'o/_/bkrus 
[\[21a.6\]]pa la yang byug par bya'o/_/'byung po'i skra dang /_ga dza hwa dang /_sha tru g+ha ni dang /_pri yang+ku ste 'di rnams kyis bdug par bya'o/_/'di rnams kyis gang 'dod pa de grub par mtshon no/_/mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas par gyur nas mi blo dang ldan pas mnyan par 
[\[21a.7\]]bya'o/_/de nas tho rangs dang mtshan mo me sbar nas rang gi khrag gis btags pa'i yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis ras ris 'dri bzhin pa la bgegs mi 'byung ngo /_/de bas kyang byug par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du na log 'dren gyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pas grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rang nyid kyis rigs sngags zlos bzhin pas ri mo mkhan khrus byed du gzhug go/_/bkrus nas de la yang gos rab tu sbyin par bya ste ji srid 'dri ba'i bar ro/_/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas par bya zhing /_
[\[21b.2\]]'dri bzhin pa na yang ras kyi mthar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing /_bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/dbus su yang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o/_/der yang bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya'o/_/bum pa de rnams thams cad kyang me tog gis 
[\[21b.3\]]brgyan par bya'o/_/mar me'i phreng ba yang dbul lo/_/rig pa 'dzin pas rig pa yid la byed cing bdug spos bsreg par bya'o/_/de nas ri mo mkhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas tshangs 
[\[21b.4\]]pa'i ri mo gdab par bya'o/_/de nas slar yang rig pa 'dzin pas kha shar du mngon par phyogs pas nye bar zhugs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar a pA marga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/de nas ri mo mkhan gyis lha la phul ba'i ston mo zos pas 
[\[21b.5\]]ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/gser mdog pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[21b.6\]]dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba la ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba/_spyan gsum pa/_dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ba/_pad+ma la gnas pa'o/_/de'i rgyab tu rig pa'i lha mo gos dkar po bgos pa/_pad+ma rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i bar 
[\[21b.7\]]ma chad par khro gnyer can ma gos dkar po 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rje chen po pri yang+ku ltar sngo bsangs phyag na rin po che bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas thams cad kyang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gang gi tshad du bya zhing pad+ma la gnas shing so sor gnas pa'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su phyag na rdo rje sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon gyi gzhogs su rig pa'i rgyal po dam pa rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa'o/_/
[\[22a.2\]]rig pa'i rgyal po'i nye logs su gser ldan ma yang rdo rje lcags kyu ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/rdo rje khu tshur sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_rdo rje bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/rdo rje dbyug pa dbyug pa bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[22a.3\]]rdo rje blo gros rdo rje ma dang gnam lcags ma yang rdo rje dbyug pa'i rgyab tu 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yon du lha skrag pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can rdo rje drag tu dgod pa 'drir gzhug cing /_phyag na rdo rje'i nye logs su rdo rje sde dang gtsug 'phyang rgyan 
[\[22a.4\]]thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/thams cad kyang pad+ma la so sor gnas pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste/_log 'dren gyi rigs bzhi rnams rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can 'bros bzhin pa 'og tu bri bar bya'o/_/de rnams kyi 'og tu 
[\[22a.5\]]pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o/_/klu lag na pad+ma thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/lha'i tshogs thams cad kyang me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/lha'i rnga bo che 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs 
[\[22a.6\]]pa rnams kyang mtshon cha dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus med 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po'i nye logs su sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/ras ris 'di bris pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa thams 
[\[22a.7\]]cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi nas lha rnams bde blag tu sgrub bo/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ras ris kyi rgyal po'i mchog de'i spyan sngar slong mo bza' zhing /_rig pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas 'di la rig pa 'dzin pa lus med kyi rmi lam du ston 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]par byed de/_rigs kyi bu sgrubs shig sgrubs shig ces so/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lcags gsum gyi pad+ma gser gyi snying po can 'dab ma zangs dang chu ba dngul la 'dab ma stong pa'o/_/pad+ma bzhis yongs su bskor ba bzhi po 'di/_'dab ma brgya par byed du gzhug go/_/
[\[22b.2\]]phyi nas sgrub pa pos 'o ma dang zan za zhing rig pa bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas par byas la ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhugs nas pad+ma'i g.yas kyi lus la bcom ldan 'das ma'i lha thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/_/rab tu 'bad pas
