[\[43b.1\]]don grub pa/_mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba/_de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/_de ji lta ba bzhin rtog par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir rig pa ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo bid+yA de ba tA ya/_
[\[43b.2\]]na mo bid+yA de ba tA nAM na ma/_sarba s+yai ba/_bI d+yA ku la baM sha s+ye/_tad+ya thA/_sarba aR+tha bi g+h+na bi nA sha ya A ha ri/_ha re ha re/_bi ha re/_pi hA te dza bi ma le/_a b+ha ye/_tsa lo/_stam+b+ha ni/_puSh+ka re/_shud+d+he muk+ke muk+ke/_bi kur bi te/_pra b+hA swa re A lo ki te b+h+yaH/_bi lA ka la/_sarba 
[\[43b.3\]]satwa/_a ba lo ka ni swA hA/_rig pa 'dis las 'di rnams su 'gyur te bsnyen pa'i dus dang sgrub pa'i dus su yang dang po nyid du bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/_/bslab pas bcing ba'i grogs rnams kyang lan bdun nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i chu spyi bor blugs pas thams cad du 
[\[43b.4\]]bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_bsngags pa la sogs pa yang 'di nyid kyis bya'o/_/ras ris blangs te lha rnams dang ras ris la kun tu bsrung ba dang /_ras ris kyi gnas su tshon gzhan dang ma 'dres pa dang /_spyan drangs pa'i 
[\[43b.5\]]lha rnams la mchod yon dbul ba dang /_yang dag par gnas pa dang /_bdag nyid dang grogs byed pa rnams kyang 'di nyid kyis khu ba bcing bar bya'o/_/khu ba bcings pas log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa dang /_gnas kun tu bsrung ba'o/_/'di nyid kyis tsha ba'i 
[\[43b.6\]]til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/bdag nyid dang grogs byed pa rnams kyang rung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phyogs gang du sngon du bsnyen pa dang /_sgrub pa dang /_zhi ba can dang /_rgyas pa can dang /_mngon spyod can ci yin 
[\[43b.7\]]pa de nyid du gdon mi za bar bya'o/_/yang na gzhan du thang gi phyogs sam/_sa'i gnas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ba'am/_gzhan las bya ba der byi dor dang por bya'o/_/rnam pa 'dis gtor ma sbyong ba dang /_bdag nyid srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_chu blugs 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pa dang /_mdor na sgrub pa dang /_las gang cung zad yin pa de 'dis bsrung ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/srung ba'i rig pa ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[44a.2\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_tA rA yai/_A gats+tsha de bi/_pad+ma ha ste na/_ba de/_pad+ma haste/_ya sho ba ti/_ro Sha Na shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha/_ma ha de bi gi_/ma hA bi gi_/ha ra ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa la tsa la/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_b+ha ga ba te/_i daM gan+d+ha puSh+pa/_
[\[44a.3\]]mA l+ya/_sarba nI yaM/_pra yats+tsha tha/_bud+d+ha sat+ye na/_d+ha rmas t+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_rig pa dang po gang yin pa des dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/rig pa 'dis a ga ru'i bdug pa dang sngar brjod pa'i rig pas lan gsum mam bdun bzlas 
[\[44a.4\]]pas byi dor dang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags nas sgrub pa ni rig pa bzlas par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar bya ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa 
[\[44a.5\]]rA ya/_bo d+hI satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_Ar+ya tA rA yai/_ar+ha t+te/_su gan+d+ha/_mA l+ya/_pri ye/_tsan+t+ra/_tsan+t+ra ma ti/_gan+d+ha nu le pa nAM/_pra tI ts+tshi swA hA/_'dis mchod yon dbul zhing dri dang gdan yang ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[44a.6\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na ma Ar+ya tA rA yai/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_ma hA pra b+hA ye/_prah+ma su ma no nu ru ha/_ha ra ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra/_de bi pra sA d+ha ku ru pra tIts+tsha tha puSh+pa swA hA/_me tog gi rig pa ste 'dis 
[\[44a.7\]]me tog rnams dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_Ar+ya tA rA yai/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_man+t+ra/_ma nu smar/_sarba de ba/_pri 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]ye b+ha ga ba ti/_a ba lo ki ni/_sid+d+ha sid+d+ha pra thA ne/_bud+d+ha sat+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_bdug pa'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga ta ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA 
[\[44b.2\]]ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA dU te/_badzra d+hu na/_a nu dzai/_be gi/_be gi/_d+hu ru d+hu ru sarba dzI ba/_pri ye/_bud+d+hA sa t+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_gtor ma'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_
[\[44b.3\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+ye/_Ar+ya tA rA yai/_a pra ti ha te/_b+ha ga ba te A ha re ha re pad+ma b+ha si ni shI tAM ge/_she ta p+hu dze/_d+hu me d+hu me/_bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_'di ni mar 
[\[44b.4\]]me'i rig pa'o/_/de bzhin du rig pa 'dis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa la thams cad mtshungs pa nyid du sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo 
[\[44b.5\]]ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_tad+ya thA/_A ga ma/_A ga ma/_ga ga na ta la/_saM pra tso/_di t+yai/_sarba bid+yA/_d+ha ra/_bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_rig pa 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu chu la yongs su bzlas nas bum pa la sogs pa bdag 
[\[44b.6\]]nyid la mngon par gtor bar bya ste khrus kyi rig pa'o/_/'di nyid kyis lha rnams la yang khrus gsol ba'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha 
[\[44b.7\]]ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_d+hu d+hu me/_d+hu d+hu me/_khu khu me/_khu khu me/_nA shud+d+ha/_sid+d+hi kany+tsa ni/_shud+d+hi kA re/_shu tsa ni swA hA/_rig pa 'di sgrub pa pos rtag tu gos la lan cig gam/_lan bdun bzlas la yongs su bcang bar bya'o/_/rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa rnams 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]kyis nges par ston no/_/gdon mi za ba kho nar sgrub pa pos bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_Ar+ya tA rA yai/_
[\[45a.2\]]shAn+tiM/_me ka ro hi/_shan+ti mA te/_shi shAn+ta/_ni shAn+ta/_ka l+yA Ni ni shAn+ta/_bi dza ye/_de bi ba ra de swA hA/_rig pa 'dis bdag nyid la lan bdun bzlas nas gnyid log par bya'o/_/rmi lam du log par 'dren pa mi mthong ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA 
[\[45a.3\]]ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya tA rA yai/_sUr+ya ta u pa ri/_tra byaM/_d+ha ra Ni/_ban+d+hi ti/_kar+d+ha sho d+ha ni/_ku tsa mA li ni/_shu tra bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_ku sha bi shod+ha ni swA hA/_ku shas mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[45a.4\]]byas te/_khu ba 'ching ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba ta Ar+ya tA rA yai/_ha ri ping+ga li/_ha ri ha ri/_hi b+ha ga p+ha pa ti/_a 
[\[45a.5\]]tsa la pra tiSh+Tha te/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_ku sha piN+Da ma ba s+thi ta s+ya/_bud+d+ha sat+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_d+harma sa t+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_rig pa 'dis ku sha'i khres la mngon par bsngags nas nye bar 'dug par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA 
[\[45a.6\]]ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_di shi ba di shi ban+d+ha ni/_su de bi su pra sA ste/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_hasta/_ka la ba la/_ka la ba la/_ba ba/_he la he la/_ku ru ku ru/_bud+d+ha sat+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha 
[\[45a.7\]]sat+ye na gan+d+ha gan+d+ha/_bi ma le swA hA/_dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dza la dza la/_dza la/_k+Sho b+ha ya/_na sha ni dza la sho d+ha ni/_sa mi ri Ni/_dza la hA si Ni/_bi sho d+ha Ni swA hA/_nye reg gi rig pa'o/_/sgrub pa po dngos grub 'dod pas rig pa 'dis bdag nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta 
[\[45b.2\]]thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_sarba de bA su man+te a saM ga tA re/_a saM ga bi mu/_a saM ga ti muk+ta bi muk+ta/_bi dza ye/_nir mA l+yai/_a pa ri kalpe ni/_puSh+pa 
[\[45b.3\]]gan+d+ha bi sho d+ha ni/_bi sho Sha ya/_hi da ma Ni/_da ma ni swA hA/_rig pa 'dis dri med nyid gsal bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru 
[\[45b.4\]]Ni kA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_sarba satwA kri ta/_pri kri ta/_prau k+d+ya/_kri ta/_sa ka le da se/_sa ka lo bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_rig pa 'dis lha bshos dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[45b.5\]]a ba lo ki te shra rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya tA rA yai/_swap+na pa Ni/_brdzA/_gardzA/_mi r+sha ya/_pra t+yak+ShaM/_bA e baM/_byA hA ra/_ka thA ya swA hA/_rig pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas seng ldeng gi 
[\[45b.6\]]shing gis me sbar nas nU la ka brti la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong brgyad brgya byas na/_rmi lam ston par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[45b.7\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_e hi b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA b+ha tI na ma b+ha yaM ka ra bA lA nA ma b+hA yaM/_da da/_b+hak+ta nA/_mar+thaM ka ra/_a tra NI nAM/_tra ya ka_/duHkhi tA nAM/_sau khyaM/_ka ra ma ma/_b+ha ga ba te/_ma nu kaM saM/_ka re hi/_b+ha ga bA na/_
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]A gats+tsha A gats+tsha i maM/_gan+d+ha puSh+pa/_ba li/_d+hu pany+tse ta/_gr-i h+na/_tad+ya thA/_pra sA de pra sA de ba ti/_ma hA/_de bi/_ma hA pra b+he/_sUr+ya pra b+he/_a mo g+he/_a mo g+ha sa ti/_ya sho ba ti/_a mo g+ha saM dar+sha na/_a mo g+ha bi ma laM/_a mo g+ha ha laM/_tsa la tsa la/_sar sar/_
[\[46a.2\]]ha ra ha ra/_tra ye/_hi maM/_sid+d+hi ra me/_dad swA hA/_nus pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos rig pa 'dis dri dang /_me tog dang /_gtor ma rab tu dbul bar bya zhing /_bsnyen pa'i dus dang sgrub pa'i dus der ram gzhan gang cung zad 'bras bu la sogs pa de thams cad 'di nyid kyis 
[\[46a.3\]]dbul bar bya'o/_/'dis lha rnams sbyong ba dang /_dge ba'i rmi lam dang /_dbul ba dang /_bstod pa dang /_sgrub pa pos glegs bam klog pa dang /_mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa thams cad 'di nyid kyis dbul bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a 
[\[46a.4\]]mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya da rA yai/_tad+ya thA/_ma ra ma ra/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_pu ra pu ra/_la la/_la la/_ra ra/_ra ra/_
[\[46a.5\]]tsa la tsa la/_kha kha/_kha kha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_bud+d+ha sat+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_saM g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_rig pa 'di'i thal bas sgrub pa po'i dkyil 'khor bcing pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na 
[\[46a.6\]]ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te Ar+ya tA rA yai/_tad+ya thA/_hi ri hi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_ki ri ki ri/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_ba ra ba ra/_da ra da ra/_gats+tsha gats+tsha/_b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma 
[\[46a.7\]]hA satwA ya/_ya thA su kha~M/_rig pa 'dis me tog gi snyim pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig pas bskul bar 'gyur te/_gshegs su gsol ba'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHsarba de ba ni/_na mo bid+yA de bA nAM/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_e hi b+ha ga ba te ma hA rak+Sha si tsa se Ti/_I Ti miSh+Ti/_a su ra pra marda ni/_e ka dza Ti/_ti rAk+Sha si/_sa hi ta de bi ma tsa ma sA/_bi he thi ya/_ki ri si ti/_rA ka pA li/_ka ra pa ri/_kA mA ri kaM pa ra kA lits+tsha Ta pri ye/_ma hA ka pA li tsaN+Da li/_ma hA tsaN+Da li/_ma hA tsaN+Da li/_sid+d+hi sarba 
[\[46b.2\]]ar+tha/_sA d+ha ni/_sarba bi g+h+na/_pra NA sa ni swA hA/_'di ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ste/_de'i spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te rig pa 'dis dri dang me tog dang gtor ma dang bdug pa la nyi ma so sor mngon par bsngags nas mchod par bya'o/_/'di skad ces 
[\[46b.3\]]brjod par bya zhing /_bdag la bgegs thams cad mi g.yo bar gyur cig_/de yang bdag la bgegs gyis shig_/de lta bu'i sgrub pa po la bgegs med par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa po gang cung zad sgrub pa rtsom pa na bgegs med par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa gzhan du 
[\[46b.4\]]rnam par 'joms par byed do/_/zhes pa sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa 'di rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po bklags pas grub pa/_'dir ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de ltar sgrub pa po'i las thams cad 'grub par byed do/_/zhes pa de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[46b.5\]]ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rim pa'i le'u yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems 
[\[46b.6\]]can thams cad kun tu snang bar gyur pas/_rig pa thams cad bskul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[46b.7\]]hA re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis ri'i rtse mor slong mo za bas mchod rten dang /_khyim du thun gsum du rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/mi smra bas 'o ma dang nas zan za ba'am slong mo za bas ku sha bting pa la nyal te zla ba gsum ma ma zla ba gcig gis 'phags pa 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang lhan cig tu lha mo sgrol ma mthong bar byed do/_/mchog gang slong pa rgyal srid dam/_mi snang ba'am/_phug tu 'jug pa'am/_gter 'pho ba'am/_yul gyi bdag po yang rung ste/_gang bslangs pa de rnyed cing rtag tu 
[\[47a.2\]]rnyed do/_/ma bsgrubs par yang rig pas gtan la 'gems par byed pa dang /_rdul du byed pa dang /_gnon par byed pa dang /_'byin pa dang /_mtshon cha 'chang ba dang /_phug gi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'gems par byed pa la bdag nyid bsrung ba byas te/_g.yul 
[\[47a.3\]]du mngon par zhugs na rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/gzhan srung na grub pa'i bya ba thams cad byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_po d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ta d+ya thA/_tA re tA re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus 
[\[47a.4\]]su mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'am/_bsnyen pa ma byas pa yang rung ste/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas sna ma'i me tog dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dngul stong phrag brgya 
[\[47a.5\]]rnyed de yang na mthong ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re/_tu t+tA re tu re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams nas sngar brjod pa'i bris sku'i mchog bya ste mthar zla ba nya ba la dri dang /_
[\[47a.6\]]bdug pa dang gtor ma dang /_me tog rnams phul nas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas ut+pal sngon po la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag 
[\[47a.7\]]brgyad bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha' la grub bo grub bo zhes pa'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/yang na ras ris g.yo bar byed do/_/de lta bus ni grub par 'gyur te/_yul dang grong dang grong khyer ram rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug so sor rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tu re tu re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas zla ba dang nyi ma gzas bzung ba na a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bcug nas gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i lag pa kha sbyar gyis mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang /_du ba 'thul ba 
[\[47b.2\]]dang 'bar bde srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do/_/du ba 'thul bzhin pas ni mi snang ba dang cha drug 'phrog go/_/'bar bas ni nam mkhar 'gro'o/_/thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog dang /_skra li 
[\[47b.3\]]zhing 'khyil ba/_lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/_lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing lus tha dad pa'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'dis 
[\[47b.4\]]rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i sor mo byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas dri dang me tog dang gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/du ba 'thul ba la blangs nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/cha drug 'phrog go/_/lo stong phrag 
[\[47b.5\]]lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re/_tA rA yai b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/_rig pa 'dis til mar la lan brgyad mngon par bsngags te bskus na rma med par byed do/_/tshor ba med par byed 
[\[47b.6\]]do/_/zug rngu med par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_tut+tA re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis 'bum yongs su bzlas te lan bdun yongs su bzlas pa'i chu la gtor bar bya/_
[\[47b.7\]]ma na ka ra dang /_ru sbal la sogs pa'i mchu bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo gi te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis chen po rnams kyi las kyi lam thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/til 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]mar la brgya phrag bcur yongs su bzlas nas sbyin du gzhug par bya ste/_gzir ba dang /_mdoms kyi nad dang /_gcin sri ba dang /_rked pa bsdams pa la byin na nad med par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[48a.2\]]ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tu re swA hA/_rig pa 'dis sha za'i rims dang /_'byung po'i rims dang /_gdon rnam par 'joms pa la srad bus thar bar byed do/_/mi mo rab tu btsa' bzhin pa la til mar la brgyad brgyar yongs su bzlas nas lte ba 'am rked par bskus na 
[\[48a.3\]]zug rngu med par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re muHswA hA/_rig pa 'dis brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/_kum+b+hi ra dang bA ra Ni dang /_a nan+ta dang /_be ta shi dang /_
[\[48a.4\]]tshangs ma dang /_shu dag dang /_bri ha ti rnams sbrang rtsi dang yang dag par ldan pa zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas zla ba mthong ba nas ji srid grol ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de zos pas mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dis g.yul ngor 'jug pa la brgyad 
[\[48a.5\]]brgya mngon par bzlas nas lag pa la chings shig_/stobs chen por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re mu lu mu lu swA hA/_rig pa 'dis dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams 
[\[48a.6\]]te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i shing gi 'og tu me tog yu ti ka dang /_kaR+Ni ka ra rnams 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/dngul brgya rnyed pa'am/_yang na mthong ngo /_/zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum smyung bar 
[\[48a.7\]]gnas te/_mtshan phyed nas chu klung du phyin nas dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste dong tse lnga brgya rnyed pa'am/_yang na mthong ngo /_/'dis zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du so ma rA dza'i 'bras bu rnams phye ma zhib mor byas 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]nas mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i ril bu bya'o/_/a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du btums nas lag pas mnan te ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de zo shig_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo 
[\[48b.2\]]d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_tu re tu re/_da ra da ra swA hA/_rig pa 'dis nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas de nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas 'o ma dang nas zan za bas phyogs su gso sbyong 
[\[48b.3\]]byas te pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba 'bum dbul bar bya'o/_/gter mthong ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_
[\[48b.4\]]tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spobs pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA yi/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/_
[\[48b.5\]]tA re tA re/_tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'od gnyis sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tu re/_tu re 
[\[48b.6\]]swA hA/_'di ni sgron ma'i snying po'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig 
[\[48b.7\]]pa'o/_/de nas rig pa 'di rnams kyis mchog tu grub pa'i cho ga phyogs tsam du 'gyur te/_ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed do/_/zhes pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/mdor na 'jigs pa chen po rnams dang /_las phran tshegs rnams la'ang 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di la yang rig pa sgrub par 'dod pas rig pa des ba byung lngas lus kun tu sbyangs nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/ji srid 
[\[49a.2\]]du zla ba nya la 'bum yang rung ngo /_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas a ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor drug pa'i tshad la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'am/_tu ruSh+ka'i til mar 
[\[49a.3\]]gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/_/de nas las su 'gyur te mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa/_gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du'am/_
[\[49a.4\]]so so'i khyim du stong phrag bcur mngon par bsngags nas lag pa la bcings na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas pad+ma stong phrag sum cu seng ldeng gi sol bas me sbar nas sbyin sreg byas na rang gi gzugs kyi lha mo mthong 
[\[49a.5\]]ngo /_/gang bslangs pa de rnyed do/_/tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas u dum bA ra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas mar gyi sreg blugs stong sbyin sreg byas na grong rnyed do/_/
[\[49a.6\]]rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du mchod rten stong byed du gzhug go/_/nyi ma so so re re la mchod rten la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pas dri dang me tog la sogs pa 'di la phul nas ji srid du mchod rten phyi ma 'bar ba de nas bcom ldan 'das byon par shes par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[49a.7\]]'das byon pa na sa g.yo ba dang dri zhim po'i rlung ldang ste/_ji srid du rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar gnas pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/mchog gang slong ba'i mchog stsol bar mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi 'dab ma'i dum bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]nyi ma so sor grong re re rnyed do/_/dgon par song nas rig pa bye ba bzlas par bya'o/_/slong mo bza' zhing zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu bya'o/_/ji srid lha rnams [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo'i gzugs su byas nas 'ong 
[\[49b.2\]]bar 'gyur te de la 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/de yang gter stsol bar byed de blang bar bya'o/_/rang nyid longs shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal srid dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_rin po che rnams ster bar byed de/_rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sbyar zhing /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[49b.3\]]la dbul bar bya'o/_/dgon par zhugs nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya zhing /_a ga ru'i shing la rab tu gnas pa'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la shing pat+sa laN+Di ka la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong byas na 'dod 'jo'i ba ser 
[\[49b.4\]]skyar 'ong ngo /_/slar yang pat+sa laN+Di ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu bya'o/_/'ongs nas kyang grub par 'gyur te lo stong du 'o ma sbyin par byed do/_/sngar brjod pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar dang /_sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/
[\[49b.5\]]zla ba drug tu dong tse stong rnyed do/_/yang na pa Na stong lhag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/ku mu da'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /_sangs rgyas la mngon par dang bas lha rnams mchog sbyin par byed do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[49b.6\]]dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas g.yul du gtor bar byas te 'di nyid stong phrag bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i bcu gsum la dri dang 
[\[49b.7\]]me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas nas me tog kha bye ba dang mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/thal ba blangs nas gzhan gyi dpral bar thig le byas te/_grong dang grong khyer du rab tu 'jug par byed de/_thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nag po'i bcu 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bzhi nas ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas pa Ta'i shing gi 'og tu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te dri dang bdug pa phul nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma phul te 
[\[50a.2\]]mi'i rus pa blangs nas rtse gsum byed du gzhug go/_/lag pa g.yon pas lan bdun 'phangs pa mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rtse gsum 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pas gang sprul pa der 
[\[50a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/lha'i khang par zla ba dang nyi ma gzas bzung ba na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi khang par ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar srang gcig blangs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gser gyi snod du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod 
[\[50a.4\]]pa byas te zla ba mi lta ba nyid du ku shas steng nas g.yogs te bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bzhin pa na btung bar bya/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/_/lci ba byung ba na btung bar bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar bzhin pa ni btung bar bya ste nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/zla 
[\[50a.5\]]ba drug tu sngon spyad pa byas pa ba'i gcin dang nas zan bza' zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma rtag tu bzlas pas ma blangs par gser brgya rnyed do/_/cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi lor brtsam par bya ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[50a.6\]]gi spyan sngar mchod pa byas nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pa lags pa de bzhin du phul te yan lag brgyad kyi gso sbyong dang yang dag par ldan pas lo rdzogs pa na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris 'ching bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 
[\[50a.7\]]byas nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te/_ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar ches lhag pa'i mchod pa dang /_slong mo bza' bar bya ste grub bo zhes pa'i tshig 'don par byed do/_/mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas pas pha rol zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/cho 'phrul gyi phyogs 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa de bzhin du phul nas dung gi me tog can gyi me tog stong phrag brgya la i gu ta'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/_grong dang /_grong 
[\[50b.2\]]khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang pra dbab par byed par 'dod na mtshan mo bdun du 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing mtshan mo gcig tu gso sbyong dang ldan pas dri ma med pa'i mar gyis lhud de bkang nas dkar 
[\[50b.3\]]po'i mar sar gyis mar me sbar nas gzhon nu 'am gzhon nu ma la bstan par bya'o/_/de nyid du ras ris bzhugs nas ku sha bting ba la nyal bar bya'o/_/rmi lam du rdzas stong phrag nyi shu mthong ngo /_/cha phyed dkon mchog gsum la sbyar bar bya'o zhes so/_/ras ris 
[\[50b.4\]]kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du nyi ma re re la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/dri dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/_/mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs 
[\[50b.5\]]spyad de rig pa bzlas par byas la/_cho 'phrul gyi phyogs nas lam po cher song la 'byung po'i brang du gnas par bya'o/_/rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/yungs kar bre ru blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par bsngags nas phyogs bcu dang 'og tu gtor bar bya'o/_/
[\[50b.6\]]mchog bdag nyid la ston par byed de/_de bzhin du nag po'i brgyad pa la dri gtsang khang du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa stong du bzlas par bya'o/_/dri dang me tog la sogs pa dang /_gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas de nas rmi lam du bcom ldan 'das ral pa'i cod 
[\[50b.7\]]pan byas pa mthong bar byed do/_/sa ga'i zla ba dkar po'i phyogs la 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas nyi ma re re la ston mo bya'o/_/chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi sman dang sa bon thams cad kyis yongs 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]su bkang ba byas nas gzhag par bya'o/_/mtshan mo re re la stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags par byas nas bya rog gi tshang du bu byung gi bar khye'u dang bu mo bkru bar bya'o/_/rgyal srid kyi don nam/_longs spyod kyi don zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'grub bo/_/
[\[51a.2\]]nag po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das ma mchod pa byas nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa dbul bar byas nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te me tog brgya pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/zla ba gcig tu bza' ba dang btung ba mi zad pa 'byung ngo /_/
[\[51a.3\]]dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs nas lan bdun mngon par bzlas te bdag nyid kyi dpral ba'am/_gzhan gyi mgo bor btab par byas nas grong du zhugs na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pas 'ching ba las grol bar byed do/_/gtan pa gcog par byed do/_/lpags 
[\[51a.4\]]bdun nyams par byed do/_/mA li ka'i me tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za zhing zla ba drug tu 'dod pa bzhin du dong tse rnyed do/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ut+pal sngon po'i snying 
[\[51a.5\]]po sbyin sreg stong bya ste/_ming nas smos te nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tsam pa ka dang /_kar+Ni ka yis dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya zhing /_ming nas smos na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad 
[\[51a.6\]]du bzlas pa dang /_ras ris kyi spyan sngar a ga ru'i yam shing gis 'bum phrag gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la sgrub pa la rab tu 'jug ste ji srid bcom ldan 'das byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/sa g.yo ba'am mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba'am ras ris g.yo bar byed 
[\[51a.7\]]pa dang grub bo/_/grub bo zhes tshig 'don par byed na rgyal srid dam yul gyi bdag po nyid rnyed do/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba drug gi nang du stong phrag lnga so sor rnyed do/_/ring bsrel 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgya bzlas par byas te dngul stong rnyed do/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'dod pas gzhon nu 
[\[51b.2\]]mas bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas blangs nas bskor bar bya ste/_skal ba bzang po nyid rnyed do/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas til nag po la stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste srad bu can dang til dang sol ba nyid do/_/ring bsrel 
[\[51b.3\]]dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas u dum bA ra'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar dkar po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/yul gru lnga'i dpon 
[\[51b.4\]]por 'gyur ro/_/byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas/_til la zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa byas nas gal te til de rnams phyogs dang phyogs bral du song na de'i tshe grub pa 
[\[51b.5\]]yin te sems can thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na til mar lan bdun cu phul nas ji srid lbu ba 'byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/'thungs na thos pa 
[\[51b.6\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu ru ka la stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas blangs na grong gcig rnyed do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya ste dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/a pA marga'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang 
[\[51b.7\]]mar gyis btags te nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na grong rnyed do/_/bu mang po can gyi yam shing la me sbar nas shu dag stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/thal ba des thig le bya'o/_/mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma gyur na lan gsum du yang 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]bsgrub par bya'o/_/zla ba gzas bzung ba na chu klung gi 'gram du song nas bil ba'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bil ba'i me tog la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gnod sbyin gzhon nu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo phyed na rig pa 
[\[52a.2\]]stong phrag bzlas nas de nas gcig 'ong bar byed de/_gter rnams sam/_nor gyi bdag po gang tshig gis brjod de byed do/_/nag po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das la dri dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gtor ma'i cho 
[\[52a.3\]]ga bya ste rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/sha za rnams 'ong bar byed do/_/gter rkos shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de nas gter stsol bar byed de blangs nas bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum po rnams la dbul bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du ras ris bcing ba'i las 
[\[52a.4\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ba ru ra'i shing gis me sbar nas/_nyi ma so sor til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o/_/blon po dbang du byed pa la yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur 
[\[52a.5\]]ro/_/bud med dang skyes pa dbang du byed pa la phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/a ru ra'i shing gis me sbar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor sgron shing gis sbyin sreg stong bya ste dong tse brgya rnyed do/_/slong mo za bas nyi ma so sor dus gsum du pa 
[\[52a.6\]]lA sha'i sbyin sreg bya ste/_gser brgya so sor rnyed do/_/rgya mtshor song nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzla ste/_ji srid rin po che rnams sbyin par byed do/_/blang bar bya ste dkon mchog gsum la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/_/sngags 'di nyid kyis sa ga'i zla ba nya ba la mtshan 
[\[52a.7\]]thog thag tu bzlas pa bar ma chad pa brjod par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi shing drung du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas a pA marga'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/bdag nyid ston pa yungs kar gyis grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]zhi bar 'dod na 'bras yos kyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyas par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang 'bras thug po ches thun gsum du sbyin sreg brgyad brgyar bya'o/_/nyi ma gsum du a mra'i yam shing gis me 
[\[52b.2\]]sbar nas dur b+ha dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/rtsod par 'dod pa rnams kyi smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma so sor 'bru rlon pa dang /_phub ma rnams lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg byas nas ming nas smos na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[52b.3\]]rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg thun mtshams gsum du stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/nyi ma gsum du a mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur b+ha dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po 
[\[52b.4\]]rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'o ma dang ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan dang bsod snyoms za ba'am mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kun tu spyad cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dang shing shun 'chang bas sgrub pa byas te/_/gang gar gtun shing gi sgra dang bral ba gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu 
[\[52b.5\]]bo'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas khru bdun pa'i sa'i gong bu bzhi byas nas dbus su 'dab ma stong gi pad+ma byas te/_de'i steng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi lcags lnga las byas pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bris sku'i spyan 
[\[52b.6\]]sngar bsgrub par bya'o/_/dri zhim po'i dri rnams dang tsan+dan dkar dmar gyis mchod nas man+da ra ba'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang phreng ba brgya phul nas bcom ldan 'das la dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o/_/mar gyi mar me'i phreng ba bdun dbul 
[\[52b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir mar gyi bum pa bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi sa bon thams cad kyis gang bar rin po che rnams bcu gnas gzhag par bya'o/_/a ga ru dang /_kun du ru ka dang /_dpal rnams btags pa dang /_gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas phyogs bzhir sngar brjod pas zho zan sngon ma can dbul bar bya'o/_/lho ru ni na b+hu tak+t+ra ra dar ba chu dang bsres pa sbyin par bya'o/_/byang phyogs su 'o thug gis gang ba'i gtor mas nye bar mchod par bya'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[53a.2\]]cad la phyogs bzhir rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung bar bya'o/_/pa lA sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas a pA marga'i yam shing la mar gyis btags la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/_sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/ming nas smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yam 
[\[53a.3\]]shing gis me sbar nas lan tshwa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas te/_mgo bo nas brtsams te ji srid rkang pa'i bar du sreg blugs re re la lan bdun bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/ming nas smos pa'i rgyal po dbang du 'gyur 
[\[53a.4\]]ro/_/dkar po'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te/_sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /_'phags pa spyan 
[\[53a.5\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gser dngul gyi snod du ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa blangs nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_lag pa g.yon pas snod bzung lag pa g.yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrug par bya ste/_
[\[53a.6\]]ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du'o/_/de nas btung bar bya ste/_yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig brjod pas thos pa 'dzin par byed do/_/de la du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/'bar bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag thams cad na 
[\[53a.7\]]ba nye bar zhi bar 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis snga dro las brtsam par bya'o/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas dbus su nad pa'i so phag gzhag par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi rnams su bum pa chus gang ba 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bzhi la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas la gzhag par bya'o/_/so phag rnams kyi steng du sen rtsi'i gos gzhag par bya'o/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas yongs su dkris te dri zhim pos yongs su bkang bas so/_/phyi rol du dkyil 'khor bya'o/_/phyogs 
[\[53b.2\]]bzhir chang dang sha'i gtor ma dbul lo/_/dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas gu gul gyi dud pa dbul lo/_/zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas ku sha ljang gu bzung nas nad pa gos dkar mo can la ji srid rkang pa'i bar du byab par bya'o/_/
[\[53b.3\]]mar gyi steng du ku sha dor bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/de nas mar zos pas blta bar bya'o/_/de nas ku sha ljang gu blangs nas zlos bzhin du gzhag par bya'o/_/sbyangs pa las 'byung ba'i snod dang gos byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[53b.4\]]thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byed du gzhug go/_/de nas pri yang+ku dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_sbrang rtsi can dang /_bzhi po gcig tu byas nas mnyam par thob par byas la mar dang lhan cig pa'i zas mchog zos na nad med pa rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/skud pa sngon po 
[\[53b.5\]]la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas rked pa la bcing bar bya'o/_/shu ba mched pa nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/de bzhin du mgrin pa la nye bar bcing bar bya'o/_/dbugs mi bde ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[53b.6\]]dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas te mar gyi mar me dbul lo/_/de nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar ro/_/sbar nas sra rtsi pog la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sreg blugs 
[\[53b.7\]]stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/nad nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/rig pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed/_'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas seng ge dang /_stag dang /_phag dang /_lug gi gdong pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o/_/de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis mtshan mo phyogs gtsang mar bla re dmar po bres la las yang dag par brtsam mo/_/sen rtsi'i gos bcu bzhi la bgegs gzhag par bya'o/_/dbus su bgegs rnams 
[\[54a.2\]]kyi gtso bo log 'dren gzhag par bya'o/_/tshon sna lnga'i phye ma la lan cig mngon par bsngags pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o/_/dri dmar po'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me bcu bzhi dbul lo/_/gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo/_/
[\[54a.3\]]sha dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bcu bzhi dbul lo/_/rgya skyegs kyi khu ba yang bcu bzhi gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas srad bu dmar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mtshan ma bcing bar bya'o/_/'byung po dang /_bgegs kyi rgyal po yang bcing bar bya'o/_/de nas u 
[\[54a.4\]]dum bA ra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes brjod de/_swA hA'i yi ges dkyil 'khor ba rnams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/der bgegs dang log par 'dren pa bcings par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa rnams thams cad sgrub par byed pa na 
[\[54a.5\]]bgegs rnams 'phrul byed do/_/des na bgegs dang log par 'dren pa rnams sa'i snod gcig tu bgegs thams cad gzhug par bya'o/_/gcig tu log par 'dren pa chen po'o/_/de nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbul bar bya zhing log 
[\[54a.6\]]par 'dren pa chen po la tsan+dan dmar po dang /_ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar po dbul lo/_/bgegs rnams thams cad la rdzas thams cad kyi bdug pa dbul lo/_/log par 'dren pa chen po la gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo/_/mar dang bsres pa dbul lo/_/de nas 
[\[54a.7\]]lte ba'i tshad kyi dong du so sor gzhug par bya'o/_/de lta bus bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas me tog dang dri dang 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]bdug pa mar gyi me la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas u dum bA ra'i shing gis me sbar nas tshangs ma'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya zhing /_lha la phul bzos na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lha la phul 
[\[54b.2\]]ba'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nas dang /_zhe dang /_lha la phul ba gcig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byas na rje rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dgra la bltas nas bzlas pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus thams cad 
[\[54b.3\]]'bebs pa dang nor byed do/_/dug thams cad la yang nye bar byug go/_/zhun mkhan gyi ril bu byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mig nad sel bar byed do/_/na ba la skud pa bcing bar bya ste/_gdon thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/gtsug phud bcings pas 
[\[54b.4\]]bdag nyid srung ba'o/_/thal bas dkyil 'khor bcings pa'o/_/bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pas phyogs bcings pa'o/_/bud med bu ma thon pa la til la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/_bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/rmongs pas mngal gyi zla mtshan gyi dus 
[\[54b.5\]]las 'das pa na khrus bya zhing rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas btung bar sbyin zhing bza' ba mchog dang mar bsres pa bza' bar bya'o/_/de nas bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/bu mang po can gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/thal 
[\[54b.6\]]ba re chu'i bum pa bzhi dang kun tu bsres nas gzhag par bya'o/_/shu dag la lan brgyad brgyar bzlas te lag pa g.yas pa la bcings pas ji srid smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 
[\[54b.7\]]g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa byas te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas lag pa bcing bar bya'o/_/brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas ma rungs pas mche ba'i ming nas smos te chu la 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas khyor chu 'thungs pas de lta bus shi ba yang ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bcu bzhi ru mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung ba sbyin par bya'o/_/'jog pos kyang mche ba sos par bya'o/_/chang gi phabs la lan bdun 
[\[55a.2\]]mngon par bsngags pa byas nas shi ba la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te byis pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang rig pa thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi spyi'i rig pa gsungs 
[\[55a.3\]]so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ri dzu ke/_tA re/_shAn+te/_tut+tA re/_a na b+hi/_sA le/_tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spyi bo'i sgrol 
[\[55a.4\]]ma zhes bya'o/_/rig pa 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du phrag pa'i tshad kyis chur zhugs nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste/_ji srid nam mkha' nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bug pa mthong ba'i bar du ste/_de lta bu byas pas las 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma mthong 
[\[55a.5\]]na slar yang bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas lan bdun du mar rjes su song nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga bya ste/_lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/ji srid dbugs 'byin no zhes brjod pa'i bar du'o/_/nyi ma 
[\[55a.6\]]so sor dngul brgya sbyin par byed de/_de yang zad par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ri dzu ke/_tA re/_shAn+te/_tA re/_
[\[55a.7\]]a na b+hi/_lA s+ye tut+tA re/_a gra/_d+harma ni t+yA te/_tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dag pa zhes bya ba ste/_rig pa 'dis dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/dus gsum du ba lang brgya rnyed do/_/
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_lam+be/_pra lam+be/_lam+be bIr+ya/_sarba sid+d+hi m+me ku ru swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phyang ba zhes bya ba ste/_rig pa 'dis ka ra bI ra'i yam shing la mar 
[\[55b.2\]]gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/_ji srid rgyal po dbang du 'gyur te 'ong bar byed do/_/sde snod smra ba yang sgo ba'i las byas pa 'ching ba grol ba la sogs pa de yang sbyong du 'jug go/_/de ma grol bar du mang du dngos grub thams cad kyi grub pa yang sngar brjod 
[\[55b.3\]]pa'i rig pas/_sarba sid+d+hiny+tsa/_me ku ru swA hA/_zhes byin nas rtag tu bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do/_/yang na gtsang mar gyur pas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya ste 'ching ba grol bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha 
[\[55b.4\]]te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ri dzu ka/_d+harme/_tA re/_shAn+ta d+harma tut+t+ya re a na bi la s+ye/_d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba bzhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_'dis ma du lum+ga dang /_d+hA lan dang /_sog 
[\[55b.5\]]ma'i me la sbyin sreg bya ste/_ji srid log 'dren 'ong bar byed de/_de brjod par bya'o/_/nyi ma so sor bdag la dong tse re sbyin no/_/de yang zad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la reg tu gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa gzhan du na mi sdod 
[\[55b.6\]]do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha to samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ri dzu ka/_d+harma mi t+yA te/_tA re shAn+ta/_d+harma ni t+yA te tut+tA re a na b+hi lA s+ye/_d+harma ni t+yA te/_tu re swA hA/_'di ni 
[\[55b.7\]]'phags ma sgrol ma drang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_'dis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du be kang+ka ta'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bil ba'i 'bras bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/'dis las rnams dpal dang ldan pa'am 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gra d+harma ni t+yA tA ra/_ri dzu ka d+harma ni t+yA te/_tut+tA re/_a na b+hI lA s+ye/_d+harma 
[\[56a.2\]]ni t+yA te tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te/_ki ki rA d+hA'i me tog sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/nyi ma so so 'am nyin zhag la tshal bdun nam brgyad rnyed do/_/yang na dngul brgya mthong ngo /_/rig 
[\[56a.3\]]pa de nyid kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi shing gis me sbar nas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba 
[\[56a.4\]]lo ki te shwa rA ye/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gre tA re/_ri dzu ke tA re/_shAm+te tut+tA re/_a na b+hi lA s+ye/_tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par rjod par byed ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_'di rtag tu bzlas pas nad med par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[56a.5\]]na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gre tA re/_a na b+hi lA s+ye/_d+harma tut+tA re/_a na b+hi lA s+ye/_d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma nges par 'byung ba zhes 
[\[56a.6\]]bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod pa nye bar rdzogs par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gre tA re/_ri dzu ka d+harma tut+tA re/_a na b+hi/_
[\[56a.7\]]lA s+ye/_d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par brjod pa byar med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dgra thams cad las mchog tu rgyal bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gre tA re/_shAn+te d+harme tut+tA re/_shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di zhi ba'i chos nges par 'byung ma'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo 
[\[56b.2\]]a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_a gre tA re/_ri dzu ka d+harma/_nir+yA te/_tut+tA re/_a na b+h+yi lA s+ye d+harma nir+yA te/_tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni drang po can gyi chos kyi mchog 
[\[56b.3\]]nges par 'byung ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas don thams cad thob pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma'am/_rin po che rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma 
[\[56b.4\]]hA satwA ya/_a gre tA re/_ri dzu ke d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re ri dzu ka d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad drang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[56b.5\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gre d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma phongs pa las sgrol ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas skye ba rgyun mi 'chad par byed do/_/na mo 
[\[56b.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a gre tA re/_a na b+hi lA s+ye tA re/_a na b+hi lA s+ye tut+tA re/_a na b+hi lA s+ye d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog 
[\[56b.7\]]ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mchog gi 'bras bu ster ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_shAn+te d+harme tut+tA re shAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas zhi ba'i sems skyed par byed do/_/na ma rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[57a.2\]]ma hA satwA ya/_ri dzu ke tA re/_ri dzu ka d+harma tut+tA re ri dzu ka d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma drang por ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas drang po'i sems skyed par byed do/_/chos thams cad ces bya ba'i rig pa 'di rnams bklags pas 
[\[57a.3\]]'grub pa/_bdag nyid srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_bde ba thams cad sbyin pa/_'bum phrag gcig brjod pas sngar brjod pa'i las thams cad bsgrub par bya ste stong phrag bcu bzlas pas bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa/_stong phrag sum cu bzlas pas bsod nams 
[\[57a.4\]]dang ldan pa/_'bum phrag gsum bzlas na mtshams med pa byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/_mdor na ma nor bar phan pa sgrub pa'i sems sbyin pa snying rje'i bdag nyid can yang rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/yams thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[57a.5\]]nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/de nas 'di'i cho ga phyogs tsam du 'gyur te/_'bum bzlas pas las thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[57a.6\]]'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas mchog rnams sgrub par byed do/_/'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pas mngon par shes pa so sor rnyed do/_/'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas lha'i shes pa so sor rnyed do/_/'bum phrag drug bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed do/_/'bum 
[\[57a.7\]]phrag bdun bzlas pas mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag bcu bzlas pas rgyal srid chen po so sor rnyed do/_/'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mig sman ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du btums 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid dro ba dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de la dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do/_/du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o/_/'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/mar gyi sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg 
[\[57b.2\]]byas na gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do/_/'bum phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas gang tshol ba de rnyed do/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/tshig gam zhabs 'ching 
[\[57b.3\]]ba thob cing yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/a ga ru nag po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o/_/rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgya chen po rnyed do/_/tsan+dan dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya/_grub pa thams cad la stong phrag bsdus pa rnyed do/_/byang 
[\[57b.4\]]chub shing gi 'og tu 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o/_/bcu dang bcud kyis len rnams rnyed do/_/zos pas skra dkar dang gnyer ma spangs bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pas bya rgod sel bar byed do/_/'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo mchog dang 
[\[57b.5\]]rnam par 'phrul bar byed do/_/yungs kar rgyal pos rtag tu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rtag tu nor rnyed do/_/gso sbyong can gyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/bza' ba dang btung ba zhim po 'byung bar 
[\[57b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/arga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o/_/gser brgya rnyed do/_/pi N+ya kaM gi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/yid la byas nas bzlas pa bya ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_gdung ba 
[\[57b.7\]]thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/gu gul gyi ril bu la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/nor 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal srid rnyed do/_/rgyu skar gyis gnod pa la 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]'o ma dang phan tshun bsres pa'i zho'i sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid dam gzhan gyis sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/dUr ba'i myu gus sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyas par 
[\[58a.2\]]'dod na til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg bya ste nor chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bA la dang so so la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas 'byung po'i nye bar 'tshe bas btab pa'i sems can thams cad la ston du gzhug par bya'o/_/mthong ba la rang gnas 'gro'o/_/
[\[58a.3\]]mig la brgyad brgyar bzlas na dang po gang mthong ba de dag tu 'gyur ro/_/chu la yongs su bzlas nas gdong bkru bar bya ste/_skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bya rog ma 'phur ba la rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de rnyed do/_/chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags 
[\[58a.4\]]pa'i khyor chu nyi ma so sor tho rangs btung bar bya'o/_/nad med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod pas/_lan tshwa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas/_rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te spyi bor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste nyi ma bdun gyis 
[\[58a.5\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa sgrub thabs kyi grub pa dang /_yid la grub pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa 'di rnams sad pa'i rgyur yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du yang 'dir phyogs cung zad tsam zhig byas pa las sgrub thabs kyis nye bar sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi stobs su 
[\[58a.6\]]'gyur bar bya'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs tsam gyis/_/sgrub pa'i yang dag dngos grub spyod/_/shin tu stong min gang ba min/_/bza' ba kun nas sbyin par bya/_/tsha ba mngar skyur la sogs pa'i/_/ro las yul bral lnga la yang /_/sred pa ldan pas ro la ni/_/
[\[58a.7\]]sred pa gang phyir skye bar 'gyur/_/sred pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs/_/'dir ni cung zad brtsam mi bya/_/'dir spro 'dir ni rnam par shes/_/lag pa ldag la sogs brjod pa/_/dor bar bya 'am dor bya min/_/nang du g.yog po lha rnams ni/_/phur bu gnas par yongs 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]brtag bya/_/lha rnams kyi ni khang pa'am/_/khang stong dang ni phug gi nang /_/shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang /_/ri bo dang ni tshang tshing du/_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg sgrub pa yang /_/rtse gcig yid kyis bya ba yin/_/ma dag ma dag kun dag la/_/dag pa rnam par 
[\[58b.2\]]sbyong ba yin/_/gnyis ka yis kyang gnyis ka la/_/dngos grub smra bas bsgrub par bya/_/gang yang ro yi srad bu dang /_/lhag ma de nas 'gongs pa dang /_/zla mtshan ldan pas kun tu reg_/gdol pa'i skye bos bskol ba yang /_/rul pa'i dri dang slar yang 'byung /_/
[\[58b.3\]]legs byas 'dod pas sbyin par bya/_/lha rnams tshad du bsnyen pa las/_/de lta la sogs yon tan ldan/_/zas sam mal stan la sogs pa/_/sgrub po rang gis blangs pa'am/_/min pa nyid ni bsnyen par bya/_/btung ba ldan pas gnas dang dga'/_/skye bo 
[\[58b.4\]]ngan pa'i sems can bcas/_/phyi ru kun tu btags pas blangs/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa po/_/nad dang 'byung chen byed pa dang /_/med pa'am yang na mang na yang /_/zas dang le los bcom pa dang /_/dge 'dun 'khu dang ngo tsha med/_/ser sna lhur len mtshon 
[\[58b.5\]]gyis 'bugs/_/rtag tu log par lta ba gzhan/_/de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/_/kun tu gsungs pa mdzes pa'o/_/dus min khrus ni mi nus na'ang /_/rang gis nus pa ma yin pa/_/rang gi rlung ni mchog tu bsgrags/_/dus gsum min par de yod pa/_/gcig 
[\[58b.6\]]tu theg gsum bral ba dang /_/khrus nyes pa dang chu bo'i nang /_/nyes pa gsum zhes bya ba 'joms/_/khrus ni mchog tu rab tu bsgrags/_/de phyir dus kyang kun bsams nas/_/me des sam ni de nas kyang /_/chu yis khrus ni dngos grub kun/_/sgrub pa po la bstan 
[\[58b.7\]]pa yin/_/de nas kun tu nad pa las/_/gsang ba'i sngags kyis khrus rnams ni/_/rab tu bsgrags par gyur pa yin/_/yang 'dir sngags ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_bud+d+hA shu tsi/_d+harma shu tsi/_saM g+ha shu tsi/_
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]a ne na par+ya/_bA kye na/_a shu tsi shu tsir/_b+ha bA mi swA hA/_sngags 'dis chu la lan cig yongs su bzlas nas bkru bar bya'o/_/sngon du bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i dus su dang /_nad pa la sngags 'dis khrus byas pas gtsang mar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo'i stod 
[\[59a.2\]]du thun gsum du dam pa'i chos kyi kha ton la sogs pa rnams kyis dub bas mtshan mo'i gung la ku sha la sogs pa'i stan la gtsang sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga dang phyag rgyas yongs su brtags te sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bya'o/_/de'i tshe srung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/seng ge'i mal du sgrub pa 
[\[59a.3\]]pos rtag tu seng ge'i stabs kyis lho'am shar gyi phyogs su mgo bo bstan nas rmi lam du me zhi ba can nam rgyas pa can gyi sbyin sreg gal te gyur na shar dang /_lho'i lho ru kun tu gnas nas rkang pa rab tu brkyang bar bya'o/_/nub kyi phyogs su mgo bo byas nas lho'i phyogs su kha bltas 
[\[59a.4\]]la nyal bar bya'o/_/rig pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas gang yang tsan+dan dang /_bil ba la sogs pa dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_u dum bA ra la sogs pa rmi lam du mthong na/_bdag nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o/_/ngang pa dang /_bya kA raN+Da ba dang /_khrung 
[\[59a.5\]]khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_bya ro ha na rmi lam du byung na de'i dngos grub myur du bdag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gos dkar po dang mnyam par kun tu ston pa 'di yang bdag nyid kyang tshe 'phel bar mthong na gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas khyab pa 
[\[59a.6\]]dang /_rmi lam du khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'dzeg pa'am/_mnan pa la sogs pa byung na dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid de/_gru la mngon par 'dzegs pa dang /_de bzhin du de'i pi wang 'dzin pa'o/_/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa rmi lam du reg pa byung ba dang /_chu cig til mar gyis 
[\[59a.7\]]reg pa yang dag grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rmi lam du bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_shing rta la sogs pa rnams mthong ba'am/_rig pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub la bar du gcod par shes par bya'o/_/nges par yang 'dod do/_/de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/_/dge ba'i las dang 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]dge las gzhan/_/de rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni/_/de phyir rmi lam shes nas bya/_/rmi lam srung dang phyag rgya ni/_/phan tshun nyid du rig pa 'dzin/_/bgegs rnams rtag tu gnyid log byed/_/rnam par gzhom bya rnam 'joms pa/_/yang dag nyer gnas de yi 
[\[59b.2\]]phyir/_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg la sogs kun/_sngar brjod bsrung ba sbyar bar bya/_/srung ba'i cho ga'i dbye ba las/_/de 'dis yang dag 'grub par 'dod/_/mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha gnod sbyin/_/rang grub [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin po dang /_/kun tu rgyu byed rnam 'joms phyir/_/rang 
[\[59b.3\]]gi gnas dang sems kun g.yo/_/de phyir thog ma nas bya ba/_/bdag nyid srung dang mtshan ma ni/_/nye bar mtshon ba la sogs pa/_/sgrub pa kun gyi tshe na 'gyur/_/mtshan ma med par gyur na ni/_/bgegs de las 'bras skye ba la/_/khyi ni g.yon nas 'byin pa 
[\[59b.4\]]dang /_/ba lang sbyin dang mdzes pa yi/_/'dab brgya can dang rna ba can/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ce spyang bya rog dang /_/khyim gyi phag pa de bzhin nyid/_/rtsangs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_/ba dan la sogs thams cad nas/_/gtso bor brjod bya dge ba'o/_/dge ba 
[\[59b.5\]]la sogs rig pa yis/_/mi dge ba yi mi dge la/_/de bzhin mchog dang mchog min dbye/_/shes nas dang por spyad par bya/_/bil ba arga'i me tog ni/_/min nyid 'dod dang a ram pa/_/khyad par las ni de byin cig_/blo ldan sngags pas las kun la/_/
[\[59b.6\]]me thab rnam pa gsum bya'o/_/lho ru mngon par kha phyogs par/_/gyur ba'i hU~M phaT yi ge ni/_/swA hA'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/yid kyis kun tu bsams nas bya/_/mngon spyod can gyis cho ga bya/_/byang du mngon par phyogs gyur nas/_/swA hA'i yi ge 
[\[59b.7\]]dang ldan bzlas/_/yid kyis bsams nas zhi ba bya/_/dge ba mngon par mdzes pa can/_/shar du kha bltas nyid kyis bya/_/zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can/_/bye brag tu ni brjod bya ste/_/'og tu kha bltas byas nas kyang /_/rgyas pa nyid la rab sbyar bya/_/mngon spyod stan 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]la skyil krung ste/_/zhi dang rgyas pa can brjod pa'ang /_/rang gi stan la tsog pur brjod/_/mi dge'i las kyi kun spyod ni/_/skra dang sen mor brjod pa ni/_/bcing bar mi bya gang gi phyir/_/gal te sgrub po tshangs spyod dang /_/ldan gyur de tshe nyes pa med/_/
[\[60a.2\]]bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs bya la/_/'thab mo 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yongs su dag par bya bzhin pa'i/_/skra rnams mkhas pas tshul de nyid/_/spu gris skra ni breg par bya/_/bsags par bya ba yang ma yin/_/dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni/_/lha rnams 
[\[60a.3\]]mchod par yongs su bsgrags/_/'dod pa'ang min yang stobs bsags pa/_/de nyid phyir yang nyes bcas 'gyur/_/sen mo'ang yongs su 'chang ba dang /_/de bzhin so dang spu la sogs/_/dri ma nyid ni bcang mi bya/_/shig la sogs pa rab skyes pa/_/de las sro 
[\[60a.4\]]ma la sogs 'byung /_/khron pa de ni blta mi bya/_/snang byed gzas zin gnas pa na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni/_/dngos grub 'dod pas nyams mi bya/_/lha rnams mchod pa'i dus su yang /_/zas mngon ma gyur lha rnams la/_/shes rab can gyis 
[\[60a.5\]]mchod mi bya/_/gal te gzhan du bla ma'i bka'/_/dam tshig las ni bzlas par 'gyur/_/sngon dus chos rnams thams cad ni/_/nyan pa sogs kyis mchod par 'gyur/_/rig pas gzugs ni spros nas ni/_/bstod pa nyid dang bsngags par bya/_/de 
[\[60a.6\]]nas gcig tu bsams dmigs bya/_/brjod pa'i rim pas rang nyid kyis/_/tshig 'di kha nas smra bar bya/_/sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems/_/rdzu 'phrul che ldan srid pa yi/_/rgya mtsho 'di la dgongs su gsol/_/zhes pa nyid ni slar brjod nas/_/rmi lam 
[\[60a.7\]]rtag tu nyi ma yi/_/tho rangs la yang rab bsngags 'gyur/_/mar gyi sbyin sreg sogs sbrang rtsi/_/don med mngon par bzlas byed pa/_/sbyin sreg mngon par mdzes pa ni/_/bgegs gzhom don du brjod par bya/_/so sor dgag pa'i don gyi phyir/_/zhi ba'i sems 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]ni bsngags pa ste/_/dngos grub 'dod pa'i don du bya/_/rgyas pa can yang bshad bya ste/_/de bzhin kun tu yang dag bsams/_/sgrub pos legs par bsgrub par bya/_/de nas mdzes pa'i sbyin sreg ni/_/rtag tu 'bad pas bya ba yin/_/nges pa kho nas rdzu 
[\[60b.2\]]'phrul 'gyur/_/skye ba 'di yi dbang bskur don/_/bil ba mya ngan med la sogs/_/rab brjod pa lA sha dang ni/_/a shwat+tha dang pa dzA ka/_/rgyas pa can la sbyin sreg kun/_/de yi yam shing bya ba ni/_/u dum bA ra n+ya gro d+ha/_/a shwat+tha dang 'o mar bcas/_/gang 
[\[60b.3\]]yang zhi la grags pa nyid/_/las rnams kun la yam shing don/_/sgrub pa seng ldeng a riSh+Ta/_/nim+pa dang ni tsher can bshad/_/de bzhin gzhan du mngon mdzes pa/_/yang dag sgrub byed the tsom med/_/ba bla mig sman la sogs pa/_/rdzas rnams sgrub pa la yang ni/_/
[\[60b.4\]]ba byung lnga yi gtsang sbra dang /_/de tshe rig pa ldan pa yis/_/yang na lha yi chu la ni/_/dri zhim dri sogs yang dag sdom/_/u dum bA ra gsher 'dab bam/_/yang na a shwat+tha las byung /_/me tog can gyi sngags kyi nang /_/bA na tra 'am bshol ldan la/_/yongs su 
[\[60b.5\]]srung ba'i cho ga ni/_/byas nas cho ga las bsgrub bya/_/gso sbyong can gyis ji srid du/_/'char ba 'byung ba de srid du/_/nges par sgrub bam mug 'di ni/_/nye bar blang phyir blang bar bya/_/bar skabs 'dir bdag nyid la dgongs su gsol/_zhes pa ni srog chags thams 
[\[60b.6\]]cad gsod pa dang /_rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa las kyang mi tshangs par spyod pa las dang /_lag tu byin pa nyid las kyang rtag tu myos byed 'thung ba dang /_skye bo rnams phan tshun gnyis 'thab par byed pa rim pa gang las phreng ba dang /_kha dog dang /_gar gyi don dang /_
[\[60b.7\]]rol pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_mal stan chen po dang /_mthon po can las log ste gang da lta dgra bcom pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o/_/bsdu bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya ba yod par bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du yang 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]mgron du gnyer bar bya'o/_/zhes brjod nas byang chub kyi sems kyis bsdu bar bya'o/_/rtag tu dkon mchog gi rang bzhin gyi skyabs 'gro sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par bskyed nas sgrub pa pos rim pa 'dis thams cad mtshams sbyar nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[61a.2\]]zhes pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_arta_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_su b+ha ge tA re/_dAn+te tu tA re/_a bai brta ke swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skal ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[61a.3\]]rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_su ga ta d+harma tA re/_dA nA d+harma tut+tA re/_a bai brti ka d+harma 
[\[61a.4\]]k+ShAn+ti/_ka d+harma tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyir mi ldog pa can gyi rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gos kyi rnyed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki 
[\[61a.5\]]te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_su kha d+harma nir+yA te/_tA re/_dAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te/_dAn+ta d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a bai brti ka_/d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma nor thams cad bde blag tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gdug pa thams 
[\[61a.6\]]cad rengs par byed pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_bud+d+he tA re/_a bai brti ka d+ha rme tu t+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi bde ba 
[\[61a.7\]]sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas khyim 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_bud+d+he ta re su ga d+harma tA re/_dAn+ta d+harma 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a bai brti ka d+ha rme tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyis dul ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'bras bu 'phel bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha ta samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma 
[\[61b.2\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_bud+d+he tA re/_nidA n+ta d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a ba brti ka d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rab tu mi gnas pa'i bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[61b.3\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a bai lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_bud+d+ha tA re/_bud+d+ha d+harme te tu re/_bu rme nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma zhes bya 
[\[61b.4\]]ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas thabs mkhas pa rnams la blo skye bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na dra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_su kha de ba tA re/_su kha d+ha rme tut+tA 
[\[61b.5\]]re su kha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas nas 'phel ba skye bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[61b.6\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma ne tA re dA n+ta d+harma nir+yA te/_tA re tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma 
[\[61b.7\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ye/_bo d+hitwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a nan+ta tA re/_de bye tut+tA re a nut+pa n+ta ke tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas bsod nams mtha' yas pa skye bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a nan+ta d+harma tA re/_di byi d+ha rme tut+tA re a nut+pa n+ti ka d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni mtha' yas shing mu med pa zhes bya ba ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 
[\[62a.2\]]mtha' yas pa'i bsod nams skye bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a nan+te tA re a nan+ta d+harma tut+tA re/_a nan+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_
[\[62a.3\]]'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mtha' yas pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas nor thob par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a nan+ta 
[\[62a.4\]]d+harma nir+yA te tA re/_de byi d+harma nir+yA tut+tA re/_a nut+pa n+ti ka d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mtha' yas pa can du skyed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas khyim gyi 'byor pa mtha' yas par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta 
[\[62a.5\]]thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sid+d+he tA re/_sid+d+hA d+harme tut+tA re/_sid+d+hA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung 
[\[62a.6\]]bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sid+d+ha tA re a nan+ta tA re/_di byi tut+tA re a nut+pa n+ti ke shu tu ra swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa mtha' yas 
[\[62a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas thabs la mkhas pa'i dul bas sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]ya/_sid+d+he sid+d+he tA re/_a nan+te tA re di byi tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas lha'i 'gro ba thob par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a 
[\[62b.2\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sid+d+he tA re a nan+tA re a nan+ta d+harme tut+tA re/_de bya d+harme tut+tA re/_di bya d+harme tut+tA re/_a nut+pa n+ti tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa'i chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dmyal bar mi ltung bar 
[\[62b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sid+d+he tA re/_a nan+ta d+harma nir+yA te tA re di bya d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re a nut+pa n+ta ka d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 
[\[62b.4\]]'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[62b.5\]]di bya tA re di bya d+harme tu re/_nir+yA d+ha rme nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_rig pa 'di rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams lha nyid du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[62b.6\]]satwA ya/_sid+d+hi tA re/_a nan+ta d+harma tu re/_a nan+ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rta rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[62b.7\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sid+d+hi tA re/_di bya d+harme tu re di bya d+harme ni r+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas glang po che rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sid+d+he tA re/_a bai brti ka d+harme nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa myur ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas ba lang yang dag par 'byor bar 
[\[63a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a nut+pa n+ti ka d+harme tut+tA re/_a nut+pa n+ti ka d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skye ba med
