[\[63a.3\]]pa can zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gos 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a dwa ye tA re/_a dwa ye/_d+harme tut+tA re/_
[\[63a.4\]]a dwa ye d+harme nir+yA te tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis su med ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po dang blon po gnyis su med par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[63a.5\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a dA ye tA re/_mai tri tut+tA re shU raM ga me tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis su med par byams ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63a.6\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a dwa ye d+harma nir+yA te/_tA re mai tri/_d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis su med pa'i dpa' mo zhes 
[\[63a.7\]]bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas spro ba dang ldan zhing dpa' bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a dwa ye d+harme tu re mai tri d+harme tut+tA re/_shU 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]raM ga ma ya d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis su med pa'i chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki 
[\[63b.2\]]te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_k+ShAn+te tA re a dwa ye tA re/_mai tri tut+tA re/_shU raM ga me tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas zhi ba'i sems nyid do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[63b.3\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_k+ShA n+te tA re shU raM ga ma/_d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i dpa' mo zhes bya ba ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na 
[\[63b.4\]]mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_k+ShAn+te tA re/_mai tri d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63b.5\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_k+ShA n+te tA re a dwa ye d+har tut+tA re/_a dwa ye d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa dang gnyis su med ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa 
[\[63b.6\]]ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_k+ShA n+te tA re a dwa ye d+harma tA re/_mai tri d+harma tut+tA re shU raM ga ma d+harme 
[\[63b.7\]]tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i gnang chen du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ya/_k+ShA n+te tA re/_a dwa ye tA re mai tri tut+tA re/_shU raM ga me tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i pho brang du smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA 
[\[64a.2\]]ya/_arta te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_k+ShAn+te tA re/_k+ShAn+te tA re/_k+ShAn+ti d+harme tut+tA re/_k+ShAn+te d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas nor thams 
[\[64a.3\]]cad 'dzin par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a dwa ye tA re/_a dwa ya d+harme tut+tA re/_a dwa ya d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol 
[\[64a.4\]]ma gnyis su med pas phongs pa las sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad dang gnyis su med par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[64a.5\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_mai tri tA re/_d+harme tut+tA re/_mai tri d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma byams ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta 
[\[64a.6\]]thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_shU raM ga me tA re shU raM ga me d+harme tut+tA re/_shU raM ga ma d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dpa' bar 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 
[\[64a.7\]]chu'i mtha' ltar bde bar rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sha ra Ne tA re/_bo d+hi tut+tA re/_pU ra se tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]'os ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad kyi skyabs kyi 'os su yang dag par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[64b.2\]]ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sha ra Ne d+harme tA re bo d+hi d+harme tut+tA re pU rA sha/_d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha 
[\[64b.3\]]te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sha ra Ne tA re/_tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas so so'i skye bor yang dag par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad 
[\[64b.4\]]ba lang du mi 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sha ra Ne r+harme nir+yA te tA re/_bo d+hi nir+yA te tut+tA re/_pU ra sha d+ha rma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags 
[\[64b.5\]]ma sgrol ma skyabs myur ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas thams cad du legs par 'ong bar brjod pa so sor rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA 
[\[64b.6\]]ya/_a mr-i te tA re/_sau [{]mye [,]me [}]tA re/_a saM skr-i ta d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bdud rtsi ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha 
[\[64b.7\]]te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mr-i ta d+harma nir+yA te tA re sau me/_d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a saM skr-i ta d+harma tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bdud rtsi'i chos nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bdud rtsi dang ldan par 'gyur te bde ba thob bo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mr-i tA d+harma nir+yA te tA re sau me d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a saM skr-i d+harma 
[\[65a.2\]]nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod chags nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[65a.3\]]ma hA satwA ya/_dr-i D+hi tA re/_shA ra Ne tA re/_bo d+he tut+tA re/_su rA se tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas nad med cing lus brtan par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM 
[\[65a.4\]]bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_dr-i D+ha tA re sha ra Ne d+harma nir+yA te tA re/_bo d+hi d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_bo d+hi d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_pU rA sa d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan par 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu 
[\[65a.5\]]bzlas pas tsher 'gyur te mchod rten gyi las la sogs pas tshe 'phel lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_dr-i D+ho tA re/_bo d+hi d+harma tut+tA re bo d+hi sha ra Ne 
[\[65a.6\]]d+harma nir+yA te/_pU ru se d+harma tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas bcos ma dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM 
[\[65a.7\]]bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_dr-i D+ha tA re/_dr-i D+ha d+harme tut+tA re/_dr-i D+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'jigs pa chen po rnams sel bar byed do/_/na mo 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_a mr-i tA d+harma nir+yA te tA re/_sau [{]mye [,]me [}]d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bdud rtsi legs par sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa 
[\[65b.2\]]ste rtag tu bzlas pas 'ching ba rnams grol bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ke te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_sau [{]mye [,]me [}]ta re sau [{]mye [,]me [}]d+harme tut+tA re sau [{]mye [,]me [}]swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba 
[\[65b.3\]]nyid kyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mdze thams cad sel bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_a mr-i te d+harme tA re/_sau mya tut+tA 
[\[65b.4\]]re/_saM skr-i te tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sor mo'i nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tre yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_
[\[65b.5\]]bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_d+harma d+harma tut+tA re/_d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gser gyi rnyed pa 'byung ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra ya ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[65b.6\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_a mr-i tA d+harme tA re sau [{]mye [,]me [}]d+harme b+hu tai tA re/_a saM skr-i ta d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'dus byas pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dngul gyi 
[\[65b.7\]]rnyed pa 'byung ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mr-i tA tA re/_a mr-i te d+harme tut+tA re/_tu re a mr-i ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bdud rtsi thams cad kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dbyig 'byung ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[66a.2\]]d+harme tA re/_a mr-i tA d+harme tA re/_a mr-i tA d+harma tu tA re/_a mr-i tA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyu ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te 
[\[66a.3\]]samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a saM skr-i te tA re/_saM skr-i te tA re tut+tA re/_a saM skr-i ta d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mkha' 'gro mas zin pa rnams 
[\[66a.4\]]la bltas pas grol bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harma tA re sau [{]mye [,]me [}]d+harme/_d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba'i chos 
[\[66a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas srul po'i gdon gyis zin pa thams cad la bltas pas grol bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme 
[\[66a.6\]]tA re/_a saM skr-i ta d+harme tut+tA re a saM skr-i te d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_rtag tu bzlas pas srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bltas pas grol bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo 
[\[66a.7\]]d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ra Na d+harma nir+yA te tA re bid+yA d+harma tut+tA re/_A dar+sha na d+harma nir+yA te swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'bab pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas brtan pa dang /_g.yo ba la sogs pa'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_/na mo 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ru Ne tA re bid+ye tut+tA re/_a di dar+sha ni tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skya rengs dang po mthong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag 
[\[66b.2\]]tu bzlas pas yul gru sbyin par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ra Ne d+harme tA re bid+ya d+harme tut+tA re/_a ni dar+sha na d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma 
[\[66b.3\]]sgrol ma chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas lo thams cad yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+ye tA re a 
[\[66b.4\]]ra Ne tA re/_bid+yA tut+tA re/_a ni dar+sha na tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum gyi chos zhes bya ba ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mtha' mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[66b.5\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+yA tA re/_a ra Na d+harma tA re bid+yA d+harme tA re bid+yA d+harme tut+tA re/_trai bid+yA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_/rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur 
[\[66b.6\]]ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+yA tA re/_bid+ye tA re a ra Na d+ha rme tA re/_bid+yA d+harma tut+tA re/_a ni dar+sha na d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma 
[\[66b.7\]]sgrol ma nyon mongs pa med pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya ba ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas bud med thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+yA tA re/_a ni dar+sha ni/_d+harme tut+tA re/_a ni dar+sha na d+harme nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum bstan du med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gzhi thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[67a.2\]]na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+ye tA re/_a ra Na d+harma nir+yA te dA re/_bid+yA d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a ni dar+shang+ha rma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum gyi 
[\[67a.3\]]chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+ye tA re/_bid+yA tA re/_bid+yA d+harme tut+tA re/_bid+yA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma 
[\[67a.4\]]sgrol ma rig pa gsum zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas grong stong sdom pa rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_trai bid+ye tA re/_a ra Ne d+harme 
[\[67a.5\]]tut+tA re/_a ra Na d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gsum rig ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i pho brang na yod pa thams cad gnang chen por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA 
[\[67a.6\]]ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ar+ha te tA re/_a ra Na d+harme tut+tA re/_a ra Na d+harme nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'thab pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/
[\[67a.7\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_bid+ye tA re/_bid+yA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]thams cad la rig pa slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha ta samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ra Na tA re/_d+harme tut+tA re/_a mi tA b+he tu re swA hA/_'di ni 
[\[67b.2\]]'phags ma sgrol ma nges par shes pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[67b.3\]]a ri Ne tA re/_d+harme ni re Ne tA re ni ra Ne/_d+harme tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dbang du byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a 
[\[67b.4\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ni ri na d+harma tA re/_shAn+ta d+harme tut+tA re a mi tA b+hA d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon dang bral ba'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dri za rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i sman 
[\[67b.5\]]rab tu sbyin te de rnams zos pas lo stong 'tsho bar byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad du'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_nir ri Na d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA 
[\[67b.6\]]re/_a mi tA b+hA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon med pa'i 'od dpag med kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas tshangs pa'i srin po dang bcas pa rnams dbang du byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[67b.7\]]ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_satwe tA re ni ra Na/_ni ra Na/_ni Ni d+harme nir+yA te tA re d+harma d+harma/_nir+yA tut+tA re/_a mi tA b+hA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]tu bzlas pas gzhan rnams dang rang gis byas pa'i rdzas rnams dang rdzas rnams thams cad la dbang byas par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[68a.2\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_satwe tA re ni ri Ne tA re/_d+harme tut+tA re a mi tA b+he tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs kyi 'od dpag med pa ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/_
[\[68a.3\]]ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_satwe tA re satwA d+harme tut+tA re/_satwA d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas srul po 
[\[68a.4\]]thams cad dbang du byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_satwe tA re ni ri Ne d+harma nir+yA te/_d+harma d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a mi tA b+hA d+harma 
[\[68a.5\]]nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rig pa thams cad dbang du byed cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na 
[\[68a.6\]]ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harma tA re/_d+harme tut+tA re/_d+harma d+harma nir+ya te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas lha dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a 
[\[68a.7\]]mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_d+harme d+harme tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi rigs pa can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas klu'i bu mo 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]thams cad dbang du byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_d+harme d+harme tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rtag pa'i chos 
[\[68b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas na khyim chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harme tA re/_d+harme ni ri Ne/_d+harma ni ri Na/_
[\[68b.3\]]d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'od dpag med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo 
[\[68b.4\]]ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_d+harma tA re/_d+harma d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi sems ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo 
[\[68b.5\]]a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha ta samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mo g+he tA re/_saM g+he tut+tA re/_su kha ba tI tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 
[\[68b.6\]]stobs dang gzi brjid rnams gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mo g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tA re/_saM g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re 
[\[68b.7\]]su kha ba tI d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'chi ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas lha ma yin gyi gnas su rab tu 'jug pa rnyed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mo g+ha tA re/_a mo g+ha d+harma tut+tA re a mo g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'chi ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/na mo 
[\[69a.2\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya sa ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re a mo g+ha d+har nir+yA te tut+tA re/_su kha ba tI d+harma ni r+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig sngags ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa 
[\[69a.3\]]ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re/_a mo g+ha tA re/_su kha ba tI tu re swA hA/_'di ni 
[\[69a.4\]]'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rang gi khyim du gter mthong ste/_zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[69a.5\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re/_a tsan+t+ye tut+tA re/_a tsin+t+ye d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas lha'i bcud len du 'gyur ro/_/na mo 
[\[69a.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+D+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re/_a tsin+t+ye d+harme tut+tA re/_a tsin+t+ye d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[69a.7\]]dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a mo g+ha 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]d+harme tA re saM g+ha d+harme tut+tA re/_su kha ba tI d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA 
[\[69b.2\]]ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re/_saM g+ha d+harma tut+tA re/_saM g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas g.yul du 
[\[69b.3\]]gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re/_a mo g+ha d+harma tut+tA re/_a mo g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di 
[\[69b.4\]]ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang 'chi ba'i dus mngon sum du shes par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba 
[\[69b.5\]]lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a tsin+t+ye tA re/_su kha ba tI d+harme tut+tA re/_su kha ba tI d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rang 'chi ba shes par byed do/_/na mo 
[\[69b.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma ar+ya A ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_su kha ba tI d+harme tA re/_su kha ba tI d+harme tut+tA re/_su kha ba tI d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 
[\[69b.7\]]bde ba can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_saM g+he tA re/_saM g+ha 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]d+harma tut+tA re/_si g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa byed pa yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga 
[\[70a.2\]]tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ba lo ki te tA re/_I she tut+tA re/_a naM gi na tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas 'chi ba'i 
[\[70a.3\]]dus su spyan ras gzigs mthong bar byed de/_de nas lha'i 'gro ba kun nas mthong bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ba lo ki te 
[\[70a.4\]]d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_I sha d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_a naM ga d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan ras gzigs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas nor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA 
[\[70a.5\]]ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ba lo ki te d+harma tA re I shwa rA d+harme tut+tA re/_a naM ga na d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan ras gzigs lus med ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag 
[\[70a.6\]]tu bzlas pas dri thob par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_Ar+ya tA re/_a ba lo ki te d+harma nir+yA te tU re I sha d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re a naM ga na d+harma nir+yA 
[\[70a.7\]]te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal srid dang chos dang lha dang nor yang thob par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha tai samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_a ba lo ki te tA re/_I she a naM ga ne tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma kun nas gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas yul gyi dpon por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta 
[\[70b.2\]]thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_Ar+ya tA re/_a ba lo ki te d+harme tA re/_I sha d+harme tut+tA re a naM ga na d+harme tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'chi med ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas 
[\[70b.3\]]pas phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_I she tA re I sha d+harme tut+tA re/_I sha d+harme nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags 
[\[70b.4\]]ma sgrol ma dbang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gdengs can du mi skye zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[70b.5\]]satwA ya/_Ar+ya tA re/_a naM ga d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma lus med ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te 
[\[70b.6\]]samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_Ar+ya tA re/_a ba lo ki te d+harme tut+tA re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phags pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas smra ba thams cad du smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/na mo 
[\[70b.7\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_I she tA re d+harma tut+tA re/_I she tA re d+harma nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_I she tA re/_I sha d+harma nir+yA tu re swA hA/_'di 
[\[71a.2\]]ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas gdon mi za bar thams cad mthong ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[71a.3\]]satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ri dzu karma Ar+ye tA re/_tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/_tut+tA re sarba b+ha ya/_mo tsa ni swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa las grol ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_
[\[71a.4\]]ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re ta ra Ni/_trA sa ya/_sha tra b+ha ya/_nA sha ni mo tsa ni tu re swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma g.yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag 
[\[71a.5\]]tu bzlas pas g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tA re tA re/_tA rA ya/_b+ha ga ba ti ban+d+ha mo tsa ni swA hA/_
[\[71a.6\]]'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'ching ba grol ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams grol bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[71a.7\]]ya/_a tut+tA re tut+tA re ba ra badzra mo k+Sha ni swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rdo rje las thar bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas rdo rje'i thog sel bar byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re ri dzu ka d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re/_shAn+ta nir+yA te tA re tA re a na b+hi la s+ya/_d+harma nir+yA te tA re tA re tu re hi na trA sa ni bi trA sa ni Te ka ni/_mo ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_sta m+b+ha ni/_pra b+he tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_be 
[\[71b.2\]]ga shangs ni kuN+Di kuN+Da ma hA kuN+Da/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+ha na pa ti tA re/_hu ru/_ku ru ku ru/_a haM yAM yaM/_tsin+ta ya/_sin tAn+tA sA d+hA ya swA hA/_'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pa ste/_rtag tu bzlas pas thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/de ni 'di'i sgrub pa thabs kyi cho ga'i rig par 'gyur ro/_/na mo 
[\[71b.3\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_su re su rA pi ti ha ra ha ra swA hA/_'di ni gu gul gyis spyan drang pa'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi 
[\[71b.4\]]tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA ra ba ti/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_yA brkAr+ya/_sa d+d+ha ma hA ma swA hA/_'di ni mchod yon gyi rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA 
[\[71b.5\]]ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwa ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ha ra ha ra/_ku ru ku ru/_gan+d+ha ra bA si ni swA hA/_'di ni dra'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA 
[\[71b.6\]]ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a mo g+he/_a mo g+ha/_bA si ba ra de swA hA/_'di ni me tog gi rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_
[\[71b.7\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_me g+ha swA ra ku ru swA hA/_'di ni bdug spos kyi rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_da ni da ni/_ha na ha na/_ku ru ku ru/_di shwa ba li swA hA/_'di ni gtor ma'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_
[\[72a.2\]]bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_e ta dz+wa li ni/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_de ba swA hA/_'di ni mar me'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha ta samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[72a.3\]]tad+ya thA/_hi ri hi ri/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_sarba satwA kA ru Ni kA_/gats+tsha ti swa b+hu ba naM/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAM sa ma ya ma nu sma rA ya swA hA/_'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i rig pa ste/_me tog dkar po dang mchod yon gyis gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur 
[\[72a.4\]]ro/_/zhes pa rnams rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sha ra Ne tA re swA hA/_sgrol ma la 
[\[72a.5\]]skyabs su gsol ba 'debs pa/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+harme tA re tu re swA hA/_me tog la sogs pa'i 'bras bu chos kyi sgrol mas 
[\[72a.6\]]sems can dbang du byed pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_satwA tA re tu re swA hA/_sems can rnams la 'phags ma sgrol mas sems 
[\[72a.7\]]can rnams dga' bar byed pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_satwA ni ri sti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sems can sgrol mas bde ba 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]thams cad rab tu sbyin pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_satwe satwa ba tI tA re swA hA/_skye bo snying stobs dang ldan pa rnams dbang du byed do/_/
[\[72b.2\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_/ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shA ste dr-i D+he tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol mas bstan pa rnams la rtag tu bzlas pa'i sbyor bas yul sbyin par byed 
[\[72b.3\]]do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ri Ni ri Ni tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon med pa zhes bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA 
[\[72b.4\]]b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sau mi sau mi tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rig pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_

[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]tA re tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma pad+ma ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shri ye shri ya ba tI/_tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra 
[\[76b.2\]]yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_b+hA se b+hA sa ba tI tA re b+ha ga ba ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma tshul khrims kyi mthu stobs zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[76b.3\]]tad+ya thA/_dA ne dA ta pra b+he/_dA tA/_tA re tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sbyin pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shI le shI la pra b+he tA ra tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma tshul 
[\[76b.4\]]khrims 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_k+bAn+ti k+ShAn+ta pra b+he tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo 
[\[76b.5\]]d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bIr+ye bIr+ya pra b+he tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma brtson 'grus kyi 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra ya yA/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+h+ya ne/_d+h+ya na pra b+he tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags 
[\[76b.6\]]ma sgrol ma bsam gtan 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pra dz+nye pradz+nya/_pra b+he tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma shes rab 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a 
[\[76b.7\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_u pA ye/_u pA ya/_pra b+he/_tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma thabs kyi 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]be d+h+ye ya/_bed+h+ya bra b+he tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'bigs pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_swa b+hA be/_swa b+hA ba/_tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma rang 
[\[77a.2\]]bzhin 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na me Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_saM g+he saM g+ha pra b+he tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[77a.3\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+harme d+harma bra b+he tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he bud+d+ha pra b+he tut+tA re tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma 
[\[77a.4\]]sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_I she I shA pra b+he tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA 
[\[77a.5\]]ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dr-iD+hi dr-iD+hi pra b+he dr-i D+ha/_pra b+he tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shak+te t+ta re/_shik+ka pra b+he tA re tA re swA hA/_
[\[77a.6\]]'phags ma sgrol ma nus pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a bya ya tA re a bya ya pra b+he tA ra tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma mi zad pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[77a.7\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ni rany+dza ni tA re/_ni rany+dza na pra b+he/_ni rany+dza na pra b+he tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma mig sman med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sUk+Sh+me tA re/_sUk+Sh+ma bra b+he/_sUk+Sh+ma pra b+he tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'od phra mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a ba ya be tA re/_a ba ya ba pra b+he/_
[\[77b.2\]]tA re tA re/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma cha shas kyi 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_mArge mArga pra b+he/_tA re tA ra ya/_b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma yam gyi 'od ces 
[\[77b.3\]]bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_duHkhe duHkha pra b+he tA re ta re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal rab bsal zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[77b.4\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+ha n+ye d+ha n+ya pra b+he/_d+h+ya n+ye tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'bru'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_A ba ra Ne/_tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 
[\[77b.5\]]kun tu sgrib pa'i 'od ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re/_tA re/_d+harme d+harme/_d+harma a ba b+hA se tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo 
[\[77b.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_saM g+he/_saM g+ha tA re/_saM g+ha a ba b+hA se/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA 
[\[77b.7\]]ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he bud+d+ha tA re/_bud+d+ha te dze tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_u pA ye/_u pA ya/_
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]tA re u pA ya te dze tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma thabs kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pA re pA re ta re pA ra te dze tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 
[\[78a.2\]]pha rol gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ak+Sha ya ak+Sha ya te dze/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma gzi brjid mi zad pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma 
[\[78a.3\]]Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dA ne dA na tA re dA na te dze tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sbyin pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[78a.4\]]tad+ya thA/_shI le shI la/_tA re shI la te dze tut+tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma tshul khrims kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_k+ShAn+te k+ShAn+ta tA re k+ShAn+ta te dze tu re 
[\[78a.5\]]swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_mahA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bIr+ya/_bIr+ya tA re/_bIr+ya te dze tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma brtson 'grus kyi gzi brjid ces 
[\[78a.6\]]bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+h+yA ne d+h+yA na tA re d+h+ya na te dze tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gtan gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki 
[\[78a.7\]]te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pradz+nye pra dz+nye tA re pra dz+nye te dze tu re tu re tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma shes rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]thA/_pra b+he/_pra b+ha te dze tA re tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'od zer gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ma d+h+ye/_ma d+h+ya tA re/_tu re tu re/_tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma 
[\[78b.2\]]sgrol ma dbu ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_nir ma le/_nir ma la/_tA re/_nir ma le te dze/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma gzi brjid dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[78b.3\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shud+d+he/_shud+d+ha hA re shud+d+ha te dze tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dag pa'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[78b.4\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_si te si te tA re/_si tA te dze tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dkar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_maM ga l+ye maM ga l+ya/_maM ga la 
[\[78b.5\]]te dze tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shis pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bo d+hi bo d+ha tA re bo d+hi te dze tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma byang chub kyi gzi 
[\[78b.6\]]brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ni r-i Ne r-i Ne ni r-i Na tA re/_ni r-i Na te dze tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a 
[\[78b.7\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_be ge be ga ba ti te dze tu rai tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma shugs kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sAp+ne/_swap+na tA re/_swap+na te dze tu re tu re/_tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma rmi lam gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a nat+ne/_a nan+ta ta re a nan+ta te dze tu re tu re 
[\[79a.2\]]swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma gzi brjid mtha' yas ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_gan+d+he gan+d+ha ta re/_gan+d+ha te dze/_tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/
[\[79a.3\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_mo ha ni mo ha ni tA re te dze tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma rmongs byed ma'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[79a.4\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA ra bud+d+ha ma ti tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re d+harma ma te tut+tA re hA re tA ra ma ti swA hA/_
[\[79a.5\]]'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA ra saM g+he saM g+ha tA re saM g+ha ma ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo 
[\[79a.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_mai tre tA re/_mai tra tu re/_mai tra ma ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma byams ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[79a.7\]]satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ku su me tA re/_ku su ma d+harme tA re/_ku su ma ma ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma me tog ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_b+ha dre tA re/_b+ha dra d+harme tut+tA re tu re b+ha dra ba tI 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]tA re swA hA/_/'phags ma sgrol ma bzar bo ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_A D+he tA re/_A D+he tut+tA re tu re ma ti swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'byor ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[79b.2\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_gr-i he tA re gr-i ha ma ti tA re tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma khyim ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_de be tA re/_de ba ma ti tA re tA 
[\[79b.3\]]re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma lha dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_r-i dzu ka tA re r-i dzu d+harma tA re r-i dzu ka ma ti tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma drang po dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo 
[\[79b.4\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sau [{]mye [,]me [}]tA re sau mya d+harme tA re tut+tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma zla ba nyid dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[79b.5\]]satwe tA re satwe tut+tA re/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ku ru tA re/_su ru tA re k+Sha ya ma ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma mi zad pa dang ldan 
[\[79b.6\]]ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bi pu la tA re/_bi pu la d+harma tA re/_bi pu la d+harma ba tI tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma yangs pa'i chos ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki 
[\[79b.7\]]te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_te dze tA re/_te dza ba tI tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma gzi brjid ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bi d+hi ba te tA re/_bid+hi ba te tA re/_bi d+ha 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]pa tI tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma cho ga ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dA ne dA na tA re dA na pa ti tA re tu tA re/_tut+tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sbyin pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[80a.2\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_u pA ye tA re/_u pA ya satwA tA re/_u pA ya tA re tu re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma thabs dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[80a.3\]]satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shI le tA re tut+tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma tshul khrims dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_k+ShAn+ti ba tI tA ra tA re tut+tA re tut+tA re/_tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags 
[\[80a.4\]]ma sgrol bzod pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shu b+he tA re tut+tA re tA re tu re tu re shu b+ha ma ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dge ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a 
[\[80a.5\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sUr+ya tA re sa mA na tut+tA re tu re tu re tA re/_sUr+ya ma ti tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol nyi ma ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+ra 
[\[80a.6\]]tA re tsan+d+ra sa me tA re tA re tsan+d+ra b+hi sa me tA re tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma zla ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dz+wa li ni tA re/_dz+wa la sa me tA re/_dz+wa la ba tI tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 
[\[80a.7\]]'bar ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_brah+me tA re/_brah+me sa me tA re/_brah+ma Ni sa me tA re brah+ma ma ti tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_in+d+re tA re/_in+d+ra sa me tA re/_in+d+ra pa ti tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_an+na tA re an+na ba ti tA 
[\[80b.2\]]re tA re tut+tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma zas kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shA rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_A kA she tA re/_A kA sha pa ti tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma kun nas gsal ba'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na 
[\[80b.3\]]mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ga ga ne tA re ga ga na ba ti tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma nam mkha'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[80b.4\]]tad+ya thA/_dza ye tA re dza ya pa tI tA re/_tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma rgyal ba'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba de ba tA/_swa re tA re a b+hi swa ra pa ti tA re tu re tu re tA re swA hA/_
[\[80b.5\]]'phags ma sgrol ma 'od gsal gyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pra d+hA na pra ti tA re/_pra d+hA ni/_tA re tu re tu re pra d+hA na pa ti swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma gtso bo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na 
[\[80b.6\]]tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba de ba ta re sarba de ba pa ti tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma lha thams cad kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[80b.7\]]satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa man+te tA re/_sa man+taM ba ti tA re/_sa man+ta ma ti/_tA re tu re tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma kun tu ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa mr-i d+harma ti tA re tu re tu re tA ra ya tA re 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ta re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma yang dag par bsags pa'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_I she tA re I shwa ti tA re tA re tu te I sha tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dbang 
[\[81a.2\]]ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re tA re tA re su tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma legs pa'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[81a.3\]]ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re b+ha ga ba te/_b+ha ya mo tsa na trA se trA sa ya/_tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa grol ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra ya ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwa ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_A re A re tut+tA re tut+tA re 
[\[81a.4\]]tu re swa hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dpa' mo zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_tA ra ya/_bo tA re/_ma hA b+ha ya/_tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa chen po las grol bar byed 
[\[81a.5\]]ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA ra Ni/_ni ra bi kalpe tA re/_nir bi kalpa sa mung+ga te tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya 
[\[81a.6\]]a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bud+d+ha kalpe tA re bud+d+ha kalpa nir+yA te tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas brtag pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re d+harma 
[\[81a.7\]]kalpe tA re/_d+harma kalpa ni r+ya te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re saM g+ha kalpe tA re/_saM g+ha kalpa nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dge 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'dun brtag pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_swa te b+ha ga ba te tA re/_a b+ha be tA re tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dngos po med ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te 
[\[81b.2\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_a b+ha ba dA ne tA re tA re/_ku tA re/_ku ru ku ru/_mu ru mu ru swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[81b.3\]]sarba b+ha be tA re/_sarba swa nir+yA te tA re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma rang thams cad nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba aM ge ra tA re/_sarba ri ju ki tA re tA re swA hA/_'phags 
[\[81b.4\]]ma sgrol ma dang po'i chos zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba pA ra mi tA tA re/_sarba bA rA mi tA nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[81b.5\]]na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba dA ne tA re tA re/_sarba dA na pA ra mi tA ni tA nir+yA te tu re tu ra swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sbyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/na mo rat+na traM yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[81b.6\]]ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_shI le tA re/_shI la bla ra mi tA/_tA re tu re tu re shI la pA ra mi tA/_nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_k+ShA n+te tA re/_k+ShAn+te pA ra mi te tA re/_k+ShAn+te pA 
[\[81b.7\]]ra mi tA nir+yA te tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_bIr+ya tA re/_bIr+ya pA ra mi tA tA re/_bIr+ya pa ra mi tA nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma brtson 'grus 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_d+h+yA ne tA re d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA tA re/_d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya 
[\[82a.2\]]ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_pradz+nyA tA re pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA tA re/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nir+yA te tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki 
[\[82a.3\]]te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba pA ra mi tA/_nir+yA te tu re tu re/_sarba d+har+m+ma a ba b+hA wa/_sarba pA ra mi te tu re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi chos nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te 
[\[82a.4\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re/_sarba bud+d+hA nir+yA te tu re tu re sarba bud+d+ha pA ra mi te tu re tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma 
[\[82a.5\]]hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba d+harme tA re sarba d+harma nir+yA te tA re tA re sarba d+harma nir+yA te ni ba ra Ni ba ra Ni tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re saM 
[\[82a.6\]]g+he/_saM g+he tA re tu re/_sarba saM g+ha d+harma nir+yA te tu re saM g+ha/_pA ra mi te tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tA re tA re/_sarba pA ra mi tA tA re/_
[\[82a.7\]]sarba d+harme tA re/_sarba ri dzu ka d+harma nir+yA te tu re tu re a na b+hi lA bya tA re tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par brjod par byar med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma 'di rnams chos thams cad nges par 'byung ba rang bzhin med cing mngon par brjod par byar med pa/_don thams cad 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]sgrub par byed pa/_nad thams cad gso bar byed pa/_thams cad du bklags pas grub pa/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad las phran tshegs thams cad la ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed do/_/'di rnams kyi cho ga phyogs tsam ston par 'gyur te/_
[\[82b.2\]]dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te gso sbyong la gnas pa'am/_gso sbyong med pas kyang rung ste/_dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis nyi ma re re la mchod pa byas nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas/_ras ris 
[\[82b.3\]]sam/_sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_ji skad gsungs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs te/_sngar brjod pa'i a ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/rtog 
[\[82b.4\]]pa'i rgyal po 'di'am gzhan gang rung du sgrol ma'i rig pas brjod cing grol bar sbyong ba la rig pa mtha' yas pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris gzhan 'dod na gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor 
[\[82b.5\]]byugs te me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar gyi mar me la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas u dum bA ra'i shing gis me sbar te tshangs pa'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste tsA ru'i bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas pas bram ze rnams dbang du 
[\[82b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/tsA ru'i bza' bas sbyin sreg bya ste/_rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nas dang zho bsres pa dang tsA ru dang gcig tu byas nas sbyin sreg bya ste/_rje rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dgra la bltas nas bzlas pa bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags 
[\[82b.7\]]pa'i chus byabs pas thams cad sel bar byed do/_/dug thams cad la yang nye bar byabs pas so/_/zhu mkhan gyi ril bu lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mig nad sel bar byed do/_/na ba la skud pas bcing bar bya ste/_gdon thams cad sel bar byed do/_/gtsug 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]tor bcings pas bdag nyid srung ba'o/_/thal bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/_/bong pa la lan bdun bzlas pas phyogs bcing ba'o/_/bud med bu ma thon pa la til mar la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/_bde blag tu btsa' bar byed do/_/rmongs pas 
[\[83a.2\]]mngal gyi zla mtshan gyi dus las 'das na/_khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin par bya'o/_/gzhan gyi tshad dang mar bsres nas sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mang po 'dod na 
[\[83a.3\]]sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas pa'i thal ba des chu'i bum pa bzhi dang bsres pa gzhag par bya'o/_/brgyad brgyar bzlas pa'i srad bus lag pa g.yas pa la bcings na ji srid du smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyan byas te 
[\[83a.4\]]g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas lag pa la bcing bar bya ste brtan pa dang g.yo bar bcas pa'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas drag shul la nyams pa'i ming nas 
[\[83a.5\]]smos te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas khyor ba'i chu btung bar sbyin par bya ste/_shib yang langs par byed do/_/de bzhin du phyogs bzhir mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin par bya ste/_'jog po'i mche bas zin pa gang 'tsho bar byed do/_/nu ma'i phur pa dang 'bras la 
[\[83a.6\]]lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas byin pas grol bar byed de/_tshor ba med par 'gyur ro/_/yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_g.yul la grong khyer gyi dbus sam/_mtshan mo mda' rgyang gang gi tshad kyis gzhil nye bar byugs nas dkar gtor byin te/_'o ma can gyi yam 
[\[83a.7\]]shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag gis sbyin sreg bya ste/_yams nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/de nas nye bar ma zhi na de las gzhan du rengs par bsams pa'i dus su bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas don grub kyi shing la ak+Sha dang /_til mar gyis 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/_'phral du yams thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/cho ga 'dis dug 'ching ngo /_/zlos bzhin pas ni sems can thams cad mthong bar byed do/_/de rnams 'di'i 'bangs su 'gyur ro/_/kuSh+mA N+Da'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag 
[\[83b.2\]]brgyad bya ste/_grul bum rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/til btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod du be la dang /_khaN+Da ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sha za dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dbang du byed pa la wa Ta'i yam 
[\[83b.3\]]shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/_brjed byed dang /_gnon po dbang du byed do/_/bal gyi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du seng ldeng gi rtse mo la rnon po'i til 
[\[83b.4\]]mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/gu gul gyi ril bu la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/_lha chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_lha chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ldong ros blangs nas rgyal po'i yam 
[\[83b.5\]]shing gis me sbar nas ji srid me dpung du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i pa ser skya'i 'o ma la gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar du byas nas/_mar de la gdab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du zhos gang ba'i snod dang /_mar dang sbrang rtsis gang ba'i snod 
[\[83b.6\]]la yang ngo /_/de nas srung ba byas te za ma tog tu bzhag nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas kha 
[\[83b.7\]]byang du mngon par phyogs pas snod bzhi ru bzhag nas ji srid 'gro ba dang /_du ba 'thul ba'am/_'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dbang du byed pa dang /_mi snang ba dang /_nam mkha' la nye bar 'khrid par byed do/_/de bzhin du mig sman bla bskyed pa'i ched du 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]rang nyid khyad par du dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i skud pa la bzhag nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lag pa kha sbyar nas blangs nas ji srid dro ba dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/'di nyid la 
[\[84a.2\]]mngon pa rnam pa gsum mo/_/lcags lngas pad+ma byed du bcug nas gur gum dang /_gi wang dang /_ga pur nam mkha'i chus btags nas pad+mar bcug ste/_de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te ring bsrel 
[\[84a.3\]]dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do/_/
[\[84a.4\]]de bzhin du gdu bu dang /_cod pan dang /_lcags sgrog rnams kyang ngo /_/de bzhin du ri'i tsan+dan dmar po dang /_gu gul dang /_dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rtsa ba dang /_lcags lnga dang /_gi ri kar+Ni ka dang /_'bru'i phub ma dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_pi pi ling dang /_
[\[84a.5\]]tu ruSh+ka rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mo byed du gzhug go/_/de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs bar ba'i 'o ma blangs nas gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar sar dang gcig tu byas nas phye ma la ril bu byed du gzhug go/_/arga'i til mar gyi phye mas mar me dbul 
[\[84a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gso sbyong can gyis a shwat+Tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bcug par byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de khar bcug pas mi snang bar 
[\[84a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas 'bar bar byed pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas me'i yam shing gis me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]btags pa'i seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/dkar po'i bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gso sbyong can gyis rtag tu bzlas pa stong phrag gsum bya'o/_/phyi nas las thams cad du 
[\[84b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/yang na rgyal po'am blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas shing gi rgyal po'i yam shing la i rgu da'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du'o/_/las 'dis 
[\[84b.3\]]tshul khrims 'chal ba yin yang de bzhin kho nar gsod pa dang /_bskrad pa la ni m+ba'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste mtshan mo bdun gyis skrod par byed do/_/rigs bzhi dbang du byed par 'dod pas tsA ru dang bcas pa'i chu dang /_
[\[84b.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi kham phor zhes pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo pu tsi ra dza ta'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/bzlas pas 'ching ba las grol bar byed do/_/bgegs la phub ma dang til gyi sbyin sreg gis gzhan gang yang rung bas rab tu zhi bar 
[\[84b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rigs kyi bu mo dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gos 'dod pas dUr ba dang /_tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/stong phrag brgyad dam mtshan mo bdun du'o/_/shu dag la stong phrag brgyad lan bdun 
[\[84b.6\]]du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas lag pa la'o/_/nor 'dod pas gu gul gyi ril bu'am sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad mtshan mo bdun du bya'o/_/khyim gyi bdag po 'dod pas dri'i sbyin sreg mtshan mo bdun du bya'o/_/mar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grong rnyed do/_/skrod pa la 
[\[84b.7\]]tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i nim pa'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/skyes bu'i sha ni skrod par byed pa las so/_/phub ma ni sdang bar byed pa las so/_/spyod par byed pa la sbrul gyi shun lpags dang thal bas so/_/skyes bu ma yin par byed pa la go ma in+t+ra'o/_/phub ma 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]chu 'ching ba la'o/_/zhi ba'i don du shing sa mi'i 'dab ma rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig pas so/_/ji ltar nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/ma grub pa sgrub par byed do/_/
[\[85a.2\]]gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa la ma nu la 'ching ba 'dzin par byed do/_/mtshan mo bdun du tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya ste dgra 'joms par byed do/_/gos 'dod pas dUr ba dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/khyim rab tu g.yo bar 'dod 
[\[85a.3\]]pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad pa'i tshad kyi phur bu byas nas khyim du gdab par bya'o/_/me tog la brgyad brgyar yongs su bzlas nas byin na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i sgo ru gur gum dang /_rgya spos dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa dang /_me tog brgya pa sdong bu 
[\[85a.4\]]dang bcas pa rnams kyis ras dkris pa yang dag par ldan pa'i cho gas phye ma gos la btab pas mi'i dgra rab tu ldan pa la mi'i dgra dbang du 'gyur ro/_/g.yul du rnam par rgyal bar byed pa la rgyal mtshan la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas nas dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug 
[\[85a.5\]]pa la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol mas mngon par bsngags nas me thab tu mchod yon lan bdun phul nas mngag gzhug pas pha rol gyi sde la ston du gzhug par bya'o/_/shing la rdo rje'i thog ji lta bar ro/_/til nag po la gzugs brnyan byas pa'i mdun du stong 
[\[85a.6\]]phrag bzlas te gang gi ming nas smos te za bar byed do/_/stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas sa bon thams cad dam/_sman thams cad dam/_dri thams cad dam/_dri zhim po'i me tog rnams sam/_pad+ma rtsa ba nag po med pa'i bum par bcug nas stong bzlas par bya'o/_/byang
