[\[85a.7\]]chub shing gi 'og tu'am/_gzhan yang rung ste khrus bya'o/_/don grub dang pad+ma 'am pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang sdong bu dang /_chu ba rnams kyi phye ma dang /_seng ldeng gi sol ba rnams ming nas smos nas sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bil ba'i dbus su sbrang rtsi dang yang dag 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]par ldan pa rnams kyis du ba dang sol ba la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/_blon po 'am/_ming nas smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dri dang /_me tog dang bdug phul nas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa bya 
[\[85b.2\]]ste/_sna ma'i me tog dang /_ut+pal sngon po'am/_gzhan pa'i me tog rnams gang gi ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/grub pa'i 'dod ma dbang du byed pa la til nag po btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la pri yang ku/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa 
[\[85b.3\]]la sA lu dmar po gang gi ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu ma'i ming nas smos te me tog ge sar gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'o ma dang 'o thug dang mar dang sbrang rtsis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na gang gi 
[\[85b.4\]]ming nas 'bod pa de rgyas pa can gyi las so/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs sam/_ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar ro/_/sngon gyi mtha' ma ri'i rtse mor ku sha dang bil ba'i yam shing gis me 
[\[85b.5\]]sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma kha rgyas par bye ba'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya/_a ga ru dang /_kun tu ru ka dang /_shri beSh+Ta ka rnams kyi bdug spos dang /_'o ma dang zho'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing rnam pa gzhan du bgegs rnams la 'byung po thams 
[\[85b.6\]]cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/_/de nas brgyad pa la mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/_/'o ma dang nas zan za bas pad+ma dkar po kha rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyin sreg byas na gter chen po'am yul rnyed do/_/me tog ser po la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pas me la sbyin 
[\[85b.7\]]sreg bya'o/_/yul gyi rje por 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo gsum du phye za bar mtshan mo gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de bzhin du stong phrag bdun brgyas mtshams med pa byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yam shing de nyid la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gser bye ba 'byung ngo /_/snga bar langs nas khrus sngon du 'gro bas tshangs par spyod cing me rab tu sbar nas nA ga ge sar dang /_pri yang ku'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/_zla ba gsum gyi nang du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos 
[\[86a.2\]]grub nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing rdzas mang po yong ngo /_/ba lang gi sha dang khaN+Da can gyi sbyin sreg byas na ba lang gi gnas rnyed do/_/de bzhin du pri yang ku dang nA ga ge sar gyi yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 
[\[86a.3\]]bil ba'i 'og tu me sbar nas bil ba dang /_A shi bil ba rnams la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/_lha mo sgrol ma mthong ngo /_/gtsang mar gyur pas zas bzhir smyung bar gnas te/_stong phrag bcur sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gter chen po mthong ngo /_/
[\[86a.4\]]de bzhin du mtshan mo nyi shur 'o ma dang nas zan za bas yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/_nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas nyin mtshan du yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/_zla bas char rgyun bzang 
[\[86a.5\]]po ltung bar byed do/_/zas bzhir smyung bar gnas pas stong phrag bcur sbyin sreg bya ste nor rnyed do/_/mkhas pas dkar po'i phyogs 'byung 'gyur la lha mo'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mkhas pas thun mtshams gsum du bsnun par bya'o/_/dkar po'i phyogs kyi nang 
[\[86a.6\]]du de la lta mo 'di mchog sbyin par mdzad do/_/rig pa 'dis til gyi sreg blugs stong gi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/bil ba'i shing gis me sbar na lha mo mthong ste nor ram 'bru'i dbang phyug tu byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas me tog brgya pa'i 
[\[86a.7\]]sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na nor rnyed do/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun phyogs gtsang mar lha la pa lA sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas ut+pa la'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na yul gru dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dis dri zhim po'i bdug pa 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]phul nas 'o ma dang nas zan za bas pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong bya ste gser stong rnyed do/_/'dis me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gang yid la sems pa de sbyin no/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar sbyin sreg stong byas na gter mthong ngo /_/pri yang ku la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar 
[\[86b.2\]]gyis btags pa'i 'o ma dang /_nas zan za bas phyogs gtsang mar sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gser brgya rnyed do/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba'o/_/de nas mtshan mo gsum du g.yul du smyung bar gnas pas a ga ru'i yam shing gis thun mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg 
[\[86b.3\]]stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/de nas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pas ras ris rab tu 'gul ba'am phreng ba'i chun po g.yo bar gyur na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te rgyal srid sbyin par byed do/_/gang yid la sems par byed pa de ster bar byed de/_nad thams cad gso ba dang /_shi ba dang 
[\[86b.4\]]'ching ba grol ba dang /_sel ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar me tog gis sbyin sreg stong bya'o/_/dbang du byed do/_/yang na ras ris gcig byang chub kyi rtsa bar bzhag nas cho ga 'di nyid kyis nas zan za 
[\[86b.5\]]bas bzlas pa stong phrag brgya bya/_zas gcig pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong la gnas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zas kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang na zla ba dang nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[86b.6\]]dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba bla gos dkar po mnabs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/gzhogs gcig tu lha mo sgrol ma gser mdog pad+ma la gnas pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa sgrub pa po la kun nas gzigs par byed pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[86b.7\]]dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_gtor ma'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zla ba la mig lta bar ji srid zla ba grol gyi bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/_/lha mo sgrol ma rang gi gzugs kyis 'bar ba nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog lta bu pad+ma kha bye ba phyag na bsnams pa/_'byon 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mchod yon phul nas mchog zhu bar bya'o/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang zan za bas bsgrub par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis me dang lan tshwa zos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gu gul gyis sbyin 
[\[87a.2\]]sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/dong tse brgyad rnyed do/_/kun tu ru ka'i las 'di'o/_/bil ba'i yang las 'di'o/_/de ba dA rus grub pa'i don du rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pas a ga ru'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/'o ma dang bcas pa'i shing gis 
[\[87a.3\]]me rab tu sbar na nor thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas nas snga bar langs te/_blugs gzar dang ldan pas me rab tu sbar nas nA ga ge sar dang pri yang ku'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya ste zla ba'i nang 
[\[87a.4\]]du blta bar bya bar 'gyur ro/_/be kang+ka ta'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/gtsang ma'i sngar gyi las kyi phyogs su pa lA sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas na gser brgya rnyed 
[\[87a.5\]]do/_/rig pa 'dis pri yang ku'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste gser stong rnyed do/_/rig pa 'dis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dri dang me tog dang bdug pa phul nas u dum bA ra'i yam shing 
[\[87a.6\]]gis me rab tu sbar te sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/'dod pa thams cad mchog dang lhan cig byed do/_/mya ngan med pa'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya bya'o/_/mngon sum du gzugs kyis 'ong bar byed do/_/bdug pa la lan stong phrag 
[\[87a.7\]]brgya bzlas nas/_gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gon te 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod cing 'dod pa rnams kun tu thob ste 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas mtshan mo lngar 'o ma dang nas zan za ba'am 'o ma 'thungs pas stong 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas zla ba nya la dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod na lha mo rang gi gzugs su mthong ngo /_/'o ma dang nas zan za zhing yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_
[\[87b.2\]]zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'o ma 'thungs pas a pA marga'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o/_/'o ma dang bcas pa'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar na des nges pa nyid du gter mthong ngo /_/rig pa 
[\[87b.3\]]'dis 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing bil ba'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i til gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na rang gi gzugs kyis lha mo mthong ngo /_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dri dang me tog dang bdug pa phul 
[\[87b.4\]]nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i u dum bA ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/_arga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste don du ma gnyer bar nor dang 'bru rnyed do/_/lha'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas de ba dA ru'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o/_/rang gi gzugs 
[\[87b.5\]]kyis 'ong bar byed do/_/mar gyi sbyin sreg gis zhi ba'o/_/dUr ba'i sbyin sreg gis rgyas pa can no/_/zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas pas de bzhin du 'di'i nor thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la 
[\[87b.6\]]mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/_bu mo bag mar gtong bar byed do/_/nub mo nyal bar 'dod pas rig pa dpag tu med pa bzla bar bya ste/_rmi lam ngan pa mi mthong ngo /_/til nag po'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du brgyad brgyar bzlas na/_gang gi ming bsams par gyur pa de 
[\[87b.7\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'bru nag po la brgyad brgyar bzlas na gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar a pA marga'i yam shing gi me la pad+ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/bil ba'i shing gi yam shing ngam 'o ma dang bcas pa'i yam shing gis 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]me rab tu sbar nas pad+ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg bya ste stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/slar yang pad+ma stong phrag bcus rgyal srid rnyed do/_/pad+ma stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis longs spyod chen po rnyed do/_/sbyin sreg 'di rnams thams cad la dri dang me tog 
[\[88a.2\]]dang bdug pas mchod pa byas nas 'o ma dang nas zan za bas sna ma'i me tog gis gang gi ming nas 'bod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bil ba'i yam shing gis brgyad brgyas me rab tu sbar nas pad+ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gang gi ming nas 'bod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gi 
[\[88a.3\]]wang gi byug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te mgo bo la byug par bya'o/_/yang na gdong la thig le bya'o/_/skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i sa bon la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/ming smos pa de 
[\[88a.4\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drin las gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma ma rnyed na ut+pal sngon po stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dri'am me tog gi sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag gcig gis lha rnams grub par 'gyur ro/_/khrus 
[\[88a.5\]]la sman thams cad dang /_sa bon thams cad rtsa ba nag po med pa'i bum par bcug nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus khrus bya'o/_/bgegs kyis btab pa 'am bdag nyid zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ut+pa la dang /_ru rta dang /_a ga ru'i cha dang /_stag sen/_
[\[88a.6\]]rgya spos bzhi 'gyur gyi cha rnams ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ba'i mar me rab tu sbar nas rdzas rnams thams cad me tog gis sbyor bas dus ma yin pa gang gi rgyal po 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po'am/_rgyal po'i 
[\[88a.7\]]btsun mo'am/_sgrub pa po'am/_tshe song ba rnams 'khrur gzhug par bya'o/_/tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang po bgegs kyis btab pa rnams bgegs las grol bar byed do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pas/_brah+ma dA ri'am dzi ten+t+ra ya dang /_a ga ru dang /_tu ruSh+ka 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya ste de bzhin du yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/til nag po la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma 'am zhogs ma dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad 
[\[88b.2\]]bya ste grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni tsan+dan gyi yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas te grub par 'gyur ro/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te bil ba'i shing gi 'og tu me nye bar sbar nas bil ba'i 'bras bu la zho 
[\[88b.3\]]dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgyad cu bya ste/_rang gi gzugs kyis lha mo mthong zhing rgyal srid chen po gnang bar byed cing gzhan yang gang zhus pa de gnang bar byed do/_/'byung po'i gdon grol bar byed pa la pad+ma'i phyag rgyas reg par bya ste 'bros 
[\[88b.4\]]par byed do/_/bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ma yin pa'i 'o ma'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/de bzhin du ut+pal dmar po dang /_sngon po 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya zhing yang na sna ma'i me tog gis 
[\[88b.5\]]sbyin sreg go/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya ste slong mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o/_/dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa'i mthar dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sgrub 
[\[88b.6\]]bzhin pa ma yin pa 'dis sa rnams tshul khrims mchog tu 'chal pas kyang grub par byed do/_/yang na yungs kar til nag po dang bsres pa zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nor 'dod pas a pA 
[\[88b.7\]]marga'i yam shing gis yungs kar rgyal po 'am ske tshe'i sbyin sreg go/_/yang na blon po dbang du byed pa la til mar gyis sbyin sreg ste/_las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/bu mo dbang du byed pa la sngar gyi sbyin sreg zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pas so/_/rgyal 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]po'i btsun mo la las 'di'o/_/byang chub shing gi me sbar nas yongs su spyod pa'i sbyin sreg go/_/dbang du byed pa la yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin sreg go/_/dbang du byed pa la kam+bo dzi ka'i me tog gi yam shing gis stong phrag brgya bya'o/_/zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar 
[\[89a.2\]]gyis btags pa'i byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas thab med pa'i me la lha dang lha mo la dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gang blangs pa de ster bar byed do/_/ba sha ka'i me 
[\[89a.3\]]tog phrag brgya sbyin sreg bya ste ming smos pa de dbang du byed do/_/na le sham gyi sbyin sreg gis log 'dren rnam par 'joms par byed do/_/byang chub shing gi 'og tu dri dang me tog gis mngon par mchod nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na ldong ros blangs nas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma 
[\[89a.4\]]bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/_/blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lha thams cad thogs pa med pa dang /_lha'i gzhal yas khang mchog tu mdzes par myur zhing mgyogs par 'gro ste nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog dang gzi brjid dang 
[\[89a.5\]]ldan zhing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang ldan par 'gro ste lha'i 'gro ba brgya phrag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i mig sman la las 'di kho na'o/_/gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang nas zan za bas sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/zla ba gzas 
[\[89a.6\]]bzung ba'i dus su pi pi ling gi 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du 'am/_ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten du gi wang rnam pa brgyar bya ste btang nas rig pa yongs su bskor bas las bya'o/_/nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa can te des thig le byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan 
[\[89a.7\]]pa'i lus 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do/_/dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman gyi 'dab ma blangs nas me gdung bzang por byas nas lan brgyar rab tu bcug nas zla ba gzas zin pa na chur zhugs te ji srid du grul 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/skad cig la bcag pa tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/_/'di byugs pas gzi brjid dang ldan zhing cod pan dang rna rgyan 'chang ba pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'i lus rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par yang rab tu smon par 'gro'o/_/
[\[89b.2\]]'khor dang bcas pa lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do/_/rlung ltar 'gro zhing yid ltar mgyogs par 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma dang ut+pa la stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis gser stong rnyed do/_/pa lA sha'i las ni 'di kho na'o/_/yang 'dir las chen po'i 
[\[89b.3\]]sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni rgyal ba'i zhabs drung ngam/_ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram/_rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho gas kyang rung ste/_rig pa 'di rnams kyi ming gsum gsum brjod pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga de'am/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du phyogs gtsang mar 'o 
[\[89b.4\]]ma dang nas zan za bas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_tsA ru dang /_rtsa ba dang /_zho'i bza' ba'am/_chu dang /_phye dang /_zan dang /_dri'i bza' ba'am/_wa kra'i bza' ba'am/_mar gyi bza' bas kyang rung ste/_yang na mi smra ba'i brtul 
[\[89b.5\]]zhugs spyad par bya'o/_/thog mar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang yang dag par ldan pas nyi ma so sor mngon par brjod bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya'o/_/gsung rab ji lta ba bzhin du slong mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o/_/byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung 
[\[89b.6\]]zhing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas bza' bar bya'o/_/sgrub pa pos dus gsum du khrus byas pa'i 'og tu shis pa'i ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste sbyangs pa las byung ba'i gos bgo zhing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas seng ldeng gi 
[\[89b.7\]]shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma dang bcas pa'i shing ngam/_a ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad dam mdzub mo'i tshad la tu ruSh+ka'i til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la phyogs bzhi ras las byung ba'i 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bum pa bzhi chu dang bcas pa a mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha g.yogs pa/_rtsa ba dang nag po med pa gzhag par bya'o/_/g.yas kyi gzhogs su sa las byung ba'am/_gser las byung ba rin po che dang /_sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba/_sman thams 
[\[90a.2\]]cad dang /_rtsa ba dang /_rin po che'i snying po pad+ma dra ba'i me tog gis kha g.yogs pa/_du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pa/_rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs su 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o/_/nub 
[\[90a.3\]]kyi phyogs su ha [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o/_/de lta bu la sogs pa bum pa rnams kyi ming smos te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhin gzhug par bya'o/_/dri bzang po'i me tog dang /_gtor ma dang /_phreng ba nyi shu dbul bar bya zhing /_dris bkang ba'i kham por nyi shu 
[\[90a.4\]]phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o/_/'o mas bkang ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o/_/mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o/_/bum pa'i sgron ma bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o/_/'o thug gis bkang ba'i kham phor bcu gnyis klu rnams la dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[90a.5\]]til gyi thug pa'i kham phor bcu gnyis srin po rnams la gtor ma mchod par bya'o/_/zan dron gyi kham phor brgyad 'byung po rnams la gtor mar sbyin no/_/hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bya'o/_/gzhan 
[\[90a.6\]]rnams la mar sar dang /_zhos bkang ba dang /_ji ltar 'os pa dang /_ji ltar mtshungs pa'i kham phor rnams phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o/_/a ga ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/_/ga bur dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_kun du ru ka dang /_shri bA sa can gyi 
[\[90a.7\]]bdug pa'i kham phor phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas srod la las brtsams par byas te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas arga'i yam shing ngam/_seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu sbar nas las 'di la sngags 'dis spyan drang ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/sngags ni/_na 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_hi ri hi ri/_su ru su ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA d+hi ri d+hi ri Ni/_ya thA sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sA hA/_gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su dri zhim po'i me tog gis bskul 
[\[90b.2\]]bas so/_/dngul las byung ba'i snod dam/_sa las byung bar mchod yon phul nas de nas a ga ru nag po'i yam shing ji skad gsungs pa'i tshad/_gzhan gsungs pa la til mar gyis btags pa rnams zla ba gzas bzung ba'am/_nyi ma gzas bzung ba na stong phrag brgyad sbyin 
[\[90b.3\]]sreg bya'o/_/de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu thugs brtse ba phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang /_dbyug pa bsnams pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba 'byon par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i snod du dri zhim 
[\[90b.4\]]po'i me tog dkar po rnams snyim pas blangs nas chu'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ci yin pa'i mchog ste sbyin par bya'o zhes gsung bar byed do/_/gang mchog blangs pa de ster ro/_/nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/_mi snang 
[\[90b.5\]]ba'am/_rgyal po nyid dam/_rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad dam/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam/_mtshon cha'am/_tshe ring po nyid dam/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'am/_gi wang sgrub pa'am/_mig sman sgrub pa'am/_gter 'pho ba'am/_phug tu 'jug 
[\[90b.6\]]pa'am/_bcud len nam/_ldong ros sgrub pa'am/_mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/_rang gi lus la rjes su 'dod pa'i cho ga'am/_lha'i mig gam/_nad 'joms pa'am/_lha'i shes pa'am/_lag pa dang rkang pa'am/_mig cha dang bral ba nyid dam/_lha'i dbang po sbas pa nyid 
[\[90b.7\]]dam/_nad 'joms pa nyid dam/_mdze'am lus la gang cung zad bsgrub bya min pa'i nad de dang de rnams la de las thar ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_nor sgrub pa nyid dam/_gang blangs pa'i mchog de sbyin par mdzad do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]su'ang 'gro'o/_/tshe bskal bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pos ku sha'i khres yod pas u dum bA ra'i cho ga shes par bya ste/_u dum bA ra'i shing gi shing lham gnyis sam/_rdza mkhan gyi sa la/_de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid do/_/
[\[91a.2\]]sgrol ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po'i cho gar 'gyur te/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_oM ku ru ku ru kul+le swA hA/_'di ni rig pa 'di thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po ste bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jigs 
[\[91a.3\]]pa thams cad gnon par byed do/_/nad thams cad zad cing 'joms so/_/'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/las phran tshegs rnams kyang bklags pas 'grub bo/_/'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zlos par byed pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[91a.4\]]mig sman ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bar byed bzhin pas ni dbang du byed do/_/du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o/_/'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/til gyi sreg blugs 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[91a.5\]]gang 'dod pa de ster bar byed do/_/'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya ste ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do/_/de mthong na gang brtsams pa de 'grub par byed do/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste nyi ma so 
[\[91a.6\]]so la dong tse rnyed do/_/tsan+dan dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste/_nyi ma re re la kA ra ShA pa Na drug rnyed do/_/'bum phrag bdun bdun bzlas par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste/_nad 'joms par byed do/_/mtshan mo brgyad du 
[\[91a.7\]]lan gsum yongs su bzlas pas nad 'joms par byed do/_/'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste bcud len dang bcud rnyed do/_/de zos pas gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum gyis gri d+ha shI sel bar byed do/_/lcags bsregs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i til mar gyis rkang pa g.yas pa la bskus nas lcags des rkang pa la gdung bar bya zhing gri d+ha shI chod cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do/_/yungs kar rgyal po'i sreg blugs byas pas dbang du 
[\[91b.2\]]'gyur zhing mtshan mo bdun gyis nor gyi bdag por 'gyur te 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ma gtogs so/_/mArga la 'bum bzlas te bskus na bza' btung gang blangs pa de rnyed do/_/arga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas na gser srang brgya rnyed do/_/shing bi N+ya kaM gis sbyin sreg 
[\[91b.3\]]bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/tA mU la'i phye mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste cod pan 'ching bar 'gyur ro/_/bye ba bzlas par bya ste 'khor brgyas bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'bras yos kyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya ste nyi ma 
[\[91b.4\]]bdun gyis bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste/_ba lci skam po hwags kyis btso bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba med pa'am/_dug med par brjod pas bskus na dri bzang por 'gyur ro/_/tAm+bu la thams cad yang dag par sbyar te 
[\[91b.5\]]'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/_/tAm+bu la ma tshang ba nyid med par 'gyur ro/_/a bA margas mig nad sel bar byed do/_/rims kyis btab pa la ku shas byabs pas so/_/srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas nas bcing bar bya ste skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/zan dang zho 
[\[91b.6\]]lhan cig pa 'bum gyis sbyin sreg byas na ji srid 'dod pa'i zas ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi sreg blugs stong gis sbyin sreg byas na yul gru gsum rnyed do/_/bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgrub pa lan gsum gyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes so/_/gu 
[\[91b.7\]]gul gyi ril bu ka par Sha'i rus pa'i tshad kyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya/_nyi ma re re la pa Na bcu drug rnyed do/_/lhag ma med pa zad par bya'o/_/dong ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste ma btags pa'i gos sna tshogs pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do/_/snying rjes sbyin 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]du bcug pa dang /_de bzhin du dad pa dang /_lha bsnyen pa las gzhan ma yin pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang chos thams cad kyi nang du gtogs par rtog pa thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig pa 'di 
[\[92a.2\]]ni cho ga rgyas par bstan par lo brgya phrag gis kyang de dang 'dis mdor bsdus nas bstan par mi nus so/_/cho ga gzhan rnams su yang rig pa 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga de thams cad bsgrub par bya zhing /_de bzhin du gang nges par brjod pa'i las rnams sgrub par byed do/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 
[\[92a.3\]]'dir rig pa'i sngags de rnams dang gang sngags rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba de rnams kho na yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa dang /_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/de rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi spyod pa sbyin pa 
[\[92a.4\]]dang /_sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi las dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i rig pa dang /_sngags rnams dang /_rtog pa thams cad du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bcu rnams 
[\[92a.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga brgyad rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rtog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu bzhi po'i rtog pa dang /_yangs pa'i ri bo dang /_kun tu ri bo dang /_'jig rten gsum 
[\[92a.6\]]las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud de/_rtog pa chen po thams cad kyi spyod pa'i cho ga rnams su mnyam pa nyid du 'gro bar byed do/_/de bzhin kho nar bdag gis brjod pa de dang /_sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas gsungs pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po bde blag tu bsgrub par bya ste mtha' yas 
[\[92a.7\]]pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams cad thun mong pa'i cho ga'i rig pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//phyag rgya'i le'u bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]de nas sems dpa' chen po phyag rgya yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba rgyud thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa phyag rgya'i ri mo'i cho ga_/rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyur pas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya'i mtshan 
[\[92b.2\]]nyid gsungs par gyur to/_/bcing ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/shes nas rab tu bzhag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/rigs kyi phyag rgya cha gsum rnams/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor kun nas 'bar/_/gtsug tor phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi/_/nyi ma'i 
[\[92b.3\]]dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/gtsug tor de nyid cung zad bteg_/gtsug tor steng 'gro'i phyag rgya'o/_/kun tu dkar ba gdugs dkar can/_/'khor lo 'bar ba rnam par 'phro/_/gzi brjid phung po rdo rje snying /_/gzhan gyis mi 
[\[92b.4\]]thub lan gsum dkris/_/rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya'o/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid do/_/pad+ma rin chen nor bu ni/_/rin chen snying po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor so sor gnas/_/las kun byed pa'i gdu 
[\[92b.5\]]bu can/_/de dbus son pa dbus ma yin/_/spyan de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan/_/de nyid rtsa ba can gyis dman/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'o/_/rtse mo'i steng 'og nus pa'i mtshan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa'o/_/'bar ba'i tshogs pa gzhan 
[\[92b.6\]]mi thub/_/'bar ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/thams cad lhung bzed sogs phyag rgya/_/sngags sam yid kyi bye brag las/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs phyag rgya'o/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi ma la/_/'dab ma can rdzogs gang ba yi/_/zla ba'i rnam pa cha dang bcas/_/
[\[92b.7\]]rtsa ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma can/_/pad+ma g.yo ba'i steng du ni/_/nges zhugs nor bu 'dod pa ni/_/phun tshogs byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rta mgrin dang ni sngon phyogs kyi/_/pad+ma yi ni ze 'bru'o/_/pad+ma dkar po gos dkar can/_/ze 'bru de nyid grags ldan ma'i/_/ut+pal de nyid 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]sgrol ma yi/_/ut+pa la ni zla ba yi'o/_/cung zad rin chen khro gnyer can/_/sdong bu dang bcas dpal mo ste/_/pho nya mo kun zhes bya'i rigs/_/kha bye rgyas pa rigs rgyal mo'o/_/lhag ma rnams kyi thun mong nyid/_/byug pa'am ril ba spyi blugs kyi/_/rnam 
[\[93a.2\]]pa de dag lhag ma ru/_/rig pa can rnams kyis shes bya/_/'bar bas pad rigs phyag rgya'o/_/rtse mo lnga pa rdo rje yi/_/gdong gnyis lha mo so sor gnas/_/'bar ba'i phreng ldan rig pa mchog_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'o/_/dam tshig rdo rje thad kar gnas/_/bum 
[\[93a.3\]]dbus steng song mA ma kI/_/gtsug tor gcig pa rgyal ba ste/_/gtsug tor gnyis pa rnam par rgyal/_/gtsug tor gsum pa rdo rje'i mtshan/_/dbus su mdung gi rnam pa ni/_/rdo rje yi ni mtshan ma'o/_/dbus su 'khyil pa byas nas ni/_/mdung la 'khyil pa 
[\[93a.4\]]mngon phyogs pa'o/_/rdo rje'i dbus su dkyil 'khor la/_/kun nas 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/yod pa phreng ba can ma'o/_/rdo rje gnyis ka'i rtse mo la/_phreng ba dag byed phreng ba 'chang /_/cung zad cod pan gzhogs su ni/_/lcags kyu rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o/_/
[\[93a.5\]]dbyug pa dbyug pa'o de bzhin du/_/dgra sta dbus ma'i rtse mor gnas/_/rdo rje khu tshur bum can yang /_/de nas nges pa'i rnam pa ni/_/rdo rje rtse gcig 'bar bcas pa/_/rdo rje kha mdung gi sna/_/pho nya mo yi ring po ste/_/khro bo rnams kyi thung ngu'o/_/rnam par 'phro ba 
[\[93a.6\]]rig pa'i rgyal/_/cung zad dbus su gtsug tor ldan/_/rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/'og tu mdung la steng rdo rje/_/tshogs kyi'o steng du mdung dang ni/_/'og tu rdo rje log 'dren kun/_/dbus su bi dI'i phyogs bzhi ru/_/mgo gsum rdo rje bi dI ni/_/rig pa'i 
[\[93a.7\]]rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du'o/_/de nyid 'dir yang de bzhin du/_/thams cad du ni 'bar bcas pa/_/bdun lnga gsum gyi 'bar bar bya/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad la/_/rdo rje lnga yi mtshan nyid rnams/_/phyag rgya bcas pa'o gtum po rnams/_/bi dI ka dang bcas 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa'o/_/cig shos 'jig rten pa rnams ni/_/'bar ba dang bcas gtum po mi/_/bi dI med par so sor gnas/_/ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba yi/_/dge ba'i spyod pas 'jig rten pa/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyud shes pas/_/thams cad rtog pa dkyil 'khor gyis zhes so/_/
[\[93b.2\]]oM sa ra sa ra badzra prA kA raM hU~M phaT swA hA/_ra ba'o/_/oM bi phu rad/_rak+Sha badzra pany+dza ra hU~M phaT swA hA/_rdo rje'i gur ro/_/o~M kI li kI li/_badzra badzri b+hu ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_phur ba'o/_/de ltar 'di rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas sems dpa' chen po 
[\[93b.3\]]des/_slar yang phyag rgya yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub thabs thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang rig pa thams cad la kun nas mnyam par 'jug pa de rnams gdon mi za ba kho nar dngos grub rtogs 
[\[93b.4\]]par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/de nas thal mo dbus ma yi/_/gung mo'i sor mo gung mos gung mo la/_/de nyid sdigs mdzub rtse mo lta bar gnas/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs dam tshig gi/_/phyag rgya lhan cig par bsgrags so/_/dang por sngags bcas rdzogs par bya/_/
[\[93b.5\]]bzlas pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir sngags ni/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_o~M ta thA ga tA ud b+ha bA ya swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su dam tshig gi sngags so/_/g.yon pa'i rgyab phyin ci log tu 'gyur te bkan la lag pa'i mthe'u chung bzung la gang 
[\[93b.6\]]gis mthe bong gnyis cung zad brkyang ba mnan par bya ste/_sor mo dag ni mchog gi dam tshig gi sngags te rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu grags par 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir sngags ni/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_o~M badzra ud b+ha bA ya swA hA/_rdo rje'i rigs su dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i 
[\[93b.7\]]sngags so/_/gung mo'i sor mo gung mo can/_/byas nas thal mo sbyar byas pa/_/sor mo gnyis rtag bug pa med/_/dang por bcings nas de bzhin phyis/_/rdzogs nas bzlas pa la sogs 'gyur/_/yang 'dir sngags ni/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHzhes pa 'di 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]rnams dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams la'o/_/o~M pad+ma ud b+ha bA ya swA hA/_'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sngags so/_/zhes pa dam tshig phyag rgya ne/_/gsum po 'di rnams kun tu bsgrag_/yon tan dpag med rnam pa ste/_/stobs chen pha 
[\[94a.2\]]rol gnon pa'o/_/dang por bcing bya rtag tu slar/_/sgrub pos lha yi spyan snga ru/_/de yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/myur du 'dod pa'i zhi sogs rnams/_/'jig rten mgon po mtha' yas dang /_/de sras bdag nyid che rnams kyis/_/lus can kun gyi phyag rgya 
[\[94a.3\]]che/_/sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa yin/_/rtag tu snga bar langs nas ni/_/nyin re nyin re bcing bar bya/_/btsang zhing dad dang blo gros ldan/_/de yis dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dam tshig phyag rgya gsum po 'di/_/gang gis shes pa blo ldan pas/_/gzung 
[\[94a.4\]]ba'i 'phags pa'i man ngag gis/_/de yi dngos grub the tshom med/_/'di rnams rnam par shes pa ni/_/cho ga nyams kyang sgrub pa pos/_/de yi dngos grub byed pa yin/_/stobs po che la sogs rnams kyis/_/phyag rgya kun tu srung don du/_/de nas dbugs 
[\[94a.5\]]'byin chen po de/_/bdag gis kun nas snang ba yi/_/phyag rgya yang dag skul byed pa'i/_/sgom pa kun nas rtag tu ni/_/phyag rgya rab tu gsungs pa ste/_/sgrol ma kun gyi thun mong du/_/rtag pa gang du gsungs pa yin/_/rtog pa gzhan du rig pa gang /_/de rnams 
[\[94a.6\]]nyid kyang rab sbyar bya/_/yang 'dir phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/_/slar yang sor mo phan tshun du/_/lan gnyis kha sbyar gnas pa la/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang /_/blo ldan de bzhin mthe bong yang /_/sems ni legs par mnyam bzhag pas/_/bcing bya 
[\[94a.7\]]rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sgrol ma spyan drang ched du ni/_/'di rnams rig pa lhan cig pas/_/zhes 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin/_/sgrub pa po ni don thams cad/_/rang gi rig pa sbyar ba yin/_/cho ga nyams kyang dad pa yis/_/lha rnams 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]'phral du 'ong bar byed/_/de nyid mthe bong bkan byas nas/_/mchod yon dag ni dbul bar bya/_/de nas mchod yon can du 'gyur/_/mi rnams 'dod pa'i 'bras rab sbyin/_/mchod yon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa bkan te bteg la brkyang /_/mthe bong gdan du 
[\[94b.2\]]rab brtag bya/_/de nyid 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i don/_/lha rnams yongs su mnyes par byed/_/gdan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bong dag gi rtse mo cha/_/bskums nas tha dad gyur gang nyid/_/khrus bya bdag nyid don bzang sgrub/_/khrus kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sor mo'i rtsa 
[\[94b.3\]]ba'i nye logs su/_/g.yas pa'i mthe bong rnam par dgod/_/sman dang srog chags yan lag ni/_/yongs su spangs te dri dag dbul/_/dri'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin g.yon pa'i mthe bong yang /_/mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par dgod/_/lha yi dri mchog dang 
[\[94b.4\]]ldan pa'i/_/me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya/_/me tog gi phyag rgya'o/_/sdigs mdzub g.yas pa'i rtse mo ni/_/bskums te gung mor gnas par 'gyur/_/gang gis mthe bong can gyis ni/_/de yis bdug spos dbul bar bya/_/bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[94b.5\]]g.yon pa'i mthe bong sdigs mdzub ni/_/gung mor gang gis gnas par bya/_/gtsang zhing dag par yang dag ldan/_/de nyid gtor ma'i mchod par bya/_/gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/sdigs mdzub rtse mor mthe bong gnyis/_/rnam par bkod pa byas nas ni/_/
[\[94b.6\]]ba yi mar ni phul byung bas/_/sgrol ma dbul bar bya ba'o/_/mar me'i phyag rgya'o/_/gung mo'i rtse mor mdzub mo ni/_/phyi yi rtse mo'i tshigs su sbyar/_/mthe bong dang ni ming med dag_/bgrang phreng srad bu yongs su 'dzin/_/phreng ba 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rtag tu 
[\[94b.7\]]me ru mngon phyogs pas/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i ming med ni/_/gung mo'i tshigs su byas par 'gyur/_/lag gnyis sbyar ba'i gung mo la/_/mthe bong cung zad rnam 'dud pa'o/_/me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/ming med mthe bong sbyar byas nas/_/sngags dang bcas 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]pa rab sbyar bya/_/de nyid kyis brjod gshegs su gsol/_/me lha spyan drangs ba bskul ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/zhes pa 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phyag rgya ste sgrub pa po dngos grub mnyam pa med pa 'dod pa rnams kyis thun 
[\[95a.2\]]mong du rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/rkang pa 'khyog por byas nas ni/_/phyag rgya rnam par rgyas pa ni/_/lag gnyis brkyang byas 'khor lo dang /_/sngon du mthe bong bskul nas ni/_/khu tshur bcings te mthe bong dag_/mnyam par bshibs te brkyang bar bya/_/gung mo sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 
[\[95a.3\]]'di/_/blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar grags pa yin/_/sgrub pos myur du sbyar bar bya/_/dngos grub thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/legs par kha sbyar ba thal mo khong stong du 'gyur te/_kha sbyar gyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[95a.4\]]gang du mthe bong nang du bcug pa ni bzang po'i gdan no/_/bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/thal mo khong stong des rab tu brjod pa'i kha sbyor gyi phyag rgya las ming med kyi sor mo yang dag par sbyar ba ni/_kha sbyor gyi phyag rgya'i gtso bo pad+ma'i rnam pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni pad+ma'i 
[\[95a.5\]]phyag rgya'o/_/zhes sgrub pa po blo dang ldan pas shes par bya'o/_/gdan gyi don du rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di ni grags pa chen po'o/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ni rab tu brjod pa de ut+pa la de 'dir brjod par bya'o/_/nas tsam rnam par grol ba ni phyag 
[\[95a.6\]]rgya pad+ma'i tog ni yan lag nyid do/_/ut+pa la'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /_sgrol ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de phyag rgyar yongs su bsgrags so/_/tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni khro gnyer can gyis so/_/de kho na tshigs 
[\[95a.7\]]bar bar gyur ba yang dag pa kho nar 'dod pa ni ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i phyag rgyar gsungs so/_/sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ni ral gcig ma'i cod pan las so/_/dang po ting nge 'dzin yang dag par gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]phyag rgya gnyis pa ral gcig ma'i'o/_/phan tshun sbyar byas lhag ma phyi rol du skra'i rnam par rab tu brkyang nas dbus ma gnyis ni mdung gi rnam par legs par gnas pa'i phyag rgya ni mdung du yang dag par bshad do/_/lha yi 'bar bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par mtshungs 
[\[95b.2\]]pa 'di bstan pa tsam gyis gdug pa rnams thams cad rnam par 'joms pa mdung gi phyag rgya'o/_/zhes pa phyag chen 'di rnams ni/_/dam tshig don du rab sbyar ba/_/gang gis yang dag shes byas pa/_/de yis dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya lhag ma thams cad 
[\[95b.3\]]nyid/_/tshad med grangs med nyid du bya/_/phyag rgya yang dag yongs su bsgrags/_/mdor na 'di ru brjod pa ni/_/sems can sems ni dur ba rnams/_/las chen byed par mi nus pa/_/mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod par bya/_/zhes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde 
[\[95b.4\]]snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa phyag rgya'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom zhing las thams cad kyi dngos grub 
[\[95b.5\]]byed pa rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gos dkar mo zhes bya ba rang gi rigs kyi rig pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs srung ba'i don dang /_bgegs bzlog pa'i don du gsungs pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_dar+sha na/_par+Sha Na/_b+h+yo shra ba 
[\[95b.6\]]Na/_sma ra N+ye na/_bA s+yA ma haM/_sarba satwA nAM/_sarba byA d+hi/_tsi kit+pa ka/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ka Te/_bi ka Te/_ka TAM ka Te/_ka TA/_bi ka TA/_bi ka Te/_b+ha ga ba ti/_bi dza ye swA hA/_'di ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de'i rig pa chen mo ste/_rig pa thams cad dang /_sngags rnams 
[\[95b.7\]]kyis dngos grub byed pa/_pad+ma'i rigs su rigs kyi rig pa 'dis bdag nyid srung ba dang /_gzhan srung ba dang /_g.yog srung ba dang /_ras ris gnas pa dang /_lha rnams bsrung bar bya ba dang /_ras ris grub pa 'di yang khyed kyi sgrub thabs gsum byas nas sam/_bdun 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]byas nas bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rang gi lha'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa'i mthar yang bgegs rnams srid pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pas kyang nad med par 'gyur ro/_/nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba 
[\[96a.2\]]dang /_ring du 'tsho bar byed do/_/bde ba yang so sor rnyed do/_/srad bus bdag nyid srung zhing phyir bzlog pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo /_/de nas 'di'i phyag rgya nyid ni sgrol ma thams cad kyi spyi'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/_de nyid sdigs mdzub bcings nas 'khyil ba'i rnam 
[\[96a.3\]]par bya ste mthe bong zung yang kun tu btsir ba ni gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/'di yang phyag rgya'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa mnyam par 'gro ma gdon mi za ba ste dang por zhabs la phyag byas te/_de nas las thams cad bya'o/_/yang rtog pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po chen po 'dir 
[\[96a.4\]]'phags ma sgrol ma dang /_sgrol ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa mngon par mdzes pa thams cad dang /_srung ba dang /_nyes pa byas pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/_'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho ga rab tu sbyor ba sgrub nus par 'gyur te/_de yang gang zhe na/_
[\[96a.5\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tsan+d+re tsan+d+ra ma ti sU r+ye/_sUr+ya ma ti/_g+hu ni g+hu na/_la la/_le le/_sU te sU ta ni/_sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/_pa rA kra me swA hA/_a mi tA b+hA su tA swA hA/_sarbe ShaM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/_
[\[96a.6\]]'di yang 'phags pa bzang po zhes bya ba 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa chen mo nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o/_/gang 'di sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i cho ga rab 'byam spyod pa dang /_sgrub thabs dang /_phyag rgya'i cho ga la sogs pa de thams cad 'phags ma sgrol 
[\[96a.7\]]ma'i zla bas bsgrub par bya'o/_/zhes kun tu rtogs par bya'o/_/rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang sgrub par byed do/_/rtog pa med pas kyang mngon spyod kyi las 'di byed de/_phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge spangs nas/_rig pa 'ba' zhig gi swA hA'i gnas su hU~M phaT sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang ngo /_/gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na nye bar 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed do/_/de nas sems dpa' chen po de thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/_
[\[96b.2\]]bsam pa rnam par dag pas sems dpa' chen po rnams la smras pa/_gang rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /_mchod par 'gyur ba dang /_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba de rnams don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la byams 
[\[96b.3\]]pa'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la kun nas dga' ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang du rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchod rten du 'gyur ba dang /_sa phyogs de gang nyid kyis lag mthil du phyin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[96b.4\]]mchod pa 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob pa des thams cad du rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang stobs med pa shes nas rab tu gsal bar bya'o/_/'di yang gtsang ma'i phyogs 
[\[96b.5\]]su thams cad kyis rab tu spyod par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ma yin no/_/gang zhig byed pa de mngon par 'dod pa med pa sems can gyi bsam pa spang ba dang /_chos dang chos smra ba po la ma gus pa la mi 'jug pa'i rab tu sbyor bas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub pa 
[\[96b.6\]]po thams cad kyis srung ba'i don du lhag ma dang /_lhag ma med pa yang rung ste gtsang sbra byas pas srung ba'i don du rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/_na mo ret+na tra yA ye/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwa ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_oM a mr-i ta ud b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/_
[\[96b.7\]]'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po ste/_thal ba la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas bdag nyid srung ba dang /_g.yog srung ba la mdud pa'i spyod pa bya'o/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang rgyal lam/_tha skar yang rung ste dge ba'i sbyor ba la mchod pa dang /_gtor ma'i tshogs 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas chos dang /_chos yang dag par sdud pa po la yang bsod snyoms dang /_theg pa chen po la bza' ba gya nom pa dang /_khyad par du yon dang bcas pa'o/_/de nas 'di rdzogs par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bya ste rtog pa'i rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[97a.2\]]rtog pa'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i gsang sngags bklag par bya ste de bzhin du dman par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar myur du dngos grub nyid kyang stsol bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[97a.3\]]gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che shin tu rgyas pa chen po nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po ral pa gyen brdzes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 
[\[97a.4\]]'das ri'i rgyal po gru 'dzin na bzhugs te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de bshad do/_/
[\[97a.5\]]da ni phyi ma'i rgyud gsang ba de gsang chen phyi ma dang bcas pa thabs sla ba bde blag tu sgrub pa/_cho ga dang bcas pa sngon du 'gro bas brjod pa snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched dang /_sdug bsngal gyis gdungs ba rnams 
[\[97a.6\]]la snying brtse ba'i ched dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/_sgrol ma thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i rig pa/_ral pa gyen brdzes rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi sbyor ba rnams shod cig_/bcom ldan 'das la sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[97a.7\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na bshad par bgyi'o/_/dang po kho nar sgrub pos re zhig skyabs gsum yongs su bzung ba dang /_byang chub tu sems 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bskyed pa dang /_ral pa gyen brdzes su ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong zhing /_dam tshig dang /_slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba dang /_sgrub pa'i thabs dang /_mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba bla ma la yon phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rig pa blangs 
[\[97b.2\]]te ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram/_sku gzugs kyi drung du slar yang sgrol ma gang yang rung ba'i rig pa blang par byas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/dus phyis mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas zla ba nya la sku gzugs sam/_ras ris 
[\[97b.3\]]kyi spyan sngar mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas seng ldeng ngam/_a ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor drug pa'i tshad kyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/nam langs khar mtshan mo mchod pa ches rgya chen po dang /_gtor ma'i cho 
[\[97b.4\]]ga ji ltar 'byor pa byas nas slong mo'i zas zos nas dngos grub stsal bar bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas las thams cad bya'o/_/yang 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[97b.5\]]po mthong nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du dam tshig dang me'i bya ba gnas par ji srid gsungs pa'i cho gas rig pa sgrub par 'dod pas sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rig pa rnam par gsang ba'i ji skad gsungs pas dkyil 'khor gzhan gsum bri ste/_bla ma la yon rab tu phul nas 
[\[97b.6\]]dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rig pa blangs nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas/_dang por re zhig tu Ti'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas a ga ru nag po'i yam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad dang mar 
[\[97b.7\]]rnams kyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i yam shing la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas slar yang gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas dngul gyi phye ma la sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bya'o/_/de nas ra gan gyi phye ma la 'o mas btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas zangs kyi phye ma la zhos btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas mu tig gi 'bras bu'i phye mas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas tsan+dan dmar po'i phye 
[\[98a.2\]]mas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas tsan+dan dmar po'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas 'bru dang bza' ba dang longs spyod la sogs pa thams cad kyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas dkar por rnam par 
[\[98a.3\]]btags pa legs par bkrus shing dri zhim po'i gos skra dang bral ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/re re la lan re yongs su bzlas nas de nas gu gul dang /_shri ba sa dang /_gan+d+ha ras dang /_kun tu ru ka dang /_ga bur rnams gcig tu byas nas mar gyis btags pa'i 
[\[98a.4\]]sreg blugs bdun dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas ji ltar rnyed ba'i 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyis sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas bza' ba mchog gi sreg blugs bdun sbyin 
[\[98a.5\]]sreg bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa cha dang bcas par byas pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog gis sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas mar gyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[98a.6\]]de nas thal ba'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sdong bu can 'bras bu med pa rnams la bar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas mar sar gyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas ge sar gyi phye ma'i sreg blugs 
[\[98a.7\]]bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas dar ba'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas yung ba'i phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas rgyam tsha dang /_lan tshwa la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]de nas bu ram gyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sra rtsi bog gi phye ma'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas lcags kyi phye ma mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci ba la mar gyis btags 
[\[98b.2\]]ba'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas bil ba'i 'bru la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas til nag po dang 'bras yos lhan cig pa la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa rnams dang /_gser dang 
[\[98b.3\]]dngul gyi phye ma phan tshun bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o/_/bar skabs 'dir sgrub pa po lha thams cad kyis kun tu gzigs par byed do/_/de dang 'di yang bdag gi mchog tu gsang chen gyi gsang ba'i sgrub pa nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga'o/_/de langs nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[98b.4\]]la bskor bar byas te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas bla ma la yon gyi mchog phul te/_gang gis sam/_de'i thad kar yang rung ste zhu bar bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor bris par lha rnams mthong nas bla ma la phyag btsal te mngon par 
[\[98b.5\]]dbang bskur ba dang /_dngos grub kyi rjes su gnang ba yang zhu bar bya'o/_/de nas las grub pa'i cho ga 'dis mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pas kyang bcom ldan 'das ma 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub thabs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gsang 
[\[98b.6\]]chen te/_mdor na las gang yang ci yin pa 'dis byed pa'ang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i thams cad zhi ba can dang /_rgyas pa can dang /_mngon par mdzes pa'i las rnams ni ji lta ji ltar sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar sgrub pa nye bar 'gro'o/_/de ltar yang rig pa rab tu sbyar ba de 
[\[98b.7\]]lta de ltar legs par rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yang sgrub par byed pa de ltar sgrub par byed de las de dang 'di rig pa thams cad dga' ba zhes pa de dang 'dis las rnams mchog tu sgrub pa nye bar skye'o/_/mdor na bdag gi seng ge'i sgra 'di gang la la rig pa la dga' 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]ba 'dis las byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dang 'di kho na'i lag mthil du dngos grub so sor gnas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o/_/las 'di yang gso sbyong can gyis sngon bzlas pa byas pa dag 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/gsang ba'i nye bar spyod 
[\[99a.2\]]pa'i cho ga'o/_/sgrub thabs gzhan gyi cho ga ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song nas bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad mchod rten stong phrag brgyad byas nas/_re re'i spyan sngar dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul te/_stong phrag brgyad du bzlas par bya'o/_/rdzogs pa'i dus su yang 
[\[99a.3\]]slong mo bza' bar bya ste yon dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni chu bo'i 'gram du cho gas 'bum bzlas par bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan 'di yang yod de/_ri'i rtse mor 'bum bzlas par bya ste/_'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[99a.4\]]'di ni cho ga gzhan te mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste/_'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te til nag po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste/_'grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni a ga ru nag po'i yam shing gis 
[\[99a.5\]]sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste/_'grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni me tog thams cad kyis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te thang chu thams cad kyis sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni mchod rten chen po rnams la mngon par phyag 'tshal zhing 
[\[99a.6\]]'bum bzlas par bya ste/_'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sgrub pa'i thabs 'di rnams ni de nas las su 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis zhi bar byed do/_/yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/bong bu 
[\[99a.7\]]dang rnga mo'i sbangs kyis mngon spyod can du 'gyur ro/_/ske tshe'i 'bru dang me tog gi rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/de nyid la mar gyi sreg blugs nyin zhag bdun du thun gsum 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]du brgyad brgya bya'o//_//thun gcig gam/_phyogs sam/_zla ba la rgyal po 'bangs su 'gyur bas dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba la yang lan tshwa srang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis gzugs byas nas rgyal po'i me la de'i rkang pa g.yon pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing 
[\[99b.2\]]sbyin sreg bya'o//_//zla ba gcig gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te dgra mngon par ma lhung ba'i rkang mthil gyis mnan pa'i rdul yongs su blangs nas glang chen sdong po'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas g.yas pa las cig shos kyi lag pa blangs nas lan 
[\[99b.3\]]cig yongs su bzlas pa'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste/_zla ba gcig la rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te rgyal po'i rkang 'thung gi shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar rgyal po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag 
[\[99b.4\]]brgyad bya ste/_zla ba gcig la sa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te thog mar yang ljon pa'i rgyal po'i shing gis me sbar nas sra rtsi pog dang lan tshwa lhan cig pa la mar gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig byas na sa'i dbang po bsgo 
[\[99b.5\]]ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te ma blangs pa'i ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar po btags nas gzugs brnyan byas te rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gris gtub cing gtub cing ka ra bI ra'i yam shing gi me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya/_zla ba 
[\[99b.6\]]re re la gzugs brnyan srang sum cu so drug pa bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni me tog dmar po dang lan tshwa phan tshun bsres te btags nas srang brgyad kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing 
[\[99b.7\]]gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas shing byas pa de bzhin du zla ba gcig la nyi ma re re la byas na sa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te ske tshe dang /_ut+pa la sngon po bsres te btags pa srang bcu drug gis gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mnan te 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]seng ldeng ko bi dA ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas mgo bo nas brtsams te ral gris gtub cing gtub cing zla ba gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nyi ma re re la'o/_/de nas gzugs brnyan gcig ni rgyal po'i 'bangs bzhin du kun tu spyod par byed do/_/cho ga 
[\[100a.2\]]gzhan 'byung ste rgya mtsho las byung ba'i tsha dang /_lan tshwa bsres te ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar po dang btags nas gzugs brnyan rdzogs par bya ste shing gi rgyal po'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong 
[\[100a.3\]]phrag brgyad bya'o/_/nyi ma so so la gzugs brnyan re re mnyam zhing mnyam pa re re'o/_/rgyal po glang po bzhin du bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni mya ngan med pa'i me tog yungs kar dang /_nA ga ge sar bsres nas ko me dang /_nA b+hA sa btags pa srang 
[\[100a.4\]]bcu drug gis gzugs brnyan byas nas gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag pa g.yon pas mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing de'i shing kho nas me rab tu sbar te stong phrag brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gzhan rnams g.yas pas nyi ma so sor zla ba 
[\[100a.5\]]gcig tu gnas te nyi ma gung la gzhan rnams ji ltar 'dod pas 'bangs bzhin du myur du dbang du byed do/_/cho ga gzhan ni so ma rA dza'i 'bras bu dang bsres pa'i dri'i rdzas rnams thams cad btags pa srang bcu drug gis gzugs brnyan byas nas 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis 
[\[100a.6\]]me rab tu sbar te lte ba nas brtsams nas rkang mthil la thug gi bar du ral gris gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas mgo bo nas brtsams te slar yang sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor byas na rgyal po ci bgyi dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan bla na 
[\[100a.7\]]med pa ste tsan+dan dmar po dang /_lan tshwa dang mnyam par 'gro ba rnams btags pa srang nyi shu rtsa lngas gzugs brnyan byas nas nyi ma so so'i snga dro'i dus tshod la tsan+dan dmar po'i shing gi me la rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]phrag brgyad bya'o/_/las 'di ni lag pa g.yas pas sreg blugs dbul zhing g.yogs kyang ngo /_/zla ba gcig tsam la rgyal po 'bangs bzhin du bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung tshwa dang yang dag par bsres nas btags par bya'o/_/
[\[100b.2\]]de nas srang nyi shu rtsa lngas gzugs brnyan byas nas phyi dro'i dus tshod la yang dag par shes pas gzugs brnyan so so re re pa lA sha'i me la gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg brgyad brgya'o/_/las lhag ma 'di ni 
[\[100b.3\]]dang po dang mtshungs par de yang zla ba tsam la rgyal po bka' bsgo ba rjes su sgrub par byed pa ci bgyid 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni ba lang gi gcin dang gnas dang /_grog mkhar gyi sa dang sbrang rtsi mnyam par 'gro ba yis/_srang nyi shu cha'i gzugs brnyan bskyed nas zla ba gcig 
[\[100b.4\]]tu nyi ma so so la lan gsum du nyi ma gung la shing gi rgyal po'i sreg za rnam par gnas pa la gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/'bangs bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes sgrub thabs 'di 
[\[100b.5\]]rnams ni dus thams cad ston dang /_dpyid dang /_so ga dang /_dgun gyi dus tshod la yang rab tu sbyar na mtshungs pa med pa'i nor chen po 'di rnams rtag tu nges par thob bo/_/de nas so ga'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/_rigs dang kha deg mthun pa'i zho dang mar lhan cig pa 
[\[100b.6\]]ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang gcig tu byas te btags nas srang sum cu'i tshad kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas nyi ma snga dro 'am phyi dro pa lA sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas gzugs brnyan gyi g.yas kyi mgor bzhag nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon 
[\[100b.7\]]pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/zla ba gcig la rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni yungs kar dkar po dang /_gur gum bsres te legs par btags la srad bu bcu pa byas nas 'di 'di'i lhag ma sngar bzhin no/_/'di la khyad ni 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]lag pa g.yon pas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o/_/cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang /_nas dang gro rnams gcig tu btags pa srang sum cu pas gzugs brnyan byas nas de'i khar tsha ba gsum gyis bkang nas zangs kyi thur ma du sti ra'i me la bzlas 
[\[101a.2\]]pa byas nas rkang pa'i 'og nas phug ste spyi bor 'thon par byed do/_/de nas mgo bo'i g.yas bzhag ste pa lA sha'i 'dab ma la rang gi ral gri'i sos bcad nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la seng ldeng gi mer lag pa g.yas pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/zla ba gcig la 
[\[101a.3\]]rgyal po ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa 'di rnams ni so ga'i dus kyi sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba rnams so/_/yang 'di'i dbyar gyi las rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dbyar gyi dus tshod la nges par sgrub par byed do/_/pu shel tse dang /_bA la kaM dang /_sau ba tsa 
[\[101a.4\]]la dang /_lan tshwa dang gzugs brnyan gcig tu byas pa la nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang nyi shu rtsa lngas rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas g.yas pa nas brtsams te lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing pa lA sha'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad 
[\[101a.5\]]bya'o/_/nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la'o/_/zla ba gcig tu'o/_/rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te pu shel tse dang /_pri yang ku dang /_TAM pa Na dang /_'gyur byed rnams gcig tu byas te nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang sum cu pa'i 
[\[101a.6\]]rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan bya ste/_mgo bo nas brtsams nas lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing dong ka'i shing gis me sbar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/'di ni nges par mngag 
[\[101a.7\]]gzhug pa bzhin du kun tu spyod do/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan te/_sardzi ka dang /_'o ma dang /_nas kyi 'gyur bya dang /_shu dag dang /_sran ma mA sha dang /_til rnams gcig tu bsres nas lus kyi chus btags te mi bdag gi gzugs brnyan srang sum cu pa byas te/_a mra'i 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la lag pa g.yas pas mgo bo nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gzhan mchog ste rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang sa la ma 
[\[101b.2\]]lhung ba'i ba byung gcig tu byas nas nas kyi 'gyur byed dang lhan cig nam mkha'i chus btags te/_srang sum cu'i tshad kyis rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la u dum bA ra'i shing gi me la lag pa g.yas pas ral gri 
[\[101b.3\]]rnon pos rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa 'di rnams ni dbyar gyi dus kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnams te 'di kho na la dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir gzhan 'byung ste dgun smad kyi dus kyi sgrub pa ni 
[\[101b.4\]]gang du dus gcig tu sgrub par byed do/_/'bru'i phub ma dang /_nas kyi tshigs dang /_ga bi na dang /_shu dag rnams gcig tu btags nas srang lnga bcu'i tshad kyis sa'i bdag po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la nim pa'i shing gi me la 
[\[101b.5\]]nub tu mgo bzhag nas rkang pa shar du phyogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong bya'o/_/rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu dang /_shri bA 
[\[101b.6\]]sa ka dang /_kun tu ru ka dang /_ba las byung ba'i mar rnams lhan cig btags pa srang sum cu'i mi bdag gi gzugs brnyan byas nas nub tu mgo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du pa lA sha'i me la zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod lam la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad 
[\[101b.7\]]bya'o/_/rgyal po mngag gzhug pa bzhin du rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga bzhin ba ru ra'i 'bras bu dang /_nas dang /_tsi ka seng 'dab ma dang /_rtsa ba dang bcas pa dang /_til dang yungs kar dkar po rnams gcig tu byas te ba las byung ba'i mar lhan cig btags nas srang 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu bstan nas/_sngar bzhin u dum bA ra'i shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/sa'i bdag po gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho nas byung 
[\[102a.2\]]ba'i lan tshwa dang /_bu ram dang /_skyu ru ra'i 'bru rnams dang /_yungs kar dkar po gcig tu byas te yang dag par btags pa srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu'o/_/sngar bzhin du 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus 
[\[102a.3\]]tshod la me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po bka' bsgo ba rjes su sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni rgya tshwa dang /_rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang /_nas dang /_til dang /_bu ram rnams gcig tu byas te ba'i mar gyis kun tu btags pa srang lnga bcus rgyal po'i 
[\[102a.4\]]gzugs brnyan byas nas nub tu mgo bo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dus tshod la zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/rtag tu mngag gzhug pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro'o/_/zhes pa 'di rnams ni dgun gyi dus kyi sgrub pa rnams grub 
[\[102a.5\]]par byed pa'o/_/de nyid la'o 'di rnams ni mchog tu gsang ba'o/_/zhes pa ste slar yang rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig_/gsang ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i dus can gyi dngos grub g.yo bar byed de/_ji skad gsungs pa'i dus nges par gyur pa so ga la sogs pa rnams la las 
[\[102a.6\]]byas pa'o/_/de nas gang gi rgyal po 'di rtag tu kun tu bcings par 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub nyams pa yang med de/_las gzhan dang lhan cig de yod pa'o/_/yang cho ga gzhan ni grub pa gang gis 'pho bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams ni sems can gyi bye brag las sam/_cho ga 
[\[102a.7\]]med pa'am/_'byung ba nyid las sam/_dbang po ma tshang ba nyid las sam/_slob dpon gyi man ngag med par rang gi rig pa bzung ste ston pa'i bka' so sor 'brang bas mang po mi shes te bla ma dam pa med pa las sam/_nus pa dang bral ba las sas rdzas ma mthong bas rtog pa'i dkyil 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'khor gyi slob dpon la phul ba dang /_bla ma dam pa sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa la bdag nyid shes pa med do zhes ma zhum pa dang ldan pas rtogs pa yang med cing mthong ba yang med par las chen po'i sgrub pa rnams shes par byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa smra ba tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_
[\[102b.2\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma yang rung ste rang gi bslab pa'i mtshams zhig pa/_pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba la zhugs pa'am/_byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'am/_mtshams med pa byas pa'am/_slob dpon la brnyas pa'am/_mchod 
[\[102b.3\]]rten gyi gnas la rdog pas brdzis pa'am/_slob dpon gyi grib ma la 'gom par byed pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang brnyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bar gyur pa'am/_lha thams cad la brnyas pa ste/_nyes pa 'di rnams kyis las gzhan 
[\[102b.4\]]byas pa de yang dag par byas pa ma yin rnam pa gzhan du byas par 'gyur te/_de dngos grub dang bral ba ni de nyid kyi cho ga las 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/gang la la 'di rnams byed pa de'i dngos grub de skad cig ma gcig la 'jigs par byed de rig pa cung zad bzlas pa ni dus gzhan 
[\[102b.5\]]du kun tu gnas te gang yang sgrub pa'i dus can gyi dngos grub ma yin pa de 'dir 'gyur ro/_/slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i cho gas rgyal po'i rkang rjes kyis la bar skabs 'dir brgyad brgya'am/_lnga brgyar sreg blugs mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin 
[\[102b.6\]]sreg byed do/_/de nyid du thams cad du byed pa'i rgyal po ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba la yang ji skad gsungs pa'i dus kyi sgrub pa byed pa la nges par dngos grub med par mi 'gyur te dngos grub nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang 
[\[102b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po stong phrag brgyad ci yang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skye bo du ma'i nang du lhung ba dge ba'i spyod pa'i mchod pa chung ngu de 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te mngon par phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal te sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' chen po de la 'di 
[\[103a.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad la kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsungs shig_/sems dpa' chen po gsungs shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_sems 
[\[103a.3\]]dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing 'dzum pa'i bgegs dang bral bas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la smras pa/_gang khyod snying rje chen po don dam pa/_mchog tu gsang 
[\[103a.4\]]ba/_lhan cig pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi rjes su son pa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod pa bya bar 'gyur te mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad dang /_klu thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin thams 
[\[103a.5\]]cad kyi dpal yang gang la la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_shes par 'gyur ba dang /_kha ton byed par 'gyur ba dang /_'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /_sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /_mchod par 'gyur ba dang /_glegs bam du bris nas rang 
[\[103a.6\]]gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /_nyal ba'i dus dang /_mal nas ldang ba'i dus su mgo la 'jog par byed par 'gyur ba de'i phung khrol chen po thams cad yongs su spangs te longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring po nyid du yang 'gyur ro/_/mdor na gang yang bdag 
[\[103a.7\]]gi rgyud ma lus pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/sems dpa' chen po de lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams 'dis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba des na bshad par byed do/_/de nas sems dpa' chen po skad cig 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing rab tu 'dzum pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/_mnyam par gsung ba pad+ma'i phyag can/_lha'i lus chen po/_lta bar mi 
[\[103b.2\]]dpog pa'i sku/_sems can thams cad kyi grol ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lte ba gang cung zad rtog par nus par mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yid la byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu btud de rin po che'i pad+ma la nye bar 'dug ste smras 
[\[103b.3\]]pa/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_sgrub pa so so dang /_byang chub sems dpa' so so'i spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i myu gu rnams la nges par phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du sangs rgyas nyid kyis thabs mkhas pa'i bya ba gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[103b.4\]]su rdzogs pa'i ched dang /_sa dang por so sor thob pa'i ched dang /_bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po rgyun du 
[\[103b.5\]]nye bar bskyed pa/_de bzhin kho nar bsod nams kyi mthus sems can rnams kyi gong du yongs su bsngags pa'i mtshan bzang pos brgyan pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs gang gis sngon byas pa'i las 
[\[103b.6\]]rnams kyis de bzhin du bya ba yang rtag tu rang nyid 'khor los sgyur ba de yang dbang du bya ste sngon brjod pa'i las rnams kho nas so/_/de las kyang sa thams cad pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ma dang ba rnams rab tu dang 
[\[103b.7\]]ba nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro/_/yul gyi dpon po'am/_ji lta bu'i bsod nams des sems can rnams kyi gong du rgyal po byed du 'jug go/_/nye bar longs spyod yongs su longs spyad pas bya ba yang rab tu byed do/_/de yang gal te sngar brjod pa'i 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]las kho nas de 'bangs su 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang du byed pa'i sgrub par 'gyur te/_ston dang /_so ga dang /_dbyar gyi dus rnams su nges par sgrub par byed do/_/rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed 
[\[104a.2\]]pa la ni de'i rkang pa'i rjes kyi rdul dang /_ske tshe mnyam par byas pa zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la dus gcig tu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni sna ma'i me tog dang til bsres pas sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 
[\[104a.3\]]gzhan ni dur b+ha'i myu gu dang lhan cig pa'i ske tshes zla ba gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni ma pa'i sa bon rnams pa shI dang /_ka k+tu kA ma dang /_phye ma rnams lan tshA dang bsres pas zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams 
[\[104a.4\]]la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni til dang ardzu na'i me tog bsres pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad kyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan nim pa'i sa bon rnams dang tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 
[\[104a.5\]]stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i mdun na 'don dbang du byed par 'dod pas ske tshe la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad zla ba gcig la ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus gcig tu sbyin sreg 
[\[104a.6\]]stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni sran ma tsa med ka la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni irgu da'i til mar gyis sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de rnams 
[\[104a.7\]]thams cad la dong ka'i yam shing gis me sbar la sbyin sreg gam/_pa lA sha'i me la yang rung ngo /_/bram ze dbang du byed pa la 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus gcig la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar seng ldeng gi shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na/_sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rje rigs dbang du byed pa la 'bras sA lu'i zan zho dang lhan cig pa a mra'i shing gi me la sbyin 
[\[104b.2\]]sreg bya ste/_sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dman pa thams cad dbang du byed pa la tsher ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas ske tshe dang /_dug dang /_nim pa lhan cig pa'i sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la brtsams nas dus gcig la stong phrag brgyad byas 
[\[104b.3\]]na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 'dir 'byung ba ni thun mong du mchog dang /_/'bring dang tha ma sgrub pa'i las ni yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad gang bstan bya'i sbyin sreg byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bud med dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad 
[\[104b.4\]]bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la yungs kar dkar po la mar dang /_zho dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gang bstan bya nyi ma gsum la dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu ma dbang du byed par 'dod pas ram ga 
[\[104b.5\]]na'i me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/spra tshil las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bdag nyid kyi lag par bzhag ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na gang bstan pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ras 
[\[104b.6\]]ris kyis spyan sngar me tog dkar po brgyad brgya dbul bar bya ste/_gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dung dang gla rtsi dang /_shu dag dang gi wang dang /_rgya spos rnams gcig tu byas nas btags par bya'o/_/stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas 
[\[104b.7\]]'di btungs pas sam/_gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bram ze mo dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod du lan bdun bzlas pas bud med gang la skyes bu gang gis mdun du 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'dug nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas pas dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sor mo gcig pa'i shing blangs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te gang dang gang kun tu 'gugs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/me tog brgya pa stong phrag brgyad 
[\[105a.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o/_/'di la me tog gcig blangs nas bud med la bltas nas bskor bar bya ste 'ong bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'o ma dang nas zan za zhing phyogs gcig tu bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas grog 
[\[105a.3\]]mkhar gyi sa las byung ba'i nor rgyas kyi bu byas nas de la nye bar 'dug ste/_ji srid g.yo bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de lta bus grub par 'gyur ro/_/nor rgyas kyi bu bdag nyid ma sha bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba sbyin par byed do/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs 
[\[105a.4\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i don ston par byed do/_/'o ma dang nas zan za zhing sku gzugs kyi mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas longs spyod so sor rnyed do/_/zla ba gcig tu bsod snyoms bza' zhing dkar po'i bcu gcig la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas 
[\[105a.5\]]pas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_sku gzugs kyi zhabs dag la 'jus nas ji srid du sku gzugs g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/g.yos pas gang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[105a.6\]]dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis gang skyed par byed du 'jug go/_/lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gAr zhugs te 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/phyi nas de srid du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bye ma las byung ba'i 
[\[105a.7\]]mchod rten byas nas sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg bya'o/_/klu thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang smras pa de thams cad byed do/_/ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas til mar gyis btags pa'i tsan+dan gyi zhogs ma'i sbyin sreg bya 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]ste/_gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang smras pa de thams cad byed do/_/nags su ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling gcig tu byas pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ong bar byed do/_/bka' bsgo ba thams cad 
[\[105b.2\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/shing gcig tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o/_/'bum yongs su rdzogs pa na gso sbyong can gyis gzugs kyi rnam pas byang chub shing las byung ba rtse gsum mtshan 
[\[105b.3\]]nyid dang ldan pa byed du bcug nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/_zla ba nya la dri bzang pos rab tu byugs nas ras ris la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/_mtshan thog thag tu bsgrub par bya ste/_ji srid 'bar
