[\[126b.2\]]gtsang ma gso sbyong la gnas pas ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas/_slong mos za ba'am tsA ru za bas stong phrag brgyar zlos shig_/las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod chen po'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bcing ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_
[\[126b.3\]]dug thams cad gso ba dang /_nges par byab pa dang /_gdon dang rims gzhom pa dang /_chu klung chen po rab tu sgrol pa la bzlas par byas te/_bde bas sgrol bar byed do/_/la gcan dang sho gam med par mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa la yang smra ba'i mchog tu 
[\[126b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/gnyid du song ba na khu ba 'ching bar 'gyur ro/_/srad bu la stong phrag bzlas pa dang /_seng ldeng gi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas lo thog thams cad kun tu srung ba dang /_brkos pas lcang ma'i 'dab ma nye bar mnyam pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_
[\[126b.5\]]thug po che rnams kyi so nam phun sum tshogs par byed do/_/yungs kar gyis rgyal po dang blon po thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/ser ba dang /_rdo rje dang /_rdo ba la sogs pa rnams la brgyad brgyar bzlas pas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do/_/thal ba la stong 
[\[126b.6\]]phrag bzlas pas gang gi phyogs su gtor ba de'i phyogs su tsher ma zlog par byed do/_/brgyad brgyar bzlas pas zug rngu thams cad med par byed do/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas so/_/de nas sen mos bcad pa'i ta la'i 'dab ma la ral gri byas 
[\[126b.7\]]nas/_de'i 'dab ma la gur gum gyis bri'o/_/nag po'i brgyad pa'i nyi ma nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong la nges par gnas pas/_gcig pu ri bo'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te/_phyogs su dor nas khru brgyad dam/_khru bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas bye ma la mchod rten 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]byas te de la ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas kha shar du phyogs te/_lag pa g.yas pas ral gri blangs nas dpung pa gyen du bsgrengs te mchod rten gyi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/ji srid ral gri la yod pa'i nang gi sngags kyi yi ge de rnams 'bar bar gyur pa dang /_
[\[127a.2\]]de blangs nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med do/_/sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can bskal par gnas shing dpag tshad stong mthong bar byed cing thos par byed snom par byed do/_/ri la 
[\[127a.3\]]yang thad kar 'gro_/rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro/_/rgya mtsho la yang mngon par 'phags par byed do/_/nges par bsags pa rnyed do/_/ba bla dang ldong ros sgrub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar de nyid du ras ris 
[\[127a.4\]]bzhugs su gsol te dkar po'i brgyad pa la mchod pa byas nas/_de'i dbus su yan lag ma nyams pa'i skyes bu bzhag nas rkang pa g.yon pas brang khar yang dag par mnan nas srung ba byas te sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/ji srid langs kyi bar du'o/_/sngar sbrang rtsi dang 'o 
[\[127a.5\]]thug bza' bar bya zhing lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i khu tshur bcings pa mgo bo la gzhu bar bya'o/_/de nas 'dzag par byed do/_/de 'thungs nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du nya dang bcas pa'i chu bor zhugs te dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/
[\[127a.6\]]gos zung so sor rnyed do/_/grong du zhugs nas brgyad brgya bzlas par bya ste/_mdzes pa'i bza' ba thob par byed do/_/lan tshwa dang /_bsres pa'i chu la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pas gzer thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/bud med bu ma thon pa la chu la lan brgyad brgyar mngon par 
[\[127a.7\]]bsngags nas sbyin no/_/bde bar btsa' bar byed do/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du nyi ma re re la stong phrag 'phel bar byas nas bzlas par bya'o/_/mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ril bu'i sbyor bas ril bu rnams bsgrubs nas khar bcug na mi 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan med pa'i me tog dang /_kr-iSh+Na sA ra'i mkhris pa dang /_dur ba'i snying dang /_so dri ya'i sol ba rnams lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas rgyal gyi lcags kyis dkris te slar yang lcags gsum gyis dkris par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 
[\[127b.2\]]bsgrub par bya'o/_/khar bcug nas ku tu gnas pas dang por 'ching ba las grol bar bya'o/_/spra tshil las byung ba'i skyes pa'am bud med kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su me rab tu sbar nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags nas gzhu bar bya ste/_
[\[127b.3\]]myos byed kyi tsher mas nges par gdab par bya zhing dbang du 'gyur te/_gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do/_/dkar po'i nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste/_kA raShA paN lnga rnyed do/_/nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin 
[\[127b.4\]]mtshan du smyung bar gnas te gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du pri yang ku'i shing gis me rab tu spar nas pe kang+ka ta'i ka yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nor thams cad thob par byed do/_/dkar po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bya rog 'phur gyi 
[\[127b.5\]]bar du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/dong tse bcu rnyed do/_/mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te bA la'i me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i ka ra bI ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas me 
[\[127b.6\]]thab tu pad+ma'i tshad kyi ka ra bI ra langs te/_ka ra bI ra'i dbus su de'i mdog can gyi ldong ros mthong ste/_sags zlos shing blang bar bya'o/_/yid kyis blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog can lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te rlung gi shugs dang bcas pa 'dod pa 
[\[127b.7\]]rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba'i 'chi ba shes par byed pa dang /_gal te slar yang sgrub pa byed na tshe nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro/_/khang stong du zhugs te phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas mi smra 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing phyogs gcig tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas gtor ma ches rgya chen po phul te/_skyil mo krung bcings nas ji srid 'od zer 'byung bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de 
[\[128a.2\]]mthong bas mtshams med pa lnga yang zad par nye bar 'gro'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te/_kun nas rgyal srid chen po rnyed do/_/phyir rgol ba med par 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bdug pas bdugs te bar ma chad par 
[\[128a.3\]]'jog tu bcug nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ma gyur na yang de dbang du byed pa la khyim du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te/_rkang 'thung a ba a bI ya lag pa g.yon pas sreg blugs stong 
[\[128a.4\]]sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thun mong ba'i bud med dbang du byed pa la lan tshwas gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'bangs mo dbang du byed pa la pu n+nA ga'i ge sar dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sha rnams 
[\[128a.5\]]gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'bras sA lu btags pa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i mig sman blangs nas mchod rten gcig dang 
[\[128a.6\]]a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te/_stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas mig la bsku bar bya'o/_/gang lung phog pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/phug gi sgor 'bum zlos shig_/'khrul 'khor ltung bar byed do/_/ba lang gi gnas su rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[128a.7\]]ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten bzhugs nas 'bum zlos shig_/dong tse 'bum so sor rnyed do/_/klu'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas 'dzam bu'i shing gis me sbar nas mngar gsum gyi gtor ma byin te klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]de nas bram ze'i gzugs can gyi klu 'ong bar byed do/_/de yang ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/_/nyi ma re re la dong tse bdun bdun rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma re re la dong tse bdun bdun 
[\[128b.2\]]stsol bar byed do/_/lhag ma med par zad par bya'o/_/phyed dkon mchog gsum gyi nye bar sbyor ba'i ched du'o/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o/_/dong tse stong phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do/_/dkar po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ring bsrel 
[\[128b.3\]]dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du zla ba drug bzlas par bya'o/_/rgyal srid sbyin par byed do/_/nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bad kan mthar byed kyi snying po blangs nas srad bu dmar pos dkris te de nas pa lA sha'i shing gis me sbar 
[\[128b.4\]]nas phur bu can la stong phrag brgyad mngon bar bsngags pa byas nas dum bu gsum du gshags te dum bu re re la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas mer gzhug par bya'o/_/tho rangs dong tse sum brgya so sor rnyed do/_/dkar po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu 
[\[128b.5\]]smyung bar gnas pas a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/_/nyi ma bdun bdun du dong tse stong so sor rnyed do/_/nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas pas mtshan mo shing bat+ya Ta ka'i rtsa ba rnams bsres pa'i me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin 
[\[128b.6\]]sreg gyis shig_/dngul stong so sor rnyed do/_/dkar po'i bdun pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te pad+ma stong phrag bcu dbul bar bya'o/_/rgyal srid so sor rnyed do/_/skyes pa dbang du byed pa la nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du 
[\[128b.7\]]smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas byang chub shing gi shing la me rab tu sbar nas ku mud la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bud med dbang du byed pa la nag po'i bcu gnyis pa 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]la so'u ga n+tI ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bsnun cig dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sman 'ching ba dang /_yid kyis gnyis 'thung dang /_rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi brun la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs 
[\[129a.2\]]su gzhag par bya ste/_khu ba 'ching ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/chos gos kyi rna ba la lan bdun bzlas nas mdud pa byas na dug 'ching ngo /_/dug gso ba la lo mas so/_/phyag rgya dbye ba la chus so/_/'bebs pa la gu gul gyi bdug pas sam/_chus 
[\[129a.3\]]gdon 'ching ngo /_/sor mo la yongs su bzlas nas/_sdigs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/rmi lam du ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin ston par byed do/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs 
[\[129a.4\]]nas de'i spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te a pA marga dkar po zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa rnams bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o/_/rgyal srid so sor rnyed do/_/ma grub na grong bsdus pa stong so sor rnyed do/_/ras ris 
[\[129a.5\]]kyi spyan sngar gi wang ngam/_ldong ros la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bskus te dgra bo rnams kyi nang du zhugs na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dgra bo rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'bebs pa la me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i chu dron la lan 
[\[129a.6\]]gsum bzlas pa dang /_ka ra bI ra'i me tog la lan gsum bzlas pas 'bebs pa la bsnun par bya'o/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ston par byed do/_/'ching ba ni se gol gyi phyag rgyas shis par byed do/_/mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos ba'i so'u pi ra'i 
[\[129a.7\]]mig sman srang gcig blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo kha byang du bltas pas ba byung lngas 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o/_/ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas nas phyogs brgyad kyis rab tu spar te cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang sra rtsi pog sreg cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/grong gi 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]mchog bcu rnyed do/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsan+dan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/_/yul gyi bdag po nyid so sor rnyed do/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas bdag pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i 
[\[129b.2\]]me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gser stong so sor rnyed do/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas te me tog gi ge sar stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gos stong so sor rnyed do/_/de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga'o/_/dur khrod nas 
[\[129b.3\]]ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs te zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum po byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong zlos shig_/rigs brgyud dang bcas pa dbang du byed do/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 
[\[129b.4\]]gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas 'bras yos la zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig_/gi wang la stong du mngon par bsngags pas thig le byas na gang mthong ba dang /_gang rnams mthong ba de rnams dbang du byed do/_/tho 
[\[129b.5\]]rangs tu ruSh+ka'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te gdong bkrus pas gang mthong ba de sbyin par byed do/_/thams cad de kho na bzhin du til mar za bas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te 'thungs shig_/don du ma gnyer bar bza' ba rnyed 
[\[129b.6\]]do/_/rgyal po'i pho brang du rab tu zhugs te chos gos de blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa byas na thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun gyi nang du dran par byed cing bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do/_/gcod pa dang /_'bugs 
[\[129b.7\]]pa lag pa'i sngags rnams la pa lA'i 'bru dang /_ka ra bI ra dkar po dang /_yungs kar rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar lag pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad zlos shig_/sngags rnams slong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rims gzhom par 'dod pas 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]gi ri kaR+Ni ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig shI rims 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas gzhan gyi 
[\[130a.2\]]gsang sngags sgrub par byed do/_/chu la lan cig bzlas pas grol lo/_/ras sam gro ga la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na pha rol gyi dmag sde rengs par 'gyur ro/_/chu dang phye za zhing nag po'i brgyad pa'am/_nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum 
[\[130a.3\]]du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan mo gcig par song nas lus kyi g.yas su ras ris bzhugs te bcing bar bya'o/_/khu tshur bcings nas ji srid khu ba byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/'ching bar byed do/_/zhes gsum pa la khu tshur sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/khu tshur 
[\[130a.4\]]byas na mi snang ngo /_/lo bdun brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang phyug chen po yang ci bgyir 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gzugs brnyan byas te cho ga bzhin du mngon par mchod nas bal 
[\[130a.5\]]ba'i yam shing zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung ngo /_/de nas grub par 'gyur ba ste rdzas sam gser dpag tu med pa rnyed do/_/nyin mtshan du smyung 
[\[130a.6\]]bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ka ra bI ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/de nas ka ra bI ra'i me tog cig blangs nas klu'i gnas su song ste me tog klu mtsho bran du bcug la sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/klu ma dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[130a.7\]]gang don du gnyer ba de thob par byed do/_/nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la lam sum mdor mchod pa byas nas nye bar 'dug ste sran ma'i tshad kyis ldong ros kyi ril bu byas nas khar bcug ste ji srid kha gas pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/ldong ros 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]grub par 'gyur te dpral bar thig le byas pas mi snang ngo /_/'dod pa'i gzugs can lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar byed do/_/nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshogs can blangs nas gzhan mo'i brgyad pa la khro tshogs can la rtse gsum byed du gzhug go/_/gzhan pa'i nag 
[\[130b.2\]]po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song nas rtse gsum la mchod pa chen po byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas rtse gsum blangs nas ji srid rtse gsum las 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas grub 
[\[130b.3\]]par 'gyur te mtshan mo ma brtsigs pa ru lha'i khyim 'byung ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i bud med 'byung ngo /_/'khor gyi skyes bu mang po yang dgod pa dang sgeg pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kun khyab par nye bar gnas te gang bsams pa de thams cad rnyed do/_/tho 
[\[130b.4\]]rangs ston pas thams cad 'jog go/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar tshangs ma'i khu ba zho gang la brgyad brgyar zlos la 'thungs shig nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan 
[\[130b.5\]]sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i srung ba byas te bza' ba'i Ti kA la ji srid zan du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te phyi nas zan 'pho bar byed do/_/'bru la skyes pa yang ngo /_/sngon spyad pa byas pas lcags gsum las byung ba'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug 
[\[130b.6\]]pa'i rnam pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'khor lo a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag ste skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[130b.7\]]blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te gang rnams kyis mthong ba de rnams dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar ba can legs par mthong ba blangs nas lag pas mnan te lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ku sha las byung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas lan bdun bzlas pa chur bcug ste klu rnams langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/_/dong tse 'bum byin cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/slong mo za zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te stong 
[\[131a.2\]]phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de mthong nas 'grub par byed do/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas arga'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/chu klung de nyid du rked pa nub tsam 
[\[131a.3\]]du zhugs nas bil ba'i me tog rab tu lhug cig_/mes pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/man+dA ra ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid chu la man+dA ra ba'i me tog gis nor sbyin mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag 
[\[131a.4\]]gnyis bzlas par bya'o/_/rgyal por 'gyur bar byed do/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do/_/rgyas tshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te mya ngan med pa'i shing gi me tog stong phrag brgya blug par bya'o/_/mtshan 
[\[131a.5\]]mo bdun gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par byed do/_/shing la mi smra bar zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas so sor rnyed do/_/arga las byung ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan sor drug pa byas nas kha dog ma 'dres pas rgyan thams cad 
[\[131a.6\]]kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yang na rig pa 'dzin pa nyid do/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar zla ba drug tu lag pa g.yon pa la mngon par bsngags nas khri yongs su bzlas te nye bar gyur pa'i gter 
[\[131a.7\]]'bum 'byung ngo /_/'bras yos la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu dang /_a bA marga'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gser stong phrag bcu so sor rnyed do/_/gi wang blangs te ril 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkri'o/_/de nas gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang bdug pa dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te ril bu thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas/_ji srid 
[\[131b.2\]]'jigs pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/'jigs par mi 'gyur grogs rnams la bgos nas yang khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/phag gi mig blangs nas phyugs dang lhan cig gzhon nu ma'i lag pas btab 
[\[131b.3\]]par bya'o/_/ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te lag pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas phyogs su kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan pas ji srid shi ta'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/rig pa bzlas te grogs 
[\[131b.4\]]rnams la'ang byin nas khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu dga' ba dang /_lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar byed do/_/pad+ma ge sar dang /_mig sman dang /_ldong ros kyang rung ste/_cha mnyam par byas nas gso sbyong can gyi bu mo'i lag pas btab 
[\[131b.5\]]par bya'o/_/lcags gsum gyis dkris pa byas nas sngon spyad pa byas pa rgyal po'i sbyor bas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas su 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phul nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag nas/_lag pa 
[\[131b.6\]]g.yas pas mnan te ji srid kha Ta kha Ta zhes sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gcig phul nas grogs rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas 'o ma dang nas zan 
[\[131b.7\]]za zhing ri'i rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas gso sbyong can gyis grog mkhar gyi sa rtag tu blangs nas 'o mas sbyar te 'jam par byas nas/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshod kyi dad pa bya'o/_/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]'dres pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ras ris bzhugs nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod de 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gos gtsang ma bgos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid ngang pa g.yo bar byed 
[\[132a.2\]]pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongs su bzlas pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/_/slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o/_/thams cad 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/sngags bzlas pa'i 
[\[132a.3\]]rma byas reg par bya'o/_/ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/_/lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig cas brjod par bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa po'i lus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/skad cig de nyid la skra li zhing 'khyil pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa rnam pa nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba 
[\[132a.4\]]thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do/_/gang mthong ba dang lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas 
[\[132a.5\]]pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/_/gso sbyong can gyis mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o mar nyin zhag bdun du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang tsan+dan gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog pa'i shing 'khrur 
[\[132a.6\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyang can gyis bzo bos seng ge byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas rgyu skar snar ma la dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo bza' bar bya'o/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po 
[\[132a.7\]]byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa po gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pas seng ge mnan te ji srid seng ge g.yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/g.yos pa dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi byed do/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i yungs kar rnams kyis seng ge la gzhu bar bya'o/_/seng ge sgra chen po sgrogs par byed do/_/sgrub pa po yang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[132b.2\]]de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng ge la 'dzegs te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'dus nas seng ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro ba dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang /_bskal par gnas shing 
[\[132b.3\]]gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe gang du 'dod par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge'i sgrub thabs so/_/nor sgrub par byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla ba nya nas brtsams te mi smra bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ji snyed phyi ma zla ba gsum gyi bar du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par 
[\[132b.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas ras ris g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g.yo bar byed do/_/nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro/_/nI lA Ta ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags te mdud pa bya'o/_/gyad g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[132b.5\]]thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor bzhag par byas na g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur te gyad kyi dngos grub bo/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thungs shig_/de bzhin du 
[\[132b.6\]]nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas 'od zer byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do/_/nag 
[\[132b.7\]]po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig_/bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi wang bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam la sred med kyi bu'i stobs su 'gyur te/_gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyur ro/_/gang phreng ba 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dang ldan pa de gnas pas lo sum brgya 'cho bar byed do/_/nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/_be kang+ka ta'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis 
[\[133a.2\]]shig_/dong tseg cig rnyed do/_/dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha byas nas de'i khar 'bras thug po che'i stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma bdun la gang bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nag po'i bcu 
[\[133a.3\]]bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song ste/_sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsan+dan dmar po'i chus bkrus nas me tog dmar po dang /_dri dang me tog gis mngon par mchod cing de 
[\[133a.4\]]nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste/_gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o/_/ji srid thod pa g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o/_/de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe sen mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste/_gang brjod pa de byed do/_/zhib byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi 
[\[133a.5\]]spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar mA la ti'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon spyad pa byas pa nag po'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa la ring bsrel dang bcas 
[\[133a.6\]]pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o/_/phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byan te/_de nas nA ga ge sar gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris shig_/dkyil 'khor bcing ba yang byas nas ku sha'i 
[\[133a.7\]]khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_ji srid du skar mda' ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/slar yang ji srid ras ris 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dngos grub kyi mtshan ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste/_de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med do/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa 
[\[133b.2\]]rgya chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod nas lag pa g.yas pas byin te ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/'bar ba tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor te nam mkha'i mthil du 'phur bar byed do/_/
[\[133b.3\]]lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa skra li zhing 'khyil ba rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'o/_/'bebs pa la 'dug pas so/_/dug 'joms pa la yal 'dab kyis so/_/bdag nyid srung ba la bzlas pas so/_/dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams 
[\[133b.4\]]te ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bzlas par bya'o/_/gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do/_/mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thungs shig_/nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs 
[\[133b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar mal+li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dkar po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas/_u dum bA ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/_u dum bA ra'i 
[\[133b.6\]]yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dong tse lnga brgya rnyed do/_/nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas mar me 'khyil pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/phyi nas bzlas pa 
[\[133b.7\]]dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas mig thob par byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du bzhugs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]byas nas/_nyi ma gcig la thun gsum du yongs su bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o/_/rna ba so sor rnyed do/_/nad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i cho gas ras sam 'bras 
[\[134a.2\]]bu can la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o/_/ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i 
[\[134a.3\]]gso sbyong can gyis tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid gcig gi bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang nas zan za ba'am ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gso sbyong can 
[\[134a.4\]]gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so sor sbar te pad+ma stong gis mchod par bya'o/_/nag po'i phyogs la bzlas par bya'o/_/dkar po'i tshes gcig nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar 
[\[134a.5\]]gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/_mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o/_/gal te rgyal por gyur na/_sgrub pa po'i khang pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun bu g.yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 
[\[134a.6\]]'khor byas nas dri dang /_me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa dang gtor ma yang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya phrag gsum blangs te brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te u dum bA ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog re re la brgyad 
[\[134a.7\]]brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo bdun du dus gsum du yongs su bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos par byed na 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]sdig pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa'i grong de so sor rnyed pa dang /_mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/til dang mA Sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig nor skyed par byed do/_/
[\[134b.2\]]ba Ta'i myu gu zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi bdag dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan 
[\[134b.3\]]pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi tshogs sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyar bas rig bsgrub pa 
[\[134b.4\]]po'i me la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang gang du rab tu gnas pas rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod de de gang zhe na/_'di'i rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/_tad+ya thA/_oM tiSh+Tha ha ri sirga la lo hi tAk+Sha/_
[\[134b.5\]]de hi/_da dA pa ya/_hU~M phaT swA hA/_'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi me'i snying po ste/_las thams cad byed pa 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa bdag nyid dgongs so/_/sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste lan cig bzlas pa'i sreg blugs gsum me 
[\[134b.6\]]la sbyin sreg bya'o/_/me spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can dang drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/_zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa'i shing rlan dang bcas pas khyad par du byas pa mtho gang ngam 
[\[134b.7\]]khru gang tsam mam sor gsum pa yang sgrub pa dang /_'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu bsngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o/_/bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra ba dang /_de bzhin du ljang gu dang /_lo ma bskams pa'am/_kha dog nag po yang sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa med pa yang kun tu 'jog pas kha dog gzhan mchog dang tha ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod do/_/ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang gzhan spang bar bya'o/_/
[\[135a.2\]]de nas me thab kun nas gru bzhi pa byas nas 'og nyid du bskor bar bya ste/_gzhu gang dang khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum mam/_khru gnyis sam khru bzhi ste/_de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma bsngags te de la pad+ma'i rnam pas so/_/de nas kha khyer 
[\[135a.3\]]kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa yang 'bad pas so/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang /_rgyas pa can yang rung ste 'di rnams yang dag par rab tu bsgrags/_mngon spyod du ni bshad pa la/_/dbus su rdo rje bya ba ni/_/rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa/_/
[\[135a.4\]]gzhan yang me thab khru gnyis pa/_/thad kar yang ni bdun pa'o/_/de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rgyab tu/_/chu klung ngogs kyi phyogs gcig gam/_/brtan pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod dam/_/khang stong sbyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o/_/de bzhin kho nar ri rtser 
[\[135a.5\]]yang /_/lha yi khang pa stong pa dang /_/rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang /_/de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni/_/sgrub po'i phyogs su gsungs pa yin/_/gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams/_/gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg las kun las/_/ku sha'i khres la nyer 
[\[135a.6\]]'dug pas/_/gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni/_/sbyin sreg las rnams khyad par du/_/der ni gsang sngags shes pas bya'o/_/dngos grub myur ba kho nar gnas/_/nyid du gnas par the tsom med/_/shar du bltas dang byang du bltas pa'ang /_/zhi dang rgyas pa 
[\[135a.7\]]can la bya/_/drag po la ni lho ru ste/_/de nas sngags pas rnam par spang /_/shar du kha bltas zhi ba 'phel/_/rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa/_/'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig_/rig pa bzlas pas yang dag brtsam/_/bil ba arka pa lak+Sha/_/n+ya gro d+ha 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]yis rgyas las bya/_/mngon spyod can la shing rnams ni/_/dkar dang tsha ba skyur dang rno/_/de rnams thams cad spang bya ste/_/thub pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin/_/rtag tu zhi dang rgyas las la/_/brlan bcas shing ni rab tu bsngags/_/de bzhin skam po drag las 
[\[135b.2\]]so/_/thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs/_/de rnams med pa'i yam shing gis/_/shing de rnams su brtag par bya/_/ljang dang snum pa 'dra ba dang /_/rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa/_/de bzhin ku sha'i rnam pa yis/_/zhi dang rgyas pa rtag tu bya/_/maR+gad dang 
[\[135b.3\]]ni 'dra ba dang /_/de bzhin dkar po'i rtsa rnams kyis/_/sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya/_/rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin/_/'dir ni dri med chu la yang /_dag pa srin bu spangs pa las/_/rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru/_/kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang /_/
[\[135b.4\]]rang snang phyi rol brtson pa'am/_/cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/_/gtsang mas rtswa yis sgron ma'i tshad la bya ba'o/_/de nas khu tshur tshad byas na/_/'bad pas ma ni sbar bar bya/_/kha yi rlung gis phu mi bya/_/de bzhin gos kyi mtha' yis dang /_/gos kyi chun po'am sham 
[\[135b.5\]]thabs dang /_/sgrib g.yogs dag ni spangs pa yis/_/nam mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung /_/nye bar bcom dang mngon dga' ba'am/_/gtsang ma nyams pa bral bas dang /_/de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang /_/rlung yab bya'o rlung bzang pos/_/me ni yang dag brtsam 
[\[135b.6\]]par bya/_/de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yis/_/sngags shes me ni sbar bar bya/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyin sreg don/_/bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag_/byas nas yang ni mtha' ru ni/_/ba yi mar gyi sreg blugs gsum/_/der ni sbyin bya de las ni/_/
[\[135b.7\]]gang yang tshad du bya ba'o/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad dang /_/rang rang sngags kyis mgon po la/_/de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya/_/de tshe me la sbyin sreg bya/_/gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa yis/_/rtag tu me ni spyan drang ngo /_/bdag nyid rtsom pa'i dri zhim 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]po'i/_/me tog kho nas rtag tu 'bod/_/sngags pa gnas la mkhas pa yis/_/gdan ni gnas la phul ba pa/_/gsang sngags des so gzhan du min/_/zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la/_/sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum/_/rgyas don 
[\[136a.2\]]me la sbyin sreg bya/_/sngags kyi las kyis thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i gdan la nyer 'dug pas/_/zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/_/rgyas pa can la 'di rnams nyid/_/sbyin bya gzugs mthun sngags rnams kyis/_/mngon spyod can du gnas pa la/_/
[\[136a.3\]]gzhan gyi gzugs su blta bar bya/_/dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni/_/rim pa bzhin du me thab tu/_/ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri/_/bdun du yongs su bzlas pa yis/_/mngon par bos pa de yi tshe/_/'byur gnas nges par gzhag pa rnams/_/ji ltar gnyis 
[\[136a.4\]]kar gnas de bzhin/_/yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas/_/bya'o stong ngam 'bum tshad dam/_/yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya/_/sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du/_/rig pa lan cig bzlas pa 
[\[136a.5\]]yi/_/mig dang gtsug phud 'bar ba yi/_/phreng ba'i me la me lce gcig_/de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las/_/sbyin sreg nges par bya ba yang /_/rgyas pa can la de dang dbang /_/drag po'i las ni smad pa ste/_/rgyas pas spangs so sbyin sreg las/_/rab sbyor me ni 
[\[136a.6\]]bsngags par 'gyur/_/sgra gcan brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan/_/rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags/_/der ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed/_/dkar ba'i me la sbyin sreg bya/_/gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin/_/rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grub 'dod/_/nag po dud 
[\[136a.7\]]kha ser skya la'ang /_/g.yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid/_/kha dog rnam gsum rab 'jug pa/_/dngos grub rnam pa gsum yin no/_/sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gam/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid/_/de la sngags kyi dngos grub med/_/slar yang lag pa'i mthil 'dir ni/_
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid/_/kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod/_/me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni/_/slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya/_/spyan drangs byas la gzugs kha dog_/gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/_/slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa/_/
[\[136b.2\]]las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/_/spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba nyid/_/me la sngags ni brjod par bya/_/sngar ni rab tu btags pas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor 'di ru rnam pa gzhan/_/mchog de nyid kyis de gyis shig_/sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang /_/
[\[136b.3\]]gshegs su gsol ba'i las can gyis/_/las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o/_/der ni me yi spyod pa'i las/_/de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi/_/spyan sngar brtsams nas 'grub par byed/_/de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[136b.4\]]rgyal bas bsngags/_/las rnams kun nas der bya'o/_/gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste/_/khyad par sdig pa can gyi las/_/rgyal ba mchog gis smad pa dang /_/gang du 'jig rten dang 'gal smad/_/'khor los sgyur ba nyid du langs/_/de nas byang sems 
[\[136b.5\]]sa yi bdag_/de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa/_/de nas lha nyid 'grub par byed/_/'dir ni rtag tu sbyor shes pa/_/ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas/_/sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni/_/bar snang la ni spyod par byed/_/de nas sa bla'i lha dang ni/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[136b.6\]]nyid dam gnod sbyin mo/_/'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang /_/rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid/_/yang na yul 'dir 'khor ba nyid/_/yang na rig dang rig 'dzin nyid/_/lha min nyid dang sems can kun/_/dbang byed rjes 'gro 'gugs par byed/_/sems 
[\[136b.7\]]dpa' chen po yang dag pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/sems can sa bcur gnas bcas pa/_/sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs par byed/_/sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin/_/khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid/_/
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]'byung po kun la yang dag nges/_/mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin yang /_/dbang gi don du sems can kun/_/mi bdag des sam mi des ni/_/sa stengs thams cad mnyam pa yis/_/las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni/_/rtag tu sbyin sreg gis 
[\[137a.2\]]bya'o/_/nges par las kun yang dag brten/_/bdag nyid brtsams pas lhan cig sgrub/_/dpal gyi don du de yi las/_/mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang /_/yang na chung ngu nyid bsgrub bya/_/de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi/_/dngos grub brjod pa'i don du slar/_/lhan 
[\[137a.3\]]cig dngos grub blta bar bya/_/sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa/_/las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing /_/bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi/_/sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug byed/_/de nas ras ris gsang sngags 'di/_/bdun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas pa/_/
[\[137a.4\]]rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya/_/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA na/_a pra ti ha ta ga ti satwA nA na/_tad+ya thA/_auM dz+wa la tiShA hU~M/_ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA/_shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te/_/slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas/_/sngags rig me la sbyin 
[\[137a.5\]]sreg gis/_/me tog bdug pa dri yang rung /_/kun nas thams cad nyid la ni/_/lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis/_/khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya/_/las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa/_/cho ga rgyu yi snga ma yis/_/rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba'o/_/
[\[137a.6\]]las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i/_/phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma/_/de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas/_/dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis/_/las rnams thams cad rtsom par byos/_/gal te nus pa mthong ba na/_/dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni/_/
[\[137a.7\]]rtag tu 'bras can sa de yi/_/gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du/_/nges par mchog 'di sbyin pa'o/_/dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba/_/gsang sngags rgyu yis rab zhugs pa/_/'bras bur bcas pa kho na yi/_/dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya/_/rgyal ba'i sgra dang 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]pa Ta ha/_/rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges/_/thams cad du ni smad par brjod/_/sbyin sreg la ni gnas bcas pa/_/gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni/_/'dab chags can nam dge ba'i sgra/_/rnam pa sna tshogs des sgrogs pa'i/_/sgra yang rung ste rgyal bas 
[\[137b.2\]]bsngags/_/rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang /_/yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /_/btsun mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang /_/mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu/_/rnam pa 'di 
[\[137b.3\]]yis bsngags pa'am/_/rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i/_/dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/_/de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi/_/sna tshogs spyod yul dngos grub bo/_/zhes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 
[\[137b.4\]]ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa las bgrang 'phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so//_//de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad las rkang shu dang /_
[\[137b.5\]]gdug pa'i rma rnams la sa'i gong bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas ba byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/
[\[137b.6\]]phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_bil ba'i yam shing la mar dang zho dang /_sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer 
[\[137b.7\]]'byung bar byed do/_/des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang rnyed pa de rnyed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]srid dang /_khyod ji 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o zhes so/_/dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang /_snying rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed do/_/nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris 
[\[138a.2\]]kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas arka'i yam shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par byed do/_/a ga ru dang /_pri yang ku dang nA ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te/_kham phor kha sbyar du 
[\[138a.3\]]byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas lus la byugs te g.yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag bcu gcig 
[\[138a.4\]]zlos shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ngo /_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig me snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zlos shig_/nad 'joms par byed do/_/sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis 
[\[138a.5\]]zlos shig_/bcud dam bcud kyis len so sor rnyed do/_/de zos pas gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro/_/lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis 
[\[138a.6\]]shig_/rgyal ba'i btsun mo dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin te 'dod pa nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs so/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gser srang brgya so sor rnyed do/_/'bras yos stong phrag 
[\[138a.7\]]brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/bgegs med par 'gyur ro/_/pi n+yA ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig_/skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum zlos shig_/rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro/_/rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o/_/bu 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o/_/skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro/_/dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do/_/rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes 
[\[138b.2\]]pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe me stag 'phro bar byed pa dang 
[\[138b.3\]]ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang /_thogs pa med par 'gro bar 
[\[138b.4\]]byed do/_/snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par byed do/_/mchog sbyin par byed do/_/zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo/_/zla ba gcig tu zlos shig dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do/_/nyin gcig pa dang /_
[\[138b.5\]]nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su'o/_/bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar lA pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni yugs 
[\[138b.6\]]sa mos skyes bu yi'o/_/rgyal po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du lan tshwa nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin 
[\[138b.7\]]sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo la lan gsum mam bdun du mngon par bsngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro/_/brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i rma bya'i mdongs kyis phyag par byas na dug 'joms so/_/ldong ros a 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsam par bya ste skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/_'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum 
[\[139a.2\]]du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum du brjes te/_a ga ru dang tu ruSh+ka dang /_tsan+dan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa'am/_thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog dang pa'i mar 
[\[139a.3\]]gyi mar me gsum mo/_/mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do/_/thun mtshams su bza' ba yang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs 
[\[139a.4\]]nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang /_sa 'gul ba dang /_mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /_phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/_
[\[139a.5\]]mtshan ma 'di rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas/_skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/_ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/'bras bu can 
[\[139a.6\]]la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o/_/de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do/_/nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do/_/'bras bu can la 
[\[139a.7\]]mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon par bris nas/_de bzhin du khron pa'am/_mtsho phran du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go/_/der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so/_/de nas blang bar bya ste chu klung 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa bgrod dka' ba can gyi 'dun sa'am/_rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran par byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o/_/de 'phags pa'i zhal du yang bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsungs par mdzod 
[\[139b.2\]]cig ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro/_/chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsams te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o/_/dug med par 'gyur ro/_/de la brjod pa'i cho gas 
[\[139b.3\]]dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro/_/sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas tsA ru bza' zhing mi smya bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum bzlas so/_/zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang 
[\[139b.4\]]brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zla bas dngos grub dang /_zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyis kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do/_/zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byed do/_/gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris 
[\[139b.5\]]nas de'i steng du rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag ste g.yogs pa'i phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/_/klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/der rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[139b.6\]]du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed do/_/thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung ngu blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor cig_/sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste gos 
[\[139b.7\]]dkar po'i kha dog can las las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khug cig shi yang slong bar byed do/_/ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang ral gri dang /_sta gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_b+huShuN+Dal sogs pa rnams 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]ba byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs bya ste/_rdzas gang yang rung ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig phyi nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te ji srid 
[\[140a.2\]]me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o/_/de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i po ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bkang ba la yang ngo /_/de nas blangs te gur gum gyi za 
[\[140a.3\]]ma tog tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ma swat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas bzhis dgab par bya'o/_/ku sha'i khres 
[\[140a.4\]]la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/_/du bas mi snang ba'o/_/'bar bas nam mkha' 
[\[140a.5\]]la 'gro'o/_/lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/de bzhin du mig sman ba bla sgrub par byed pa dang /_gi wang la cho ga 'di'o/_/dkar po'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas 
[\[140a.6\]]lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/_ji srid dro ba dang /_du ba 'thul ba dang /_'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/'di nyid la dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/_/ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig_/de nas bzo bo dbang po ma tshang ba min pa gso 
[\[140a.7\]]sbyong can gyis lcags gsum gyis pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa'am/_brgyad pa gdan dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas nas gur gum dang /_gi wang dang /_ga bur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar bcug cing /_dkar po'i brgyad pa la/_ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang /_gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[140b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do/_/de bzhin du gdu bu dang /_cod pan dang /_lcags sgrog dang /_rdo rje dang /_dgra sta dang /_'khor lo yang zhes pa'o/_/'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga ba'i 'khor lo byas nas 
[\[140b.3\]]so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi tshad do/_/gang gA'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o/_/de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan+dan dmar pos mchod de kar bI ra'i me tog dmar po dang phreng ba phul nas dkar 
[\[140b.4\]]po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis smyung bar gnas pas/_slong mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o/_/gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa 
[\[140b.5\]]la sogs pa rnams phul nas ji ltar nye bar 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi ru yang mar me bzhi dang /_gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_tsan+dan dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun par bya'o/_/
[\[140b.6\]]ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o/_/de nas 'khor lo sgra dang /_'od zer 'phro ba dang /_de nas 'bar ro gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste/_de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig de blang par bya'o/_/
[\[140b.7\]]blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_dpag tshad stong phrag bcur rig pa 'dzin pa chen po klu dang gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyur te/_lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed do/_/shi na yang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na/_sai le ta ka dang /_tsan+dan dmar bo dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_gu gul dang /_tA ra bar ta ka'i rtsa ba dang /_lcags kyi phye ma dang /_gi ri kaR+Ni dang /_'bru'i phub ma dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_pi pi ling 
[\[141a.2\]]dang /_tu ruSh+ka rnams gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go/_/de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gyis gcig tu byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go/_/de nas dkar 
[\[141a.3\]]po'i brgyad pa'am/_dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bgrang phreng dang til mar dang /_phye ma la sogs pa 
[\[141a.4\]]gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/_mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag pa g.yas pas mnan te ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/yang dag par bgos te/_khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lha gzugs can 
[\[141a.5\]]rnams 'ong ngo /_/grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo /_/lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do/_/de nas 'bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so/_/'di yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub 
[\[141a.6\]]pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro/_/gsum pa'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub 
[\[141a.7\]]thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i byang 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i/_/sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas/_/dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni/_/sems dpa' chen po smros shig smros/_/sgrol 
[\[141b.2\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang /_/phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel/_/sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi/_/don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par smros/_/ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi/_/lus can bar mar gyur pa rnams/_/khyod kyi tshig gi mchog 
[\[141b.3\]]gyur pa/_/'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni/_/myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la/_/sems can gang du rab zhugs pa/_/de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang /_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams kyis/_/thams cad de la rjes yi 
[\[141b.4\]]rang /_/dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa/_/dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni/_/sems can rnams kyi mgon pos smros/_/sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig_/sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor gang 'di thos nas ni/_/rab tu 
[\[141b.5\]]dad pa skye bar 'gyur/_/dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang /_/de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing /_/dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi/_/gzi brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel/_/mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni/_/rab tu dad pa skyed par byed/_/gang 
[\[141b.6\]]yin de rnams bdag gis ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni/_/thob pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to/_/ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ni/_/rjes su yi rang 'gyur ba yin/_/dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel 
[\[141b.7\]]byed pa/_/de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa/_/sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba/_/sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon/_/yang dag bka' yis smros shig smros/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshigs 
[\[142a.2\]]su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do/_/shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal/_/phun tshogs yon tan du ma can/_/rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams/_/rgyun du dkar ba'i gos dang ldan/_/mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri/_/blo bzang 
[\[142a.3\]]snying po bstan pa 'dzin/_/gang phyir khyod ni phun tshogs nyid/_/'di ni 'gro ba de dag gi/_/dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni/_/mgon po lha rnams kyi ni ste/_/rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang /_/de yi tshig ni rab rig pa/_/dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid/_/
[\[142a.4\]]'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed/_/de de gzhan du de yis ni/_/lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa/_/brgyad kyis 'dir ni dbang zhal las/_/skyes pa'i dpa' bo rab stobs dang /_/g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang /_/kun nas gser gyi ri dang ldan/_/
[\[142a.5\]]cod pan yang ni lhan cig gdan/_/lha dang lha min lhar bcas pa'i/_/lhag pa'i theg pa thams cad kyang /_/'jig rten bar do'i srid pa dang /_/skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs/_/byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi/_/'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste/_/gang rnams zla ba lta 
[\[142a.6\]]bur dkar/_/lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can/_/kun da du ku dkar po yi/_/gos ni mnabs nyid tsa kor/_/brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig_/sa srungs phrag par phyogs gcig 'gro/_/bla ma'i ri la ri bong can/_/rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni/_/mig brgya brtson 
[\[142a.7\]]'grus ma nyams pas/_/grangs dang chu gter chu 'byin pa/_/tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang /_dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang /_/nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni/_/rnam pas zas dang dri 'khor ba/_/bum dkar gang ba so so yi/_/bum pa de rnams dbang bskur zhing /_/tsan+dan sa 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]mchog yan lag bshad/_/gi bang thig le rnam par bkra_/yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i/_/dga' ba mchog gi yan lag dang /_/lus med gzhom pa'i ched du byas/_/yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las/_/khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas/_/gzhan du 
[\[142b.2\]]'chi med legs pa ni/_/de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi/_/dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i/_/char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni/_/sngon las khyod ni lam gyi mgo/_/dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang /_/me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la/_/
[\[142b.3\]]rnam par tshar phyin longs spyod ldan/_/bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid/_/btsos nas sngar med cho ga yis/_/bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste/_/mgon med 'gro ba mtha' yas las/_/gang phyir srid pa mtha' med cing /_/dri mas lha dang lha min yang /_/de yi brtul 
[\[142b.4\]]zhugs phan tshun du/_/dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyis snang /_/'khyil pa spyan yangs yan lag mchog_/phyogs su lha rnams gnas pa dang /_/mi rnams byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/_/rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni/_/mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las/_/de phyir 
[\[142b.5\]]rnam pad chu skyes ni/_/lha yi yan lag dam par son/_/dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags bral/_/'chi bzhin sa yi lus kyang 'khod/_/kun nas gtod dang kun nas sdud/_/yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan/_/rnam bzhi mnyam par byang chub ldan/_/byang chub shing 
[\[142b.6\]]drung bdud dpung las/_/rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang /_/sangs rgyas go 'phang 'pho med dang /_/klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru/_/zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyis/_/rkang pa stong bu me yi ched/_/rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa/_/khro bo'i me ni 'bar ba la/_/mi g.yo 
[\[142b.7\]]rab tu sbyin par byed/_/phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom/_/gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan/_/dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni/_/'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa/_/yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma 
[\[143a.2\]]thag tu sems dpa' chen po'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gang gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to/_/dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de 
[\[143a.3\]]la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/sems dpa' chen po smros 
[\[143a.4\]]shig_/mthu chen po sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig_/gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[143a.5\]]bskor ba dang /_lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba dang /_sa chen po ri dang /_nags dang /_phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[143a.6\]]dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad par brtsams so/_/dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong bas slob dpon dang mtshungs 
[\[143a.7\]]pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing dad pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_sems can rnams kyi stobs dang /_stobs ma yin pa shes pa/_ser sna med cing g.yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing ha cang mi sbom/_ha cang mi phra ba dri ngan pa med pas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa/_mdzes 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pa/_snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_snying rje dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/_sems can gyi dgongs pa dang /_bsam pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[143b.2\]]dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba/_cha mang po mngon par shes pa/_gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/_dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la byang ba/_rig gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa la sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/_phyag dang 
[\[143b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/_mchod rten gyi las byas pa/_ha cang mi rgan byis pa dang /_rigs dma' bar skyes pa ma yin pa/_gzhon zhing lang tsho dang ldan pa dang /_tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes so/_/
[\[143b.4\]]de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste/_nus med 'dul nyes ma yin pa/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag rab sbyar bya/_/rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la/_/dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya/_/gang zhig 
[\[143b.5\]]bslab la yud tsam yang /_/lhag par 'gro ba'i lus can des/_/mtho ris thar pa yang dag 'grub/_/yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni rjes zhig pa'i/_/dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/byang chub rtsa bar rig thob pa'i/_/
[\[143b.6\]]sems de las ni yang dag brtsam/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams/_/bdag nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya/_/de la bstan bya'i dkyil 'khor bri/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob 
[\[143b.7\]]dpon gyis/_/stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus/_/cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la/_/grong dang grong khyer grong rdal dang /_/ljongs rnams su ni byang shar gyi/_/phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin/_/sa yi mthil du de ji ltar/_/sa phyogs sngags la sngags 'gyur ba/_/
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]snun dang ljon shig me tog bzang /_/'bras bu yang dag mang po can/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i phyogs/_/dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi la/_/gyo mo bong ba gseg ma bral/_/rnga bo che yi sgra dbyangs dang /_/lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang /_/
[\[144a.2\]]lha gzhan yongs su bzung ba dang /_/shis shing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la/_/gang du kun nas rgyang grags lnga'i/_/tshad du chu klung lteng ka dang /_/mtsho phan chu bo rab 'bab pa/_/ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang /_/me tog nyid ni dus rgyun du/_/shin tu 
[\[144a.3\]]rgya chen yang dag ldan/_/cho 'phrul phyogs ni gang rung la/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yi/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der/_/nyi ma gung la song nas ni/_/ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi/_/mngon par mdzes pa'i las bya'o/_/thog mar rab 
[\[144a.4\]]dag sems can kun/_/byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas/_/dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs/_/dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya/_/sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang /_/de bzhin dbyangs ni rjes su gdon/_/'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du/_/dkyil 
[\[144a.5\]]'khor lus can kun gyis bri/_/phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnas su gnas/_/thog mar gtor ma byin byas nas/_/dri yi yam shing yang dag ldan/_/gnas su gnas pas kun zos nas/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du spyan drang ba'i/_/dbyangs kyis tshig 'di brjod par 
[\[144a.6\]]bya/_/slob dpon ming ni che ge bdag_/bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'tshal/_/bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang /_/bdag mthar gdug pa'i sems med pa/_/bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang /_/sangs 
[\[144a.7\]]rgyas bstan la rab dad pa'i/_/sems can rnams la phyir zhing ni/_/mang du rab tu dad pa'i ched/_/dkyil 'khor bri bar bdag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod/_/de nas sems can de rnams ni/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gyis/_mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par byed/_/de nas bris pa'am gzhan du song /_/tho rangs rmi lam rnam par spyad/_/sa yi phyogs der song nas ni/_/khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang /_/kun nas gru bzhi pa ru bya/_/phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi/_/dkon mchog 
[\[144b.2\]]gsum gyi tshad song nas/_/sa la shing dang phub ma dang /_/thal ba sol ba so phag dang /_/skra dang sen mo mchod sbyin gyi/_/so phag nag po la sogs gang /_/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dge ba yi/_/mi dge'i zug rngu thams cad kun/_/lhag ma med par 
[\[144b.3\]]bas la nas ni/_/sa yi gong bu de nyid du/_/gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi/_/'gram gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas/_/rab tu bcug ste thobs brdung /_/tsan+dan chu yis yang dag gtor/_/de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i/_/ba byung tsan+dan chu bsres nas/_/khru brgyad 
[\[144b.4\]]pa yi phyogs su ni/_/phyi rol gyis kyang khru bcu yi/_/tshad du yongs su sbyangs pa la/_/gso sbyong sbyin nas byug tu gzhug_/ji srid sa yi phyogs der ni/_/shin tu 'jam zhing shin tu ni/_/legs par rdzogs par skyes kyi bar/_/de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni/_/
[\[144b.5\]]de nas khru bzhi'i tshad du ni/_/grwa bzhi seng ldeng phur bu brgyad/_/sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du bya/_/gzhon nu mas bkal srad bu ni/_/tshon sna lnga pa legs 'jam pa/_/shin tu sra ba bcom ldan ma'i/_/rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun gyis/_/bsngags pas phur bu la 
[\[144b.6\]]dkris nas/_/bdun byas srod la gdab par bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/_/gtsang ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus de ru/_/rtsa ba nag po med pa yi/_/bum blang dri yi chu dang ni/_/me tog sgron mas bkang ba la/_/mgrin par me 
[\[144b.7\]]tog phreng bar dkris/_/a mra'i yal 'dab kha dgab bya/_/pus mo dag ni nges btsugs nas/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te/_/yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/_/de nas phyogs bcur kun bltas nas/_/'di ni bsgrag bya che ge dag_/gnas 'dir sangs rgyas mchod 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/sems can kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/_/bsam byas dkyil 'khor bris pa 'dir/_/sangs rgyas phan par mdzad pa kun/_/dkyil 'khor du ni byon par mdzod/_/da lta 'dir ni byon nas kyang /_/bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol/_/de dbus nyid du brtag bya 
[\[145a.2\]]ba/_/gnas su bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das/_/spyan drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi/_/gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya/_/dga' ldan du ni byang chub sems/_/'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa/_/de bzhin kha ba'i gnas su dang /_/gang ldan pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'byung /_/lcang 
[\[145a.3\]]lo can du nor dbang phyug_/te se ru ni bde byed bshad/_/mchod yon snod ni bkang ba yis/_/de rnams gnas ni rnam bsam bya/_/de nas zhal ni srub bsnyen bkur/_/dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la/_/ming dang gnas ni yongs nyams na/_/phyin ci log tu ldog 
[\[145a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni/_/nyin re nyin re tsan+dan gyi/_/chu yis byug tu gzhug par bya/_/mtshan mo'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya/_/bar 'dir yo byad thams cad ni/_/rnam par 'byor par 'gyur ba yin/_/de la 'di ni brjod bya ste/_/dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa 
[\[145a.5\]]yi/_/phye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes/_/dzi ba'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i/_/phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/_/pad+ma rA ga ut+pa la/_/phye ma mtha' dag gis gdab bya/_/gur gum chu dang mtshungs pa dang /_/puSh+pa rA ga yi dkyil 'khor/_/zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs shing /_/
[\[145a.6\]]de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang /_/de tsam kha dog rin chen ma/_/lcags kyang rung ste ming can lnga/_/yang na dris btags phye mas sam/_/ji ltar snyed pa rnam sprul pas/_/rab bkug rin chen phye ma yis/_/yang dag pa yi dngos grub 'dod/_/nor bu mching bu mtshungs 
[\[145a.7\]]min gang /_/pad+ma rA gas rnam pa kun/_/dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad kyang /_/slob dpon gyis ni gzhon nu ma'i/_/lag pas byed du gzhug par bya/_/bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang /_/ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa/_/dbang 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]po ma tshang ma yin pa/_/mdor na bud med mtshan nyid dang /_/yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis/_/'di 'dra'i gzhon nu ma gcig gnyis/_/gsum la gso sbyong sbyin nas ni/_/'o ma'i zas kyis mngon dga' bar/_/byas nas dkar po'i gos bgos te/_/dkyil 
[\[145b.2\]]'khor yo byad thams cad ni/_/byed gzhug dkyil 'khor yo byad kun/_/legs bsags so sor brtags pa yis/_/chu dang rnam par dben pa dang /_/dge slong 'dul ba byas pa dang /_/yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa sngon 'gro bas/_/
[\[145b.3\]]slob dpon rang gi lhag gnas ched/_/phye ma thams cad bdug pa bri/_/gtor ma dang ni mar rnams ni/_/cho ga can gyis byed du gzhug_/de nas slob dpon yo byad kun/_/tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bre/_/slob ma yongs su bzung bar gyis/_/de 
[\[145b.4\]]rnams sangs rgyas chos dang ni/_/dge slong dge 'dun la rab dang /_/yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa/_/bden par smra dang spom pa min/_/mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs/_/gzung bar mi bya gcig gnyis gsum/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ni gzhan bcu drug_/
[\[145b.5\]]de rnams skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang /_/'o ma'i ston mo bza' ba dang /_/'o ma'i shing las byung ba yi/_/so shing sor mo brgyad kyi tshad/_/bcom ldan rtsa ba'i snying po yis/_/lan ni nyi shu rtsa bdun du/_/mngon par 
[\[145b.6\]]bsngags nas ba yi gcin/_/rab sbyar mtshan mo'i thun mtshams su/_/dkyil 'khor sa gzhi phyi rol du/_/shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi/_/khres la rim pas nyer 'dug nas/_/snying po re re lag par byin/_/rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/_/
[\[145b.7\]]gtsug tor bcing la'ang bdun bzlas bya/_/de nas so shing de rnams la/_/byin nas rang rang so shing bza'/_/ral gcig ma yi snying po yis/_/lan bdun bsngags pa'i dri yi chus/_/spyi bor mngon par gtor bar bya/_/de nas de rnams la brjod bya/_/
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/_/dbang phyug mchog gi thugs rje can/_/chen po'i mchog ni sbyin pa po/_/bsgral dka' sgrol ba dran par gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yang /_/rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 
[\[146a.2\]]sems dpa' kun/_/skyed par byed ma dran par gyis/_/de yi 'og tu slob dpon gyis/_/slob ma de rnams kun la ni/_/'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos/_/brtan par byas nas de rnams mdun/_/shes rab pha rol phyin bklag bya/_/de lta bu yi cho ga yis/_/bud 
[\[146a.3\]]med rnams kyang yongs gzung bya/_/langs nas bu mos bkal ba yis/_/srad bu tshon sna lnga pa ni/_/mi mnyam rgyud du bsgrim pa la/_/dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas/_/re rer pad+ma'i bgrang phreng gis/_/bsang gtor byas nas rtsa ba yi/_/snying po lan grangs nyer gcig 
[\[146a.4\]]tu/_/mngon bsngags de la 'dir brjod bya/_/dpal gyi gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs mtshan ma/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba ste/_/pad+ma'i bgrang phreng de phyir bsngags/_/de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis/_/slob ma rnams la cha phra mos/_/lag 
[\[146a.5\]]pa la ni bcing bar bya/_/slob ma rnams la gang kho na/_/de nyid slob ma bdag nyid bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa/_/shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni/_/phrag pa gcig tu byas nas ni/_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni/_/sa la rab tu btsugs byas te/_/rtsa ba'i 
[\[146a.6\]]phyag rgya bcing ba dang /_/rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thams cad dang /_/rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan thos dang /_/lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang /_/lha mi'i dri dang me tog gi_/phreng ba yongs su 'dzin pa yis/_/kun la gsol ba gdab par bya/_/
[\[146a.7\]]dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon bdag_/che ge mo zhes bya ba yis/_/bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi/_/dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal lags na/_/de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas/_/nyan 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za lha min nam mkha' lding /_/mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/rang gi rig pa sngags tshogs kyis/_/yongs bskor sems can thams cad la/_/rjes su brtse bas byon nas kyang /_/bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzod/_/de ltar yang gnyis yang 
[\[146b.2\]]gsum du/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la bltas nas/_/dbus su me tog phreng ba dor/_/gal te me tog phreng g.yo byed/_/de nas byon par shes par bya/_/de nas sangs rgyas byang sems la/_/dri yi 
[\[146b.3\]]chu yis mchod yon dang /_/me tog phul cig de nas ni/_/khru brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la/_/yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ru/_/a pA marga'i yam shing gis/_/me ni rab tu sbar byas nas/_/shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis/_/rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho/_/mar gyi sreg blugs 
[\[146b.4\]]brgyad brgyar dbul/_/de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang /_/lha rnams la yang mchod yon dbul/_/de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru/_/gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yis/_/skyes bu srung ba'i phreng ba dang /_/dbang po tshang ba gzhag par bya/_/de la 'dir ni brjod bya ste/_/gang 
[\[146b.5\]]zhig rnam pa gzhan bya ba/_/skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams ni/_/yang dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir cho ga byas pa yis/_/slob mas dam tshig shes par 'gyur/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang /_/rab gnas slob mas thabs cig 
[\[146b.6\]]tu/_/song nas ku sha bting ba la/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/tshogs kun rjes su dran pa yis/_/g.yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya/_/de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis/_/gtsang ma shar du kha phyogs pas/_/rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya/_/de la 'di ni brjod 
[\[146b.7\]]bya ste/_/gang zhig tsan+dan bil ba sogs/_/u dum bA ra sogs n+ya gro d+ha/_/rgyal mtshan phreng bas khyab pa dang /_/rmi lam rab tu dad pa'ang rung /_/kha cig me lce mdzes pa dang /_/de ltar mthong ba de dngos grub/_/mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang /_/kA raN+Da ba krung krung dang /_/
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]rma bya ro ha Na rnams ni/_/gang zhig de lta bu mthong 'gyur/_/rmi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de/_/myur ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ma 'am ra ha Na yang rung /_/de bzhin pi wang thogs pa dang /_/kuN+Da la sogs pa yang rung /_/de bzhin a sogs d+hi mthong na/_/
[\[147a.2\]]gang yang rmi lam mthong byed pa/_/mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de/_/sgrol ma'i rtog par nges par bstan/_/gtum po khyi yi lag pa rnams/_/gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang /_/bong bu rnga mo shing rta sogs/_/mthong dang rig pa nyid sogs sam/_/rgya skyegs til mar 
[\[147a.3\]]gyis reg pa/_/gang gis rmi lam du 'jug pa/_/de yi dngos grub nges par gnas/_/dam tshig tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan/_/rmi lam blo yis rnam dpyad nas/_/de ltar rab blo gang shes nas/_/slob ma de la rmi lam gyi/_/lung du yang 
[\[147a.4\]]ni bstan par bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/_/gal te khyim gnas gyur pa'am/_/dge slong dge slong ma dang ni/_/dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung /_/chen po de rnams gso sbyong ni/_/bzung ste phyi nas slob ma rnams/_/gso sbyong yang dag gus par bya/_/
[\[147a.5\]]slob ma rmi lam mi dge ba/_/bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/_/snga ma kho na ras dang ni/_/ras ris mthar ni a lA sa/_/zangs las 'byung bar ba zhugs te/_/yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug_/de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la/_/tsan+dan
