[\[147a.6\]]chu yis legs par byug_/slob ma thams cad gnas cig tu/_/snying pos bsrung ba byas nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor phyi yi gnas gcig tu/_/nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams/_/nang du rab tu gzhug par bya/_/de nas nyi ma nub dus su/_/dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya/_/
[\[147a.7\]]bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu ni/_/tshon sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi/_/snying po lan bdun bsngags byas te/_/dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/_/phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings/_/de dag thams cad khru yi tshad/_/gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bya/_/phyi nas 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]kun tu dung dang ni/_/rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang /_/'khar rnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/'khar ba dang ni pheg rdob rnams/_/kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/_/phyi rol du ni dgram par bya/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/_/tshon sna lnga 
[\[147b.2\]]pa'i thig skud kyis/_/khru brgyar byas nas thig gdab bya/_/de lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste/_/de nas kha dog thams cad pa/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/
[\[147b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi/_/nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni/_/phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/_/rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che/_/ral pa gcig pa'i snying po yis/_/gdug pa'i sems can thams cad kyi/_/sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[147b.4\]]yang ni thams cad kyi/_/slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams/_/ral gcig snying po nyid kyis ni/_/thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni/_/byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te/_/tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris/_/
[\[147b.5\]]yongs su bcad cing lus dkar ba'i/_/slob de de bzhin gshegs rnams la/_/phyag bya rin chen phye mas so/_/pad+ma'i rigs la phyag byas te/_/phye ma ser pos bcom ldan ma/_/'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas/_/ljang gu rnams kyis nyan thos kun/_/rang sangs rgyas kun phyag byas nas/_/
[\[147b.6\]]nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o/_/de ltar dang pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi ba'i snying por ro/_/phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi tshad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o/_/gsum pa mtho gang pa de'i nyis 'gyur ro/_/de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas 
[\[147b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol/_/'bru thams cad dang rin po che thams cad dang sman thams cad dang /_dri dang me tog thams cad dang /_tsan+dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba/_mA Sha'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa/_du ku la'i ras 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa/_gser dang dngul las byung ba/_dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste/_snying po'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[148a.2\]]gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/de la 'di brjod par bya ste/_dam tshig don dang bsod nams don/_/'dod don so sor dmigs byed du/_/sdom pa gzung bar byas gyur nas/_/gang du gnas pa thams cad nas/_/dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bri bar bya/_/gzhan gyis mi thub 
[\[148a.3\]]thugs rje che/_/sangs rgyas byams pa spyan mar bcas/_/'di rnams ming ni kun drangs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor grags/_/de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can/_/khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste/_/'di rnams ming ni kun dran 
[\[148a.4\]]nas/_/spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya/_/rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs byed/_/rdo rje ser skya rdo rje ni/_/drag por bzhed dang seng ge dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur nyid/_/'di rnams ming ni kun nas ni/_/phyag na rdo rje kun tu bri/_/de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon 
[\[148a.5\]]gyis/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phye ma dkar po dang /_yungs kar dkar po bsres pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kun tu 'phro ba/_gtsug tor nas 'od 
[\[148a.6\]]zer 'byung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang por bris shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyis su phye ma ser po dang /_pad+ma ge sar phan tshun bsres pas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun 
[\[148a.7\]]nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs dang /_cha byad dang /_dbyibs kyi rnam pa can rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa/_sa bon gyis gang ba dang /_'bras bu phyag na bsnams pa la 'di lta ste/_bcom 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang /_gdugs dkar po dang /_gzi brjid phung po dang /_nor bu'i phung po dang /_gser gyi phung po dang /_rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang /_kun nas phung po dang /_nyon 
[\[148b.2\]]mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung po dang /_rtag pa'i phung po dang /_dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung po dang /_thams cad phung po dang /_sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i phung po dang /_'jig rten gsum pa'i phung po dang /_mtha' 
[\[148b.3\]]yas phung po dang /_bsod nams phung po dang /_lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhogs su nye bar bzhugs pa'o/_/g.yon du 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_mngon par 'phags pa dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /_
[\[148b.4\]]mngon par mtho ba dang /_sa'i 'dab ma dang /_'dab ma brgya pa dang /_'dab ma stong pa dang /_'od zer dang /_'od zer chen po dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang /_bkod pa'i 'od zer dang /_dkar po'i 'od zer dang /_pad+ma'i 'od zer dang /_bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang /_
[\[148b.5\]]bdud bzhi'i rnam par 'dul ba'i gtsug tor dang /_gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang /_lung bstan pa zhes gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'di rnams g.yon gyi steng du bri 
[\[148b.6\]]bar bya'o/_/gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma spyan ma dang /_mdzod spu dang /_zla ba dang /_snying rje ma dang /_byams pa ma dang /_mi 'jigs ma dang /_lung bstan ma dang /_
[\[148b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'khrugs pa rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]pa'i snying po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_rab tu dang ba'i sku cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/_rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku 
[\[149a.2\]]bri'o/_/gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/_rtse gsum dang zhags pas phyag brel ba/_cung zad de bzhin gshegs 
[\[149a.3\]]pa'i gzugs brnyan la blta ba'o/_/gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /_phyi nas dge sbyong ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzes 
[\[149a.4\]]ma dang /_sangs rgyas dkar mo dang /_de bzhin gshegs ma sems ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o/_/
[\[149a.5\]]'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dang /_de bzhin 
[\[149a.6\]]gshegs pa'i 'dus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/_pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin 
[\[149a.7\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/_/rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_phyag na pad+ma ste/_de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g.yas pas sa 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bon gyis gang ba dang /_phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/_rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo /_/gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rig par bri bar bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[149b.2\]]steng gi drang srong dang /_drang srong chen po dang /_lha'i drang srong dang /_mA da ra dang /_brtsegs pa dang /_legs par brtsegs pa dang /_brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[149b.3\]]la snyoms par zhugs pa/_'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_bla gos ser po can no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yon du snam sbyar ro/_/mdun gyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng 
[\[149b.4\]]bas 'khrugs pa/_pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'o/_/de'i yang nye logs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i 
[\[149b.5\]]'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_dar la dang /_ras kyi smad g.yogs dang stod g.yogs can/_thal mo sbyar ba byas pa cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs la lta bar gyur 
[\[149b.6\]]pa/_bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/_/de'i gong du pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[149b.7\]]po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/_dar dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o/_/sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs can/_dar la dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/_pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin 
[\[150a.2\]]pa'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang /_pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/_ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang /_
[\[150a.3\]]dar la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ba/_shin tu dang ba'i sku/_'od zer 'bar ba/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o/_/dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g.yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_bgrang 
[\[150a.4\]]phreng dang /_g.yang gzhi nag po can dang /_rab tu dang ba'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs byed pa pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa sku dkar po pad+ma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can/_phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang /_g.yas pas yid bzhin 
[\[150a.5\]]gyi nor bu phyag tu bkod pa/_'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/_phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyi snam bu gcig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang /_nyal ba dang /_legs par 'grub 
[\[150a.6\]]par byed pa dang /_rdo rje sde dang /_dpung bzang dang /_ral pa gyen brdzes dang /_rig pa bzang po dang /_legs 'grub dang /_sde bzang dang /_stobs po che dang /_rnam par 'joms pa dang /_ki lI ki la dang /_mchog dang /_legs 'dul dang /_'gro lding ba dang /_sngon 
[\[150a.7\]]rabs dang /_rin chen ke lI dang /_byis pa'i ke lI dang /_legs par ke lI dang /_legs par gang pa dang /_gang ba chen po dang /_lha mthar byed dang /_rdo rje chen po dang /_'bar ba zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'khrugs pa/_rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/_ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/_bzhin cung zad khro gnyer du byas pa/_phyag g.yon pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o/_/'di dag gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste/_'di lta ste bcom 
[\[150b.2\]]ldan 'das mA ma kI dang /_rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /_rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /_rdo rje rgyal ma dang /_rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang /_dmar po ldan ma dang /_grags ldan ma dang /_bi shi ni rdo rje spyan ma dang /_rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang /_rdo rje khu tshur ma dang /_rdo rje mi 'jigs ma 
[\[150b.3\]]dang /_rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /_rdo rje sgra ldan ma dang /_rdo rje dge legs ma dang /_rdo rje 'dzin ma dang /_rdo rje ma mo dang /_rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /_rdo rje gnam lcags ma dang /_dus kyi rdo rje ma dang /_rdo rje gtsug phud ma dang /_rdo rje bka' bsgo chen mo dang /_rdo rje 'od dang /_rgyal ba ldan ma dang /_
[\[150b.4\]]rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang /_rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/_rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/_ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas pa dang /_dar dang ras kyi sham 
[\[150b.5\]]thabs dang /_dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/_g.yon pa rdo rje dang /_g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/_lhas bstod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o/_/de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/_rang gi gzugs 
[\[150b.6\]]dang cha byad dang dbyibs bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/_ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_'od dpag med dbus su bzhugs pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs can/_dar la 
[\[150b.7\]]dang ras kyi sham thabs can/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag rgya/_g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byas pa'i lus can/_cung zad de 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog can/_pad+ma'i gdan la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_rab tu dang ba'i sku/_dar dang ras kyi sham thabs 
[\[151a.2\]]can/_stod g.yogs dmar po mnabs pa/_phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/_phyag g.yon pas rnga yab kyis brel ba/_'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i spyan cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/_/spyan 
[\[151a.3\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_rab tu dang ba'i sku/_pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_cung zad 'dzum bzhin pa/_dar dang ras kyi sham thabs can/_stod g.yogs 
[\[151a.4\]]dmar po mnabs pa/_phyag g.yon pas ut+pal yongs su bzung nas g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/_lus cung zad 'dud pa/_lang tsho dang po can/_ha cang mi sbom/_ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o/_/'phags 
[\[151a.5\]]pa spyan ras gzigs kyi g.yas su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyad la 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang /_phyag stong pa dang /_phyag brgya pa dang /_phyag bcu gnyis pa dang /_phyag drug pa dang /_phyag bzhi pa dang /_zhabs 
[\[151a.6\]]stong pa dang /_zhabs brgya pa dang /_zhabs bcu gnyis pa dang /_zhabs drug pa dang /_zhabs bzhi pa dang /_rta mgrin dang /_don yod zhags pa dang /_'od zer stong gis rnam par snang ba dang /_mgrin pa dkar pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_mtha' 
[\[151a.7\]]yas rnam rgyal dang /_rnam rgyal chen po dang /_lha'i mtha' dang /_mtha' dpag tu med pa dang /_yid kyi shing rta dang /_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rnams pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo srid par 'jug pa nye bar spyod par byed pa/_kun nas 'bar 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_pad+ma'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus phyag na pad+ma dang /_g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_cung zad sgrol ma la lta bar gyur pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nye logs su gos dkar mo pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/_rab tu dang ba'i sku/_ral 
[\[151b.2\]]pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/_phyag na pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa dang /_g.yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa'o/_/de'i yang g.yas su phreng gcig la brten pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi gtso mo bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/_
[\[151b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can dang /_dkar mo dang /_dkar mo chen mo dang /_dpal mdun ma dang /_pad+ma go bo rig dang /_grags ldan ma dang /_sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i zla ba ma dang /_longs spyod ldan ma dang /_bde ldan ma dang /_grags pa ldan ma dang /_shes rab gos 
[\[151b.4\]]can ma dang /_stobs gcig ma dang /_stobs mang po dang /_stobs bcu ma dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yum dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi yum zhes pa 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/_kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_rgyan 
[\[151b.5\]]thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_lha'i bud med kyi cha byad 'chang ba/_rab tu dang ba'i sku/_cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/_/pad+ma bsnams zhing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_rang gi gzugs su bri bar bya'o/_/sgrol ma'i 'og tu ci bgyi zhes bya 
[\[151b.6\]]ba bcom ldan 'das las 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzhi pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/_lus brtan pa/_nag po mthar byed pa'i gzugs can/_khro gnyer du byas pa/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_zhal gcig gis drag tu bzhad pas gdangs bzhin 
[\[151b.7\]]pa/_gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bzhin pa/_dang pos sgrol ma lta ba'o/_/phyag dang pos rin po che mthong ba 'byin par byed bzhin pa/_g.yon dang pos zhags pa bsnams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/_/de'i yang g.yas 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]su khro bo chen po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba lha chen po la nye bar 'dug pa/_pad+ma'i chu bas dkris pa'i lus can/_ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o/_/'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga 
[\[152a.2\]]thams cad sngar brjod pa kho na'o/_/ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ral pa gyen 
[\[152a.3\]]brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi snying po sbyin par bgyi'o/_/gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[152a.4\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so/_/khyod kyis smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rang gi snying po'i 
[\[152a.5\]]dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas 'di las dkyil 'khor che/_/dam pa yang dag rab 'chang byed/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam pa ru/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/_/de yi dbus su srad bu mnyam/_/gru bzhi yongs su bskor bar bya/_/gnyis par 'joms pa po 
[\[152a.6\]]song ste/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyis ni/_/ri mo bzhi po rnams kyang ngo /_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/_/pad+ma yi ge ze 'bru la/_/'jig rten mgon po dgod par bya/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba rnams/_/sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 
[\[152a.7\]]kun tu bri/_/de ru slob dpon rab bzhugs nas/_/pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya mchog_/dkyil 'khor gnas la nyer 'dug pas/_/mnyam par bzhag pas mnyam par dgod/_/ji ltar chu la pad+ma gang /_/gnas kyi nyes pa mang pos kyang /_/gos par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]'gro la chags pas yang dag byed/_/lan cig 'di gsungs dper brjod nas/_/de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis/_/yang dag bkug nas pad+ma che/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu chen po'o/_o~M ma hA pad+mo hU~M dza hrI/_de nas 
[\[152b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dpon la mthod pa sbyin par byed do/_/yang na 'od zer gtong bar byed do/_/de nas 'di nyid kyi phyag rgyas slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste/_dar dkar pos gos dkar po dang /_gtsug tor dkar pos 
[\[152b.3\]]mgo bo dkri bar bya'o/_/'di nyid 'jig rten du rab tu brjod nas de nas smros shig ces so/_/de nas pad+ma lag pa g.yon du byin nas g.yas pas chu snod byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad pad+ma che/_/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/'phags pa spyan 
[\[152b.4\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug_/de nyid lhan cig brtag par bya/_/zhes so/_/de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang ting nge 'dzin yang bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o/_/de nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/_de bzhin du dkyil 
[\[152b.5\]]'khor bris nas dbus kyi ze 'bru la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu gzigs par byed pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid thob par byed do/_/zhes pad+ma'i dkyil 
[\[152b.6\]]'khor ro/_/de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/_de bzhin kho nas dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas dbus su pad+ma stong dgod du gzhug go/_/de nas pad+ma stong po de bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste/_lan re lan re yongs su bzlas nas so/_/de nas slob ma rab 
[\[152b.7\]]tu bcug nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o/_/bu dang slob ma'i ched du yang /_/dam tshig nyams par mi bya ste/_/dam tshig bdag la brjod par bya/_/gang phyir pad+ma'i rnam pa las/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dag_/dam tshig gi ni dkyil 'khor ro/_/las kyi dkyil 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]'khor bri bar bya/_/mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mchod/_/lus kyis spyan ras gzigs mgon la/_/ngag gis phyag na rdo rje la/_/las las nam mkha'i snying por skyes/_/ji ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur/_/
[\[153a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri rab lhun po'i ri'i rtse mor 'khod pa rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad do zhes so/_/de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/_rtag 
[\[153a.3\]]tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du bzlas pas ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'phros nas sgrub pa po'i pad+ma'i dbus su 'khod de slar yang de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku 
[\[153a.4\]]gzhan 'byung ste sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shing brtan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdag gi dngos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_ji srid du 'phur bar byed do/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[153a.5\]]dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes so/_/de nas sgrub pa gzhan dang las chen po thams cad 'byung ste/_'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa 
[\[153a.6\]]thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum cu 
[\[153a.7\]]rtsa lnga bzlas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyag rgya chen po ni mchod rten stong phrag brgya byas nas mthar cho gas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas snying khar rab tu 'jug par byed 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' so sor rnyed do/_/de nas zhal du rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor rnyed do/_/ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur ro/_/thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi grong dang grong khyer srung ba dang /_
[\[153b.2\]]mdzes par spyan drangs pas thams cad bya'o/_/'bebs pa la tsan+dan gyi bdug pas gdon 'bebs so/_/shi rI Sha'i me tog gis sems can dbang du byed do/_/dri bzang po'i me tog gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do/_/sa dkar pos bud med do/_/
[\[153b.3\]]dri zhim po'i me tog gis chom rkun rengs pa'o/_/yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya rengs so/_/yungs kar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par byed do/_/rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par byed do/_/dus gsum du bzlas pas rmi lam ngan pa 
[\[153b.4\]]'joms par byed do/_/til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do/_/bya gag gi gshog pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do/_/rgyal po 'khyil pa'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[153b.5\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas mtshan mo brgyad smyung bar gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang po'i spu'i sbyin sreg gis so/_/
[\[153b.6\]]bu mo dbang du byed pa la yang ngo /_/don gzhan la yang sbyin sreg dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyi ma re rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya'o/_/ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar las chen po thams cad kyi sgyu 'phrul lo//_//de nas sems 
[\[153b.7\]]dpa' chen po de ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so/_/khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang /_/sgo khyud rta babs nges gnas pa/_/phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya/_/de nas kun nas grwa rnams 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]su'ang /_/de ni legs par bsams byas nas/_/nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/sngar brjod snying po 'di yis ni/_/zlos bzhin 'di ni bsrung ba dang /_/dkar po dmar po ser po dang /_/nag po ljang gu'i tshon sna lnga'i/_/phye ma 'jam po rnams 
[\[154a.2\]]kyis ni/_/sgrol ma'i rig pas mngon bsngags pas/_/bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya/_/khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste/_/g.yon du ral pa gcig ma bya/_/g.yas su 'dam skyes phyi rol gyi/_/sgo khyud snying por ji rigs grub/_/yongs su 'dod pas rdo rigs bya/_/
[\[154a.3\]]dri yi phye mas yongs su byang /_/rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/_/gang du 'jig rten gsum cho ga_/rdo rje 'chang chen 'dod pa yis/_/'das pas rnam par thim par 'gyur/_/khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur bcas/_/de ni g.yas kyi sgo khang du/_/stobs po che ni rab bzhag nas/_/
[\[154a.4\]]nya yis mgrin par stobs po che/_/nub phyogs su ni bya ba'o/_/g.yas kyi phyi yi sgo khang du/_/de bzhin dbang phyug chen po bya/_/de la mdung gi phyag rgya dgod/_/ji 'dra'i u ma bri bar bya/_/lho yi grwa gnyis su bya ba/_/phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/_/nub dang 
[\[154a.5\]]byang gi grwa rnams su/_/log 'dren phyag rgya rdo rje'o/_/byang gi grwa gnyis rnams su ni/_/mkhas pas rigs kyi phyag rgya bya/_/shar gyi grwa gcig rnams su ni/_/ma mo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod/_/b+h+r-ing gi ri Ta log 'dren bcas/_/de nas ji ltar 'byor ba yi/_/cho 
[\[154a.6\]]gas ji bzhin lha rnams mchod/_/khro bo stobs chen sgrol mas non/_/bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/_/ka ra bI ra ta la ni/_/blangs nas rang gnas smyung gnas pas/_/mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du/_/gtsang ma gang du rab 'jug bya/_/blo dang ldan pas spyan drang 
[\[154a.7\]]bya/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad nas/_/ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yis/_/tshar bcad rjes su 'dzin pa'i mchog_/gdon dang lus kyi las rnams ni/_/de nyid du ni nges par bya/_/tshar bcad dam tshig bde ba 'dri/_/gdon 'pho byed dang za byed dang /_/gang zhig la la gsod 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pa dang /_/de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang /_/sems can rnams ni thams cad nyid/_/sgrub thabs bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni/_/ji 'dra ba yi bya ba dang /_/mkhas pas las ni stong dag dang /_/gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang /_/rang gi rigs dang gzhan rigs kyi/_/
[\[154b.2\]]phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya/_/'di yi dkyil 'khor thams cad nas/_/'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun/_/de nas gtor ma bdug pa sogs/_/rgyas pas mngon par mchod byar gyis/_/de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya/_/phyis kyi dbang las dul ba thob/_/skye 
[\[154b.3\]]bos btung ba sbyin sreg la/_/sogs pa rnam par gzhom par bya/_/shi Sha lAn tsa na blangs nas/_/gdon thob pa ni 'pho bar bya/_/srin po rnams kyis byin pa'i mchu/_/mthong ba de 'dra'i tshon rnams dang /_/sha za rnams la ri bong can/_/mig mi 'dzums par 'dzag 
[\[154b.4\]]pa yi/_/'jigs pa mthong na sna tshogs pa/_/kun tu rnam par lta bar byed/_/skem byed gdon gyi rnam 'gyur gang /_/nus dang dpung pa brten pa yi/_/dgra bo rnams ni thams cad du/_/lha dang mtshon cha'i bya ba ni/_/pad+ma byed dang ral pa dang /_/dbyug gu bgrang 
[\[154b.5\]]phreng 'jigs pa'i gnas/_/ril ba spyi blugs mi thub nyid/_/phyag rgya bram ze can zhes bshad/_/rtse gsum kun dang zla phyed dang /_/ral pa mig la sogs pa dang /_/khyu mchog sgra dang drag po dang /_/dbang ldan rnams te bdun du grags/_/shak+ti gdengs ka ba 
[\[154b.6\]]dan dang /_/khyim bya de bzhin rma bya'i mjug_/phyag rgya gzhon nu ma can bshad/_/'khor lo dung dang be con nyid/_/ral gri phub nyid nam mkha' lding /_/mgo nyid phyag rgya khyab 'jug bshad/_/che ba sprin ni lha chen po'i/_/bum pa gtun shing de bzhin du/_/dang 
[\[154b.7\]]pa'ang g.yon gzhogs phyag rgya ste/_/phyag rgya la hi ri kar bshad/_/nam gru rnams dang gtor zan dang /_/rgan po gtum po mthong ba ni/_/nam gru dkar po rnams kyi rgya/_/rang gi gzugs nyid mthong ba ni/_/mdangs 'phrog rnams kyi lhung bzed dang /_/'degs 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]par byed pa grol ba'o/_/de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/_byed pa thams cad dge ba la/_/shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dam/_/khang stong gtsang ma tsha sgo med pa'i sa gzhi mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas 
[\[155a.2\]]dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te re khA gsum der bya'o/_/kun nas khru bzhi pa la dang por thal ba'i re khA'o/_/gnyis pa ri'i btsag gis so/_/gsum pa sol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bar pas bri bar bya'o/_/byang ngam nub tu yang sgo gcig byed du gzhug go/_/sgo'i dbus su yang lha chen 
[\[155a.3\]]po lag na mdung thogs pa bya'o/_/snam bu'i nang du sangs rgyas bden par rmad du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o/_/sangs rgyas g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrol mas non pa rnam par dgod par bya'o/_/g.yon du dpa' mo chen mo stobs mo che ma ral pa gcig ma bzhag nas/_bde 
[\[155a.4\]]bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /_de bzhin du 'jog po dang /_dpa' bo chen po stobs kyi rgyu yang dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po dang /_dungaskyong dang /_rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon par brjod pa'o/_/
[\[155a.5\]]lha de rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o/_/'di thams cad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par med par bya ste/_dpal ldan ma ni snam bu'o/_/sgo ru spre'u dang /_ra dang /_bu ma rnam yang sgo'i spyan par ba yi yang ngo /_/nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto 'phye 
[\[155a.6\]]chen po las ma 'das pa yang dag par mchod de/_stong phrag bzlas par bya'o/_/shes rab can sngags kyi rgyal po grub par 'gyur ro/_/rims dang gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang /_rtsod pa yang rnam par 'joms par byed do/_/rang gnas su 'jug go/_/de nas gsang 
[\[155a.7\]]sngags 'di yang rtag tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu'am ku shas gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_zhi ba can dang /_rgyas pa can dang /_mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas par grub ste/_thams cad 'joms pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis 
[\[155b.2\]]mngon par shes pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la mngon sum du thos pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar sems can gyi don gyi phyir dang /_sgrol ma'i mthu bstan 
[\[155b.3\]]pa'i phyir dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa smros shig_/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/_ma hA bu ru Sha ri Sha b+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ma hA s+thA ma prA p+ta mai tri ya many+dzu shrI badzra pA Ni 
[\[155b.4\]]pra b+hi ti b+h+yo ma hA sa twe b+h+yaH/_de rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa srid pa'i lam rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod par bgyi'o/_/
[\[155b.5\]]sAd+ya the daM/_he bo d+hi satwA/_ma hA satwA/_he ha le/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_pa ra ma ma tri tsit+ta hi ta tsit+ta kA ru Ni kA mAM/_ga ma bi ya ti/_ma hA bi ya ti/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_d+hu ru tsa len+t+ra/_ba la na ma ste stu/_sar+b+ba satwA/_b+ha ya pra ta/_ha ri ha ri ha ri bA ha nor+b+ba ba/_b+ha bA na kha/_tu ru 
[\[155b.6\]]tu ru/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_su ru su ru/_su pra shA si/_pA ma la mUrti/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_kr-iSh+NA dzi na/_dza TA mu ku TA ba la mu trA la mA la ba la ma la ma la/_ka la ka la/_na la/_ha la ha la/_hu lu hu lu/_he bo d+hi satwA/_pri ya bo d+hi satwA/_ma hA bo d+hi satwA/_na ma te ru/_ku ru ku ru/_
[\[155b.7\]]hr-i da yaM/_ma nu sma ra/_i daM tsa me/_kAr+ya ku ru swA hA/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/_nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]byas te dri dang me tog la sogs pa mngon par bkram nas/_de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o/_/de nas nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/zla ba drug kho nar byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[156a.2\]]du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_gal te mtshams med pa byas pas kyang ma grub pa na de'i tsheng mtshams med pa byas pa dang /_bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces so/_/de nas 
[\[156a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rig pa 
[\[156a.4\]]sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rnam par gzigs par gyur pa/_rtog pa bzhir skyes pa/_thung ngu'i gzugs can/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_sa 'og dang /_mi snang ba dang /_ro langs dang /_'thab rtsod dang /_
[\[156a.5\]]rkang pas rab tu bgrod pa dang /_rgyas pa can dang /_mngon spyod can dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_skal ba bzang po nyid rab tu sbyin pa po tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa las bzlog pa/_rang bzhin gyi 
[\[156a.6\]]mtshan nyid can gyis lhag pa'i cha khyim du skyes pa kun tu ston par byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen pa'i mthu'i don gyis ched stong phrag pas kyang stong phrag brgya po des kyang lan cig gzhom pa tsam dang /_dpe tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i yul 'jig rten 
[\[156a.7\]]du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la ltos nas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sbrub pa 'di rnams gsungs pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das yid dbang du gyur pa dngos grub rab tu stsol bar mdzad par gyur to/_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]tad+ya thA/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_o~M dza ye swA hA/_rgyal ma zhes bya ba'o/_/tad+ya thA/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_oM bi dza ya swA hA/_rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[156b.2\]]tad+ya thA/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_o~M a dzi te swA hA/_mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o/_/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_o~M a pa rA dzi te swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o zhes pa de lta bu 
[\[156b.3\]]sring mo bzhi'o/_/lnga pa ming po ni/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_aR+ha te/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_o~M ki ni ki ni sarba ta thA ga tA ut+b+ha ba shAn+te/_ba ra de/_ut+ta ma ta thA ga tA ut+b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA/_ming po tum bu ru zhes pa'o/_/
[\[156b.4\]]sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su bsgrags/_/mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa/_/phyi ma'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni/_/ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar ba/_/de lta de ltar sgrub par byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan 
[\[156b.5\]]par 'dod pas/_stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_rang gi rdo rje yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub 
[\[156b.6\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mthu kun tu bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod rten 
[\[156b.7\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa sbyin par bgyi'o/_/de la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mchog gi grub pa dang /_mchog gi las byed pa tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa bos gang rtul ba las byung ba 'di rnams rigs dang /_pha rol gnon par byed pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang 
[\[157a.2\]]chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/phyag na rdo rje gsungs shig_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/phyag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[157a.3\]]khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas so/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag gi sor mo rab tu brkyang ste/_rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang /_rdo rje khu tshur dang /_rdo rje dmar po dang /_rdo rje mthar phyin dang /_rdo rje nag po ste g.yon pa'i phyag las byung ba 'di 
[\[157a.4\]]rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i spun rnams so/_/de nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[157a.5\]]gzhon nu'i spun lnga po rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal ba ste/_sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_dngos grub sbyin par byed pa sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen po sbyin pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba pad+ma'i phyag la mnga' 
[\[157a.6\]]bdag tu gyur pa'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to/_/gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang ni/_/ji srid khru ni brgyad kyi bar/_/nor 'dod pa yis khru gcig ste/_/bu 'dod pa yis khru gnyis so/_/dgra nyams byed 
[\[157a.7\]]bas khru gsum mo/_/bzlas pa nyid kyis khru bzhi'o/_/lnga pa dngos grub thams cad la/_/brgyad pa mkha' la 'gro ba yis/_/sa 'og don dang 'bab chu dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni dngos grub gnas/_/khyim du'ang rung ste gtsang ma yi/_/gzhan du 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]g.yogs par byas pa dang /_/las la shis pa gang rung gis/_/thig gis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/gru bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa/_/sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor cha gsum byas pa yis/_/steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[157b.2\]]sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdan gnas pa/_/chos ston par ni mdzad bzhin pa/_/g.yas su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blugs phyag_/g.yon du 'phags pa phyag rdo rje/_/rdo rje'i phyag gam de gzhogs su/_/khyab 'jug 
[\[157b.3\]]dung dang 'khor lo ste/_/be con phyag na 'khor lo'o/_/dbus kyi cha ru gru la zhon/_/gru yi srog shing sgreng ba'o/_/dang bor rdo rje rab 'joms dang /_/sgyu 'phrul dang ni tum bu ru/_/gnyis par rdo rje khu tshur dang /_/rgyal mar bcas pa'o gsum pa 
[\[157b.4\]]ru/_/lus dmar dang ni rnam rgyal bcas/_/bzhi par rdo rje bsags mtha' dang /_/mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru/_/lto nag gzhan mi thub dang bcas/_/ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang /_/ser po nag po [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/lha rnams dgod 
[\[157b.5\]]par byas nas ni/_/dkar po'i gos dang dkar po'i rgyan/_/be con rdo rje gtun shing dang /_/gzhu dang ral gri mtshon cha'i phyag_/dbus su zla nyi pad+ma la/_/lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya/_/gru yi 'og tu me dang ni/_/chu yi gter ni gnas par 
[\[157b.6\]]bya/_/dung dang nya dang chu srin gyis/_/rnam par brgyan pa'i shar dang lho/_/nub dang byang du dbang po dang /_/gshin rje chu lha lus ngan rnams/_/bzhon pa bcas shing phyag rgyar bcas/_/legs par dkris pa'i bum pa ni/_/dri yi chu yis yongs su bkang /_/
[\[157b.7\]]yal 'dab kyis ni nye bar mdzes/_/grwa rnams su ni dgod par bya/_/'dir ni bum pa lnga pa ni/_/rin chen gyis brgyan 'jam pa yi/_/gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa dang /_/sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab kyis/_/kha ni dgab par byas pa dang /_/gdugs 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]sgreng me tog phreng ba dpyangs/_/shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya/_/dkyil 'khor phyi ru rgya mtsho bzhi/_/dung dang pad+ma la sogs kyis/_/ri yi rtse mo yis kyang bya/_/rgyal mtshan rnams 'khrugs bla re bres/_/in+d+ra nI la gser dang ni/_/dngul dang zangs 
[\[158a.2\]]dang lcags rnams kyi/_/phye mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/lha yi me tog bdug pas bdug_/rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod/_/dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras/_/dbyig gser sna tshogs rin chen dang /_/bza' ba phyi rol gcal du dgram/_/ri 
[\[158a.3\]]bo'i steng du rab 'jug bya/_/snying po phyi mas spyan drang sogs/_/las rnams kun dang gshegs su gsol/_/de nas gang gis dkon mchog gsum/_/dad pas byang chub sems bskyed de/_/bud med skyes pa gzhon nu yi/_/bsnyen gnas byas pa gos 
[\[158a.4\]]kyis ni/_/gdong ni nye bar bcings pa yis/_/dam tshig gis kyang mnyan par gyis/_/dbyig dang gser gyi me tog gis/_/lag pa yis kyang dor bar bya/_/de ni gang du lhung gyur pa/_/de yi rigs 'gyur de nas ni/_/gdong phye lha rnams bstan par bya/_/
[\[158a.5\]]sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang 'gyur/_/yang na nyin dang mtshan mo ru/_/dkyil 'khor de bri mnyes par 'gyur/_/de nas gzugs brnyan 'byung ste/_a shwat+tha dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_u dum bA ra zhi ba can dang /_tsU ta dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_nA ga ge sar 
[\[158a.6\]]gyis rgyas pa can dang /_bil ba dang /_a riSh+Ta dang /_ko Tha yis mngon spyod can no/_/dbang du byed pa dang skal ba ngan pa rnams la bad kan mthar byed dang /_shasma li dang /_dIr+g+ha bit+ta 'o/_/smyo bar byed pa la tsan+dan dang /_mya ngan med pa'i shing dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_myos byed 
[\[158a.7\]]rnams so/_/skal ba bzang po nyid la as+thi dat+ta las byung ba rnams so/_/las thams cad pa la gser las byung ba'o/_/rgyal srid 'dod pas ni dngul las byung ba'o/_/zangs ni skal ba bzang po'i ched du'o/_/lcags las byung ba ni mngon spyod can no/_/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]nyams par byed pa la tsam pa ka dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_ba gu la dang /_a ti muk+ta ka'o/_/nor 'dod pa yis ni sna ma dang /_yu thi ka dang /_mal+li ka dang /_myos byed dang /_gser shing dang /_mA li ka rnams so/_/skal ba bzang po 'dod pas ni pad+ma 
[\[158b.2\]]dang /_/ku mu da'o/_/zhi ba can la ut+pa la dang /_so'u gan+d+hi ka'o/_/rgyas pa can dang /_gzhan la yang dri bzang po can gyi me tog go/_/rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i me tog go/_/mngon spyod can dang nyams par byed pa la sogs pa la ni tsan+dan la sogs 
[\[158b.3\]]pa'i dri 'phrog pa'o/_/zhi ba can dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_skal ba bzang po nyid la de lta bu'i bdug pa lag pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnams kyi las bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pA ba ta ye/_
[\[158b.4\]]na mash+tsa tuR+nAM b+ha gi nI nAM/_na mo de ba tum+bu ru sAR+tha kA ha ya/_dzam+b+ha ni/_dzam+b+hi ka ro ti a mi traM/_staM b+ha ni/_staM b+hi ka ro t+ya/_mi traM/_mo ha ni/_mo hI ka ro t+ya mi traM/_an+d+ha ni/_in+d+hi ka ro t+ya mi traM/_dza ye A gats+tsha bi dza ya A gats+tsha dzam+b+ha ni A gats+tsha stam+b+ha ni A gats+tsha/_
[\[158b.5\]]ba li ba li/_puSh+pa/_d+hU pa/_u pa hA raM/_pra ti gr-ih+Na thA/_sa mA ya yu pA lA yA thA/_su Tu Tu su sla badzra b+hany+dza nI ya swA hA/_rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_phug tu rab tu 'jug pa dang /_
[\[158b.6\]]gter 'pho bar byed pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang /_mig sman ldong ros sgrub pa dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_nyams par byed pa dang /_gzhan rab tu 'joms pa dang /_rang gi yul so sor skyong ba dang /_dug dang /_pho nya dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_
[\[158b.7\]]mche ba rab bsnams la yang dag par gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste/_de lta bu la sogs pa'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o/_/sring 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa khru bzhi pa gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa/_kun nas rta babs kyis brgyan pa/_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan rnams bzhon pa dang bcas mtshon cha dang bcas 
[\[159a.2\]]pa'i sgo skyong dang gsum byed du gzhug go/_/byang gi rab tu thob par bya ste cha gsum byas nas steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'o/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rje yang phyag g.yon pas rdo rje dang g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/_kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[159a.3\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon du rdo rje lcags kyu lag na thogs pa/_gzhan du rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags sgrog lag na thogs pa/_thams cad kyang ri'i rtse mo la yang dag par gnas par bya'o/_/dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa/_
[\[159a.4\]]khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par bri'o/_/gzhan rnam pa gsum rim gyis mtshon cha dang /_gnas dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/b+h+r-ing gi ri ti dang /_nag po chen po rnams so/_/nub tu mi sbyin dang /_tum bu ru dang /_'od srung dang /_sna 
[\[159a.5\]]tshogs bshes gnyen lag pa rnams ril ba spyi blugs dang /_chu snod phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/khron pa dang srog shing sgreng ba dang /_ta ta spu bri'o/_/stod g.yogs ljang gu can lag na be con thogs pa cod pan gyis brgyan pa phyag na tog skyong bsnams pa/_
[\[159a.6\]]rna ba la rgya skyegs kyis brgyan pa'o/_/rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa/_stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can no/_/rnam par rgyal ba lus dmar po phyag na gtun shing thogs pa/_gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs can/_gser gyi kha dog can 
[\[159a.7\]]gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa nag mo gos khra bo'i stod g.yogs can/_gos nag po'i sham thabs can phyag na ral gri thogs pa gru la zhon pa'o/_/de nas zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_lha rnams dang /_nang du pad+ma rab tu gtor ba 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]bri bar bya'o/_/byang gi sgo ru log 'dren chen po g.yas kyi gzhogs su chu bo rab med khor yug tu rdo rje dang /_dung dang /_la da dang /_dpal be'u rnams kyang kun tu bri'o/_/de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te de nas ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang /_thug 
[\[159b.2\]]pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang /_bza' ba rnam pa lnga dang /_k+t+rany+tsa mang po dang /_bza' dkris pa'i bag zan dang /_dzam+bu li ka dang /_zho dang /_bu ram dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi ji ltar rigs pa dbul bar bya'o/_/chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar 'dod pa'i yal 'dab 
[\[159b.3\]]kyis kha bkab pa dang /_bum pa dri'i chu thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba sa bon thams cad dang /_sman thams cad dang /_yal 'dab dang /_gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa/_dbyig dang /_gser dang rin po che rnams dang /_yal 'dab kyis brgyan 
[\[159b.4\]]pa'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang /_phyi ru rin po che rnams kyis mngon par bkram pa'o/_/de lta bu la sogs pa'i bkra shis pa rnams byas nas phyi nas bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas sngon du slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste/_'di las gzhan pa'i sngags 
[\[159b.5\]]su 'gyur ba ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mash+tsa tuR+b+ha gi nI nAM ma ma dza yA ya/_mA he ti swA hA/_sngags 'di rnam pa brgyad kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/_/me tog dang /_yungs kar dang /_
[\[159b.6\]]lan tshwa dang /_chu dang thal bas dri med nyid sun 'byin pa'i cha byad kyis kyang ngo /_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsa N+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mo bi dza yA ya/_ha ha/_d+ha li/_ku mA ra ni piSh+Nu mu khe ra Te sha swA hA/_rig pa 'di 'bum bzlas 
[\[159b.7\]]pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas brgya byin gyi gnam lcags phog pa'i shing blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par gyur nas/_gang du mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa der song nas bum pa bzhi po thams cad kyang me tog dang 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]yal 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa bzhag par bya'o/_/de nas ku sha bting zhing bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor lcags gsum bcings pa'i phur bu'am rkang pa g.yon pa lag pa g.yon pas mnan te/_ji srid du lag pa mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du 
[\[160a.2\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/lag pa gtang bar yang mi bya'o/_/de nas phur bu de dgon par gdab par bya ste/_phur bu khyim du 'byung ngo /_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis btab nas phur bu rkang pa g.yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis shig_/grong khyer 'jig pa'i 
[\[160a.3\]]lag pa btsir bas phyag rgya thams cad dang /_dug byas pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed do/_/skye bo'i nang du yang gdab par byaste thams cad du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnams byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra 
[\[160a.4\]]pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na ma sh+tsa ta sr-i NAM/_b+ha gi nI nAM/_na ma stum+bu ru sar+b+ba ba ha s+ya/_ma hA kaR+Na s+ya/_pi tsi pi tsi/_a mu kA ya/_b+haR+ga pra pa tAn+tu swA hA/_nag po'i brgyad pa'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas 
[\[160a.5\]]pas sngags 'di thod par khrag gis bri bar bya'o/_/stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags par byas nas chu la dor bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mash+tsa 
[\[160a.6\]]ta sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/_na mo dzam+b+ha ni tsA Tu tsA Tu tsA Tu tsA Tu swA hA/_rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu na le sham gsum khar bcug ste/_stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas na le sham gcig khar rab tu bcug ste/_gang 
[\[160a.7\]]mig mi 'dzums par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mash+tsa ti sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/_na mastu m+bu ru ma hA sAR+tha bA hA ya/_na mo dza ye bi dza ye a ji te a pa rA dzi te swA hA/_rig 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]pa 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am/_nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/_mar me dang rgyal mtshan dang phreng ba la sogs pa phul te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te chu rang 
[\[160b.2\]]nyid kyis blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste thun gcig tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de 'thungs shing khrus byas nas cho ga de nyid kyis tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo zos nas de lta bu brgyad zlos shig_/de nas phyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnams 
[\[160b.3\]]kha ru rab tu 'jug par byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_namash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/_na mash+tsa ta sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/_tan+t+ri mi li mi li swA hA/_rig pa 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te lag pa 
[\[160b.4\]]g.yas pas khu tshur byas nas nyi ma bcu gsum du bzlas par bya'o/_/dug dang mche bas shi ba thams cad slong ba 'jug par byed do/_/khu tshur gyis gdon rnams 'bebs par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa 
[\[160b.5\]]ta ye/_na mash+tsa ta sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nA/_na mastu m+bu ru/_sar+b+ba ma hA ya/_su Tu su Tu badzra pra b+hany+dza nI ye swA hA/_sngags 'dis ba byung gi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas der ba sha ka'i yam shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa sbyin sreg stong 
[\[160b.6\]]phrag brgyad gyis shig_/nag po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du'o/_/gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed do/_/'dis kyang khros pas rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/_kun tu rgyu rab tu zhugs nas de la sol bas 
[\[160b.7\]]mngon par bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyag rgya rab 'chad byed/_/dge ba'i lag pa las kun la/_/las gang cung zad bya ba de/_/kun la lag pa g.yon sbyar bya/_/
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]mthe bong can la bzung ba yi/_/phyag rgya lha yir yongs su bsgrags/_/sdigs mdzub can ni gnod sbyin la/_/dri za la ni gung mo ste/_/'byung po rnams la ming med do/_/klu la lag pa mthe'u chung /_/srin po rnams la mthil du'o/_/dbyug pa'i 
[\[161a.2\]]phyag rgya [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams/_/phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad du bshad/_/mthe bong rdo rje rab 'joms pa/_/sdigs mdzub rdo rje khu tshur te/_/gug mo rdo rje lus dmar la/_/mthe chung nag po'i yan lag can/_/mthe bong tum+bu ru zhes 'di/_/rang gi gzugs kyis rang rang la/_/
[\[161a.3\]]phyag rgya lnga po rnam par dgod/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[161a.4\]]par mdzad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du ji ltar bya ba bstan du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[161a.5\]]rigs kyi bu legs so/_/des na gang rig pa 'dzin pa bkrus bzhin pa rig pa de rjes su dran par byas nas rig pa med par khrus bya ba dang /_rnam par dben pa'i phyogs ma yin par bzlog pa nyid de rnams ni lus rtsub pa dang /_stobs chung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[161a.6\]]lam du 'gro ba grong pa'i chos kyis gos pa rnams la yid kyis bzlas pa byed do/_/rtag tu sems g.yo ba dang /_nad mang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du 'pho ba dang /_gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang /_
[\[161a.7\]]sbyin sreg dang bral bas bzlas pa byed pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang /_grogs nyams par yang 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa rang gi rig pa la brnyas pa byed pa dang /_lha la spyod par byed pa ni log par 'dren pa dang skrag par byed do/_/rtag tu 'jig rten 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang bdug spos la 
[\[161b.2\]]sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya bkur stir bya'o/_/dam tshig med pa dang srog gcod par byed pa dang /_sngags byed pa dang /_dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_tshul dang bral bas dge 'dun gyi rdzas la yongs su 
[\[161b.3\]]longs spyod pa dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang la yongs su 'gro ba dang /_dge slong ngam dge slong ma gsod par byed pa dang /_zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /_dam tshig med par khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang /_'thor bar byed pa dang /_dam 
[\[161b.4\]]tshig med pa shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang /_dam tshig med pa dang /_dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang /_sngags sbyin par byed pa dang /_de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang /_dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[161b.5\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha gzhan rnams la yang dri med nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang /_dam tshig med par dung dang /_'khor lo dang /_rtse gsum kha gdengs dang /_be con dang /_mdung dang /_rdo rje dang /_phub dang /_gzhu dang /_gshol dang /_
[\[161b.6\]]gtun shing dang /_mda' dang /_mdung thung dang /_glang po che dang /_khyu mchog dang /_bong bu dang /_phag dang /_sha ra b+ha dang /_seng ge dang /_bya gag dang /_rma bya dang /_ma he dang /_rnga mo dang /_ngang pa dang /_mi dang /_lha'i bzhon pa dang /_mtshon cha sna 
[\[161b.7\]]tshogs pa rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang /_sna tshogs byed pa mthong nas rkang pas gnon par byed pa dang /_rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa dang dngos grub ster bar mi byed do/_/bza' ba'i cho ga yang 'dir til dang /_sha dang /_par+pa Ta dang /_dzam+bu li ka dang /_nya dang 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]spu pa li ka mang po dang /_til gyi thug pa dang /_lha bshos dang /_dri med nyid bza' ba yang spang bar bya'o/_/lha'i dri med nyid gnon pa dang /_pad+ma gnon pa dang /_chu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang /_ut+pal gnon pa dang /_nags kyi bdag po gcod pa dang /_rtsa 
[\[162a.2\]]pa 'byin par byed pa yang spang bar bya'o/_/rig pa rjes su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu gos gtsang ma bgos pas bya ba thams cad la bstan pa nyid dang /_gzhan rig pa'i cho ga thams cad la mchod par byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slar yang byang chub sems 
[\[162a.3\]]dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa/_ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar 
[\[162a.4\]]yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_g+hu ni g+hu ni la la la sid+d+he sid+d+he/_pA ra kra ma swA hA/_a mi tA b+hA su ta swA hA/_sar+b+bai sh+tsa Ar+ya a ba lo ki te swA hA/_'di ni 'phags ma zla ba ma 
[\[162a.5\]]zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nu mo ste las thams cad byed pa'o/_/sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug pud bcing ba dang /_phyag rgya bcing ba yang bya'o/_/bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o/_/de la 'di ni tho rangs langs nas gtsang mar gyur 
[\[162a.6\]]pas dkyil 'khor byas nas me tog la sogs pa gtor te/_lnga brtson pas brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par byed do/_/yang na gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do/_/de nas dkyil 'khor du tse trA dzi kaM rab tu gtor nas gang 'dod pa de skrod par byed 
[\[162a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bklags pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir rnam grangs kyi gter 'dir de dag gcig tu reg pa de dran par byed do/_/de nas gshed byed skyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gis me 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]rab tu sbar te dar chen pos bskor la/_ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma bdun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga ro can gyi gshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas lang bar byed do/_/yang dag par bsngags pas ji ltar brjod pa'i gnas su yang byin gyis brlabs pa sbyin par 
[\[162b.2\]]bya'o/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon par bde bar byed do/_/de nas gnas kha cig tu mi rnams 'chi ba dang /_gnas kha cig tu me 'bar bar mthong ba dang /_gnas kha cig tu lcags sgrog bcings pa mthong ngo /_/de ltar 
[\[162b.3\]]gshed byed de rnam par rgyu bar byed do/_/de zhi ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/_/mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra rnams skyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar te yungs kar dkar po la 
[\[162b.4\]]til nag po'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/'gro bar byed do/_/de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'dod na dur khrod kyi me la dur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/rims chen pos 'dzin to/_/zhi ba'i don du chu la brgya 
[\[162b.5\]]rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par bya'o/_/rims las grol lo/_/mgo bo zug rngus 'dzin par 'dod na ba byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bor phur bus gdab bo/_/mgo bo zug rngu chen pos 'dzin to/_/phur bu bton pas zhi 
[\[162b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po la btab na ma ning du 'gyur ro/_/bton na thar ro/_/snying gar btab na gzer chen por 'gyur ro/_/bton na thar ro/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu sha dang khrag gis btags pa srad bus dkris pa la brgyad brgya bzlas pa mi rus kyi phur bu'i mgo 
[\[162b.7\]]bor gdab par bya'o/_/dgra'i sgor btab na tho rangs 'bros par byed do/_/ji srid phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar du gang du'ang gnas par mi byed do/_/rgyal po skyed par 'dod na lha chen po'i khang par song nas lha la dug dang khrag gis byugs te sha chen po'i bdug pa dbul 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/nim pa'i 'dab mas kyang mchod par bya'o/_/de nas dug dang /_khrag dang /_skye tshe rnams gcig tu byas nas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig_/brgyad brgya dang pos rang gi sha'o/_/gnyis pas me tog go/_/gsum pas btsun mo'i 
[\[163a.2\]]'khor ro/_/bzhi pas mtshon cha chen po'o/_/lnga pas glang po che'o/_/drug pas ma he ste/_khro bo chen pos bkris pa'i las so/_/blo bzang po nyid nyams par byed par 'dod na/_nim pa'i shing gis me sbar nas nim pa'i lo ma dang /_dur khrod kyi thal ba phan tshun bsres pas 
[\[163a.3\]]sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/skad cig la nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lkugs par byed par 'dod na/_ka sa ma ya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te dgra bo yid la byas nas kha la phur bu gdab par bya'o/_/lkugs 
[\[163a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/phur bu bton na thar ro/_/mngon spyod can rdzogs so//_//ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung ste/_so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o/_/ma blangs par bza' ba rnyed do/_/brgyad brgyar bzlas nas mgo bo la byugs pas skye 
[\[163a.5\]]bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gos la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas gon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/mig sman la mngon par bsngags nas mig la bskus na khro bas dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lam du zlos bzhin par song 
[\[163a.6\]]ma chom rkun rnams kyis 'joms mi nus so/_/sor mo la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/_/gseg ma la brgyad brgyar bzlas nas chu la gtor na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcings pa lam 'gag pa la bzlas 
[\[163a.7\]]na thar ro/_/ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du nye bar byugs nas sa la mtshon cha sbyin par bya'o/_/gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do/_/khyor ba'i chu la bsngags nas steng du gtor bar bya ste dus ma yin pa'i char rengs par byed do/_/thal ba la brgyad 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]brgyar bzlas na thal pa 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/lcags kyi phye ma rdo'i ra bar 'gyur ro/_/sgron ma gsum gyis mar me'i ra bar 'gyur ro/_/bil ba'i 'dab mas bil ba'i ra bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyad brgyar bzlas pa'i chus chu'i ra bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor bsdus na bcom 
[\[163b.2\]]ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed do/_/rig pa bsgrubs pa las mtshams med pa las grol nas byang chub kyi sems rnyed do/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+Ni Sha/_a nA ba lo ki te mur+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi hU~M/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_
[\[163b.3\]]d+ha ka d+ha ka_/da ra bi dar/_tshin+da tshin+da/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_gzi brjid dang phung por rnam par bshad de/_'dab ma chung ngu'i rgyab tu gnas par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyud chung ngu las bris pa 'dab ma so so la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_gzhon 
[\[163b.4\]]nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la ras byed du bcug nas sam/_yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa ste ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba min pas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'khrul 'khor la bzhag ste/_
[\[163b.5\]]de'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dang /_khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar byas nas/_de nas arga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa ral pa gcig ma'i 
[\[163b.6\]]snying pos ras ris kyi spyan sngar khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/ras ris 'dri bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshes grangs dang /_byed pa dang /_rgyu skar dang /_yud tsam dge ba la snod sar par bzhag pa kha 
[\[163b.7\]]dog ma 'dres pa shin tu so sor btags pa'i kha dog gi chus sbyar nas ba lang gi spu'i pir gyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing ni sna tshogs pa'i gnas rab tu bsngags pa/_bya'i tshogs skad 'byin pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing dang mtshungs pa bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]med 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/_skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_mdzes par snang bzhin pa'i lus/_gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po gser gyi kha dog can 'phro ba/_pad+ma dkar 
[\[164a.2\]]po la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su dkar po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/_kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyi stod g.yogs pa gos pa/_phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o/_/gzhan du rgyu skar me bzhi la 'phags pa dri ma med pa 'gro ba 
[\[164a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'drir gzhug par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su thams cad dkar po gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_ral pa'i tshogs dang /_phyag na ril pa spyi blugs dang /_dbyug gu'i shing bsnams pa/_mchod phyir thogs pa phrag pa 
[\[164a.4\]]la 'phyang ba/_gos dkar po bgos pa/_mchog tu skyes pa/_sgrub pa po'i steng du phyag brkyang ba/_phyag bzhi pa/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba cung zad mngon par lhags pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das las cung zad dman 
[\[164a.5\]]pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/_gser dang rin po ches rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i lus can/_cod pan gyis brgyan pa/_rnam par bkra ba'i gos bgos pa/_rin po che'i 
[\[164a.6\]]stod g.yogs can/_lus cung zad 'dud pa/_bcom ldan 'das la lag pa kha sbyor byas pas ut+pa la sngon po yongs su bzung ba phyag mchog tu skyes pa dang por bcom ldan 'das la rtog par byed bzhin pa'i sgrol ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[164a.7\]]rtsa ba'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o/_/g.yon du 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba'o/_/gzhan du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g.yas su klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas mgo bdun pa/_phyag na pad+ma'i sdong po bsnams 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]pa/_thams cad dkar ba rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/g.yon du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sngo bsangs phyag na pad+ma'i sdong bu bsnams pa/_'di 'dra ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[164b.2\]]g.yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa dang nye bar dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_rin po che'i stod g.yogs can rin po che dang /_tsang+ga Ta ka phyag na bsnams pa/_pus mo sa la btsugs pa'i lha mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i 
[\[164b.3\]]g.yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa ba dang nye bar 'khod pa'i thams cad dkar mo gzhon nu'i gzugs can/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_thal mo kha sbyar du byas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das la nges par rtog bzhin pa'i bde ldan 'drir gzhug 
[\[164b.4\]]par bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du sgrub pa po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lta bar gyur pa gos dkar po'i stod g.yogs dang /_smad g.yogs can dang /_dbyibs dang /_rnam pa'i khyad par ji 'dra ba pus mo gnyis btsugs 
[\[164b.5\]]pa lag pa spos phor thogs pa bya'o/_/lha'i bu rnga bo che rdung bar byed bzhin pa bya'o/_/sprin las glog dang bcas pa bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi dang phyogs bral du yang bya'o/_/g.yas su ras ris kyi steng du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa 'drir 
[\[164b.6\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/steng du zla ba dang nyi ma rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/steng du dung dang rnga bo che dag go/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su nag mo gsus pa 'phyang ba/_rgyan thams cad pa/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_
[\[164b.7\]]stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_go zhes bya ba'i pags pas dkris pa/_gtsug phud la thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyang ba/_rdo ba la rab tu bzhugs pa/_sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa/_phyag bzhi pa g.yas kyi phyag gis dgra sta yongs su bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa'i dang 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pos khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i snod dang /_phyogs dang ldan pa'i lus la smin ma dang skrar ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/_sen mo ring po can glang po che'i pags pas stod g.yogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bka' rab 
[\[165a.2\]]tu nod par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sring mo chen mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de ltar ras ris 'drir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su dag pa dang /_skyong ba dang /_tshad ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par spangs pa/_rin po che dang chu klung gi 'gram mam/_gzhan 
[\[165a.3\]]du yang rung ste gtsang ma'i gan du'o/_/de nas du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed do/_/gang thabs cig gsang sngags byed pa de'o/_/lha thams cad gsal bar byed par 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa yang rung ste/_las brtsam par bya'o/_/gtsang ma'i sa'i phyogs su gzhu'i 
[\[165a.4\]]tshad kyi thang la yongs su byug par bya ste/_de'i dbus su so phag gzhag par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi rnams su sa las byung ba'i rtsa ba nag po med pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhi la brgyad brgyar bsngags pa gzhag par bya'o/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu tshon sna lnga las legs par 
[\[165a.5\]]dkris pa'o/_/dri zhim pa'i phye mas dkyil 'khor byas/_phyogs bzhir chang dang sha med pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/dri bzang ba'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o/_/gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo/_/zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhan nas 'gram gyi phye ma rnams la nye 
[\[165a.6\]]bar gzhag par bya'o/_/shar du mngon par phyogs pas phyi rol du dkyil 'khor du ral pa gcig ma la mchod pa dang /_gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas gos dkar po gcig 'chang bar byas te/_ji srid du rkang pa gnyis kyi bar de srid du bya ba 
[\[165a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas mar gyi snod kyi steng du ku sha des dor bar bya'o/_/de nas mar chung ngu de la gal te dri ma dang sen mo dang skra mthong na gang dang gang gcig tu bya'o/_/ji srid du rang 'dod pa dang smra ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o/_/de nas bum pa re re blangs te zlos bzhin pas 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gzhag par bya'o/_/sbyangs pa'i snod nges par gnas pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byed du gzhug go/_/'di la yang 'di'i sku mnye sbyin par bya'o/_/pri yang ku dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_sbrang rtsi can dang /_tu ruSh+ka rnams 
[\[165b.2\]]gcig tu byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te bsku bar bya'o/_/ba'i mar dang bsres pa'i bza' ba mchog bza' bar bya'o/_/nad med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu sngon por btsos pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas 
[\[165b.3\]]bcing bar bya ste mig gi nad zhi'o/_/mgrin pa la bcings na skyugs pa sel bar byed do/_/srad bu 'di nyid kyi ras yug 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o/_/stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa gyad kyi lus la bcing bar bya ste/_g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 
[\[165b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te bcom ldan 'das ma la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas ba'i mar gyi sgron me dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub shing gi me sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lan bdun mngon par 
[\[165b.5\]]bsngags pa'i sra rtsi pog gis sreg blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de'i nad yun ring por nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gcig 
[\[165b.6\]]gis blangs nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i seng ge dang /_stag gi mdog can gyi bgegs rnams nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o/_/de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyogs su khrag sgrub par byed pa nye bar thogs te las 
[\[165b.7\]]brtsam par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhin rgya skyegs kyi lo ma la 'dug pa'i bgegs rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/bgegs rnams kyi dbus su bgegs chen po log par 'dren pa gzhag par bya'o/_/lan cig mngon par bsngags pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma de rnams kyis 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]thog mar dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o/_/me tog dmar po dang dri dmar pos mngon par mchod par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o/_/rgya skyegs kyi khu ba phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad 
[\[166a.2\]]du mngon par bsngags pa'am brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i sred bu dmar pos bgegs thams cad la g.yas skor du dkri bar bya'o/_/de nas bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po bcing bar bya ste/_de rnams kyi dbus su u dum bA ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas bgegs 
[\[166a.3\]]bcing bar bya'o/_/zhes brjod nas swA hA'i yi ges be'u'i lci ba la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/de nas sgrub pa po de'i bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro/_/rig pa thams cad sgrub par 
[\[166a.4\]]byed bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams ni de rnams kyis bya bas bas log par 'dren pa chen po gcig tu bzhag nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbul lo/_/srung ba thams cad kyang ngo /_/bdug pa ni log 'dren chen po rnams la 
[\[166a.5\]]ka ra bI ra dmar po dang /_tsan+dan dmar po dbul lo/_/gegs thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la mchod yon dbul lo/_/log par 'dren pa dang bcas pa la gu gul dang mar bsres pas mchod yon dbul lo/_/de nas lte ba'i tshad du dong brko bar bya'o/_/
[\[166a.6\]]de so so so sor bcug nas slar yangs pa'i sar bya'o/_/de ltar rig pa 'dzin pa'i bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dus la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas 
[\[166a.7\]]nas/_u dum bA ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te tshangs pa'i yam shing gis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig_/nyi ma brgya phrag gcig gam/_nyi ma brgya phrag gnyis su tsA ru bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/khru bzhi'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]nye bar byugs te 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/bram ze dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tsA ru'i sreg blugs gyis shig_/rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zho'i sreg blugs gyis shig_/rje rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nas kyi sreg 
[\[166b.2\]]blugs gyis shig_/dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i don du nyi ma brgya phrag gcig go/_/dgra la bltas nas bzlas par bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro/_/ma sha ka'i yam shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa rnams thun gsum 
[\[166b.3\]]du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gang la bltas nas bzlas pa de las su mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_/dug thams cad la 'dod pas bya ba par bya'o/_/zhu mkhan gyi ril bu la lan bdun 
[\[166b.4\]]mngon par bsngags nas mig dag par bya ste/_mig nad nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la srad bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya ste/_grol bar byed do/_/nad pa la bcing bar bya ste/_gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyur 
[\[166b.5\]]ro/_/thal ba la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/_/bu ma thon pa la til mar la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/rmongs pa mngal gyi dus tshod la bzlas pa la khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar la lan bdun mngon par 
[\[166b.6\]]bsngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin no/_/bza' ba mchog dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o/_/bu skye bar byed do/_/de nas bu mo mang po can gyis yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/thal ba de bum pa bzhi chus kun tu bkang nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa dkyil 
[\[166b.7\]]'khor du gsum gzhag par bya'o/_/skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/'di'i bu 'chi ba yang med do/_/shu dag la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas te lag pa g.yon la bcings na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog thun gsum du stong 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]phrag sbyin sreg gyis shig_/phyogs gcig la g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mdud pa bdun bya'o/_/lag pa la bcings nas brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug 
[\[167a.2\]]mthu med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug la swA hA'i yi ge'i bar du khyor ba'i chu blangs nas brgyad brgyar ba sngags te btung ba sbyin par bya'o/_/dug nyal ba yang slong bar byed do/_/de nas ma langs na phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par bsngags pa 
[\[167a.3\]]byas te btung ba sbyin par bya'o/_/'jog pos kyang mche ba'i dug slong bar byed do/_/stan gan+ti ka la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas la byug pa sbyin par bya'o/_/ma bcings par yang de nyid du skam par byed do/_/tshor ba med par byed do/_/yams kyis nye bar 'tshe 
[\[167a.4\]]ba rnams la grong ngam grong khyer gyi dbus su mtshan mo phyed nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyi thang la nye bar byug pa bya ste/_dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin nas dri dang me tog lag pa'i gtor ma byin te lo ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad 
[\[167a.5\]]sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma gsum gyi grong gsum gyi dang /_nyi ma bdun gyis khong ba'i yams nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/de nas nye bar zhi bar ma gyur na 'dir nyi ma bdun du bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas/_ak+Sha'i til mar gyis btags pa'i 'bras 
[\[167a.6\]]yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma gsum la 'phral gyi yams nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/thal bas 'gram bcings te zlos bzhin pas gang mthong ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang ma bsgrubs par yang bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris 
[\[167a.7\]]kyi spyan sngar 'gyur ro/_/cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar zla ba nya la gzugs brnyan la dang por nag po phyogs la mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/_arga'i yam shing gis me sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas thun 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]gsum du mdzub mo'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du gyis shig_/de nas grub par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i sbyor bas stong phrag gsum du bzlas par bya'o/_/stong phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya ste las gzhan rnams su 'gyur ro/_/'dis 
[\[167b.2\]]sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na/_bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa byas nas/_byang chub shing gi yam shing la ing+gu da'i til mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg 
[\[167b.3\]]gyis shig_/nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis grul bum dbang du 'gyur ro/_/til btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/'byung po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i dum bu can stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis 
[\[167b.4\]]shig_/sha za dbang du 'gyur ro/_/wa Ta'i shing gi yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bal gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/'o thug dang /_tsA ru dang /_til gyi thug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg gyis 
[\[167b.5\]]shig_/rigs bzhi dbang du byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/lha chen po rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo gtsang mar langs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg dang bzlas pa gyis shig_/phyogs 
[\[167b.6\]]gcig la 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/zla bas 'ching ba chen po las grol bar byed do/_/til dang piN+d+ya ka'i sbyin sreg gis khro ba nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/yang na til gyi sbyin sreg gis so/_/gos 'dod pas dUr ba'i myu gu'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/gos zung 
[\[167b.7\]]brgya rnyed do/_/thun mong ba'i skyes bu dbang du byed pa la go be traM gi sbyin sreg gyis shig_/sbrang bum chu [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]mchu bcing ba la sA la'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/stag gi mthu bcing ba la/_gi ri kaR+Ni ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/seng ge'i mchu bcing ba la sing 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]ha kaR+Ni ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/sprul rnams la nA ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig_/zhi ba'i don du sA la'i lo ma dang /_'o ma can gyi yam shing gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du
