[\[188b.2\]]dran pa mchog gis dmigs par byas la ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/sems dpa' chen po byon pa dang /_sa g.yo ba dang /_ri'i rtse mo nyil ba dang /_
[\[188b.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_lha thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par byed pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams rin po che chen po'i char 
[\[188b.4\]]rab tu 'bebs pa dang /_lha ma yin thams cad ut+pa la'i char rab tu 'bebs par byed do/_/drag po thams cad khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba pa rnams kyang skad cig de la bde ba skyes te/_mchog tu 'jigs pa smra bar byed do/_/dri za rnams glu 
[\[188b.5\]]snyan pa'i sgra thos par byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang rang gi rig pas yongs su bskor te ji ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do/_/log 'dren thams cad dang /_bgegs thams cad dang /_srin po thams 
[\[188b.6\]]cad dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad dang /_ji srid du drag po sna tshogs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' byon pa mthong nas zhi ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/sprin las gu lu gu lu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang sa rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang /_phyogs bzhi skyong ba rnams byang 
[\[188b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do/_/log par 'dren pa thams cad dang bgegs thams cad 'ongs te phyogs bzhi rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung 'gro ba dang /_drag po rab tu 'gro bar byed/_dus ma yin par shing la me tog tu 'gyur ro/_/'jig 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ongs te phyogs gang du rig pa 'dzin pa sgrub pa byed pa der sems dpa' chen po'i dga' ston la thams cad nyid 'dus so/_/sgrub pa pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong nas mchod yon phul nas 
[\[189a.2\]]phyag bya'o/_/lha thams cad dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad la mchod yon dang gdan phul nas de nas lha thams cad dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa po/_/byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te srid pa gsum gyi chu bo chen po las bsgral 
[\[189a.3\]]bar byas pa de rnams nges par rgyal ba kun tu snang bas mnan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang lhan cig 'tsho ba'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g.yas pa/_sgrub 
[\[189a.4\]]pa po'i spyi bor nyug par mdzad do/_/de nas sgrub pa pos gang yid la snying po bsam pa der 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lha nyid gang 'dod pa de rnams ches gzhan du snang ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[189a.5\]]ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gru 'dzin deng mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po phyag g.yas pas bzung ste rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin la yang dag par gtad par gyur to/_/gru 'dzin du song shig_/gang 'dod pa de 
[\[189a.6\]]sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas pa sgrub pa po'i lag pa g.yas bzung nas rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am 
[\[189a.7\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i tshogs la me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_rnga dang /_rdza rnga kha gcig pa dang /_rdza rnga rnams sgra 'byin bzhin du gru 'dzin du 'gro bar byed do/_/rgya mtsho'i steng der rgya 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]mtsho chen po rig pa'i rgyal pos mthong nas skyes bu dam pa de yang chu klung thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rin po che'i mchod yon rab tu stsol bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/legs so zhes bya ba yang gnang bar mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs par 'tsho ba 
[\[189b.2\]]dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas so/_/de nas rgya mtsho chen po bsgral nas gru 'dzin du song ste/_mthong ba dang der gang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[189b.3\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams thams cad mchod yon gyis snod kyi me tog gi char chen pos sgrub pa po la bsu ba la 'ong bar byed do/_/de nas gru 'dzin mthong nas sna tshogs pa'i nor bu dang sman gyis bskus pa/_
[\[189b.4\]]mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/_gser dang /_shel las byung ba dang /_baiNUr+ya las byung ba dang /_in+d+ra nI la las byung ba dang /_mthon ka chen po las byung ba'i them skas dang /_snam bu rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i me tog nye bar mdzes pas 
[\[189b.5\]]rig pa'i rgyal po dang /_sgrub pa po de la mngon par dbang bskur ba byas nas sgrub pa po la smras pa gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba khang pa dbus mar ji srid du byang chub kyi bar du rang gi gnas 
[\[189b.6\]]bzhin du kun tu spyod cing gnas so/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la mngon par dbang bskur te rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu bgrod par gyur to/_/'di ni dngos grub ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pas mtshams med pa byed pas kyang /_
[\[189b.7\]]'di 'grub par byed do/_/rta mgrin rgyal pos rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad la smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba dbus ma'i khang par rang gi gnas bzhin du gzhi la gnas pa'i rig pa 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]sgrol ma dang /_khro gnyer can dang /_gzhan rig pa thams cad pha rol gnon pa chen po'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni ma bsgrubs pa nyid du las byed de gtan pa gcod par byed pa dang /_hU~M yig gis rgya mtsho skems par byed pa dang /_sor mo'i sdigs 
[\[190a.2\]]mdzub kyis thams cad rengs par byed pa dang /_o~M yig gis 'gugs par byed pa dang /_phaT yig gis lhun po rnams yang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang /_yid kyis bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /_oM yig gis spyan drangs pa dang /_hU~M 
[\[190a.3\]]yig gis gshegs su gsol ba dang /_phaT yig gis gsod pa dang /_swA hA'i yi ges 'tsho bar byed pa ste/_mdor na rig pa rnams kyi cho ga ji snyed yod pa de thams cad rig pa 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/'di ni sngags 
[\[190a.4\]]thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong ba ste/_gang la cho ga med pa dang /_sdig pa byed pas kyang lan gsum du bzla'o/_/rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su gnang ba stobs dang pha rol gnon pa chen po 'di lan gsum gyis mtshams 
[\[190a.5\]]med pa byed pas kyang 'grub par byed do/_/dad pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung ba 'dod pa chen po dang /_snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_ser sna med pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos la mngon par dad pa dang /_ma dang /_pha dang /_
[\[190a.6\]]ma dang phar shes pa dang /_myur ba kho nar bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma bsgrubs par 'grub par yang byed do/_/mdor na las thams cad pa ni brjod nas rig gcod par 'dod pa dang /_sel bar 'dod pas 'di brjod nas te 'di ni las thams 
[\[190a.7\]]cad pa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gzhan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta ste/_rig pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i ched du rta mgrin rgyal po'i mgul du'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu rnam par 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so//_//de nas 'od dpag med mthong bar 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad cing skra dang bral ba'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser 
[\[190b.2\]]ltar ser pa/_pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs g.yon du rta mgrin rgyal po zhal rnam par 'gyur ba 'jigs par byed pa gsus pa 'phyang ba pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug pa/_me dmar ser 'bar ba 'phro 
[\[190b.3\]]bzhin pa/_rin po che'i phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs pa can/_lag 'gro'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_ral pa 'od dpag med 'dzin pa/_sor mos log par 'dren pa la sdigs par byed pa/_de'i rgyab nas log par 'dren pa 'bros par byed bzhin pa'o/_/g.yas 
[\[190b.4\]]kyi gzhogs su rnam par brgyan pa sbyangs pa'i snod dang /_gos dang phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od dpag med mgo bos 
[\[190b.5\]]'dzin par byed pa/_pha rol gnon pa'o/_/'od dpag med kyi steng gi sprin de la sprin gseb nas gnas gtsang ma me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma de yang klu gzhon nu rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o/_/'og tu 
[\[190b.6\]]lag na spos phor thogs pa'i sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis btsugs pa 'od dpag med la rnam par lta bzhin pa'o/_/ri mo'i las yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sgrub pa pos gtor ma dang /_mar me dang /_mchod pa rgya chen po byas te zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum 
[\[190b.7\]]du smyung bar gnas pas sbyangs pa'i snod dang gos 'di nyid kyis rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin bkug nas mchod yon phul te sgrub pa dang /_slar yang gshegs su gsol te ba ser skya'i mar dang /_pad+ma'i sa bon dang /_nA ga ge sar rnams gcig tu byas nas/_nyi ma bdun du 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]sbyin sreg gyis shig_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas smon lam gdab par bya ste/_ji srid du sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo ba dang /_mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /_sprin las gu lu gu lu'i 
[\[191a.2\]]sgra sgrogs pa dang /_me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char 'bebs pa dang /_dril bu'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa rings par bzlas par bya ste/_ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon 
[\[191a.3\]]pa rta mgrin rig pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa sa la 'ong ba de srid du'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos me tog dkar po dang /_dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod kyis mchod yon phul nas smon lam gdab po/_/'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod legs par 'ongs so/_/'phags pa spyan 
[\[191a.4\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i ched du slar yang legs par 'ongs so/_/rta mgrin 'di ni brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lan gsum 
[\[191a.5\]]bskor ba byas te pus mo btsugs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/khyod la snang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de rnams lhan cig 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nyug par mdzad de 'di skad ces 
[\[191a.6\]]gsungs so/_/skyes bu dam pa brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa khyod kyis gang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pas rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub pa legs so legs so/_/khyod cag gis mngon par 'dod pa smros shig_/mchog sbyin par bya'o/_/'di skad ces 
[\[191a.7\]]brjod par bya ste bcom ldan 'das bde ba can du 'gro bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od dpag med de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag g.yas 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]pa brkyang ste sgrub pa po phyag g.yas pas bzung nas rta mgrin rgyal po la yang dag par gtad par gyur to/_/rig pa'i rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di bzung nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig_/gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[191b.2\]]dpag med bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa der bstod du bcug nas slar yang gru 'dzin gang na yod pa der shog shig_/de nas rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bzung nas me tog gi char 'bebs pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 
[\[191b.3\]]song ste/_sgrub pa pos smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston pa la ltos shig ltos shig_/de nas rig pa'i rgyal pos de bstod du bcug nas slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 
[\[191b.4\]]gru 'dzin pa der 'ong bar mdzad do/_/de nas sgrub pa po 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi drung du chos nyan no/_/dngos grub 'di ni gnas ma yin pa rnams la gang sbyar bar mi bya ste/_gang zhig byed na dam tshig las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod nas mchog 
[\[191b.5\]]gi sgrub pa rnams la 'di gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu mi sbyor te de'i dam tshig med do/_/las de rnams thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byed du gzhug go/_/thal bas thal ba'i ra ba'o/_/sgron me gsum gyis me'i ra ba'o/_/chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags 
[\[191b.6\]]pas nam mkha' bcing ba'o/_/yungs kar dkar pos sa gzhi bcing ba'o/_/til gyi sbyin sreg gis log par 'dren pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/skye tshe'i sbyin sreg gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg 
[\[191b.7\]]gis khro bo thams cad 'grub par byed do/_/me tog thams cad tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg gis 'jig rten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/d+hu d+hu'i sbyin sreg gis dbang phyug chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/pri yang ku'i me tog dang /_mA lA ti 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]dang /_sau gan+d+hi dang /_gu gul ba ser skya'i mar dang lhan cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byed na rig pa thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_rkang gnyis dang /_rkang bzhi pa thams cad dbang du byed do/_/
[\[192a.2\]]gi wang la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas thig le byas te/_mche bas tha dad par za bar byed pa dang /_tha snyad las rgyal bar byed do/_/sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ba ser skya'i mar blangs nas lus la mngon par byugs te mer rab tu 'jug par byed do/_/seng ldeng 
[\[192a.3\]]las byung ba'i rdo rje blangs te/_hU~M yig dang lhan cig pas phug gi sgor lha ma yin gyi bu mo byung ba dang /_rab tu zhugs pa 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_gal te 'khor lo rab tu 'jug par byed na dam tshig dran pas hU~M yig gis phung pos 'khor lo phye mar byas par 
[\[192a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas ril bu'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/_rig pa 'dzin pa ril bu sgrub par byed pas tsan+dan dmar po dang /_me tog lnga pa dang /_pad+ma ge sar dang /_'bras sA lu dmar po'i phub ma dang /_kat+ni ka'i myu gu dang /_NU ka'i sa bon dang /_'bru dang /_ma sha'i myu gu dang /_
[\[192a.5\]]ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_tu ru Sh+ka'i til mar rnams gcig tu byas te/_cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba ser skya'i 'o ma la gso sbyong can gyis ser skya de la rnam par dben par rtsa ba'i sngags su bzlas nas khyim du btags te/_legs par 
[\[192a.6\]]btsags pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags nas nyi ma bdun spyad par bya'o/_/khyim du 'am rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su yang rung ste/_de nas srung ba byas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi des ba bzho bar bya'o/_/de nas 'o ma de gtsang ma'i phyogs rnam par dben par bum pa la bzlas 
[\[192a.7\]]par bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bram ze'i bu mo la srub par byed du gzhug go/_/mar des rdzas rnams btags pa byas te lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkris pa byas nas de yang ba ser skya'i ba byung lngar ril bur mtshan mo gcig tu bcug nas gzhag 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]par bya'o/_/de nas bton nas dri'i chu las gzhag par bya'o/_/bkrus te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gi wang gis byugs la gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas gtor ma dang /_mar me dang /_mchod pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 
[\[192b.2\]]byas te/_de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi ril bu brgyad blangs te pad+ma kha sbyor du bzhag nas ba ser skya'i mar de nyid mA la ti'i me tog dang gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang 
[\[192b.3\]]gi lha spyan drang ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid du du ba 'thul bar byed pa/_'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/du ba 'thul bzhin pas mi snang ba dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 
[\[192b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa'i 'od kyis rig pa 'dzin pa mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed do/_/lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi khyim du 
[\[192b.5\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/'di nyid kyis pad+ma'i sa bon dang /_paN+DI ta ka ra'i sa bon dang /_tu ruSh+ka dang /_a ga ru nag po dang /_tsan+dan dmar po dang /_sau gan+d+hi ka dang /_mA la'i me tog dang /_gur gum dang /_ldong ros dang /_gi wang rnams ba ser skya'i 
[\[192b.6\]]ba byung rnams gzhon nu ma gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas btags par bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas pri yang ku'i shing blangs nas khang pa brtsegs pa gtsang mar shing bzo ba gso sbyong can byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i lag pas 
[\[192b.7\]]za ma tog byed du gzhug go/_/za ma tog der ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bcug nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma yang phul nas za ma tog blangs te gos gtsang mas g.yogs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa rig pa'i lha rnams spyan drang 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]par byas nas ji srid du dro bar byed pa dang /_du ba 'thul bar byed pa dang /_'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dro bzhin pa la dbang du byed do/_/mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul bzhin pa la rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu'i mchog gcig go/_/
[\[193a.2\]]'bar bar byed pa ni rig pa 'dzin pa drug dang lhan cig 'gro ste/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lhun po'i rtse mor rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur yongs su spyod par byed do/_/lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i 
[\[193a.3\]]tshe nor chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/'di nyid kyis mig sman ldong ros sgrub par byed do/_/dkar po'i bco lnga la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i gi wang blangs nas mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas nyi ma gung la bram ze'i bu mo 
[\[193a.4\]]gso sbyong can gyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma ba ser skya'i 'o mas btags par bya'o/_/ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang par byas te/_mchod yon dang gdan phul nas pri yang 
[\[193a.5\]]ku'i me tog dang ba ser skya'i 'o mas sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg gyis shig lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas slar yang lha de rnams mdun du pad+ma kha sbyor du ril bu bcug nas ji srid du du ba 'thul ba dang /_dro bar byed pa dang /_'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas 
[\[193a.6\]]par bya'o/_/dro bzhin pa la ni thig le byas pa'i skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul bzhin pa la ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu 'bar bas thig le byas nas rig pa 'dzin pa drug gis yongs su bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis 
[\[193a.7\]]lhan cig rtse bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe nor chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig klu dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nya dang sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mA la 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]ti'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byed na lha mo chus byung dbang du 'gyur ro/_/pri yang ku'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gyis shig lha dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sau gan+d+hi ka'i sbyin sreg byed na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas 
[\[193b.2\]]gang gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa dang /_rims kyis btab pa dang /_srin pos zin pa'i mdun du ske tshe la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas sbyin sreg byed cing de'i thal bas snun par byed na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rta 
[\[193b.3\]]mgrin rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yang rdzogs so//_//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu bsgyings pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad du 'gyur ba de 'byung ste/_rig pa'i rgyal po gang la cho ga med pa de 
[\[193b.4\]]rnams cho ga 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa dang rtog pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyis thams cad byas te mdor na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang lan gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang dad pa dang ldan pa ser sna med pa g.yo med pa/_phra ma med pa/_
[\[193b.5\]]rig pa'i rgyal po la gus pa'i gang rtog pa pa la mchod par byed pa dang /_klog par byed pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_gzhan la stod par byed pa dang /_ser sna med par gyur nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs 
[\[193b.6\]]su zin pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'o/_/ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar rta mgrin rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'o/_/slar yang dus de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi cha nas mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten 
[\[193b.7\]]gyi khams na sgrol ma mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal bar bya ba dang /_bgrang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]brlabs pa'i stobs kyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gsang sngags thob pa gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di nyid du 'ongs nas 
[\[194a.2\]]ji ltar byung ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'phel ba'i stobs dang sgrub pas pad+ma'i gdan de la bzhugs so/_/de lta bu la sogs pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul 
[\[194a.3\]]phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'o/_/de nas mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud 
[\[194a.4\]]phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sngags kyis spyad pa la so sor rjes su rang ba'i ched dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_snga ba'i ched dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i ched dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[194a.5\]]'phags ma sgrol ma'i dngos grub kyi ched du bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma ak+Sho b+h+yA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/_
[\[194a.6\]]ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/_tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/_trA sa ni trA sa ni/_pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/_sar+b+ba kar+m+ma pa raM pa rA Ni swA hA/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da sUr+yA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+re/_ma ti/_tsan+d+re/_kar Ne/_mi 
[\[194a.7\]]lA mi lA/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_si li si li/_d+har+m+ma a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ki li ki li/_saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa bskal 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]par brjod de yid la byed par 'gyur ba de rtag tu bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur 'tsho bar byed do/_/skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHpuSh+pe ke ta be/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_
[\[194b.2\]]samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe puSh+pe su puSh+pe swA hA/_gzungs 'di me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te cho ga ji lta ba dang /_'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gtor bar 
[\[194b.3\]]bya'o/_/de'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHsarba ni bar Na/_biSh+kaM b+hi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_
[\[194b.4\]]s+phu Tan+du me/_sarba pA pA ni/_sarba bud d+ha sa t+ye/_d+harma sa t+ye na/_saM g+ha sa t+ye na/_in+d+ra sa t+ye na/_ba ru Na sa t+ye na/_ye lo ka sa t+ye na/_bir Na sa t+ye na/_sa t+ya sa tsa ne na s+phu Tan+tu/_sarba pA pA ni sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_mtshan mo nyi shu 
[\[194b.5\]]rtsa gcig gis las thams cad zad par byed do/_/nyin mo dang mtshan mo gsum byas nas drug tu rab tu sbyor bas mtshams med pa nges par zad par byed do/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo bai ro tsa nA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na ma A 
[\[194b.6\]]kA sha gar+b+hA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_hu ru hu ru/_bai ro tsa na/_ra smi sany+tso di de/_A gats+tsha Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/pU rA ya/_shu baM/_dar+sha ya/_bud d+ha pi Sha ya ra tsa ra tsa ra/_
[\[194b.7\]]tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/_'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pas 'grub pa ste/_skrag pa dang /_rgyan po dang /_dug dang /_dug brtan po dang /_byad stems dang /_rgyal po dang /_chom rkun la sogs pa rnams gnon par byed do/_/gang du bris 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pa gnas pa'am/_mgo dang lag pas bcang bar byed pa de la nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/'di rtag tu bzlas pas dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor rnyed do/_/na me rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo ba ro tsa nA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na ma 
[\[195a.2\]]A kA sha gar+b+hA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_badzram+bu badzram+bu/_badzra d+h+wa dze/_shU n+ya tA pra de she/_bai ro tsa na gar+b+he sany+tsa in+d+ri ya sho d+ha ne swA hA/_cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas pas 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas so sor rnyed do/_/bdud 
[\[195a.3\]]thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad dang bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis thub dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang bris nas lag tu bcang bar byed pa de yang yon tan 'di rnams so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHsarba 
[\[195a.4\]]durga ti pa ri sho d+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/_sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/_shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Ni bi shud+d+he swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[195a.5\]]kyi byin gyis brlabs pas skye ba bzhar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zad par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga wa ti Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yai/_o~M shru ti/_smr-i ti/_bi dza ye/_
[\[195a.6\]]swA hA/_'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar 'gyur/_'di'i cho ga ni 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs nas de'i mdun du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te nyin mtshan du 
[\[195a.7\]]smyung bar gnas pas gnas der mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ba'i mar gyi mar me phul te bya ba yid la dran par gyur pas gdon par bya'o/_/de nyid du ku sha bting nas gser gyi kha dog gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo /_/de 'di la yang dag par lta ba bzhin ston 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]par byed do/_/tho rangs sam/_mtshan mo nyid du yang rung ste/_tshig tu gdon par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_
[\[195b.2\]]dza ya bA hI ni/_dza la ut+ta re/_ka la ka la/_ma la ma la/_tsa la tsa la/_hu lu hu lu/_k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/_sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra NA ni/_me bi shwa d+hA ya/_b+ha ga ba te/_sa ha sra/_A brta/_sar+b+ba bud d+ha a ba lo ki te/_tsak+Shu/_shro tra/_g+h+rA Na/_dzi hwA/_kA ya/_ma no bidz+nyA na/_sho d+ha ni/_su ru su ru/_pra su ra pra su 
[\[195b.3\]]ra/_sar+b+ba bud d+ha/_a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/_a b+hA ba/_sarba d+harma a bi b+he da ni swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_mtshan mo gcig tu dran par byas nas rtag tu bzlas pas bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas stong 
[\[195b.4\]]gis nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong gi 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byed do/_/skye ba brjes te lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal srid dam yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[195b.5\]]bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar byed do/_/'di ni stong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/_phan yon chen po byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo bklag par bya/_rtag tu yid la bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA 
[\[195b.6\]]ya/_na ma sa~M g+hA ya/_na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_swe tA ya/_swe tA b+hu dzA ya/_dwA da sha b+hu dzA ya/_e hi e hi/_b+ha ga wA na/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bud d+ha bud d+ha bud d+ha/_Ar+ya ma nu sma ra/_bud d+ha ma nu sma ra/_d+har+m+ma sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_
[\[195b.7\]]saM g+ha sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_tad+ya thA/_na tu na tu/_ki Ni ki Ni/_tu ru tu ru/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_ku ru ku ru/_sarba sarbaM/_me sA d+ha yaM hi ri mi ri Ti Ti/_ni ni/_ma ma sa ba ri wA ra s+ya/_si d+h+yan+tu/_man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis gzungs 'di gsungs nas byang chub 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rig pa'i gzungs 'di ni bklags pas 'grub pa/_ma bsgrubs pa yang las rnams 'byung ba ste/_zla ba nya la gso sbyong can gyis nyin 
[\[196a.2\]]mtshan du smyung bar gnas yang rung ngo /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar byang chub kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/de bzhin du nyi ma bdun du lan re'am thun gsum du byas na rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po 
[\[196a.3\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig_/phyogs sam zla bar yul gyis don du grog mkhar bdun gyi rtse mor song nas re re 'dzegs te/_nyi ma snga dro nas ji srid phyi dro'i bar bzlas par 
[\[196a.4\]]bya'o/_/mtshams med pa grol bar byed do/_/bu 'dod na 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khye'u 'byung ngo /_/gzungs 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba dang /_gnod pas gdon 'bros par byed pa la bya bas pas sam/_rdzas 
[\[196a.5\]]su bcings pas kyang rung ngo /_/yang na chom rkun thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rtag par rgyun du zlos bzhin pa ni nor nye bar bsags par 'gyur zhing /_dgra rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis slar yang ral 
[\[196a.6\]]pa gyen brdzas kyi rgyud phyi mar gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/_na mo bu da d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_hu lu hu lu/_bi ma le/_nir ma le/_sho d+ha ni/_kA tsa ti/_mir pa Ta la/_sar+b+ba ni ro gaH/_bi na sha nits+tsha da ni/_ts+tsha da ni/_bA ta sa 
[\[196a.7\]]mu t+Thi taM bA ta sa mu tiSh+Thi taM/_sh+leSh+ma/_san+ni pA ta sa mut+Thi taM sar+b+ba nA shA ni/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya/_te dza na na s+yan+tu/_ak+Shi ro gaHswA hA/_gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas nas mi snang bar gyur nas lag pa'am 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ku sha la brgyad brgyar yongs su bsngags nas mig la byab par bya'o/_/long bas kyang mig so sor rnyed do/_/zla ba drug gis rtag tu dran par byed na/_mig nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[196b.2\]]dbang phyug dang gru 'dzin na gnas pa'i 'khor chen po la legs par gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di ni rtog pa'i rgyal pos rgyud phyi ma 'dir brjod pa sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs 
[\[196b.3\]]pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos rtag tu dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma chos gos kyi rna ba'am/_gos kyi mtha' la mdud pa bya'o/_/gang la la zhig bcom ldan 
[\[196b.4\]]'das ma sgrol ma sgrub par byed pa des lan cig brjod nas gsum gyis gos la bgos pas dgra dbang du nye bar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_gdug pa thams cad rings par 'dod pa dang /_dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dod pa dang /_don thams 
[\[196b.5\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pa dang /_mi mdza' ba rnam par 'joms par 'dod pa de ci'i rgyu dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can don thams cad bya ba la rab tu 'jug 
[\[196b.6\]]pa 'dzin par byed do/_/de la yid la grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maH_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_na ma 
[\[196b.7\]]Ar+ya ma hA s+thA ma prap+tA ya/_bo d+hi satwA/_bA ma ne trAn+na ma s+yA mi tAn+na maH/_s+yA mi bA ma ne/_pi shA tsi par+Na sha wa ri/_par+Na sha wa ri/_pi shA tsa/_b+ha ga ba ti/_pA sha ha sta/_paR+shu d+ha ra Ni/_yA ni/_kA ni/_tsh+tsha ta/_b+ha ya ni/_ut+pa t+yan+te/_yak+Sha sh+tsa/_ri tA yo/_yA kash+tsi ta/_ma hA 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bA d+yo/_ye ko tsi ta/_u pa dra bI/_ye ke tsi ta/_Ar+ya bak+sha/_ye ke tsi ta/_u pa sarga/_a u ba sarga/_sam+b+ha d+ha ba/_at+pa t+yan+te/_sar+b+ba Ni tA ne/_sar+b+bAM staM/_sarbe te/_bA la ta d+ha na/_ut+pa t+yan+ta ne/_paN+Di ta/_a ne na/_sa t+ye na/_sat+ya bA ke na/_i b+hiHpaN+Di ta/_a d+hiSh+Tha tai rma n+t+ra ba rai rma ma rak+ShiM ku ru pa ri tra NaM ku ru pa ri gra 
[\[197a.2\]]haM ku ru pa ri pA la naM ku ru swa sti/_ya naM ku ru daN+Da pa ri ha raM/_ku ru bi Sha pa ri ha raM ku ru/_bi Shad+bu Sha NaM ku ru/_bi Sha nA sha naM ku ru/_tad+ya thA/_a mri te a swa targe mA/_ma ra ma ra sa ma/_pra sa ma/_u pa sa ma tu nu bi tu nu/_tu le tu mu le/_ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+ShaM ku ru swA hA/_'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i 
[\[197a.3\]]gzungs te bzlas pa dang /_sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/'di lta ste mi rnams la yams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba la shing sha ma'i yam shing gi me rab tu sbar nas gang ba'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad thun 
[\[197a.4\]]gsum du ji ltar nus pas sbyin sreg gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas ri khrod lo ma can la yang bya'o/_/de bzhin las byas pas nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/ba lang gi nye bar 'tshe ba la ba lang gi spu dang rus 
[\[197a.5\]]pas sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ma he'i nad thams cad la skra dang rus pas nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya ste/_zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar gyis gnod pa la nyi ma bdun du 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dod pa nyi ma bdun du nye bar 'tshe ba la seng ldeng gi phye ma'i sbyin sreg 
[\[197a.6\]]go/_/mgo bo na ba la dri bzang po'i me tog la yongs su bzlas nas bsnams nas mer gzhug par bya'o/_/rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro/_/rims la srad bu bcing bar bya ste/_rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro/_/za ba dang sbyin sreg kyang bya'o/_/gdon la bag zan las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas 
[\[197a.7\]]la lan bdun bzlas te nyi ma bdun nas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/mig na ba la mig sman gyis sbyin sreg gyis shig_/nyi ma bdun gyis grol lo/_/zhi bar 'dod pas dUr ba'i sbyin sreg gyis shig_/zhi bar 'gyur te/_rgyas par 'dod pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig_/rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]rgyal ba la shu dag gi sbyin sreg gyis shig_/rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sbyin sreg gyis shig_/dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa la yal 'dab kyi las so/_/sbrul las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun la dbang du byed do/_/'byung po dang sha za'i rgyas 
[\[197b.2\]]btab pa la lan nyi shur bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par byas te rang gi gnas su 'gro'o/_/rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdong la yongs su bzlas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg gi las 
[\[197b.3\]]thams cad la nyi ma bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/mdor na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis las thams cad byed do/_/las thams cad la dang por gang ba'i sreg blugs sbyin sreg gyis shig_/las thams cad la yang las 'di nyid gyis 
[\[197b.4\]]shig ces bya'o/_/gso sbyong can gyis bya ba'o/_/sems dpa' thams cad la sems kyis dmigs pas sa las byung ba'i ka pA la dang /_sel+la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas gzhon nu mas mdud pa brgyad brgya bya'o/_/de nas de dri'i chus bkrus nas shing la bzhag ste/_
[\[197b.5\]]de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du ma he rnams dang /_ra rnams dang /_phyugs rnams la chom rkun gyis nye bar 'tshe ba la rwa la bcing bar bya'o/_/bum pa chus gang bar byas nas gtsang mas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas te nad pa'i rked pa la bcing bar bya'o/_/rang gi gnas 
[\[197b.6\]]su 'gyur ro/_/khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang /_sha zas nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la sbyin sreg gyis shig_/ji ltar nus pa'i gtor ma bya'o/_/zhes te 'di ni ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya ba'i gzungs ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo sde yang ngo /_/
[\[197b.7\]]slar yang dus de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor phyag g.yas pa rab tu brkyang nas nyug par mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu rin chen phreng bzhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yod de 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas gsungs so/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang /_smra ba'i ched dang /_ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub po'i dngos grub byed 
[\[198a.2\]]pa rtag tu byed du gzhug go/_/blo gros dang ldan pas gang dge ba'i tshes grangs la bris nas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngags kyi tshig rnams bka' stsal to/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaMg+hA ya/_na maHsap+tA nAM/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ko TI nAM na mo me tre ya/_pra mu khA nAM/_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi 
[\[198a.3\]]sa twA nAM/_na maHsamya g+ga tA nAM/_na maHsamyak+p+ra ti pan+nA nAM/_na mo ar+ha tAM/_na mo nA gA mI nAM/_na maHsa kri dA gA mI nAM/_na maHshro tA pan+mA nAM/_na mo ar+ha te/_mar+d+h+wa tu/_a pa rA dze ta hr-i da yaM/_ma brta yiSh+ya mi samyak+saM bud+d+ha/_b+hA Shi ta/_ma nu mo da taM/_de ba ga nai sarba karma ka raM/_shu b+haM/_pa pi trany+tsa bA/_maM ga l+yaM/_d+ha n+yaM/_shu b+h+ya ka raM/_
[\[198a.4\]]shu b+haM rAk+Sho/_g+h+na sarba satwA nAM/_de bany+tsa a pa rA dzi tA hr-i da yaM/_mA brta mi sarba pA pa/_pra sha mA nAM/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/_d+ha n+yaM/_sarba gra ha bi nA sha nAM/_ni t+yaM dza ya/_ka ri h+ye Sha sha kra s+ye ba a pa rA dzi ta pa Sha kri t+ye/_nA sha ne tse ba/_rA dzA/_ag+ni ri pu nA sha nI krit+ya karmA Ni/_be ta Do duHswap+haduHswap+nA bi a tha spu ta na de ba dA na ba/_gan+d+ha rba/_
[\[198a.5\]]yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/_pan+nA ga/_rak+ShaM/_kurba n+tu me ni t+yaM sa mAn+ta tsa/_te dza naM e hi kA/_dri tI ya ka dz+wa rA tri tI yak+Sha/_tsa tur+tha ke b+h+yo rak+Sha yaM bi Sha ma dz+wa ra karmA Ni bi Sha b+huk+taM ga raM tsai ba b+h+yo dz+ye brdza yi Sh+ya ti/_ya s+ya bA na b+ha ba ta gar+b+ho ha yan+te ya s+ya dA ka ra ka/_rat+na mA la i yaM te ShAM k+Shi pra ma ma ba ha te/_dzA ya mar+tha/_kA mo la ba tar+the/_shrI kA 
[\[198a.6\]]mo la b+ha te/_shrI yaM/_bi tha te ra Na/_saM gra he/_k+Shi pra mA bA te/_dza paM/_a tra bi t+yaM/_pra bak+ShA mi/_rat+na mA la ti/_bi pru taM/_ta ba tA lo ka nA tha hri driSh+Ta satwA nu pa dru tAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM d+ha na ka ri bi pu la ka ri ya sha ka ri/_bid+d+ha ka ri a yun+ta ti a lak+Shi pra sa ma ni d+haM narbA n+ya bi n+ya bi bar+d+ha ni ba shrI ka ri/_sarba gra ha nak+Sha tra ba sha/_
[\[198a.7\]]brti ni me/_t+hA dza na ni/_su tra dza na ni ba ri bA ra bad+h+ya ni/_A yun+da ni/_prI ti kA ri/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_a mo ha shak+ti kAny+tsa na mA la gra ha sau mya/_ka ra Ni sarba kA li kA lA hA bi gra ha/_bi bA da pra sha ma ni/_par tsa tra/_ni bA ra Ni pa ra sai n+ya stam+b+hA ni tsit+ta ni rma lI kar Ni/_sarba pA pra sha ma ni sarba kilbi Sha nA sha ni swA hA/_tsu Tu tsu Tu/_
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]tu Tu tu Tu/_mu Tu mu Tu swA hA/_sarba de ba a nudz+ny+wA te swA hA/_sarba nA gsaM rak+Shi te swA hA/_o~M ni ri phaT/_ha na ha na phaT/_da ha da ha phaT/_pa tsa pa tsa phaT/_ye ShAM bid+h+wa Shan+ti bi sha ma tsit+tA yan+ti/_ha ha ni/_ka kho rda kurba n+ti ka ra yan+ti/_kr-i tany+tsa a b+ha yA nu mo de nar+tha ba phaT swA hA/_ag+niM stam+b+ha yA mi bi ShaM shasta u da ka tsau ri sarba 
[\[198b.2\]]duSh+Ta sarba byA d+hi ta/_tsan traM dza na yA mi hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mas khrus byas te rin po che'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid du yang gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris pa'am gang du'am der yang rung ste la la'i 
[\[198b.3\]]bgegs srung ba dang /_bsod nams mchog dang /_sdig pa dang /_dri ma 'joms pa dang /_g.yul du'am/_rtsod pa'am/_thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba'o/_/gang 'di 'dzin pa la rig pa bzhi pa bris pa dang /_skyes pas rtag tu klog pa de la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/klog pa dang 
[\[198b.4\]]'dzin pa thams cad rtag tu srung bar byed do/_/gsang ba rnams kyis yongs su skyong bar byed do/_/cho ga'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ni ji ltar rin po ches spras pa'i phreng ba steng du rnam par 'bar ba'i dpal gang yin pa de rig pa 'dzin par byed do/_/'di las gdon de rnam par 
[\[198b.5\]]nyams par byed do/_/nad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/bu tsha bo rnams kyang 'phel lo/_/'khor bzang po can rnam par gnas so/_/rig pa 'di ni thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang /_byis pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba'i ched do/_/
[\[198b.6\]]lha dang /_rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de yang phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas gzigs par mdzad do/_/dge ba'i don rnam par 'phel ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad kun nas zad par 'gro ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa rnams dang /_nyes par 
[\[198b.7\]]byas pa rnams las kyang grol te 'dir the tshom med do/_/ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzungs so/_/de nas 'di las rgyud 'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs so/_/'di lta ste/_gtsug phud dang /_go cha dang /_ra ba dang /_snying 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]po dang /_nye ba'i snying po dang /_zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o/_/rtsa ba'i rig pa la ni drug cur bshad do/_/don thams cad sgrub pa de la dang por re zhig ra bi ta dang /_bi Ni ka dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnams so/_/mthe chung khab kyi rnam pas nges par btsir ba'i 
[\[199a.2\]]gung mo dang mthe bong dag tu bshad do/_/'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/zhes rnam par grags te don thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/rig pa tshim par byed pa la mthe chung gnyis bsnun par bya ste rnam par tshim par 'gyur ro/_/lhag par gnas pa ni mthe bong gnyis ka 
[\[199a.3\]]khab kyi rnam pas so sor g.yo bar bya ste/_snying po rnam par shes par bya'o/_/bstod pa kho na'i ming gis so/_/nye ba'i snying po la mthe bong gnyis 'di lta ste/_nang kho na'i khu tshur ro/_/mthe chung lcags sgrog gi cha'i sgra dang /_sdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab tu byas pa 'di ni go cha'i mtshan 
[\[199a.4\]]nyid de/_rtag tu bdag nyid la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/sdigs mdzub gnyis nges par btsir nas gung mo dkris te khab kyi rnam pas bsdigs pa 'di ni gtsug phud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ste/_bdag nyid kyi gtsug phud bcings pa'i dus su rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/slar yang khu tshur bcings 
[\[199a.5\]]nas/_sdigs mdzub kha phye ba khab kyi rnam pa ste/_'di ni bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do/_/de lta bu kho na yongs su gyur pas sdigs mdzub khab kyi rnam pas ra ba'i phyag rgya bya'o/_/khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa ste/_mtshan ma 'di ni dam tshig 
[\[199a.6\]]srung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/rkang pa bsnyams pa la g.yas pa'i rkang pa rab tu bzhag nas gar gyi sbyor bas yongs su bskor bar bya ste/_gzhan du bskor nas lag pa gnyis kas rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i las sbyar ro/_/dpral bar yang las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[199a.7\]]phyag rgya bcing ba dang /_bzlas pa'i dus dang /_nyal ba'i dus dang /_rnam pa gzhan du yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/gdon gyi las dang las thams cad la rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rgyud phyi mar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du phyag rgya bcings pa gsungs so/_/de la 'di rnams yang dag sbyar bya ba/_/yams ni bde bar bya dang mkhas pas phyag 'tshal ba/_/rig gsum la yang thun mong phyag rgya ni/_/
[\[199b.2\]]de rnams nye bar drangs ba phyag 'tshal phyag rgya ni/_/g.yas pa'i sor mo'i tshigs la tshigs kyis rtse mo kun/_/phyag rgya nyid ni rjes su bcing bar gyis shig dang /_/rtag tu gsol ba 'debs la gtsang ma gsol 'debs pa'i/_/phyag rgya de bzhin kho nar g.yas pa sor mo yi/_/tshigs rnams 
[\[199b.3\]]tshegs su byas nas rjes su yi rang bya/_/mchod pa thams cad kho na gtsang mas rtag tu ni/_/mchod pa rtag tu rjes su yi rang byed pa dang /_/sor mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan/_/tshigs kyi rtse mo mthe bong snying por yang dag ldan/_/'di rnams rgyal ba yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur/_/sor mo'i rtse mo yang dag sbyar 
[\[199b.4\]]ba gung mo dang /_/mthe bong gnyis kar gang du mi 'gyur phyag rgya yis/_/bzlas pas mchog sbyin yid kyi bzlas pas phyag rgya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slar bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[199b.5\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sa dang /_nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /_sems rab tu 'gul ba dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di rang 'gul bas skrag cing me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /_bar snang las spyod pa'i 'byung po bye bas thams cad du 'gro ba'i gdug pa rab tu btul lo/_/de nas yang byang chub 
[\[199b.6\]]sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu des na ral pa gyen brdzes zhes bya bar yang zungs shig_/rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zungs 
[\[199b.7\]]shig_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig_/rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zungs shig_/rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'u rab 'byam zhes bya bar yang zungs shig_/thabs kyi spyod pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis de rnams yang dag par ldan par 'gyur/_chos du zhig gis lhag par gnas pa lags/_byams pa des gang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha dang /_
[\[200a.2\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs pa rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs mnyam pa'i sems zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i chos las kun tu gnas pa'i sa ji srid du 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[200a.3\]]bris nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_glegs bam du 'gyur bar byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe dang nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba ste/_phan yon mang po nyid dang /_phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs dang lha dang bcas pas 
[\[200a.4\]]byin gyis brlabs pa/_rig pa dang /_sngags chen po 'dus pa 'khor ba'i pha rol tu song ba bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyu skar dang /_mtshan mo dang /_nyin mo dang /_zla ba dang /_lor bde ba'i ched du mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[200a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/ral pa gyen brdzes 'chang ba po dang khyim du gzhag pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams la'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[200a.6\]]mngon par dga'o/_/ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so//_//'di ni jo bo chen po a ti sha'i phyag dpe rwa sgreng nas dka' thub chen pos gdan drangs nas/_shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis 'phar ba'i lo cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'i yi ge 
[\[200a.7\]]pa ni lots+tsha ba chen po 'di nyid kyi zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa/_shAkya'i dge slong bsod nams grub kyis bgyis so/_/paN+Di ta la ma gtugs shing /_/dpe dbang 'grel pa ma rnyed pas/_/sgra don log par gyur srid na/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis bcos par gsol//_//
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]{D725}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra mA tA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[200b.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na/_'khor chen pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya dang byams pa la sogs 
[\[200b.3\]]pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes 
[\[200b.4\]]bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[200b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sngon gsungs shing da ltar gsung ba/_bcom 
[\[200b.6\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur te byang chub yongs su tshol ba na/_sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba dang don dang byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi bar gyi phyir sngon gsungs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi 
[\[200b.7\]]phar gyur pa mar gyur pa skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen ma mchis pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen dang /_mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa sdig pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa mchis te/_gzungs de thos ma thag tu bsam pa thams 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_rig sngags thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur te byang chub yongs su tshol ba na/_'jig 
[\[201a.2\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[201a.3\]]chos kyang ston to/_/'khor de nyid na bram ze dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa thob par gyur pa zhig 'dug pa des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di bram ze brgya stong mang po dang sems 
[\[201a.4\]]can bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsgrags bshad bstan te/_de dag thams cad kyis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sdig pa ltung bar byed pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang skye ba dran par gyur pa ngas dran no/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po de smros shig_/
[\[201a.5\]]phyi ma'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du sems can sdig pa byed pa mtshams med pa byed pa/_bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i sdig pa zad par 'gyur/_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur/_mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[201a.6\]]ngas kyang gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 
[\[201a.7\]]'di dag smras so/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_rig sngags chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag brjod par bya'o/_/bdag la rig pa 'di grub par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[201b.2\]]i li mi li/_tsi li mi li/_kun tu le/_kun tu le/_kun tu le/_si re si si re/_bi si re/_bi rA yA gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri drA ma Te/_mA tang+gi/_puk+kA si/_kaSh+TA ya/_mA tsaN+Da lI/_huT+Tu ma li ni/_hU~M d+hu d+hu ma li ni/_tsi le mi le/_gr-ih+Na sau mya daR+sha ni/_ku ru 
[\[201b.3\]]tsan+d+ra mu khe/_lA g+hu mA na ya~M te/_Ar+ya dak+Shi b+hu dze sarba bid+yA nA ma/_pra sA d+ha ne/_sarba bi d+yA nA ma/_I shwa ri swA hA/_bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te thos ma thag tu las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa 
[\[201b.4\]]thams cad las bsrung ngo /_/dus gsum du bzlas pa byas na zhag bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du mi sems pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa byas na/_zla ba gcig gis 'phags pa spyan 
[\[201b.5\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma rig pa chen mo bdag nyid ston te/_'phags pa 'od dpag med kyang mthong ngo /_/bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran pa dang thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de 
[\[201b.6\]]dang der dam pa'i chos dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong 
[\[201b.7\]]de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa//[ {D726}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_mA tarnI tA ra 
[\[202a.2\]]bi shwa karma b+ha ba tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum sgrol ma las sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[202a.3\]]dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang /_ku ru kul+le dang /_ri khrod lo ma can las sogs pa dang /_tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dag gis 
[\[202a.4\]]lha rdzas kyi me tog pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_man dA ra ba la sogs pa lha rdzas kyi me tog dpag tu med pa dag dang /_dung dang /_pi bang dang /_rnga dang /_rdza rnga dang /_gau rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la sogs pa lha'i rol mo dpag tu med pa dang lha'i gdugs dang /_
[\[202a.5\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pa dpag tu med pa thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor te/_mchod pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu 
[\[202a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_bzhag ma thag tu sa chen po yang g.yos/_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor yang pham par byas te/_'od kyi snang ba chen po yang bkye'o/_/de yang 'di lta ste/_dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po dang /_ljang 
[\[202a.7\]]gu dang /_mthing ga dang 'dres pa ste 'od sna tshogs bkye ste/_sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams sbyangs te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum sgrol ma ku ru kul+le'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/gtsug tu nub ma thag tu mchod pa'i sprin gyi char ba yang 'bab par gyur to/_/de 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]nas lha mo de dper na sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur to/_/de'i tshe bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod pa/_zhing khams thams cad yongs su dag pa la/_/rin chen me tog mang po char du phab/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed 
[\[202b.2\]]pa'i yum/_/yum gyur sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces gsungs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[202b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad zab pa'i phyir ci'i phyir bskyed/_gang gis na yum yin zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'jam dpal bden mod kyi dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma skyes pa/_ma 
[\[202b.4\]]'gags pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma dang bral ba med pa 'grib pa med pa 'phel ba med pa rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni de'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_bcom 
[\[202b.5\]]ldan 'das dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma dang bral ba med pa/_'grib pa med pa/_'phel ba med pa rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa de ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_
[\[202b.6\]]'jam dpal mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/snying rje chen po'o/_/kun rdzob ngo bo 'khor ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de las 'das pa ni dus 
[\[202b.7\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum mo/_/de'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar na yum du yid la bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'jam dpal de bas na chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid shes pas 'di bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/nan tan du bsgrub par bya'o/_/'di'i yon tan shes par bya'o/_/'di mchod par bya'o/_/lung nod par bya'o/_/the tshom med par bya'o/_/las la nan tan du bya'o/_/'di'i bsngags pa yid la bya'o/_/
[\[203a.2\]]las so so'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bstan to/_/des ni gleng gzhi'i le'u bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[203a.3\]]la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar bsgom par bya/_'di la ji ltar du nan tan du bya zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar yid la bya'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni ma 'gags pa'o/_/chos thams cad 
[\[203a.4\]]ni dri ma dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das shing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsgom par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M swa b+ha ba shud d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba 
[\[203a.5\]]shud d+ho\u0f85 haM/_zhes brjod par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_mngal las skyes pa dang /_sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_brdzus te skye ba dag la bltas te byams pa bsgom par bya'o/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_
[\[203a.6\]]na ba dang /_'chi ba la snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'dus ma byas pa la dga' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na/_rgyu ni tshad med pa bzhi'o 
[\[203a.7\]]des bskyed pa ni byang chub kyi sems so/_/de'i phyir de la nan tan du yid la bya'o/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ut+pa dA ya a haM/_zhes brjod par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_mchod pa 'di 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi/_/phye ma'i phur ma bdug pa'i bye brag rnams/_/rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod par bya'o/_/gang yang phyogs 
[\[203b.2\]]bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan/_/me tog sil ma phreng ba'i bye brag rnams/_/rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi/_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/de 
[\[203b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog rin po che/_/rin chen mar me'i bye brag phreng ba rnams/_/rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi/_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum mchog na bza' dkar/_/dri zhim 
[\[203b.4\]]chu gtsang spos ngad ldang ba'i chu/_/rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod par bgyi/_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum mchog 'phrin las ldan/_/bza' dang bca' ba la sogs zhal zas rnams/_/rgyal ba 
[\[203b.5\]]bskyed pa'i yum la dbul bar bgyi/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi mdzad pa'i/_/glu dang rol mo sil snyan bcas pa'i sgra/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'phan gdugs bcas/_/phyogs bcu kun nas sprin bzhin gtibs gyur cig_/dpag 
[\[203b.6\]]bsam gyis ni shing dag dang /_/ljon pa'i shing dang shing dag gis/_/dri zhim lo 'dab bcas pa'i shing /_/phyogs bcu kun nas gtibs gyur cig_/spos kyi dri ngad ldang ba'i char/_/'bru dang me tog la sogs pa'i/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhim char/_/nges 
[\[203b.7\]]par kun tu 'bab par shog_/'bab chu lteng ka lu ma dang /_/mtsho dang rdzing bu dag dang ni/_/ro brgya dag dang ldan pa'i mtsho/_/dad pa la sogs bcas pa yi/_/rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba'i/_/dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang /_/shar nub 'od bcas nyi zla dag dang ni/_/khang 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba rnams/_/rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum la mchod bya'o/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir mchod pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu da s+phar Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha 
[\[204a.2\]]ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta nai wi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta shap+da pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spar Na sa ma ye 
[\[204a.3\]]hU~M/_zhes brjod par bya'o/_/mchod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gsungs pa/_'jam dpal yum 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs 
[\[204a.4\]]rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa 'di 'jam dpal khyod kyi yid la gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M na maHsU ka saM na maH_tA rA yai tA ra mi ta/_na ma stA re tu re bI rek+Sha Nair+d+yu ti ni b+he k+Sha Ne/_trai 
[\[204a.5\]]lo kya nA thA bak+t+rA p+dza/_bi kA sat+ke sa rod b+ha be/_na maHsha ta sa ra ts+tsan+d+ra/_saM pUr+N+Na pa Ta lA na nA+e/_tA rA sa ha sra ni ka ra/_pra ha sat+ki ra No dz+dz+wa le/_na maHka na ka nI lAp+dza/_pA Ni pad+ma bi b+hU Shi te/_dA na bIr+ya ta paH_shAn ti/_ti ti k+Sha d+h+yA na go tsa re/_na ma sta thA ga toSh+NI Sha/_bi dza yA nan+ta tsA ri Ni/_
[\[204a.6\]]a she Sha pA ra mi tA prA p+ta/_dzi na pu tra ni se bi te/_na ma stu t+tA ra hUM kA ra/_pU ri tA shA de gan+ta re/_sap+ta lo ka kra mA krA n+ti/_niHshe ShA kaR+Sha Na k+Sha me/_na maH_sha krA na la brah+ma/_ma ru dwi shwe shwa rA r+ts+tsi te/_b+hU ta be tA Da gan d+ha rba/_gaNai R+Yak+Sha pU ra skri te/_na ma s+t+ra Di ti phaT kA ra/_
[\[204a.7\]]pa ra yan+t+ra pra mar+d+d+ha ni/_pra t+yA lI D+ha pA da n+yA se/_shi khi dz+wa lA gu le k+Sha Ne/_na mastu re ma hA g+ho re/_mA ra bI ra bi nA sha ne/_b+h+r-i ku TI kr-i ta bAk+t+rAp+dza/_sarba sha truM ni sU da ni/_na ma s+t+ri rat+na mu drAM ka_/hr-i d+yAM gu li bi b+hU Shi te/_b+hU Shi tA she Sha di ka tsa kra_/ni kar swa ka rA ku le/_na maH_pra mu di 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]tA To pa/_mu ku TA k+Shi p+ta mA li ni/_ha sat+pa ha sa t+tut+tA re/_mA ra lo ka ba shang+ka ri/_na maH_sa man+ta b+hU pA la/_paT lA kaR+Sha Na k+Sha me/_tsa lad b+h-i ku Ti hU~M kA ra/_sarbA pa da bi mo tsa ni/_na maH_shi khaN+Da khaN+Den+du/_mu ku TA b+ha ra No dz+dz+wa le/_a mi tA b+ha dza TA b+hA ra/_b+hA swa re kir No d+h+ru 
[\[204b.2\]]be/_na maH_kalpA n+ta hu ta b+hug_/dz+wA lA mA lAn+ta ras+thi te/_A lI D+ha mu di tA ban d+ha/_ri pu tsa kra bi nA sa ni/_na maH_ka ra ta lA g+hA ta/_tsa ra NA ha ta b+hU ta le/_b+h+r-i ku TI kr-i ta hU~M kA ra/_sap+ta pA tA la b+he di ni/_na maH_shi be shu b+he shAn+te/_shAn+ta ni rbA Na go tsa re swA hA 
[\[204b.3\]]pra Na ba saM yuk+te/_ma hA pA pa ka nA sa ni/_na maH_pra mu di tA ban d+ha/_ri pu gA tra pra b+he di ni/_da shA k+Sha ra pa da n+yA se/_bi d+dzA hU~M kA ra dI pi te/_na ma stu re pA da g+hA ta/_hU~M kA rA kA ra bI dzi te/_me ru man+da ra kai lA sa/_b+hu ba na tra ya tsA li ni/_na maH_su ra sa rA kA ra/_ha ri 
[\[204b.4\]]NAng+ka ka ra s+thi te/_hA ra dwi ruk+ta s+phu TA ra/_a she Sha bi Sha nA sa ni/_na maH_su ra ga NA d+h+ya k+Sha/_su ra kin+na ra se bi te/_A baM d+ha mu di tA b+ho ga_/ka la duHswap+na nA sa ni/_na mash+tsan+dA rka saM pUr+Na/_na ya na d+yu ti b+hA swa re/_ha ra dwi ruk+ta tut+tA re/_bi Sha ma dz+wa ra nA sa ni/_na ma s+t+ri ta twa bi 
[\[204b.5\]]n+yA sa/_shi bsha k+ti sam n+wi te/_gra ha be tA la yak+Shau ga Na/_nA sha nI pra ba re tu re/_man+ta mU la mi daM sto traM/_na ma skA rai ka biM sha kaM_/yaH_pa that+p+ra san+na d+hI nAM/_/de byaM b+hak+ti sa ma n+wi taH/_sha yam+bA prA ta rut+thA yaH/_sma ret+sa rbA b+ha ya pra daM/_sarba pA pa pra sha ma naM/_sarba du rga ti nA sha 
[\[204b.6\]]naM/_a b+hi Shik+to b+ha be t+tur+N+NaM/_sap+ta b+hi rdzi na ko Ti b+hiH/_a smin ma hat+t+wa mA sa d+ya/_so\u0f85 n+te baud+d+ha ba daM bra dze ta/_bi Shan+ta s+ya ma hA g+ha raM/_s+tha ba raM bA tha dzaM ga maM/_smar NAt+p+ra la yaM yA ti/_khA di taM pI ta me ba bA/_gra ha dz+wa ra bi ShAr+t+tA nAM/_par mAr+t+ti bi nA sha nAM/_a n+yeShAM tsai bas twA nAM/_dwi sti 
[\[204b.7\]]sap+tA b+hi bar+t+tI nAM/_pu tra kA mo la b+he t+pu traM/_d+ha na kA mo la b+hed d+ha naM/_sarba kA mA na bAp+no ti na b+hi g+h+niH_pra ti ha n+ya te/_tA rA b+ha ga ba tI yaM sU traM/_samyaka saM bud+d+ha b+ha Shi taM/_sarba ka ra/_sa ma yA u la kar ye/_bud+d+ha ni tsa/_d+harma Ni tsa/_saM g+ha ni tsa tA ra ye swA hA/_'jam dpal gzungs 'di ni dus 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum sgrol ma lam rungs pa 'joms pa'i sgo nas bstod pa ste/_phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[205a.2\]]gzungs 'di brjod pa'i gang zag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro la sogs pa'i gnas su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yul mtha' 'khob dang kla klo dang /_dbang po ma tshang pa la sogs par nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rims dang /_'brum bu 
[\[205a.3\]]dang /_nad 'go ba la sogs pa'i nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad las grol zhing nad kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/'jigs pa chen po brgyad la sogs pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstod pa 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de 
[\[205a.4\]]ni/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba mi 'byung 
[\[205a.5\]]zhing /_nam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum sgrol ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de ni yid la ci bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_kha dog phun 
[\[205a.6\]]sum tshogs pa la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_mi ma yin pa'i par du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi bden pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yum sgrol ma'i 
[\[205a.7\]]sku dngos su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta saMmyaka saM bud+d+ha ya tre ya te tA ra te tu tA ra/_zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bstod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]gzungs sngags 'di gang la brten nas yid la nan tan du bya zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdug bsngal las grol bar 'dod cing zab mo'i don la mos pas nan tan du bya'o/_/de nas ta~M las byung ba'i 'od zer las steng 'og thams cad 
[\[205b.2\]]du rdo rjer gyur te/_'jam dpal sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/o~M badzra dz+wa la badzra ta na hU~M phaT/_zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas ta~M las byung ba'i yi ge e dkar po bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i steng du ba~M sngon po bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i steng du la~M ser po bsgom 
[\[205b.3\]]par bya'o/_/de'i steng du ya~M ljang gu bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i steng du ra~M dmar po bsgom par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis 'od zer 'phro ba dang bsdu ba bya ste/_o~M d+harma d+hA tu bi shud d+ha hU~M/_o~M aM d+hA tu bi shud d+ha hU~M/_o~M sa man+ta bi shud d+ha hU~M/_o~M prak+Sha ki shud d+ha hU~M/_
[\[205b.4\]]o~M k+Sha ta bu thA na bi shud d+ha hU~M/_o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la sa man+ta pi shud d+ha hU~M/_'jam dpal de ltar sngags de brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bskyed par bya ste/_pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa kha dog sna tshogs pa la rdo rje rabs bskor ba gru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa gru 
[\[205b.5\]]bzhir 'dug cing sgo bzhir ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa/_dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang dang twa ra ni la sogs pas mdzes pa'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de 'dra ba bskyed de/_dbus kyi ze 'bru la ni zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du ta~M ljang gu las byung ba'i ut+pa la 
[\[205b.6\]]ta~M dang bcas pas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma'i sku ljang gu zhal gcig phyag 
[\[205b.7\]]gnyis pa phyag g.yas pa mchod sbyin/_g.yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa/_mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang /_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/_gzhon nu ma lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa/_mnyam 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/_/shar du zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du ta~M las bskyed pa'i ut+pa la mthing ga sa bon dang bcas pa las/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[206a.2\]]khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma mthing ga phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas kyis tri shU la 'dzin pa/_phyag g.yon na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 
[\[206a.3\]]'dzin pa mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/_gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa/_mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/_/lho ru zla ba dang 
[\[206a.4\]]pad+ma'i steng du re las bskyed pa'i ut+pa la ser po sa bon dang bcas pa las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/_'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/
[\[206a.5\]]de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma sku mdog gser bsregs pa lta bu phyag gnyis pa/_phyag g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa g.yon na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa/_mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan 
[\[206a.6\]]pa/_gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/_/nub tu zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du tu las byung ba'i ut+pa la dmar po sa bon dang bcas pa las/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 
[\[206a.7\]]khyab ste/_'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma dmar mo phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas pa na 'khor lo 'dzin pa/_g.yon pa na 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa/_mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa/_mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs 
[\[206b.2\]]pa'o/_/byang du zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du tAM las byung pa'i ut+pal ljang gu sa bon dang bcas pa las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/_'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs 
[\[206b.3\]]brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma ljang gu phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas na gdugs 'dzin pa g.yon na sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa mdzes pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan 
[\[206b.4\]]pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa zhal 'dzum bag dang bcas pa mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung dang bcas pas gdan zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/_/shar gyi sgor zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du tA~M las byung pa'i ut+pa la sa bon dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od 
[\[206b.5\]]kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma lcags kyu ma sku mdog dkar mo phyag gnyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa khros pa'i sku 
[\[206b.6\]]rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa cung zhig khros pa'i zhal dang bcas pa zhabs brkyang bskum du zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/_/lho'i sgor pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du re las byung ba'i ut+pa la 
[\[206b.7\]]sa bon dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pal las byung ba'i sgrol ma zhags pa ma 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhags pa 'dzin pa/_khros pa'i sku rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa cung zhig khros pa'i zhal dang bcas pa/_zhabs brkyang bskum du 
[\[207a.2\]]zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/_/nub kyi sgor zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du tu las skyed pa'i ut+pa la sa bon dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang 
[\[207a.3\]]gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma lcags sgrog ma sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa khros pa'i skur rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa khros pa'i zhal dang bcas 
[\[207a.4\]]pa zhabs brkyang bskum du zla ba dang pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/byang gi sgor zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du re las byung ba'i ut+pa la sa bon dang bcas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od kha dog sna tshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma 
[\[207a.5\]]dang 'ja' tshon dang smin rgyu dang /_chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i ut+pa la las byung ba'i sgrol ma dril bu ma sku mdog ljong sngon ma phyag gnyis na dril bu 'dzin cing khros pa sku la rin po che'i do shal dang snyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas 
[\[207a.6\]]brgyan pa gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa/_khros pa'i zhal dang bcas pa zhabs brkyang bskum du pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar lha'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la sogs pa rnams 
[\[207a.7\]]ni ji lta bu/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'gro ba drug po rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i khams so/_/de lta bas na sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang gzugs brnyan lta bur rig par bya'o/_/lha'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]de nas 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das lha de lhas ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma lta bu dang 'ja' tshon lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bus so/_/
[\[207b.2\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sprul pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing gnyis ka 'khrul pa'o/_/sgyu ma ni gzhan 'khrul pa'o/_/'ja' tshon ni stong pa'o/_/smig rgyu 
[\[207b.3\]]ni yul 'khrul cing stod pa'o/_/chu zla ni rgyu 'bras so/_/gzugs brnyan ni dri za'i grong khyer te/_'jam dpal 'khrul pa ni de bzhin te nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na lhas lha la byin gyis rlob pa yang 'dra'o/_/'jam 
[\[207b.4\]]dpal sprul pa dang sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang gzugs brnyan ni thogs pa med cing thogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/tha dad pa med cing tha dad pa dang bral ba'o/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin de dang 'dra bar yid la gyis shig_/de nas bcom 
[\[207b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad pa ni/_lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te/_gung mo gnyis brkyang ste rtse sbyar nas/_mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis gung mo la reg ste zur bcag nas mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rtse sprad nas nang sbyar ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[207b.6\]]de'i sngags ni o~M sarba ta tha ga ta a taM a haM badzra sta na sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sta na hU~M zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur bar mdzad pa ni/_lag pa thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis phyir bkan te/_gung mo rtse sprad de mthe bos 
[\[207b.7\]]mdzub mo gnyis mnan pa ni rin po che'i phyag rgya ste mgo bo'i steng du bzhag nas sngags brjod pa ni/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la ni sarba ta thA ga ta a haM shud d+ha pa ri shud d+hA ya swA hA/_zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyi rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni lag pA gnyis thal mo sbyar te sor mo rnams phan tshun du so sor bsnol gung mo bsgreng ste/_mthe bong dang mthe'u chung yang gshibs 
[\[208a.2\]]te bsgreng ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste sngags ni oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya hU~M zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus gsol pa/_zla ba nyi ma'i sku 'dra ba'i/_/ljang gu'i 
[\[208a.3\]]mdog can 'gying bag can/_/pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum/_/sems can kun gyi skyabs gyur pa'i/_/ut+pal bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces yum la bstod nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[208a.4\]]'di'i gsang sngags ni gang gis 'grub ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di'i gzungs sngags ni 'di'o/_/oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wa sarba ta thA ga tA nAM na mastA rA yai/_na mastA re tu re bI rAk+Sha Ne d+yu ti ni b+he k+Sha Ne/_trai lo kya na 
[\[208a.5\]]thA bak+t+rA p+dza bi ka shat+ke sa ro da b+ha be/_na maHsha ta sha rats+tsan+d+ra saM pUN+Na pa Ta lA na ne/_tA rA sa ha sra ni ka ra pra ka shat+nyi ra No dz+dz+wa li/_na maHka na ka nI lA p+dza pA Ni pad+ma bi b+hU Sha te/_dA na bIr+ya ta paHshA na ti te ti k+Sha d+h+yA na go tsa re/_na ma sta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza yA nan+ta tsa ri/_a she Sha pa ra mi tA prA p+ta 
[\[208a.6\]]dzi na pu tre Na se bi te tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/gzungs sngags ni 'di'o/_/snying po ni 'di'o/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/oM tut+tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying po'o/_/oM tA re tu re tu re swA hA/_rin po
