[\[208a.7\]]che'i rigs kyi snying po'o/_/oM tu re tut+tA re swA hA/_las kyi rigs kyi snying po'o/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tA re swA hA/_rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po'o/_/oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_las sna tshogs pa'i snying po'o/_/oM tA re tA re tut+tA re hU~M kA ra pU ri tA sha di gan+ta res p+ta lo ka tra mA trAn ti/_a she ShA 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]kar+Sha k+Sha mi hIH_dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags so/_/oM tA re tA re tut+tA re hU~M swA hA/_kA ra pu ri tA shA di gan+ta re sap+ta lo kak+kA mA krAM ti a she Sha pun+TiM ku ru kar+Sha Nak+Sha mi ho/_/rgyas pa'i sngags so/_/oM tA re tA re tut+tA re hU~M kA ra pU ri tA shA di gaM ta ri sap+ta lo ka krA mA krA na ti uSh+NI Sha a li ka ra 
[\[208b.2\]]yA kar+Sha Na k+Sha mi phaT/_de ni las kyi sngags so/_/oM tA re tA re tut+tA re tu re hU~M kA rA bu ri tA shA di gaM tsa ris b+ha lo ka krA mA krA nA ti niH_a she Sha shAn+tiM ku ru kA r+Sha Na k+Sha mi swA hA/_klu zhi ba'i sngags so/_/oM tA re tA re tu re tut+tA re swA hA/_sha krA na la bra h+ma ru drai sh+tse shwa rA rtsi te 
[\[208b.3\]]b+hU ta be tA la gaM dar ba ga Na yak+Sha pu ra skr-i te phaT kA ra yan+t+ra pra marda ni pra t+yA lI D+ta pA da n+yA sa shi khi dz+wA lA ku li dza li ri ma hA hro ri mA ra bIr bi nA sha ni/_b+h+r-i ku Ti kr-i ta bA ka trA p+dza sarba sha tru ni sU da ni rat+na mu drAM ka hr-i d+yAM gu li bi b+hU Shi t+ya p+hU Shi tA she Sha di ka tsakra kA ra sau ka rA ku li hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT 
[\[208b.4\]]phaT/_las sna tshogs pa'i sngags so/_/oM i n+tsA ya/_ya mA ya/_ba ru NA ya/_yak+ShA ya/_ag+n+nA ya/_bA ya be/_nai ri t+yai rak+Sha se/_oM in+d+ra pA lA ya/_sU r+yA ya tsan+t+rA ya/_u ti a ya bu mi ye/_a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/_Ad+ya nu t+pan+na 
[\[208b.5\]]twA ta oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni las thams cad grub pa'i sngags so/_/sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//'jam dpal las ni 'di'o/_/spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po'i chag chag btab ste/_maN+Dal dkar po tsan+dan dkar po'i chus byugs 
[\[208b.6\]]la me tog sil ma gtor te/_bum pa dkar po rin po che las byas pa'i nang du rin po che lnga ni/_gser dang mu tig dang man shel dang byi ru dang mu men gzhug par bya'o/_/spos lnga ni tsan+dan dang a ga ru dang du ru ska dang ga pur dang pu shel tse gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[208b.7\]]'bru lnga ni nas dang gro dang sran ma dang 'bras dang til mar gzhug par bya'o/_/snying po lnga ni bu ram dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang lan tshwa dang til gzhug par bya'o/_/gtsang ma'i ras kha tshar mnyams pas dkris te dbus su gzhag go/_/gang ba'i bum pa bzhi yang gzhag par 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bya'o/_/pog phor bzhi dang me tog la sogs pa bzhi yang gzhag par bya'o/_/de ltar rdzogs pas 'di bsam gtan du bya'o/_/yi ge ta~M las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrol ma dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom pa ni/_
[\[209a.2\]]pad+ma rgyas pa las byung zhing zla ba rgyas pa la bzhugs pa sku mdog ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu'i sku do shal dang dpung rgyan dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/_pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa ka shi ka'i 
[\[209a.3\]]ras kyis stod g.yogs pa skyil krung phyed pa dang bcas pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhal 'dzum zhing spyan 'khyug pa/_phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa/_g.yon pa ut+pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa 'dzin pa/_sku las 'od zer 'phro zhing pad+ma dkar po ge sar dang bcas 
[\[209a.4\]]pa'i dkyil na bdud rtsi'i rgyun sku las 'od zer 'phro ba can du byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa bsams te bzlas pa 'di bya'o/_/o~M tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pa la ni gcig gam/_
[\[209a.5\]]bdun nam/_nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de'i phan yon ni mtshams med pa lnga dang de dang nye ba lnga dang sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[209a.6\]]dpal de'i phan yon ni ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa brgyad du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di'i phan yon ni tshe rabs dran pa dang dbang po gsal ba dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/bzo'i gnas thams 
[\[209a.7\]]cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang mdangs dang gzi mdangs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis srung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed pa dang phan par byed de/_gang du phyin pa thams cad du bkra shis par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i las 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//'jam dpal rgyas pa'i las 'di'o/_/spos kyi khang pa dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i gnas su ba ser skya'i rnam lngas skyong nul bya ste dri zhim pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal bya'o/_/me tog gi tshom bu yang dgram par bya'o/_/rgyas pa las 
[\[209b.2\]]byung ba'i thang ka yang dgram par bya'o/_/rin po che rnam pa lnga dang 'bru dang sman la sogs pa dag la ril bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bya ste/_rin po che'i ga 'ur bcug la maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/pog phor bzhi yang gzhag par bya'o/_/me tog la sogs pa 
[\[209b.3\]]yang gzhag par byas nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste/_yi ge ta~M las bskyed pa'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrol ma dpa' mo gcig ma rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom pa ni pad+ma rgyas pa las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng du rgyas pa'i sku ston ka'i zla ba ltar gsal 
[\[209b.4\]]ba sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma lta bur gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu'i sku mdog ser po do shal dang dpung rgyan dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/_pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa/_ka shi ka'i ras kyis stod g.yogs pa skyil krung phyed pa dang 
[\[209b.5\]]bcas pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhal 'dzum zhing spyan 'khyug pa/_phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa/_g.yon pa ut+pa la sdong pu dang bcas pa 'dzin pa sku las 'od 'phro zhing pad+ma'i ge sar dang bcas pa'i dkyil na bdud rtsi'i rgyun sku las 'od 'phro ba lha'i tshogs dang lha ma 
[\[209b.6\]]yin gyi tshogs dang nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang mi'i tshogs dang dri za'i tshogs dang lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang srin po la sogs pa'i stobs zil gyis gnon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa bsgom ste bzlas pa 'di bya'o/_/
[\[209b.7\]]oM tA re tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pas lan gcig gam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas/_gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de'i phan yon ni lha'i tshogs dang lha ma 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]yin gyi tshogs dang nam mkha' lding gi tshogs dang mi'am ci'i tshogs dang /_mi'i tshogs dang dri za'i tshogs dang lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang /_srin po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de'i stobs thub par mi 'gyur la/_srung ba dang skyob pa yang byed par 'gyur ro 
[\[210a.2\]]dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_rims dang /_'brum bu dang /_g.yan pa la sogs pas mi tshugs so/_/nam 'chi ba'i tshe yang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ngan song gsum du mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[210a.3\]]'jam dpal las des yo byad dang tshe dang bkrag dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//'jam dpal dbang du bsdu ba'i las ni 'di'o/_/
[\[210a.4\]]dur khrod dam shing gcig gam/_chu bo chen po'i 'gram mam gtsug lag khang du bya'o/_/khang pa der ba'i rnam lngas skyong nul byas te dri zhim pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal me tog sil ma dgram par bya'o/_/yum gyi sku gzugs kyang bzhugs te pog phor dang me tog la 
[\[210a.5\]]sogs pa yang bsham par bya'o/_/me tog dang 'bras bu nus pa dang ldan pa'i rdzas dag rin po che'i ga 'ur bcug la maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas bsam gtan bsgom pa ni/_tA~M las byung ba'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrol 
[\[210a.6\]]ma dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom pa ni pad+ma las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng na sku mdog ban+du ka'i me tog ltar dmar ba gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu'i sku do shal dang dpung rgyan dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/_pany+tsa li ka'i gos 
[\[210a.7\]]kyis smad dkris pa/_ka shi ka'i ras kyis stod g.yogs pa/_'gying bag gi tshul gyis bzhengs pa/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhal bzhad cing cher bzhad pa spyan 'khyug pa phyag g.yas thugs ka na 'dud pa/_g.yon sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa/_sku las 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'od 'phro ba dang bcas pa las rang dang mthun pa'i 'od 'khrug pa dang bcas pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa lha mo dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa bsam ste bzlas pa 'di bya'o/_/oM tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las kyi sngags dang 
[\[210b.2\]]bcas pa lan gcig gam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de'i phan yon ni sa bdag gi rgyal po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad 
[\[210b.3\]]khugs par 'gyur ro/_/dbang gi las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//'jam dpal drag po'i las bya bar 'dod pas gnas ni dur khrod dam shing gcig gam chu bo chen po'i 'gram mam gtsug lag khang du bya'o/_/khang pa der ba'i rnam lngas chag chag btab 
[\[210b.4\]]ste dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal bya'o/_/sku gzugs la sogs pa yang dgram par bya'o/_/gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la rgyal po la sogs pa'i gzugs nim pa'i chus bris la maN+Dal gyi steng du kham pa'i ga 'ur gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas maN+Dal gyi steng 
[\[210b.5\]]du gzhag par bya'o/_/pog phor la sogs pa'i mchod pa yang bsham par bya'o/_/de nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste yi ge ta~M las bskyed pa'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i yum sgrol ma dpa' mo rnal 'byor ma'i lus su bsgom pa ni pad+ma rgyas pa 
[\[210b.6\]]las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng na bzhugs pa sku mdog ljang gu kun nas gsal ba gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu'i sku do shal dang dpung rgyan dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/_pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa ka shi ka'i gos 
[\[210b.7\]]kyis stod g.yogs pa zhabs g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pas bzhugs pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhal mche ba gtsigs pa spyan ni rab tu 'bar zhing dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa dbu'i zla ba'i steng na a mi tA b+ha dang bcas pa bskal pa'i me dpung nang na bzhugs pa phyag 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]g.yas na 'khor lo 'dzin pa g.yon sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa 'dzin pa/_sku las khro bo 'phro ba khro mo dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu'o/_/de'i bzlas pa ni 'di'o/_/oM tu re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes 
[\[211a.2\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pa lan gcig gam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bzlas nas gsol ba btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di'i phan yon 
[\[211a.3\]]ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang rnam par smin pa dang ngan song la sogs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/_/'jam dpal ma rungs pa'i dgra dang gdon dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/drag po'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//
[\[211a.4\]]'jam dpal phrin las sna tshogs pa'i las ni 'di'o/_/dur khrod dam shing gcig gam mchod rten gyi mdun nam chu bo chen po'i 'gram du las bya'o/_/khang pa der ba'i rnam lngas skyong nul bya ste/_dri zhim pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal la me tog sil ma dgram par bya'o/_/
[\[211a.5\]]yum gyi sku gzugs kyang bzhugs te/_sbra tshil las byas pa'i gzugs kyi snying gar dur khrod kyi ras la sngags bcu pa dang gsal ba'i yi ge gnyis dang bcas pa la ming gi yi ge mtha' dang bcas pa bcug ste/_maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/_/pog por 
[\[211a.6\]]dang me tog la sogs pa yang gzhag par byas nas/_de nas bsam gtan bsgom pa ni ta~M las byung ba'i myur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sku/_yum sgrol ma dpa' mo rnal 'byor pa'i lus su bsgom pa ni/_pad+ma las byung zhing nyi zla'i steng na sku mdog nag po shin 
[\[211a.7\]]tu 'tsher ba gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu'i sku do shal dang dpung rgyan dang rin po che'i chun 'phyang la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/_pany+tsa li ka'i gos kyis smad dkris pa ka shi ka'i gos kyis stod g.yogs byas pa zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa zhal gcig phyag 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]gnyis pa mche ba zla ba phyed pa lta bu gcigs pa zhal khro gnyer hU~M sgra dang bcas pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du phyogs pa dbu la zla ba'i steng na a mi tA b+ha bzhugs pa/_bskal pa'i me dpung dang bcas pa'i 'od las 'jigs pa brgyad las bsrung ba'i lha mo brgyad 'phro ba phyag 
[\[211b.2\]]g.yas na gri gug 'dzin cing g.yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la'i steng na me tog gis bkang ba'i bram ze'i thod pa can 'dzin pa khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sngags ni 'di bzlas par bya'o/_/oM tA re tu re tut+tA re swA hA/_zhes bzlas par bya'o/_/
[\[211b.3\]]de nas las kyi sngags dang bcas pa lan gcig gam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsol btab nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di'i phan yon ni phrin las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa las bsrung bar 'gyur 
[\[211b.4\]]ro/_/phrin las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid kyi yum ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rdo rje 
[\[211b.5\]]rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi ma phyag brgyad ma dung gi mdog can gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa/_zhal dkar ba dang gnag pa dang dmar ba dang ser po'i zhal bzhi'o/_/rigs lngas dbu la mtshan pa spyan gsum pa'o/_/phyag brgyad ni rdo rje dang mda' dang mdung thung 
[\[211b.6\]]dang tha ma la mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/ut+pa la dang gzhu dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub ni g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos sku'i rang bzhin can no/_/'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o/_/na mo rat+na tra 
[\[211b.7\]]yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/_a k+Sho b+h+yaH_byu ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te b+h+yaH_saM myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_po d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tu re tut+tA re swA hA/_zhes brjod pas 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis me tog dang mar me dang dri chab dang bshos gtsang gis mchod do/_/'jam dpal de'i las ni 'di'o/_/spra tshil las gang la bya ba'i gzugs byas te/_skrod pa'i rdzas ni bya rog dang hu lu'i sha ming dang bcas 
[\[212a.2\]]pa'i snying gar bcug nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM a mu kaM me ba sham na ya swA hA/_zhes brjod nas rlung gi phyogs su spas na 'jam dpal 'thab cing 'byer bar 'gyur te gzhan du 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje rigs kyi yum gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis 
[\[212a.3\]]pa'o//_//'jam dpal pad+ma'i rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/_rtsa ba'i zhal ni dmar mo ban+du ka'i me tog gi mdog can gyi sku gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa g.yas zhal dkar po/_g.yon zhal nag po rgyab zhal ser po rigs bzhis dbu 
[\[212a.4\]]la mtshan pa spyan gsum pa'o/_/phyag brgyad na pad+ma dang mda' dang mdung dang tha ma mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/ut+pa la gzhu dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub ni g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing chos 
[\[212a.5\]]sku'i rang bzhin can no/_/'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/_a mi ta b+ha de ba byu ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te b+h+yaH_saM myaki saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA 
[\[212a.6\]]ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyis me tog dang bdug spos dang mar me dang dri chab dang zhal zas kyis mchod do/_/'jam dpal de'i las ni 'di'o/_/d+ha du ra dang nim pa dang mya ngan 'tshang 
[\[212a.7\]]gis me tog btags te phye ma sbrang rtsi dang lde gu byas nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM a mu ka a mi ta naM ku mA ri ma hA mu ri dra ba te na da s+ya pi ta ba yats+tsha tu hU~M hrIH/_zhes brjod nas lus la byugs na rang dbang med par khugs par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma rigs kyi yum 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa ser mo gser bsregs pa lta bu'i sku gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa/_rtsa ba'i zhal ser po g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba rgyab kyi zhal gnag pa rigs 
[\[212b.2\]]bzhis dbu la mtshan pa spyan gsum pa'o/_/phyag brgyad na 'khor lo dang mda' dang mdung dang tha ma mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o/_/ut+pa la dang gzhu dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa g.yon na 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje skyil mo 
[\[212b.3\]]krung gis bzhugs shing chos sku'i rang bzhin can no/_/'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te b+h+yaH_saM myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re 
[\[212b.4\]]swA hA/_zhes brjod pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis mchod pa'i me tog dang mar me dang bdug pa dang dri la sogs pas mchod do/_/'jam dpal de'i las ni 'di'o/_/thal chen dang sa zhag la gzugs bya ste snying gar gsal 
[\[212b.5\]]byed gnyis kyi yi ge'i mtha' can bcug la sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/_kA ra ya kA ra ya/_staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/_dzaM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_la~M la~M la~M la~M la~M/_zhes brjod nas lam rgya gram du sba bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[212b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi yum gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//'jam dpal rin po che'i rigs kyi yum ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa rtsa ba'i zhal ni mthing ga gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa mthing ga'i sku zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba rgyab zhal ser ba rigs bzhis dbu

[\[213a.1\]]@#/_/'jam dpal de'i sngags ni 'di'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na swA ga rA ya saM b+ha ba byu ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te b+h+yaH_saM myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_/

[\[213b.1\]]rnams nim pas ril bu byas te 'di brjod par bya'o/_/tsa la pra tsa la shI g+h+rAM ga mi de ba dang+ta u tsa tA ya a mu kaM ba sA nAM mug taM ku ru na yin ma hA ri had te hrIHswA hA/_zhes bzlas te byugs na mo thams cad khugs par 'gyur dbang du 'gyur te phrag dog med par 'gyur

[\[215a.1\]]mu khyud nang ma la ni a a zhes bya ba brgyad dgod par bya'o/_/mu khyud phyi ma la ni a oM a a tA a a re a/_a tuta a/_a tA a/_a re a/_a tu a/_a re a/_zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o/_/ga'u me tog gi phreng ba bcings te maN+Dal gyi

[\[215b.1\]]'khor lo ling tshe dgu pa bri'o/_/dbus su a mo g+ha hrIHha zhes bri'o/_/rtsibs brgyad la oM de oM/_tA ba tA/_re data re/_tut+tA tuta/_tA a tA/_re mo re/_tu g+ha tu/_re hriHzhes bya ba bris te ga'ur srin mgo dmar po dang 'khor lo phral nas gtsang po phar

[\[216a.1\]]phaT/_hU~M tA phaT/_hU~M re phaT/_hU~M tu phaT/_hU~M re phaT/_zhes bya ba bris te/_rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas myos pa'i 'khor

[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]gsum pa'o//_//de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa'am/_lhang tsher ma gnyis gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te/_ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa bri'o/_/sngags dgod pa ni/_dbus su wa swA staM b+ha ya

[\[216b.4\]]gtor to/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma yang bsgrags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te/_/lha yi 
[\[216b.5\]]'khor lo dang ldan pas/_/srog chags dag ni gsad pa spangs/_/ma byin blang bar mi bya zhing /_/bud med mi bsten smad mi bya/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni rnam pa kun tu spang /_/myos 'gyur dag dang sha dag dang /_/rku zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang /_/mo rnams thams cad 
[\[216b.6\]]kun la ni/_/chags pa'i sems ni spang ba ste/_/ma bzhin du ni kun la ni/_/phan pa'i sems kyis kun la bkur/_/dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yis/_/las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/dam tshig 
[\[216b.7\]]dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dpag tu med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang /_lha dang /_
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar 
[\[217a.2\]]gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ {D727}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tA rA b+haT+TA ri ka nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/_bod skad du/_rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa 
[\[217a.3\]]brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan yid 'ong po Ta la/_/sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras/_/sna tshogs ljon pa bkram pa ste/_/skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa/_/'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che/_/
[\[217a.4\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste/_/me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis/_/kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste/_/sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/_/rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra/_/mi'am ci ni glu snyan len/_/glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs/_/
[\[217a.5\]]rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang /_/dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/_/thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang /_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni/_/'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/_/
[\[217a.6\]]rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis/_/rtag tu legs par bsten pa'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i chogs gzhan dang /_/rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba/_/sems can kun la phan par brtson/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/_/bzhugs 
[\[217a.7\]]te de phyir dpal dang ldan/_/pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan/_/dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/_/byams pa dang ni snying rjer ldan/_/lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/_/chos gsung bar ni yang dag bzhugs/_/de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs/_/phyag na rdo rje 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]stobs po che/_/mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas/_/spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste/_/rkun po sbrul dang seng ge me/_/glang po stag dang chus 'jigs pas/_/zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying pa rnams/_/'khor 
[\[217b.2\]]ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/_/chags sdang gti mug dri ma las/_/gang gis sems can grol gyur pa/_/de gsungs bdag la thub chen po/_/'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs/_/dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/_/phyag na rdo rje rab 
[\[217b.3\]]rtogs byed/_/snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs/_/nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/_/skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/_/smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste/_/nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i/_/'gro ba 'don par 
[\[217b.4\]]brtson pa mo/_/nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/_/zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od/_/lha bcas mi dang lha min rnams/_/'di rnams thams cad gsal bar byed/_/'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/_/phyag na ut+pal sngon po bsnams/_/
[\[217b.5\]]ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/_/bar snang du ni 'phar bar gnas/_/'gro ba yang dag bsrung don du/_/mtshon cha'i bskal pa byung ba dang /_/'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed de/_/ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis kyang /_/
[\[217b.6\]]sems can thams cad bdag gis bsrung /_/sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/_/des na bdag la 'jig rten du/_/rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags/_/thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/_/spyan sngar 
[\[217b.7\]]'dug ste 'di skad gsol/_/gus dang bcas pas yang dag gnas/_/gang zhig rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pa/_/gsungs shig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba/_/sdig pa spong byed bsod 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]nams dang /_/bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed/_/gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid/_/nad rnams thams cad rlag byed pa/_/dpal ldan shis pa 'jog byed pa/_/nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed/_/sems can rnams la byams 
[\[218a.2\]]bsgoms nas/_/de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po/_/'di skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/_/phyogs rnams thams cad rab gzigs nas/_/'di lta bu yi byams pa spros/_/phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thabs 
[\[218a.3\]]mdzad/_/bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/_/de gsungs shes rab shin tu che/_/legs so legs so dka' thub che/_/sems can kun la gcig tu brtse/_/skal ba chen po'i mi rnams nyon/_/mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa/_/nor gyi dbang phyug 
[\[218a.4\]]yang dag 'gyur/_/nad rnams cad rnam par grol/_/dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan/_/dus min 'chi ba nges par 'joms/_/'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba/_/de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/_/lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/_/'di la rjes su 
[\[218a.5\]]yi rang gis/_/legs par bsdams par 'gyur la bstod/_/oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che/_/'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/_/dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma/_/shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/_/gso byed ma dang rgyas byed ma/_/swA hA oM gyi rnam pa 
[\[218a.6\]]'dod gzugs ma/_/sems can kun la phan par brtson/_/g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo/_/lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/_/'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/_/rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma/_/zla ba'i gdong can dkar 
[\[218a.7\]]mo che/_/mi pham gos ni ser mo can/_/sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che/_/stobs po che la pha rol phyin/_/rtsub mo chen mo gtub chen mo/_/sdang ba'i sems can rlag byed ma/_/rab tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/_/rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/_/glog gi phreng ba'i rgyal 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]mtshan can/_/ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/_/'tshol byed rengs byed nag mo che/_/mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/_/srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/_/mdzes ma dge ma dra ba'i lding /_/tshangs pa mo dang rig byed ma/_/gsad pa mo ni brag phug gnas/_/
[\[218b.2\]]bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo/_/skye gnas rig byed yid mgyogs ma/_/thod pa can ni shugs chen mo/_/tshangs ma bde ma gzhan mi rgyal/_/ded dpon chen po snying rje gnas/_/chud zos lam ni rab ston ma/_/mchog ster ston byed ston pa mo/_/bud med gzugs 
[\[218b.3\]]la dpag med gnon/_/ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma/_/grub ma gtum mo bdud rtsi ma/_/des ma nor sbyin bsod nams ma/_/skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma/_/mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs byed ma/_/drag dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma/_/'gro la gcig 
[\[218b.4\]]tu phan par brtson/_/skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma/_/ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/_/rtag par kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/_/don kun grub byed bzang po ma/_/gsad byed gso byed nor ster ma/_/mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag 
[\[218b.5\]]nyid skyes/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/phan par byed par grags pa ste/_/mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba mo/_/lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba'i/_/skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed/_/dug ni thams cad nyams byed pa/_/nad rnams thams cad zhi byed ma/_/
[\[218b.6\]]sems can kun la bde ster ma/_/blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog_/mnyam gzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis/_/des ni dus mi ring ba ru/_/rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu sdug pa bde bar 'gyur/_/bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o/_/rmongs 
[\[218b.7\]]pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/_/yid gzhungs 'gyur bar the tsom med/_/bcings pa 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/_/tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/_/dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba'o/_/rwa can dang ni mche ba can/_/dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' ba/_/sna tshogs 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las/_/mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis/_/'jigs pa kun las grol bar byed/_/dus min 'chi las grol byed pa/_/skyes bu snyan pa thob par 'gyur/_/mir ni skye ba don dang bcas/_/de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis/_/
[\[219a.2\]]gang zhig 'dir ni sngar langs nas/_/skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa/_/de ni dus ring tshe dang ldan/_/mi yi dpal ni dga' 'gyur te/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za dang ni lus srul po/_/'byung po gshed byed srin po dang /_/ma mo rtsub pa'i 
[\[219a.3\]]sems ldan pa/_/gnod sbyin mo dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byed/_/smyo byed dang ni gnod byed rnams/_/grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang /_/sha za la ni sogs pa rnams/_/ro langs sna tshogs la sogs dang /_/skul byed ma dang sems sdang rnams/_/grib ma 
[\[219a.4\]]la yang 'gom mi byed/_/ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur/_/sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar byed/_/nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur/_/phyug cing longs spyod yon tan ldan/_/bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 
[\[219a.5\]]'gyur/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba/_/blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag ldan/_/byang chub sems kyis yang dag brgyan/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/rtag 
[\[219a.6\]]tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong /_/rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa rdzogs so//[ {D728}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na/_
[\[219a.7\]]bod skad du/_lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang /_na bza' dang /_sham thabs kyi gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/_oM trai lo kya bi dza ya/_a tsit+ta dzA ya/_a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/_su dzA ya/_bi dzA ya/_ma hA dzA ya/_bi dzA ya/_dza ya dza ya/_he he/_sma ra sma ra/_ba ra ba ra/_bar da/_ma hA de bi/_
[\[219b.2\]]bi la sa/_bi la sa/_bi la sa/_ba dza a mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi/_hI hI/_ki ni ki ni pi lam ba se/_sma ra sma ra/_ma hA pra dz+nyA a ni ba ta/_badzra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/b+ha gi ni hrUM hrUM/_s+phuT s+phuT/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/_A be sha ya/_A be sha ya/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_kaM pa 
[\[219b.3\]]kaM pa/_kaM pa ya/_su ra b+hi gan+d+ha/_a ti si ta/_mu khe ha la da ba la/_saM ga rA dza na/_bi ma bi gi_/bi nA sha ya/_bi nA sha ya/_he b+ha ga ba ti/_san+t+ra sa ya/_bi g+ha nA na/_pa ri ba lA ya/_a smA kaM a smA kaM/_mA da ni mA da ni/_saM bo d+ha ya/_saM mo ha ya/_ha ra ha ra/_hi ri 
[\[219b.4\]]hi ri/_hu ru hu ru/_bi ta ka ra/_ba ra dza/_haM haM/_tro tA ya/_haM haM/_san+t+ra tA ya/_san+t+ro ya/_man+ta man+ta/_maR+da maR+da/_tsa ra tsa ra/_saM tsa ra saM tsa ra/_be ga be ga be ga ba ti/_na mo na mo na maHswA hA/_de nas lha dang lha min tshogs/_/srin po gnod sbyin mi'am ci/_/lto 
[\[219b.5\]]'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang /_/'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams/_/'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog_/gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas/_/skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te/_/lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas/_/gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 
[\[219b.6\]]'di/_/mtha' dag khyab par byas pa'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i lha yi ngag bzlog pa/_/sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs smos pa/_/che ba nyid kyi grags pa 'od/_/spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams/_/phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba 
[\[219b.7\]]lags/_/de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa/_/lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang /_/rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang /_/de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te/_/bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang /_/pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du/_/
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras/_/sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni/_/phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi/_/dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi/_/bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba/_/skye dgu'i dbang phyug mngon 
[\[220a.2\]]shes myur/_/dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag_/rgod bag med cing dregs pa med/_/pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal/_/pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin/_/spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste/_/sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od/_/skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin/_/de 
[\[220a.3\]]bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa/_/mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste/_/dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma/_/sgros dmar sen mo dmar ba ste/_/spyan rtsa dmar pos gzigs par mdzad/_/dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad+ma lags/_/pad+ma'i mdog can 
[\[220a.4\]]pad mdog dgyes/_/'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste/_/'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che/_/'dul du 'chug ma 'dul mdzad ma/_/bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags/_/rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can/_/rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba/_/byang 
[\[220a.5\]]chub rdul med dri ma med/_/zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rjed/_/sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar/_/rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes/_/chu lha g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can/_/skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas/_/gtsug phud gsum po lto tshil gsum/_/spyan 
[\[220a.6\]]gsum dri ma gsum sel ba/_/srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba/_/tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags/_/rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin/_/sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med/_/nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma/_/gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang /_/
[\[220a.7\]]sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul/_/dul ba bsrung pa rdul sel ba/_/phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma/_/rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma/_/drag mo lags te gzi bskyed ma/_/dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan/_/
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags/_/zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal/_/zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad/_/nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes pa mo/_/yid 'ong bzang zhing zhi ba mo/_/bde ba bde ldan mu dang stegs/_/bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/_/
[\[220b.2\]]nor spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo gser dngul 'od/_/'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin/_/sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal/_/sems can kun la med mi 'gyur/_/mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma/_/cha lugs sngo ba cha 
[\[220b.3\]]lugs bzang /_/rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste/_/na bza' gser mnabs gang ga ma/_/dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs/_/gi'u wang gi thig le spos/_/'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid/_/dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma/_/tshems 
[\[220b.4\]]dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum/_/dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub 'khor thogs/_/do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can/_/'og pag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma/_/grogs ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs/_/nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang /_/nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du 
[\[220b.5\]]thogs/_/nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can/_/nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/_/'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can/_/skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad/_/zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can/_/tshangs pa'i shugs can rlung dang ldan/_/bud med lags te mkha' 
[\[220b.6\]]las gshegs/_/lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phrog ma/_/'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul/_/'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma/_/drag po thor tshugs gtsug pud can/_/tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal/_/bing ka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma/_/'jig rten dbang 
[\[220b.7\]]phyug rigs mchog skyes/_/dbyig pa'i shing lo rdo rje thogs/_/drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan/_/gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo/_/gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug_/rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma/_/stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad/_/stobs 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dang stobs med mnga' ba ste/_/shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad/_/sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan/_/de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags/_/steng nas khyams dang khyams bzang tshul/_/tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal/_/ser mo tsan 
[\[221a.2\]]pa legs pa'i rten/_/drag mo phyag na chun po thogs/_/skal ba bzang mo gshal ka can/_/de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes/_/rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan/_/rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma/_/bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thabs/_/blo mdzad 
[\[221a.3\]]shes rab skyed par mdzad/_/lha mo lam me cod pan can/_/lha rnams kun las tshul lhag pa/_/sred med bu mo sdig pa sel/_/bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes/_/rab tu dga' ma 'grogs na dga'/_/spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan/_/dga' 
[\[221a.4\]]ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste/_/chos rnams kun gyi legs pa'i rten/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa sbrul mdzad ma/_/nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste/_/las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing /_/'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma/_/shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas 
[\[221a.5\]]pa/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/_/sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa/_/stobs rnams bcu bos cher gsal ma/_/rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje phra mo lha min sel/_/dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags/_/rdo rje lcags kyu bde dang dpal/_/rdo rje zhags pa zhags 
[\[221a.6\]]ba bzang /_/sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams/_/yid 'ong yid la tshim par mdzad/_/pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/_/tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste/_/rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad/_/chos can ha la ha la'i 'od/_/chos sbyin rnam par gzigs 
[\[221a.7\]]pa lags/_/khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang /_/bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste/_/rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che/_/lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod/_/kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni/_/smra ba 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rnams kyi mchog lags gsung /_/de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing /_/'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi/_/lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can/_/'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa/_/dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun/_/nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/_/thams cad rtag tu 
[\[221b.2\]]mthun par ni/_/stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang /_/dus kun tu ni bsrung bar gyis/_/zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing /_/'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/_/rgal dka' 
[\[221b.3\]]khyed kyis rgal bar gyis/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la/_/dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis/_/de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi/_/phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra/_/'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa/_/kye ma rig 
[\[221b.4\]]sngags sgrol ma'i mchog_/mun pa sel bar byed pa dang /_/mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa/_/sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa/_/tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis/_/dag par byas pa ma yin pas/_/shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi/_/gzungs 
[\[221b.5\]]'di thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i/_/brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la/_/dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi/_/dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing /_/sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa/_/
[\[221b.6\]]sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i/_/gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/_/su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis/_/nyan tam 'chang ngam klog byed na/_/rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/_/de yi don kun grub par 'gyur/_/nyon mongs kun las rnam grol 
[\[221b.7\]]zhing /_/sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog_/'jig rten dag tu chos shes la/_/'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/_/su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/_/'don zhing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal/_/de bzhin stod byed de dag ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/de yi don kyang grub 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi/_/gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang /_/thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/_/lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di/_/'jig 
[\[222a.2\]]rten dag na rgyags pa dang /_/nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o/_/de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba/_/'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po/_/
[\[222a.3\]]rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyab par stobs kyis brten pa yis/_/gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la/_/don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang /_/rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang /_/de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas/_/bzod med 
[\[222a.4\]]nyon mongs sel ba dang /_/zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig_/rgyal ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal nas/_/gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs/_/de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la/_/dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde 
[\[222a.5\]]sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas/_/lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' bas rgyas shing rmad byung nas/_/rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar gyur/_/sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs 
[\[222a.6\]]so//_//[{D729}]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+ta re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TaM ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/_mo ha ya/_ban+d+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_
[\[222a.7\]]phaT phaT phaT/_sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/_'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D730}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tA rA swa pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas ba ces bya ba'i gzungs/_
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tA rA yai/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_sa ma yas+thi te/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sarbA b+ha ra Na/_bi b+hU Shi te/_pad+ma ni pad+ma/_ma hA pad+ma/_A sa na s+thi te/_ha sa ha sa/_trai lo kya 
[\[222b.2\]]ba ra de/_sarba de ba dA na pa/_bU dzi te sma dA hi/_b+ha ga ba ti tA re/_sma rA hI/_b+ha ga bAM ta/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_pu ra taHsa ma yaM/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA satwa a ba lo ki te/_ma Ni ka ni ka/_bi tsi trA b+ha ra Ne/_oM bi lo kA ya/_che ge mo/_b+ha ga ba te tA re/_hrIM hrIM hrIM phaT srA hA/_
[\[222b.3\]]gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen 
[\[222b.4\]]po byas te/_sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas par bya'o/_/gang 'dod pa de sbyin no/_/mchog thams cad ster ro/_/ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so/_/gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje 
[\[222b.5\]]mchog gi rgyud las btus/_'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D731}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tA ra aSh+Ta g+ho re tA sbI sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo/_
[\[222b.6\]]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lha'i gnas na bzhugs te/_de 
[\[222b.7\]]nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas/_/las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos/_/bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis/_/gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa/_/'jig 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te/_/dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang /_/gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g.yang sa ngal ba'i lam/_/'jigs shing dngangs skrag shin tu skyi g.ya' ba/_/zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[223a.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham/_/bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang /_/kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur/_/ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/_/dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni/_/rang 
[\[223a.3\]]dbang med par gshin rje gdug pas khrid/_/bsregs shing btsos ti mtshon gyis rab tu 'thub/_/bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang /_/des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las byed pa/_/rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin/_/bskal pa mang por sdug 
[\[223a.4\]]bsngal drag pos gdungs/_/thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med/_/dran pa gsal bas las kyi 'bras bur shes/_/sdug bsngal ma bzod smre sngags rang la rmo/_/skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag_/de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi 
[\[223a.5\]]khyab/_/gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la/_/ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs/_/sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang /_/lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re/_/rang yang bde la 'gro rnams yongs la phan/_/chags sdang rmongs spangs snying 
[\[223a.6\]]rje'i rtsa ba brtan/_/sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad/_/shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad/_/me tog sad kyis khyer ba'i 'bras bu la/_/so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar/_/sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis/_/shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags 
[\[223a.7\]]bsgrub gyur kyang /_/byin brlabs 'byung ngo snyam yang 'byung mi srid/_/rtsol ba de dag ngal ba don med 'gyur/_/rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs/_/ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra/_/skyon med skyes bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na/_/ji ltar 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub/_/dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi sa bon ni/_/shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na/_/dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye/_/bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na/_/rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos/_/'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu 
[\[223b.2\]]med/_/tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten/_/gru tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na/_/rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas/_/rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin/_/byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten/_/byang 
[\[223b.3\]]chub sems ldan dge ba sbyang gyur na/_/yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te/_/nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mda' nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na/_/mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur/_/chos nyid don kun 
[\[223b.4\]]chub pa'i gang zag ni/_/mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur/_/bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tsom med/_/chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na/_/bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med/_/las med 
[\[223b.5\]]de yi rnam par smin pa med/_/mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol/_/de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi/_/snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad/_/ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[223b.6\]]kun/_/rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag_/don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di lta ste/_/oM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo/_lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol/_/oM na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA 
[\[223b.7\]]ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TA na/_pra duSh+TA na ma ma kr-i te/_dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_mo ha ya/_ban d+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_ma ma Ar+yA ba lo b+ha yA na rA/_bo d+hi satwA/_ma hA satwA ni/_ad+hi Sh+ThI te ma ma sarba karma A ba ra Na swa b+hA ba/_shud d+he 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bi shu da d+he/_sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su/_/lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod/_/thugs rje shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma/_/mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras/_/shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum 
[\[224a.2\]]zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin/_/spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i pad+ma 'dra/_/snyan gyi skye mched ug cos bye ba 'dra/_/shangs kyi skye mched ut+pal bum bu 'dra/_/zhal gyi mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra/_/sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku/_/chos kyi sgra sgrogs ka la ping 
[\[224a.3\]]ka'i gsung /_/sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs/_/'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma g.yon/_/sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g.yas/_/thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/_/rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs 
[\[224a.4\]]su mchi/_/'khor ba'i g.yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig_/'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re/_/thugs rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig_/ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re/_/'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig_/log par 
[\[224a.5\]]lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re/_/bla ma byang sems mnga' dang bdag sprod cig_/bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o/_/seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul/_/mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang /_/sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las/_/skyob mdzad khyed la phyag 
[\[224a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/_/'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol/_/pha rol 'bras bu ma thob bar dag tu/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang /_/bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang /_/stobs dang de 
[\[224a.7\]]bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin/_/bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_kun chub pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D732}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ya o ba tI d+hA ra NI/_bod skad 
[\[224b.2\]]du/_'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/_du khe muk+ti su saM pan+ne/_ma hA saM pan+ne/_
[\[224b.3\]]saM pat+ti/_ma hA saM pat+ti/_ka se ma hA ka se/_kats+tsha dz+wa ra mug+te si swA hA/_skud pa'am chu la lan gsum sngags na rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tsi li tsi li/_mi li mi li/_
[\[224b.4\]]rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra swA hA/_gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'am skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du sngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[224b.5\]]ya/_ma hA satwa ya/_tad+ya thA/_ki li ki li/_tsi li tsi li/_ni gi le swA hA/_'bru mar la lan gsum sngags te bskus na skran 'tsho'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa re sa re/_bi sa re bi sa re/_
[\[224b.6\]]sa ra nA sha ni swA hA/_shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te sha rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ni si re ni si re/_ka la mi mi re/_ka la ri tsi rI/_pa tsi le swA hA/_lpa ba dang /_lkog ma'i 
[\[224b.7\]]lha gor na ba dang /_lce kyi ba na ba dang /_gdon nad thams cad la 'ji ba la lan gsum du sngags te bskus na phan no/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_badzra pA Nid+h+ya ma/_oM oM krA rA pra b+ha be/_b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+he/_pra ti bud+d+he/_ud+d+he/_shAn+ti ka ri/_ha na ha na/_
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ma ma pA pa maM/_da ha da ha/_ma ma pA pa daM/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma ma pA pa kaM/_oM o De/_gra sa gra sa/_ri te De ri te De/_shAn+tiM ka rI ye swA hA/_shu b+ha ka rI ye swA hA/_k+She ma ka ri ya swA hA/_rims nad kyis btab pa la bya ba pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[225a.2\]]sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro/_/zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[225a.3\]]'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D733}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ha ya grI ba d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[225a.4\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sarba satwe b+h+yaH_sa nA ga ti ne/_na maHsarba satwa b+h+yaHsa na/_a pa ha ri Ni/_na maHsarba satwa b+ha yot+ta ra NA ya/_
[\[225a.5\]]na maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba/_pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsi ki ta saM ka rA ya/_na maHsarba ban+d+ha na/_ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba duHkha pra sha ma na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba an+d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba bid+yA rA dza/_pa sha prA p+ta ye/_ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya/_ta 
[\[225a.6\]]s+ya na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong+gI r+NaM r-i Shi bi da dA/_de ba nA ga_/yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/_shAkya prah+mA/_lo ka pA la/_biSh+tu ma he shwa ra/_nA rA yA Na/_skan+d+ha/_ku be ra/_a su ren+d+ra/_ma tr-i ga Na/_na maHkr-i taM/_badzra khur sa hi yaM/_ha ya grI ba brah+ma/_pa ra ma hr-i da ya mA 
[\[225a.7\]]brta yiSh+Ta mi/_a ba pra me yAr+ha sa d+ha ka na/_a ba h+yaM/_sarba b+hU tA nAM/_sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kaM/_a mo g+haM/_sarba karma NaM/_bi shA na ny+tsa/_bi nA ya kaM_/tad+ya thA/_oM ta ru la ta ru la ta ru la/_bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/_sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ka_/sarba b+hU ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa li ta/_a na la/_bi s+phu lang+gi/_aT+Ta 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]hA sa/_ke sa ra/_a ta bA/_pra bi ta ka_/yaM badzra khu ra ni ra ga ti ta/_tsa li ta bA su dA ta la/_badzrod shwa si ta/_hA si ta ma ru to k+Sha ti/_pra sha man ka ra/_pa ra duSh+Ta big+h+NAM/_sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka ra/_swa bid+d+ho pa de sha ka ra/_pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_b+ho d+ha ya mi te/_
[\[225b.2\]]b+ha ga bAM ha ya grI ba/_sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya mA baR+ta yi Sh+yA mi/_khA da khA da/_ma hA rau dra/_man+t+ra na/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_A t+ma swa hi tA na/_man+t+ra na/_sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/_sarba karme Shu me/_sid+d+he/_de hi de hi/_A bi sha A bi sha_/pra bi sha pra bi sha_/sarba gra he Shu/_a pra ti ha ta/_d+hu na d+hu na/_
[\[225b.3\]]bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_sarba ba ro pa gra ma/_kr-i t+ya ka kho rdo du rlaM gri ta/_mu shi ka_/bi sha ka ra bi sha daMSh+Ta bi Sha cU r+Na yo a b+hi tsA ra bi sha ka ra Na/_sid+d+ha any+dza na/_tsak+Shur mo ha na/_tsit+ta bA k+She pa na ka ra/_ni t+ya/_a pa ra pre k+Sha Na/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_ma hA 
[\[225b.4\]]bod+hi sa twa rid+d+h+ya daMSh+Ta Ne na/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsatwA nAM/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_ma ma bud+d+ha/_d+harma saM g+ha/_a nu dz+nyA taM/_me karma shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru/_phaT/_ha ya grI ba phaT/_badzra khu rA ya phaT/_badzra daM Sh+T+ro t+ka Ta/_b+ha ya b+hi ra bA ya phaT/_bar maM trA na/_nA sha na ka rA ya phaT/_pa ra duSh+Ta big+h+nAM/_baM b+hak+Sha Na ka 
[\[225b.5\]]rA ya phaT/_sarba gra hot+sA d+ha na ka rA ya phaT/_sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/_pa Ta la mu lA ya phaT/_ye ko tsi ta/_ma ma a hi te Shi na/_ka ye kra min+ti/_man+ta yan+t+ra/_ya mAn+ti/_dzu hwan ti kA khordi kurba n+ti ta na sarba na ba da mi khe na/_bA kri tA ya phaT/_na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra ho t+sA+e d+ha na ya/_ha 
[\[225b.6\]]ya grI bA ya/_sid+d+h+yanu man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/_oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bA ya hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_oM na mo ha yA ya swA hA/_oM na mo bi shwa mUrta ye swA hA/_na maHsarba satwA nI sid+d+hA n+tu/_man+t+ra pa dA ya swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[225b.7\]{D734}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi dza ya ba ti nA ma pra t+yaM gi rA/_bod skad du/_phyir zlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen 
[\[226a.2\]]po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/_phyir zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba gshed byed dang byad sel ba/_ro langs dang bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[226a.3\]]chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang /_me'i 'jigs pa dang /_chu'i 'jigs pa dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang /_grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang /_brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa dang /_srul po'i 
[\[226a.4\]]'jigs pa dang /_lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang /_lam log pa dang /_lam du zhugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i 'gro ba so so'i 'jigs pa rmugs par byed pa/_rengs par byed pa/_rmongs par byed pa/_mdog bzang por byed pa/_spro 
[\[226a.5\]]ba yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/_dgra thams cad zlog pa/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_sdig pa thams cad yang dag par byang bar byed pa/_kha rmugs par byed pa/_kha rengs par byed pa/_bzhin mdzes par byed pa brjod par bya'o/_/

[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]mi 'dod cing bdag la lta ba thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o/_/rengs par bgyi'o/_/'khrugs par bgyi'o/_/rmongs par bgyi'o/_/'byung po thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_nad thams cad 'khrul par mdzad ma/_rmongs par mdzad ma/_

[\[227a.7\]]dge ba rnams ni rtag tu 'phel/_/nad med pa yang thob par 'gyur/_/phyir zlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so/[ {D735}]@#/_/'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[227b.2\]]po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bA ma ne twaM na ma s+yA mi twaM na ma s+yA mi bA ma ne/_b+ha ga ba te pi shA tsi/_par+N+Na sha ba ri/_bi shA tsi pA sha paR+shu d+hA ri NI/_yA ni kA ni tsid b+ha yA n+yu ta pa d+yaM te/_yaHkA tsid mA ra yo/_yaHkA tsid ma hA mA ra yo/_ye ke na tsid u pa dra bAH/_ye 
[\[227b.3\]]ke tsid u pA yA sA/_ye ke tsid ad+h+yAt+mi kA b+ha yA/_ye ke tsid u pa sar+g+ga saM bad d+ha bA/_ut+pa d+ya na te/_sarbA ni tA ni/_sarba sta/_sarba te bA la tA/_e bo ta pa d+yan+te/_na paN+Di ta taH/_ta da ne na sa t+ye na sa t+ya ba tsa ne na sa t+ya pA ke na/_tad+ya thA/_oM dzaHdzAHdzaHdzAHe b+hi 
[\[227b.4\]]ShaH_paN+DI ta a d+hiSh+Thi tai ra man+t+ra pa dai ra/_ma ma sarba satwA nA na tsa/_rak+ShaM ku ru pa ri trA NaM ku ru/_pa ri gra haM ku ru/_pa ri pA la naM ku ru/_shAn+tiM ku ru swa s+t+ya ya naM ku ru/_daN+Da pa ri hA raM ku ru/_sha s+t+ra pa ri hA raM ku ru/_yA bad ba Shi d+hu Sha NaM ku ru/_ag ni pa ri hA raM ku ru/_u da ka 
[\[227b.5\]]pa ri hA raM ku ru/_ka kho re da ts+tshe da naM ku ru/_sI mAM ban+d+haM ku ru/_d+ha ra NI ban+d+haM ku ru/_tad+ya thA/_a mi te a mi te/_a mi tod b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be/_a swa te/_a swa s+t+yaM ge_/mA ma ra mA ma ra/_mA sa ra mA sa ra/_sha ma pra sha ma/_u pa sa ma sarba bya d+hI nu pa sa ma sarba 
[\[227b.6\]]a kA la mr-i t+yu nu pa sa ma sarba nak+Sha tra gra ha do ShA nu pa sa ma/_sarba diSh+T+rI NAM/_tso sa sa ma/_b+ha ga ba ti/_par+N+Na sha ba ri/_t+yuM na t+yuM na/_bi t+yuM na bi t+yuM na/_tu na tu na tu mu le swA hA/_oM gau re gan+d+ha ri tsau rI tsaN+DA li mA taM gi_/puk+kA sI swA hA/_na maHsarba sha ba rA NAM/_ma hA sha ba rA NAM/_b+ha ga ba ti pi 
[\[227b.7\]]shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/_oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri hrIHdzaHhU~M phaT pi shA tsi swA hA/_oM aM ku re/_maM ku re ku ra re par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/_gnag nad la srad bu byas te/_brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud de/_sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang bcas pas bzlas 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ba tshul bzhin du byas la/_de'i rjes la nad pa'am/_rta dang ba lang la sogs pa la spos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus te de'i mgo la bcing na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma he dang /_ra lug rnams la gnod pa byung ba la yang lhas su bri bar 
[\[228a.2\]]bya'o/_/bum pa chu gtsang mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags nas bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/snga dro phyugs kyi lhas su song la dri dang me tog gi gtor ma byas te/_bum pa sar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags te/_phyugs lhas kyi sgor rta babs 
[\[228a.3\]]gzugs shing /_rta babs de la chu shing gi lo ma la rig pa gi'u wang gis bris te/_rta babs kyi khar gdags so/_/de nas phyugs thams cad gzas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo de nas gzud do/_/gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags 
[\[228a.4\]]nas mi bzhis chus gtor na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du zhag bdun du byas na dad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mi nad dang /_phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te/_mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so/_/stag gi 'jigs pa la 
[\[228a.5\]]dril bu la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o/_/chu srin gyi 'jigs pa la mnga' dang /_pha gu la sngags na sbrul dang /_byi ba dang /_sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro/_/g.yul ngor thal ba la sngags te/_spyi bo dang mgul du byugs na mtshon 
[\[228a.6\]]cha zlog par byed do/_/skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nad pa'i khri la bcing ngo /_/bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pas khrus bya'o/_/lag pa'i skud pa la bzlas nas bcing ngo /_/de nas bde bar 'gyur ro/_/yul bskor te dril bu dang /_
[\[228a.7\]]rnga dang /_dung la bzlas pa byas na bgegs thams cad 'byer te gnod pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dpa' bo'i dpral bar rig pa'i mdongs gzhag la mtshon cha bskur na dgra'am g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]{D736}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya par+N+Na sha ba ri nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de

[\[228b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das ma mi'u thung sha za mo ri khrod lo ma gyon ma dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jigs pa gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad dang yams kyi nad gang ci 'byung

[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]a mr-i ta saM b+ha be/_A shwa ste/_A shwa staM ge_/mA ma ra mA ma ra/_mA sa ra mA sa ra zhi bar mdzod/_nad thams cad nye bar mdzod/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/_gza' dang rgyu skar gyi nyes pa thams cad

[\[229a.4\]{D737}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ba la ba tI nA ma pra t+yaM gi rA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_sems

[\[229b.1\]]yongs su gzung du gsol/_yongs su bskyang du gsol/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/_chad pa spong bar mdzad du gsol/_mtshon cha spong bar mdzad du gsol/_mtshams gcad par mdzad du gsol/_sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/_

[\[229b.4\]]gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D738}]@#/_/dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/_lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_/rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/_/mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/_/shes rab dkyil 
[\[229b.5\]]'khor mang la skyabs su mchi/_/phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma/_/'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shes/_/drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs/_/de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung /_/sems can don phyir

[\[229b.7\]]pa/_/dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs/_/de la lha dbang tshangs tshogs shin tu 'dud/_/byams shing bzod ldan snying rje skyed pa'i ma/_/lha mo mchog ste 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/_/thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags/_/shes rab zab cing 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]shes pa'i rten byed kyang /_/rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag_/'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la/_/sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas/_/mu su rtog ge pa rnams kun kyang 'dud/_/yan lag rnam par 'byes 
[\[230a.2\]]shing gsung snyan pa/_/yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings/_/rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/_/blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig_/sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/_/mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la 
[\[230a.3\]]bzhugs/_/thugs dam brtan bcas bskul pa rnams la yang /_/dpal gyis dgongs shing don kun nye bar skongs/_/'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/_/sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te/_/phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang /_/
[\[230a.4\]]dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/_/gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/_/dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can/_/lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang /_/yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/_/byang chub mchog gi spyod 
[\[230a.5\]]phyir su dag mos/_/bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i/_/lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/_/bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol/_/bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang /_/lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la/_/rig 
[\[230a.6\]]pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang /_/bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol/_/rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben/_/snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod/_/mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par bri 'dod ltar/_/mtshan nyid rtogs dka' 
[\[230a.7\]]yon tan gting mtha' med/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_brah+ma ni/_na maHswa ra swa t+yai de bi sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA daM brah+mA nu man+t+ra swA hA/_dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so/[ {D739}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya shrI ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha mo chen mo 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]dpal lung bstan pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[230b.2\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /_
[\[230b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[230b.4\]]sel ba dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang /_
[\[230b.5\]]'jig rten 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[230b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 
[\[230b.7\]]tu 'dug go/_/lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang mgo bos 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis 
[\[231a.2\]]bstod cing bsngags so/_/lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'am/_
[\[231a.3\]]blon po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal kyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod 
[\[231a.4\]]pa 'di 'chang na/_rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang /_sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang g.yo can dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_
[\[231a.5\]]nor dang 'bru dang /_mdzod dang bang pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[231a.6\]]'das gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so/_/legs lags te/_gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang /_thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang phan yon ni de dag lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[231a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo chen mo dpal 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ban de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho baiDUr+ya dang /_gser 
[\[231b.2\]]gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 
[\[231b.3\]]'phel ba dang /_'grub par byed pa dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /_nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang /_lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa 
[\[231b.4\]]dang /_nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang /_dbul ba gcod bar byed pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs 
[\[231b.5\]]par byed pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[231b.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /_gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[231b.7\]]gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal 
[\[232a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 
[\[232a.3\]]rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[232a.4\]]gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi dpal 
[\[232a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[232a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od 
[\[232a.7\]]tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[232b.2\]]pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[232b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[232b.4\]]gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te/_bcang bar bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 
[\[232b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/_lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[232b.6\]]sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/_'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas 
[\[232b.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]pad+ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi 
[\[233a.2\]]ming rnam par nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/_lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/_lha thams cad kyi ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/_
[\[233a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/_lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/_gnas thams cad 
[\[233a.4\]]yod pa'i dpal/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/_rig sngags 'chang dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/_'jig 
[\[233a.5\]]rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo/_/oM nyi ma'i bu mo'am/_yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal/_bkra shis ma/_sems can gyi ma/_rgyal ma/_rnam par rgyal ma/_gang gA ma/_mu stegs thams cad ma/_bkra 
[\[233a.6\]]shis thams cad ma/_dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/_sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/_rgyags byed ma/_zla ba'i dpal/_nyi ma'i dpal/_gza' thams cad kyi dpal/_seng ge la zhon ma/_pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/_pad+ma/_pad+ma las byung ma/_pad+ma la 
[\[233a.7\]]gnas ma/_pad+ma 'dzin ma/_pad+ma dang ldan ma/_rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba dum dang ldan ma/_nor sbyin ma/_dkar mo dkar mo chen mo/_/lag dkar ma/_bkra shis thams cad 'dzin ma/_bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/_shes nyen can gyi bu mo/_
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]lag pa 'bum ldan ma/_mig 'bum ldan ma/_mgo 'bum ldan ma/_nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/_gzugs bzang ma/_kun gyi gzugs can ma/_grags ma/_shin tu grags ma/_zhi ma/_sprin 'dra ba'i skra gtsang ma/_zla ba ltar mdzes ma/_dge ma/_dge byed ma/_
[\[233b.2\]]sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/_'phags ma me tog gi dpal me tog gi dbang phyug ma/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/_chu klung dang /_mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/_chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/_mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i 
[\[233b.3\]]dpal/_sman dang /_rtswa dang /_nags tshal dang /_nor dang 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/_gser sbyin ma/_zas dang skom sbyin ma/_'od gsal ma/_snang ma/_lus gtsang ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/_lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/_
[\[233b.4\]]gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/_sbyin byed ma/_longs spyod ma/_gzi brjid ma/_gzi brjid ldan ma/_phun sum tshogs ma/_'byor pa ma/_rnam par 'phel ma/_mthong ma/_chos kyi dpal ma/_khyab 'jug la rten ma/_ku mu da la 
[\[233b.5\]]gnas ma/_gnod sbyin ma/_bzod sbyin ma/_mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma/_dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag ldan ma/_bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jigs byed ma/_bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/_sa thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/_rig sngags 
[\[233b.6\]]'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/_'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/_lha'i gnas dang /_lha thams cad kyi dpal/_bzlas brjod dang /_bzlas brjod du bya ba dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_
[\[233b.7\]]sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang /_bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/_'od ldan ma/_mchog dga' ma/_skal bas 'gyur ma/_drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/_bud med thams cad kyi gnas kun gyi gtso mo dpal gyi mchog_/mi'am ci mo thams cad dang /_lha ma yin mo thams 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]cad kyi dpal gyi mchog_/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/_yid 'ong ma/_sim byed ma/_lus ngan la sdug ma/_chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/_oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig_/thar bar mdzod cig_/bsod nams kyi 
[\[234a.2\]]tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/_oM gang ga sarba ti R+tha mu khe swA hA/_oM sarba bid tre swA hA/_sarba maM ga la d+hA ra NI swA hA/_tsa tu ra ba de sarba nak+Sha tra/_grA hA ga_/nA hA ga_/_nA d+hA mU rta ye swA hA/_prah+mA ya swA hA/_biSh+Na be swA hA/_rudrA ya swA hA/_bi shwa mu khA ya swA hA/_
[\[234a.3\]]oM gri ni gri na sarba kar+ya sA d+ha ni/_si ni si ni/_A bA hA/_de ba hA/_bai shra ma nA ya swA hA/_su bar+Na/_d+ha na d+ha n+ya/_A kaR+ShaN+yai swA hA/_sarba puN+yA A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/_shrI he ba te A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/_sarba pA pa na sha mai swA hA/_sarba a la k+Sh+mI pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ye swA hA/_
[\[234a.4\]]sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shri ye A yuR+ba la par+Na ke ra ye swA hA/_sarba bid twa maM ga la ha stA ya swA hA/_siM ha ba ha na nai swA hA/_pad+ma saM b+hU ta ye swA hA/_sarba kr-id ti ka kho rda ba ni sha mai swA hA/_'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi 
[\[234a.5\]]ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/_sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/_bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/_dpal dang bde ba dang /_skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang /_de bzhin 
[\[234a.6\]]gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang /_klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/_sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/_lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsan+dan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_
[\[234a.7\]]bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/_lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed par byed par 'gyur/_de'i dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lha mo chen mo'i dpal de dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan 
[\[234b.2\]]pa rdzogs so//[ {D740}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA lak+Sh+mi NI sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na 
[\[234b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig
