[\[234b.4\]]tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_de ma yin pa 
[\[234b.5\]]gzhan yang rung ste/_gang gis shes pa dang /_gang la la 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[234b.6\]]dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/_dpal ldan ma/_bkra shis ma/_pad+ma'i phreng ba can/_nor gyi bdag mo/_dkar mo/_grags pa chen mo/_pad+ma'i spyan/_'od chen mo/_byed pa mo/_zas sbyin ma/_rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/_dpal chen mo/_s+yAd ya the daM/_
[\[234b.7\]]dzi ni/_g+h+ri ni/_sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/_sha shi ni/_a lak+Sh+mi ni/_me nA sha ya/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dAHswA hA/_a b+h+r-i ku TI pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/_lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/_gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang po dang ldan 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad par byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa dang /_
[\[235a.2\]]bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[235a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so//_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[235a.4\]{D741}]@#/_/dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[235a.5\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[235a.6\]]'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[235a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te/_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_sgrub par byed pa dang /_rjod par yang byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/_/dpal lha mo chen mo'i 
[\[235b.2\]]ming bcu gnyis ni 'di lta ste/_bkra shis ma/_dpal ldan ma/_pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma/_nor bdag ma/_dkar sham ma/_grags chen ma/_pad+ma spyan mnga' ma/_'od chen ma/_byed pa mo/_zas sbyin ma/_rin chen 'od ldan ma/_dpal chen 
[\[235b.3\]]mo ma/_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_dzi ni/_g+h+ri Ni/_dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad ma/_si mi si mi/_ni mi ni mi/_
[\[235b.4\]]bdag gi mi shes pa thams cad bsal bar mdzod cig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o//
[\[235b.5\]]dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D742}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_a gra bid+yA man+t+ra/_
[\[235b.6\]]bod skad du/_mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/_bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa/_gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/_longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/_dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/_'khor 'phel bar 
[\[235b.7\]]byed pa/_tshe 'phel bar byed pa/_dgra zhi bar byed pa/_bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/_sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]shad+khi ni de bi ta A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_tiSh+Tha d+ha ne d+ha na dza ye/_brI brI br-I d+d+hi ka ri/_d+h+ri d+h+ri/_d+h+r-i ti ka rI nA na/_bi bi d+yA be sha bsta/_A yur+d+ha ra Ni yu yu/_A yuSh+bA la ni ta thA ga tA sma ra bo d+hi tsit+ta/_ma tI laM bo da ra/_de hi me bar na shad+bi ni swA hA/_bdag dge ba 'di nyid kyis sprul pa'i sku 'di 
[\[236a.2\]]nyid du mthong bar gyur cig_/stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig_/stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig_/stong pa nyid kyis don byed par gyur cig_/'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs 
[\[236a.3\]]so//[ {D743}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM kaM ka ni kaM 
[\[236a.4\]]ka ni/_ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/_tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/_trA sa ni trA sa ni/_pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/_sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni me swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di'i chog ni 'di yin te/_rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du bzlas brjod 
[\[236a.5\]]byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/lus la 'chang ngam glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[236a.6\]]ro/_/gang zhig snying rjes non te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/_'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am stong ngam 'bum brjod na sems 
[\[236a.7\]]can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sa'am til lam yungs kar ram chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/_khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa'am/_yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/_rig sngags kyang bris te 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]mgo bo la btags na de ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te dus gsum du gos brje zhing kha zas 
[\[236b.2\]]mi za ba'am yang na zas dkar bag bza' zhing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la legs 
[\[236b.3\]]so/_/zhes bya ba yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod rten 'bum byas la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang /_
[\[236b.4\]]yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags pa'i dge 
[\[236b.5\]]'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas 'di che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig_/'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba yang 
[\[236b.6\]]byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'am/_dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/_'phags pa la skur pa btab pa yang rung ste 'chi kar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na/_de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/_'don pa dang bzlas brjod 
[\[236b.7\]]byed pa lta ci smos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur da'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]{D744}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra pA tA la nA ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi 
[\[237a.2\]]gtsug lag khang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_lha'i tshogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[237a.3\]]sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang /_blo gros thams cad pa dang /_blo gros 'phel ba dang /_'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa'i blo gros dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_kun du bzang po dang /_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[237a.4\]]nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bu dang /_mi thub bsrel dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu drug dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la 'di lta ste/_rab 
[\[237a.5\]]'byor dang /_ka t+ya'i bu dang /_'od srung dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_glang po'i mchod rten dang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_de dag la sogs pa nyan thos stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor cing mdun du 
[\[237a.6\]]bdar te bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_ci'i skyes bu dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang du chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[237a.7\]]kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_dri ma med pa'i blo gros khyod kyis shar phyogs kyi snang ba chen po 'di mthong ngam/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros stan las langs te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos mngon par btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/shar phyogs kyi ngos kyi snang ba shin tu chen po yongs su 'phro ba 'di 'tshal 
[\[237b.2\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i snang ba 'di ci lags/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di sus bgyis pa bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol 
[\[237b.3\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cung zad bzhad pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dri ma med pa'i blo gros 'dir byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang tshim pas rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing 
[\[237b.4\]]gzhan yang lha ma yin dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po stong phrag rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pa'i snang ba yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de nyid du 'khor 'dus 
[\[237b.5\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor der phyin par gyur to/_/phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod par mkhyen nas mkhyen bzhin du dgyes 
[\[237b.6\]]shing rangs pas yongs su dris pa/_lag na rdo rje gal te nga'i thad du cung zad gleng bar 'dod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pas gdon mi za bar rtogs par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[237b.7\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas/_de nas yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas ngo phab ste/_cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]'khod par gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rig pa'i rgyal po dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'khor thams cad spro ba'i sems su gyur pas cang mi smra bar 'khod kyis smros shig smros shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[238a.2\]]dang /_lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na bdag lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len zhes bya bas nye bar bos te/_lha ma yin gyi 'khor chen pos yongs su bskor nas rang gi gnas su mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas 
[\[238a.3\]]der bdag gis sngon ma 'tshal ba'i khang pa dang /_sgo dang /_rta babs dang /_yang thog dang /_phyir dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing dang /_khron pa dang /_sgo dang /_sgo gseng rnams mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gang gis kyang sngon ma 'tshal 
[\[238a.4\]]te/_bdag gis de'i rnam par rnal 'byor pas bsam gtan mchog la mnyam par bzhag lags so/_/der lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis bdag la bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang stobs dang rnam par rol bas nam mkha' khyab pa'i sku 
[\[238a.5\]]mnga' ba/_'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gnas khang na nyams mi dga' ba cung zad kyang ma mchis na/_gang gi don du bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa 
[\[238a.6\]]lags par bka' stsal du gsol zhes mchi'o/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po des sgyu ma thams cad dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_sgo glegs la sogs pa gleng lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de zil gyis mnan pa'i byir snang ba chen po 'dzin pa'i rdo rje khro bo chen po rdo rje sa 'og 
[\[238a.7\]]ces bgyi ba 'khrul 'khor thams cad kyi bla ma'i bla mar gyur pa/_'khrul 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_nye bar zhi bar byed pa/_ltung bar byed pa/_nges par 'joms par byed pa bshad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rjes su mkhyen no/_/bdag 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]gis dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bshad pa dang /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la sems can skyabs med pa rnams zhi ba dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'khrul 'khor brgya rtsa 
[\[238b.2\]]brgyad po thams cad 'joms pa'i rdo rjes 'og ces bya ba 'khrul 'khor thams cad kyi bla ma'i bla ma bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje smras pa 'di srog chags rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/_/
[\[238b.3\]]lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das brjod pa 'di bsgrub par dka' ba ma lags kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsgrub par dka' ba brjod par mi 
[\[238b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyi 'khrul 'khor bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa de bdag gis rjes su dran te/_bshad par bgyi lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bdag la rjes su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[238b.5\]]kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas rjes su gnang gis khyod kyis rjes su shod cig_/lag na rdo rje skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'khrul 'khor gyi 
[\[238b.6\]]bla ma rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gsang ba chen po ston cig_/de nas lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas ca co'i sgra yang dang yang du phyung nas rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rdo rje sa 'og gi gsang sngags smras pa/_na mo rat+na tra 
[\[238b.7\]]yA ya/_na mash+tsuN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_o~M hrIH_po tri badzra pA tA la ha na ma tha b+hany+dza pA ta ya mA tsi ra ma badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje khro bo chen pos kun 'od zer gyis snang bar byas te/_sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams rdo rje khro bos 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]gzir bas skyabs med par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smra zhing 'dud par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bsrung du gsol bde bar gshegs pa yongs su bskyang du 
[\[239a.2\]]gsol/_rdo rje khro bos bdag cag yongs su gzir to/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bo 'di bshad pas bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams med par gyur/_sgo gtan rnams med par gyur/_sgo rnams grol bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i sems can 
[\[239a.3\]]rnams kyang byung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ji ltar gnas par bgyi bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig la mnos shig_/de ltar na bde ba la gnas par 'gyur 
[\[239a.4\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la gzigs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje lha ma yin gyi dbang po la sogs pa la rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig ston la bde bar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_phyag na rdo rjes lha ma yin dang 
[\[239a.5\]]lha ma yin gyi chung ma dag la bka' stsal pa/_'dir thog mar rdo rje sa 'og gi khro bo chen po'i sa 'og gi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la gang 'jug pa de dag 'dir 'khrul 'khor chen po'i bla ma'i rtsi sman dang /_phye ma dang /_rtsa ba dang /_sbyar sman dang /_grub pa'i rdzas dang /_dngul chu dang /_
[\[239a.6\]]bcud len dang /_gzhon nu ma dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu ga dang /_sgor 'jug pa dang /_'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms pa dang /_skems par byed pa de dag ni 'jug ngogs bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir sa 'og gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug 
[\[239a.7\]]par bya'o/_/lha ma yin rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bu gar 'jug nus pa dang /_bya ba'i rgyud kyi khams dang /_gser 'gyur dang /_dug sman dang /_sa 'og dang /_zhing gi dngos grub dag rang nyid kyi khang par 'jug pa ltar rdo rje'i bye brag gis 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa smra'o/_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gzhan du na dkyil 'khor ma mthong na nyams par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i rang nyid kyi rtog pa dang /_rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mi bya la/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga 'dod pas bsgrub par mi bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[239b.2\]]stsal pa dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dga' zhing rangs te rab tu tshim pa dang mgu ba skyes nas rang nyid kyis phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas nges par 'byung bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bran du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[239b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha'i mig gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/_grong ngam grong khyer gyi sa'i phyogs legs par brtags nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_rus 
[\[239b.4\]]pa dor nas rgyu skar dge ba la rjes su mthun pa'i tshon rtsi lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/_khru bzhi pa/_sgo bzhi pa/_'dod pa drug pa can yang dag par bri bar bya'o/_/sgo dang sgo'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje dang yungs kar gzhag par bya'o/_/shar phyogs kyi char sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[239b.5\]]ldan 'das bri bar bya'o/_/byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug_/lhor rdo rje 'chang /_nub du chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan can no/_/dbang ldan du dri ma med pa'i blo gros lag par rnga yab 'dzin pa'o/_/mer snying po'o/_/lus ngan du rjes su spyod pa'o/_/rlung du las 
[\[239b.6\]]thams cad pa'o/_/dbus su rdo rjes 'og lag par rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/_/snying po dang rjes su spyod pa la dbyug gu dang thob bri bar bya'o/_/las thams cad pa la rdo rje'o/_/shar gyi sgor sman thams cad dang /_rgyan thams cad dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_
[\[239b.7\]]lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /_grub pa'i rdzas la sogs pa dang /_mig sman dang /_ldong ros dang /_ral gri dang /_rin po che sngon du 'gro ba gzhag par bya'o/_/lho'i sgor lha ma yin brgyad ni stobs can dang /_stobs can gyi bu dang /_bde mchog dang /_thags zangs ris dang /_bde 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]ldan dang /_dus kyi mu khyud dang /_gzhan len dang /_dbyig za'o/_/nub kyi sgor 'khrul 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/_/de yang brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri ste/_srad bu dang /_gri gug dang /_bud med dang /_seng ge dang /_lug dang /_mda' dang 
[\[240a.2\]]bcas pa'i gzhu dang /_chu rgyun dang /_sbyin dang /_'od li dang /_bdag nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams so/_/byang gi sgor bu ga brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri ste de yang lug gi rnam pa dang /_chu srin gyi rnam pa dang /_glang po'i gdong gi rnam pa dang /_lto 'phye'i rnam pa dang /_byi ba'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[240a.3\]]mi'i gdong gi rnam pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang /_ma byas pa'i gdong gi rnam pa'o/_/stegs bu'i mtshams rnams su sgo bral bzhi bri bar bya'o/_/me'i phyogs su me'i thab khung ngo /_/bden bral du bdug spos kyi thab khung ngo /_/rlung gi mtshams rnams su chu'i thab khung ngo /_/
[\[240a.4\]]dbang ldan du rus sbal gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas dri thams cad dang /_me tog thams cad dang /_bdug pa thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma dang mchod pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas skyes bu dpa' bo dag gis dri zhim pos yan lag byugs la shin tu phra ba'i ras kyis 
[\[240a.5\]]gdong g.yog tu bsrung ba byas la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma'i bya ba byas la 'jug par bya'o/_/spyan dang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas so/_/'dir rdul tshon gyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo de la bla mas rjes 
[\[240a.6\]]su gnang ba byin la dam tshig shes pas 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma'i phyag rgya'am/_lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya bcings pas dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi chung ma dang khyim rnams su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan len gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad las khyad par du 
[\[240a.7\]]'phags pa'i rdzas rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rjes 'og gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya dang sngags su gyur pa ni sor mo phan tshun khu tshur du byas la mthe bo sbrul mgo'i rnam 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa ltar byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags ni dzi na dzika_/gnyen gyi phyogs su pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni A ro lika_/lho phyogs su rat+na d+h+r-ika_/byang phyogs su pad+ma d+h+r-ika_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni badzra d+hAM ka/
[\[240b.2\]]mthe chung dang ming med sbyar la rtse gcig tu byas pa la sdigs mdzub bzhag pa ni rdo rje sa 'og gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags ni na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_o~M hrIH_po hri badzra pA tA la ha na ma tha b+hany+dza pA tA ya/_mA ci raM badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_rtsa ba'i 
[\[240b.3\]]sngags dang phyag rgyas lus thams cad byin gyis brlab bo/_/phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las ming med kyi rtse mo sbyar la mthe chung sbas te/_gung mo dang mthe bo'i rtse sbyar la g.yon pa'i mdzub mos phyi nas bkug ste/_g.yas pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam pa ltar bskum pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i 
[\[240b.4\]]phyag rgya'o/_/g.yas pa'i lag pa dang g.yon pa'i lag pa mnyam par bzhag la mthe bong mdzub mo sbyar te/_g.yas pa'i mthe bos sor mo gsum gyi sen mo bkab la mnyam par mdzub mo g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i rtsa bar sbyar ba ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa la'o/_/
[\[240b.5\]]o~M bi b+hin+da bi b+hin+da na hU~M phaT swA hA/_snying gar ro/_/o~M badzra pA tA la hU~M phaT/_spyi bor ro/_/o~M haHbadzra hU~M phaT spyi gtsug go/_/o~M hrIHban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/_go cha'o/_/o~M badzra badzra sa hA shrI shi ra se dz+wa li ta a na la ha na b+hany+dza uts+tsa Ta ya hU~M phaT/_mtshams bcing ba'i sngags so/_/'di dag dang rtsa 
[\[240b.6\]]ba'i phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o/_/lag mthil mnyam por byas te mthe bong dang mthe chung sbyar la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di ni las thams cad pa sa gsum gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags ni/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_hi ri 
[\[240b.7\]]mi ri b+hi ri ri Ni swA hA/_so sor sbyar bar bya'o/_/sor mo phan tshun sbyar la khu tshur du byas te gung mo brkyang la sbyar nas de'i phyi rol tu mdzub mo cung zad bskums la mthe bong gnyis dbus su bzhag pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags ni/_na maH_sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM ru drA ya swA hA/_dbang phyug 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]chen po'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba 'di ni lha mo chu lon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags ni/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM u ma ye swA hA/_thal mo phye ba las mthe chung rtse mo sbyar la de'i rgyab tu srin lag sbyar nas de'i tshe tshigs gsum par gung mo gnyis sbyar la de'i tshigs dang por 
[\[241a.2\]]mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni lha ma yin thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/gnyis ka yang rdo rje mtshan nyid dang gcig tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/lha ma yin thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor 'joms shing 'byed pa'i phyag rgya ni 'dir sor mo rnams rnam par bzlog la rus sbal gyi rnam par bya ba ni rus 
[\[241a.3\]]sbal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/spyi bor bzhag pa ni lha ma yin thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa 'og tu bzhag la de'i steng du lag pa g.yas pa sbyar la mthe bong so sor bya ba 'di ni rus sbal dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa lag pa 
[\[241a.4\]]g.yas pa rdo rje thur du bzhag la thad kar sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya gzhan no/_/bla 'og gi lag pa rnam par bzlog la snying gar sor mo gyen du byas la mthe bong mnyam par gshibs pa ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rjes 'og gi mdzub mo steng du mnyam du gzhibs pa 
[\[241a.5\]]ni rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o/_/khu tshur byas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang la gung mo dang srin lag gi steng du mthe bong sbyar ba ni dbyug gu'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mthe bong mdzub mo'i rtsa bar sbyar ba ni tho ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/khu tshur du byas la gung mo dang mthe bong mnyam por sbyar ba ni bya rog gi mchu'i 
[\[241a.6\]]phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i tshul du byas la snying ga'i phyogs su sbyar la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje steng du phyar nas rkang pa brkyang bskum du gnas pa ni rdo rje smod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag la/_lag pa g.yas pa'i sor 
[\[241a.7\]]mo gsum gyis rgyas btab nas brkyang bskum du gnas pa 'di ni rdo rje gzhan la smod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags ni o~M bi b+hin+da bi b+hin+da hUM phaT/_'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud ci snyed pa las sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//gang gi tshe skyes bu dpa' bo dpal 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gyi sgor 'jug par 'dod par gyur na/_des rdo rje khro bo'i bsnyen pa sngon du byas la phyis 'jug par bya'o/_/de la sngon du bsnyen pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad slong mo za zhing smra ba bcad la/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la dga' bas rten cing 'brel 
[\[241b.2\]]par 'byung ba'i snying po'i mchod rten byas la/_de'i mdun du ri bo'am chu bo 'dus pa'am/_shing gcig pa'am/_ba lang gi lhas sam/_bas mtha' 'am/_mchod rten gang yang rung ba'i gnas su byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab 
[\[241b.3\]]nas sdig pa bshags te/_bla na med par bsngos la dam pa'i chos bton te rjes su dran par byas la/_mchod rten gyi las la rjes su gnas nas lus dang srog la dga' ba dor te/_dus gsum du phyag rgya dang /_dbang bskur zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis 
[\[241b.4\]]bsnyen pa bya'o/_/gang dag rmi lam mam/_mngon sum mtshan ma mthong na re shig mi 'jug ste/_de yang rmi lam ni glang po che chen pos zil gyis mnan pa'am/_gzir ba'am/_bros pa 'am/_'gyel ba'am/_gang dag shi ba de lta bu mthong na de nas 'jug par bya'o/_/yang na mngon 
[\[241b.5\]]sum ste sgo 'phar gyi mtshams bcom pa'am/_rdo chen po ltung ba'am/_khros nas gza' chen po 'gugs pa'am/_gdug pa rnams dang /_gtum po dang /_'jigs byed dang /_klu dang /_glang po che chen po dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_ma he dang /_dgra'i dbus su phyin yang 
[\[241b.6\]]blta dka' bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems su gyur na de nas 'jug par bya'o/_/lha thams cad mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro/_/'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje sa 'og gi sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//bu ga'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba/_/
[\[241b.7\]]chu 'bab gang dag rtse mo med/_/sa yi sgra ni sgrogs pa dang /_/ltos 'phye'i gnas khang ji lta bar/_/rdo rje sa 'og mtshan nyid ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni mtshon par bya/_/rnam pa gang gi tshul gyis ni/_/bu ga rnams su brjod pa yi/_/'jug pa na ni dog gyur la/_/bu ga der 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]ni phyin pa na/_/kun nas sa gzhi mnyam pa ni/_/dpal gyi sgor ni rnam par bstan/_/gla rtsi mchog gi dri ldan zhing /_/'khril shing lcug mas khyab pa dang /_/dri snum ldan pa'i kha dog can/_/dpal gyi sgor ni de bshad do/_/dri dang ldan zhing ngos brlan pa/_/dro ba yis 
[\[242a.2\]]ni 'khrugs 'gyur ba/_/zhugs pa tsam gyis yang dang yang /_/'khrug pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni/_/dpal gyi sgor ni de shes bya/_/de na dngul chu yod par bstan/_/bu ga yi ni sgor zhugs pas/_/de yi sems ni 'dod ldan 'gyur/_/khro bo'i sems su gyur pa na/_/bu gar mdzes ma gnas 
[\[242a.3\]]ba yin/_/'jigs pa med cing nga rgyal dang /_/rlom pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis/_/der ni zhugs pas tshim 'gyur na/_/bu gar dkar rdzas ldan pas khyab/_/bu ga dag ni gang dag tu/_/tshul med nga rgyal can khro ba/_/brtse med ser sna dang ldan zhing /_/phan tshun du ni smod byed pa/_/
[\[242a.4\]]yang na bu ga'i sgo na ni/_/srin bu rnams ni rten gyur pa/_/der ni ltos 'phye shes bya ste/_/bu ga der ni rnyed dka'o/_/gang dag dkar po'i bya ba ni/_/bug sgor yang dag gnas mthong na/_/de na bud med stong phrag gnas/_/gser ni rnam pa du ma gnas/_/nor bu mu tig byi ru dang /_/
[\[242a.5\]]rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/bcud len du ma'i rdzas rnams ni/_/bu ga mchog der gnas pa yin/_/bu ga gang gi sgo la ni/_/rkang gdub sgra ni grag gyur na/_/bu ga de ni rin chen gang /_/bud med stong phrag de na gnas/_/bu ga gang gi sgo na ni/_/tshad bye'u gar byed gnas gyur 
[\[242a.6\]]na/_/bu ga de ni 'bras med shes/_/der ni blo ldan 'jug mi bya/_/gang gi nang na rkang gnyis ni/_/yang dag rten par mthong gyur na/_/der ni rab tu spro ba yis/_/mkhas ba yis ni 'jug par bya/_/mi gang 'thungs pas 'chi med pa'i/_/mchog gi bcud len de na gnas/_/gang 
[\[242a.7\]]dag bu ga'i sgo la ni/_/glang po yang dag rten mthong nas/_/mthong nas ma mthong gyur na ni/_/bu ga des ni las kun byed/_/gang dag bu ga der 'jug pa'i/_/ltos 'phye'i dbang phyug rnam mthong na/_/dpa' bos der ni 'jug mi bya/_/de ma thag tu srog 'phrog byed/_/bu ga'i drung 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]na 'jigs byed pa'i/_/ce spyang mo yi sgra grag na/_/der ni bag med mi bya ste/_/'khor dang bcas pa skrag par 'gyur/_/gang khrung khrung sgra sgrogs pa/_/bu ga'i nang na gnas gyur na/_/bu ga de ni kun gyis gang /_/'dod pa rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/_/gang dag bu ga'i sgor 
[\[242b.2\]]rten pa'i/_/nya ni yang dag mthong gyur na/_/der ni brtson pas 'jug par bya/_/bud med stong gi bdag por 'gyur/_/bud med gzhon nu bum pa'i lag_/bu ga'i sgor ni yang dag mthong /_/gdon mi za bar bu ga'i las/_/der ni grub par shes par bya/_/bu ga'i las la 'jug 
[\[242b.3\]]pa na/_sgra skad chen po byung gyur na/_/bu ga de ni mtha' med shes/_/der ni grub par rjes su bstan/_/bu ga yi ni sgo ru yang /_/byi ba ka ka ru dkar po/_/gang dag lhan cig gnas mthong na/_/bu ga de ni las kun byed/_/bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/_/der ni ras kyi dri byung na/_/
[\[242b.4\]]bu mo rnams ni stong phrag dag_/dgu dang bdun brgya rnams dang ni/_/bcud kyis len dang gser dang ni/_/rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/_/gang du bzhugs pa'i 'byung 'gyur ba/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog rgyas/_/de na dngul chu gnas pa na/_/mkhas pa yis ni blang bar bya/_/
[\[242b.5\]]bu ga gang na sgre mo ni/_/gnas par mthong na bu ga de/_/'khrul 'khor med par shes byas la/_/der ni brtag dpyad mi bya'o/_/bud med dag ni chig stong dang /_/brgya phrag dag ni bcu gnyis ni/_/pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam zhing /_/rtag tu rol pas spyod par byed/_/thams 
[\[242b.6\]]cad kyang ni tshul gcig cing /_/kun gyis mthong na dga' ba'o/_/de la rin chen du ma dang /_/gos dag dang ni rgyan dag dang /_/bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'o/_/de nas ldong ros dag dang ni/_/mig sman dang ni dngul chu dang /_/mdzes pa'i mtshon 
[\[242b.7\]]cha sna tshogs rnams/_/bu ga'i grong gi mchog na'o/_/bu ga de yi nang 'gram na/_/du ba 'thul ba mthong gyur na/_/gser ni rnam pa mang po dang /_/der ni dngul chur shes par bya/_/bu ga de yi logs la ni/_/tshangs pa kha dog sna tshogs pa'am/_/rang bzhin dkar po rten gyur na/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bu ga de yang las kun byed/_/dbus nas mchi ma 'dzag pa yi/_/bya rog 'thon pa gang yin pa/_/de ni bza' ba sna tshogs pa'i/_/bu ga ru ni rnam par bstan/_/gang na ma he mthong ba na/_/khyad par du ni sprin gyi mdog_/bu ga der ni 'bad pa yis/_/mkhas 
[\[243a.2\]]pa yis ni 'jug par bya/_/ma myos pa dang lhan cig tu/_/lag na ral gris rgyun du ni/_/bu ga der ni dor bar bya/_/thams cad du ni byang gi char/_/zab mo sprin gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/_/dngul chu der ni shes par bya/_/gang na me tog dri yod cing /_/khyad par du ni spang spos dri/_/
[\[243a.3\]]bu ga de yi nang na ni/_/bud med gnas par rnam par bstan/_/'jug pa pos ni khyad par du/_/der ni the tshom mi bya'o/_/de nas ra ba rnam lnga dang /_/rgyal po'i sgo dang rta babs dang /_/gser gyi rang bzhin ka ba ni/_/bud med rin chen rnams kyis spras/_/bcud len 
[\[243a.4\]]rnams dang rin chen rnams/_/gdon mi za bar de na gnas/_/bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/_/gang na pad+ma'i dri yod pa/_/gzhan len bu gar der shes bya/_/'dod pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/brtul zhugs can gyis der 'jug go/_/brtul zhugs med pas nam yang min/_/
[\[243a.5\]]de na rnam pa du ma gnas/_/gang 'dod de ni brtag par bya/_/bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/_/gang na sbrang rtsi'i dri yod na/_/bu ga'i logs ni thams cad la/_/de na bung ba yod pa ste/_/de la the tshom mi bya'o/_/de na gnas pa'i bung ba sogs/_/rig pa 'dzin pa khyad par du/_/
[\[243a.6\]]sngags grub pa la rtsed mi 'gyur/_/bu ga'i sgo ni thams cad du/_/gang nas yi dri yod pa/_/sa la'i na chen ji snyed pa/_/rgya mtsho yang ni khyad par du'o/_/lha ma yin rnams kun gyi dang /_/mi yi gtso bo rnams kyi dang /_/gnod sbyin dag ni rnams kyi yang /_/bu ga'i mchog 
[\[243a.7\]]der thams cad gnas/_/rig pa 'dzin pas der zhugs pas/_/'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/bu ga'i nang na lug gi dri/_/gang dag yod na bu ga de/_/'khrul 'khor med par shes par bya/_/'dod pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/chu skyar dang ni chu skyar mo/_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]mnyam du spyod cing lhan cig tu/_/bu ga'i nang na gnas na ni/_/bu ga de yi 'khrul 'khor med/_/de na dngul chu bcu gcig yod/_/de ni bu ga'i dam pa'o/_/bu ga dag ni brkos pa na/_/gang du lugs kong mthong gyur na/_/bu ga de ni rin chen gang /_/mkhas pa yis ni 'jug par 
[\[243b.2\]]bya/_/zhugs pa tsam na mthong 'gyur ba/_/dkyus su dpag tshad phyed pa yi/_/de na thang ni legs par yod/_/'dzam bu chu bo 'dra ba'i 'od/_/der ni mi yis 'bras thob ste/_/lo ni khri phrag brgyar 'tsho'o/_/gang na mi mo sgron ma'i lag_/bu ga'i nang na gnas pa na/_/'di ni de 
[\[243b.3\]]yi bu gar shes/_/gdon mi za bar dngul chus gang /_/bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/_/gang na sha yi dri yod pa/_/srin po rnams kyi bu gar shes/_/blo dang ldan pas der mi 'jug_/bu ga'i drung na gar byed pa'i/_/rma bya mthong na bu ga de/_/'khrul 'khor med par shes par bya/_/
[\[243b.4\]]'dod pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/_/gang na khrag ni mthong ba na/_/gcig pu nyid du der 'jug ste/_/rang gi khyim bzhin 'jigs pa med/_/gang na nya yi dri yod cing /_/khyad par du yang zhag dri yod/_/de dang der ni brtson pa yis/_/mkhas pa yis ni 
[\[243b.5\]]'jug par bya/_/zhugs pas chu rgyun mthong gyur na/_/'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster/_/de yi 'gram du bzang ldan pa'i/_/khang pa rab tu sbyangs gyur pa/_/lha khang dang ni shing khang la/_/ba dan rnams kyis mngon par spras/_/de na rin chen bzang po dang /_/dga' ma 'dra ba'i bud 
[\[243b.6\]]med dang /_/de na dngul chu mang yod par/_/thams cad du ni the tshom med/_/bu ga gang dag brkos pa na/_/khrag gi char pa bab gyur na/_/der ni 'jug par mi bya ste/_/de ma thag tu srog 'phrog byed/_/bu ga brtags shing dpyad pa na/_/gang na mun pa yod gyur na/_/der ni 'jigs 
[\[243b.7\]]pa med par 'jug_/bu ga de ni rang khyim mtshungs/_/bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/_/gang na ras kyi dri yod pa/_/de na rin chen du ma dang /_/dngul chu ldong ros de bzhin du/_/mig sman bzang po rnams dang ni/_/rin chen rnams kyi rgyan dag ni/_/du ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/gser 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ni rnam pa du ma yod/_/bu ga'i nang ni gang dag na/_/sgron ma yi ni dri yod pa/_/de ru yang ni 'jug par bya/_/'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/bu ga yi ni 'gram logs na/_/gang na gdug pa gnas gyur na/_/de ni sha za'i gnas yin zhing /_/'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[244a.2\]]gnas par gdon mi za/_/gang na ha ha'i sgra sgrogs pa/_/dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs la brten/_/bu ga de ni 'jigs shes bya/_/de bas myur bar 'bros par bya/_/gang na sgra dag gis gang bar/_/shar gyi phyogs la yang dag brten/_/der ni 'bad par byas na ni/_/bu ga de 
[\[244a.3\]]yang las kun byed/_/bu ga de yi thon 'khor du/_/gang na rdo rje'i char 'bab na/_/der ni dngul chur shes bya ste/_/sems can thams cad grub par byed/_/bu ga de yi thon 'khor du/_/me tog dri ldan bu ga de/_/'khrul 'khor med par shes par bya/_/'dod pa thams cad 
[\[244a.4\]]sgrub par byed/_/bu ga de yi nang na ni/_/gang na rgyal ba'i sgra yod pa/_/bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya/_/der ni mkhas pas 'jug par bya/_/bu ga yi ni thon 'khor du/_/gang na khyu mchog mthong ba na/_/der yang dpa' bos 'jug par bya/_/bu ga de yi rin chen gang /_/gang 
[\[244a.5\]]na skyes bu gcer bu ni/_/nag po sha khyim chen po dag_/mthong nas yang ni ma mthong na/_/bu ga de yang las kun byed/_/gang na dge sbyong gcer bu dang /_/spyi cer dang ni sna ring po'am/_/gang dag tu ni khyi mthong na/_/der ni grub par bstan pa'o/_/bu ga gang gi thon 'khor du/_/
[\[244a.6\]]rnga mo yi ni dri yod pa/_/bu ga de yi lam gyi rgyud/_/dpag tshad brgya ru shes par bya/_/gang na rtse gsum mtshan nyid ni/_/thams cad du ni mthong ba na/_/mi rnams kyis ni khyad par du/_/bu ga der 'jug nus ma yin/_/gang du me tog dris brgyan pa'i/_/bram ze mthong na bu ga de/_/
[\[244a.7\]]'khrul 'khor med par shes bya ste/_/'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu 'grub/_/bu ga'i sgo ru yang dag brten/_/gang na dkar po'i sbrul yod na/_/der yang brtson par byas nas su/_/mkhas pa yis ni 'jug par bya/_/bu ga'i sgo yi thon 'khor ni/_/gang du dom ni mthong ba na/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya/_/'dod pa kun gyi don grub byed/_/bu ga'i las ni byed pa na/_/gang du phag ni mthong gyur na/_/bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya/_/gdon mi za bar rin chen gang /_/bu ga'i sgo yi thon 'khor na/_/gang na chu yi dri yod pa/_/
[\[244b.2\]]der ni dngul chur shes bya ste/_/sems can kun la phan par byed/_/bu ga de yi thon 'khor na/_/gang la bdug pa'i dri yod pa/_/bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya/_/gdon mi za bar rin chen gang /_/bu ga'i sgo la gnas pa yi/_/gang na bur chang dri yod na/_/bud 
[\[244b.3\]]med rin chen gzugs mdzes dang /_/bza' dang btung bar shes par bya/_/bu ga yi ni thon 'khor na/_/gang na ra yi dri yod pa/_/der yang dpa' bos 'jug bya ste/_/'ga' zhig dang ni 'jug ma yin/_/ma myos par ni zhugs nas su/_/der ni ji ltar 'dod par bsdad/_/
[\[244b.4\]]dad ldan gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang /_/bya ba byas pas khyad par du/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag bya'o/_/de bzhin rig pa'i bdag po dang /_/rig pa'i rgyal po lha mo dang /_/rig pa'i tshogs la'ang khyad par du'o/_/o~M ba ra badzra hU~M phaT/_'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi 
[\[244b.5\]]snying po'o/_/las thams cad pa'i nye ba'i dbang po'ang de nyid do/_/oM hrIHhU~M phaT/_oM bi b+hin+da bi b+hin+da hU~M phaT/_'dis sgo dang 'khrul 'khor gyi phyogs sam/_mchod pa'i dus su bsrung bar bya'o/_/'di ni rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bu ga'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i le'u ste 
[\[244b.6\]]bzhi pa'o//_//sngags pas dpal gyi sgor 'jug par 'dod na des brjod pa dang sbyang ba byas la 'jug par bya'o/_/de la brjod pa ni gang /_sbyang ba ni gang zhe na/_de la thog mar sa rnying pa dang /_chu dang sman gyis lus nye bar byugs la/_ku mu da dang /_ut+pa la dang /_
[\[244b.7\]]ru rta dang /_nir guN+Di dang /_ldong ros mnyam por sbyar ba'i sman gyi dam pa 'dis srin po 'joms pa dang /_dug 'joms shing gzhon nu rnams bskyed 'phel ba dang /_mchod sbyin gyi bgegs sel ba dang /_tshangs pa'i srin po bsrung ba dang /_drag po dang /_skem byed kyis 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bzung ba dang /_gang dag lus srul pos bzung ba dang /_bud med mngal nyams pa rnams kyi nyer gnas la byugs pas bzang por 'gyur ba dang /_de dag gis yan lag byugs pa gang yin pas ni dug ha la ha la yang 'thung bar byed do/_/de dag gis 'dir yan 
[\[245a.2\]]lag byugs nas zhugs pas sgo grol bar 'gyur la/_sgo bsgribs pa de grol nas gang dag mtshams ring du sbyar ba'i rlung yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni brjod pa'o/_/sbyor ba yang ma tu lung ka dang /_ka rany+dza dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i yal ga la sogs pa'i shing rnams kyis bu 
[\[245a.3\]]ga'i sgo bkag la mtshams med par byas te/_sgo 'phar gyis kun nas bsgribs la me sbar bar bya'o/_/gang dag nang na gnas pa'i me rab tu zhi ba ni sbyor ba'o/_/de nas skyes bu dpa' bos bser skya'i lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la bu ga'i sgor mchod pa dang /_
[\[245a.4\]]gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/_a pa mArga'i yam shing la me rab tu sbar la/_a pa mA rga'i 'bras bu dang mar dang /_sbrang rtsi btags te/_sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad khro bo 'khrul 'khor gyi bla mas dbul bar bya'o/_/'dis 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung ba dang brlag par 
[\[245a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas ra'i pags pa'i ral gu gyon la nyi ma shar ba na 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sman gyis lus byugs te/_bya ba byas la grogs bzang po dang 'jug par bya'o/_/shing mngar dang ko bi dar dkar po dang /_ka Du ka blugs pa'i yung ba gnyis kyis sbrul gyi dpa' ba 
[\[245a.6\]]'joms pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa dang /_skyes bu gzhon nu bsrung ba dang /_bud med skal ba bzang por byed pa dang /_'dod pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa dang /_sa'i bdag po rgyas pa ster ba dang /_dgra thams cad rtag tu 
[\[245a.7\]]'joms pa dang /_nyi ma shar ba na dbang du byed par brjod do/_/'dir 'di dag gis lus la byugs la ra'i pags pa'i ral gu gyon te/_chu gri bzung la mun pa'i phyir sgron ma shal ma li'i dog pa las sdong bu byas te/_'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bzlas la rab tu sbar te/_byi ba'i rnam pa yin na byi ba'i zhag dang /_chu srin gyi zhag snga ma bzhin no/_/ji ltar glang po'i gdong gi rnam pa yin na snga ma bzhin du glang po'i zhag gis so/_/ji ltar ltos 'phye'i rnam pa yin na snga ma bzhin du ltos 'phye'i zhag gis so/_/mi'i gdong gi rnam pa 
[\[245b.2\]]yin na mi'i zhag gis shal ma li'i dog ba'i sdong bu steng du bzhag la mun pa'i phyogs su gzung bar bya/_gang gi gdong gi rnam par 'dug pa de'i zhag gis bskus la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la me sbar ro/_/mun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[245b.3\]]'jug pa na lhan cig pa rnams la yang nye bar byug go/_/ta ka ra'i me tog dang /_ru rta dang /_spang spos dang /_sug smel dang /_ut+pa la wa ti dang /_sing g+h+ri dang /_byA g+h+ri dang /_na ma skA ri dang /_a nan tA dang /_dza yan ti dang /_rma bya'i gtsug phud dang /_dung gi me tog ste de dag 
[\[245b.4\]]gi phye mas sgyu ma thams cad 'joms pa dang /_'byed pa dang sreg par brjod do/_/chu dang sbyin dang de bzhin du bcud dang /_bcud len dang /_rnga'i khang bu dang /_dug gi gdug pa dang /_pad+ma'i mtsho dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'gugs pa dang /_dbang du byed pa dang /_bud med 'bebs 
[\[245b.5\]]pa dang /_de dag gi gnas rnams sam/_gzhan du yang skyes bu dpa' bos 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la bsnun par bya'o/_/chur 'jug pa dang /_dug gi du ba dang /_dug gi rlung gis rang gi rkang mthil dang spyi gtsug gi bar du yongs su byugs la 'jug go/_/de dag 
[\[245b.6\]]thams cad las bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jug pa na 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma bzla'o/_/zlos shing 'jug par bya'o/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzi brjid lta bur thams cad kyis tshugs par mi nus te rang gi khyim du 'jug pa bzhin no/_/ra'i 'o ma dang ka ra lhan cig tu badzra tan tu la dang /_
[\[245b.7\]]bslags la khro bo lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zos la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe lha chen po'i khang ba'i lha bshos yod pa las phyogs te/_g.yas phyogs nas bskor la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma zlos shing 'jug par bya'o/_/zhugs pa dang rnga'i dbyug gu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]brdung bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rnga'i sgra grag pa la bud med kyi tshogs ma 'ongs na de nas lha chen po'i lho'i sa la bsdad la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma bzla'o/_/de'i skad cig la bud med kyi tshogs thams cad thad du 'ongs te/_mchod yon sbrengs nas skyes bu dpa' bo rnams 'jug par byed do/_
[\[246a.2\]]zhugs pa dang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shig ces phrin yig gdas par byed do/_/dkon mchog gsum dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rtag tu rjes su dran pas bzlas par bya'o/_/'di ltar bud med kyi dbus su nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma gnas kyi bar du sdod do/_/ji srid 'gro bar 'dod 
[\[246a.3\]]na des sbyar sman gyis bsku ba byugs la/_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_grub pa'i rdzas gang 'dod pa de gzung bar bya'o/_/gzhu'i 'khrul 'khor las byol la yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la bsnun par bya'o/_/de lta na yang mi ltung na de nas 'khrul 'khor de la lho'i rtsa nas 
[\[246a.4\]]bsnun par bya'o/_/de nas ltung ngo /_/thog mar 'khor rnams sngon du btang bdag nyid phyi nas 'jug par bya'o/_/mar me'i mchod sdong la sbyin sreg gi thab nas me sbar la 'jug go/_/khron pa rnams su 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas sgo 'byung ngo /_/khron pa de 
[\[246a.5\]]na yang ta la'i shing sbrul gyi rnam par snang ba la dri ma med pa'i mig sman dang /_rgya spos dang /_ru rta dang /_bA lA dang /_spang spos dang /_ldong ros dang /_gi wang rnams mnyam por skar ma rgyal la sbyar ba'i ril bu byas la sman gyi mchog dug 'joms pa de shes rab can gyis bsnun 
[\[246a.6\]]par bya'o/_/de nas ta la'i shing nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'ba' zhig pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi 
[\[246a.7\]]gnas na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu ba zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje ji ltar lha ma yin thams cad kyi dregs pa gzhom pa dang /_dam tshig la gnas par bya ba'i 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]phyir/_/rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig 'di sgrogs shig_/de nas lag na rdo rje stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la btud nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas rdo rje khro bos smras so/_/smras pa tsam 
[\[246b.2\]]gyis rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po me lce gcig tu 'bar te/_'jig rten gsum bkang nas sgra chen po phyung ngo /_/de nas de lta bu'i mtshan ma chen po des lha ma yin 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'dir lha dang lha ma yin rnams g.yul 'gyed par gyur to snyam du sems te/_lha ma yin rnams 
[\[246b.3\]]la thags zangs ris dang /_stobs can dang /_rnam par snang byed dang /_rab bde dang /_bde mchog dang /_dus kyi mu khyud dang /_dbyig za dang /_rus sbal la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang bgrod dka' chen po dang /_glog gi lce dang /_sgra gcan 
[\[246b.4\]]dang /_snang ba'i phreng ba can dang /_'phrog byed ser skyal sogs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi rjes su dpyod pa dpung dang bcas pa bzhon pa dang bcas pa 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de lta bu'i mtshan ma chen po de 
[\[246b.5\]]mthong nas lha'i tshogs gzhan rnams dang rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa ji lta de ltar lha rnams kye dbang po la smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal 
[\[246b.6\]]pa/_lag na rdo rje gang 'dir dus la bab par shes na deng 'dir sa 'og gi dbang bskur ba rnga'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bas byin gyis rlobs shig_/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang don dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis theg pa chen po la dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[246b.7\]]bu'i don du dam tshig bstan pas byin gyis brlabs lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis kyang byin gyis brlabs lags so/_/de bdag 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gis kyang byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/_/dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bsdad la gnas mchog der mgal du ma dang /_rdo ba dor te/_'khrul 'khor dang shing sdong spangs la gzhan yang bsang gtor dang /_lha'i mchod sbyin dang /_dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur ba byas 
[\[247a.2\]]pa dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_gnod sbyin mchod pa byas pa dang /_dge 'dun dbang bskur ba'i gnas rnams dor la/_der yang chu snum pa dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_ri bo dang snum pa'i phyogs mtshon par byas la de rnams su sngon bzhin du byi dor dang yongs su 
[\[247a.3\]]sbyang ba byas te/_tshon sna lngas gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa'i ri mo bris la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus cha brgyad par byas te/_yungs kar dkar pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[247a.4\]]g.yas kyi drung du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag can gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i drung du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje sa 'og rdo rje sa 'og rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag can gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi drung du byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros rnga yab kyi phyag can gzhag par bya'o/_/
[\[247a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i mdun du khyu mchog kha 'og tu lta ba nag po'i gos can gzhag go/_/shar gyi sgor sman thams cad gzhag par bya ste/_e ra ba ti dang /_me Sha ba ti dang /_dz+yo ti ra sa dang /_be ga ba ti dang /_sUr+ya ba ti dang 
[\[247a.6\]]a dza gan+d+ha dang /_yak+Sha ka n+ya ste/_sman chen po 'di brgyad gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i gzugs ni seng ge dang /_khyu mchog dang /_bya rgod dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbal pa dang /_rtsangs pa dang /_me 'bar ba dang /_dngul chu rnams gnas rnams su [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/sman 
[\[247a.7\]]rnams dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_rigs kyi bud med kyi dbyibs su gzhag par bya'o/_/rgyan rnams dang /_grub pa'i rdzas rnams dang /_ldong ros dang /_mig sman dang /_gi wang dang bum pa bzang po dang /_rkang byug dang /_mchod phyir thogs dang /_'khor lo dang /_ral gri 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dang /_dbyug gu dang /_rtse gsum dang /_zhags pa la sogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i lho'i sgor lha ma yin brgyad bri ste/_stobs can dang /_stobs can gyi bu dang /_bde mchog dang /_dus kyi mu khyud dang /_thags zangs ris dang /_rab bde dang /_gzhan len dang /_dbyig 
[\[247b.2\]]za'o/_/nub kyi sgor 'khrul 'khor sum cu lhag pa'i stong gzhag par bya'o/_/de la 'khrul 'khor chen po brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa gzhag par bya ste/_de la srad bu dang /_gri gug dang /_bud med dang /_gzhi'i 'khrul 'khor dang /_'phang 'dzin pa'i lag pa dang /_'og 
[\[247b.3\]]tu lta ba'i tshul dang /_gzhi'i 'khrul 'khor la lta ba bri bar bya'o/_/de nas seng ge dang /_lug dang /_chu srin dang /_glang po che dang /_lto 'phye'i rnam pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang ma byas pa'i gdong dang /_dpal gyi sgo 'di brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/gdong 
[\[247b.4\]]gi 'khrul 'khor mchu btsums pa bri bar bya'o/_/lug gi spyi bor phur bu'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu dang /_chu rgyun gyi lte bar phur bu gzhag par bya'o/_/sbyin dang 'od li gru bzhi pa dang /_bskor ba'i 'khrul 'khor bri'o/_/gnyid dang /_'od 'phro ba'i 
[\[247b.5\]]rnam pa bri bar bya'o/_/de yang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du rnam pa dang bcas pa'i 'khrul 'khor la phur bus bsnun pa bri bar bya'o/_/de nas byang gi sgor bu ga rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/_seng ge dang /_lug dang /_chu srin dang /_glang po che'i gdong dang /_ltos 'phye'i gdong dang /_ba 
[\[247b.6\]]lang gi gdong dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_ma byas pa'i gdong gi rnam pa ste/_dpal gyi sgo brgyad phur bus bsnun pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i dbus su chu rgyun dbyug gu dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/grwa bzhir sgo bral bzhi bri bar bya'o/_/mer me'i thab khung ngo /_/
[\[247b.7\]]bden bral du du ba'i thab khung ngo /_/rlung du chu'i thab khung ngo /_/dbang ldan du sbrul gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas ras dkar po phra ba dri zhim pa'i gdugs bzhi dang /_dbyig dang bcas pa'i nor bus byin gyis brlabs la shin tu dri zhim pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]rtsa ba nag po med cing dri zhim pos yongs su byugs pa bzhag go/_/phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs grwa bzhi pa'i shar gyi sgor gnas gcig tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po chen po stobs can dang /_bgrod dka' chen po bri bar bya'o/_/de'i lhor rnam par snang byed dang ha ri ta'i pi gi la 
[\[248a.2\]]zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o/_/de'i nub kyi sgor snang ba'i phreng ba can dang rnga bo che ste/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag bri bar bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa sha med pa'i lha bshos bzhi bya ste/_gcig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i blo gros la'o/_/gsum pa ni rdo rje 
[\[248a.3\]]'dzin pa la'o/_/bzhi pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po la'o/_/lnga pa ni lha chen po la'o/_/de nas ji ltar 'byor pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyi gtor ma dang /_'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas dri thams cad dang me tog dang phye ma la sogs pa'i lha bshos sbyin no/_/
[\[248a.4\]]de nas lha rnams sa 'ching bar byed pa'i sngags ni/_oM badzra gar+b+he badzra gar+b+he phaT hA d+hi ki ri Ni swA hA/_de nas mtshams bzhi ru lag pa phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas log 'dren bcing bar bya'o/_/de'i sngags ni na maHsa man+ta badzrANAM/_oM badzra pA la ye swA hA zhes lan gsum du brjod 
[\[248a.5\]]do/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang dgug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lha thams cad me tog gis dgug par bya'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi k+Sha nAM sarba ta thA ga tA nAM a na la b+hA kA nAM na maHswA hA/_de nas skyes bu dpa' bos sngags 'dis bsrung bar bya ste/_
[\[248a.6\]]oM dUrbA re dz+wa la dz+wa la na mo badzra sA ga rA ya swA hA/_'dis bsrungs nas ras dkar po phra ba dri zhim pos gdong g.yogs te 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma bzlas la skyes bu dpa' bos chos kyi gru lta bu'i shing lha ma bskon te/_lag pa g.yas pa rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'am/_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[248a.7\]]phyag rgya bcings la/_rtsa ba nag po med pa'i bum pa lo ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i chus shar gyi sgor 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma zlos shing dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de ltar dbang bskur ba de'i rjes su lag pa rdo rje'i phyag rgyas me tog dor ro/_/me tog gang la ltung ba de'i lha'i rigs 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]'grub bo/_/de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba de la skyes bu dpa' bos dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang /_mtshon cha dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_bud med kyi tshogs dang /_grub pa'i rdzas dang de dag gi 
[\[248b.2\]]dkyil 'khor mthong na/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi dam tshig gi tshogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas kyang 'khrul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis nye bar mi rtsed do/_/lha ma yin thams cad kyi khang pa dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_bud med dang /_
[\[248b.3\]]mtshon cha dang /_rgyan dang /_sgyu ma la sogs pa'i 'khrul 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs pa des dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sgyu mas sprul pa'am/_lha ma yin gyi sprul pa rnams sam/_gzhan yang drang srong dang /_grub pas rab tu sbyar ba'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa ltung ba dang dbang du byed 
[\[248b.4\]]nus par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag dpal gyi sgor 'jug par 'dod na sngon du rdo rje khro bos bzlas la dpal gyi sgor brjod pa dang sbyong bas bsreg pa la sogs pa byas te/_ba ser skya'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs la gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas kha'i rnam pa'i thab khung gi steng du a pa mA rga'i 
[\[248b.5\]]yam shing la me sbar la/_a pa mArga'i 'bras bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/_/des 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ra'i pags pa'i ral gu gyon la lag tu mtshon cha thogs te/_mar me'i mchod sdong ba lang gi ma'i pags pa bcings la shal ma li'i 
[\[248b.6\]]dog pas bkang ste/_dz+yo ti sma ti'i 'bru mar la sngags 'dis me sbar ro/_/oM dU pi dU pi pra dz+wa li ni swA hA/_yang na bu ga gang gi rnam par gyur pa de'i zhag la sngags 'dis me sbar te/_'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma bzla'o/_/mun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/bdag 
[\[248b.7\]]dang lhan cig spyod pa thams cad sman gyis lus byug go/_/sman ni 'di dag ste rgya spos dang /_gur gum dang /_ru rta dang /_spang spos dang /_sug smel dang /_mu li ka dang /_daN+Da ut+pal dang /_sing g+h+ri dang /_byA g+h+ri dang /_na ma ska ri dang /_a nan ta dang /_dza yan ti dang /_rma bya'i 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gtsug phud dag ste/_'di rnams kyi phye ma sgyu ma thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ste/_chu'i 'khrul 'khor dang /_sbyin dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_bud med kyi dbus su 'jug pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'gugs pa na cho ga phra mo byas te/_'khrul 
[\[249a.2\]]'khor gyi bla ma bzlas nas de'i rkang pa legs par byugs pas sbyin la sogs pa'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/der 'jug pa na sngon du badzra tan tu li bslags la ka ra dang lhan cig tu zos la 'jug go/_/lha'i khang pa'i lha bshos mi bya'o/_/lha'i grong la g.yas 
[\[249a.3\]]phyogs nas bskor la 'gro'o/_/rnga'i khang par 'jug go/_/rnga'i 'og tu rus sbal gyi phyag rgya bri'o/_/dbyug gu la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la khro bo'i rgyal po zlos shing brdung ngo /_/'jug pa'i sngon du mchod yon dang /_zhabs 
[\[249a.4\]]bsil dang /_'thor 'thung bzung nas ma 'ongs na thams cad der 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/ci nas kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis gsungs so/_/yang na phyag rgya'i steng du rkang pas rkang pa mnan la kha byang du phyogs te/_phyag rgya bcings la cung zad cig 
[\[249a.5\]]bzla'o/_/rkang 'og gi nang na gnas pa thams cad dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_grub pa'i rdzas rnams ster ro/_/de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus de srid du de rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas so/_/de 
[\[249a.6\]]nas 'ong bar 'dod na sems can la phan par byed pa'i rdzas mdzes pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzung la gang 'dod pa der gdon mi za bar dong bar bya'o/_/de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi rnam pa sems la bris la lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya'am gzhan gyi phyag rgya bcings la bzla'o/_/de'i skad cig 
[\[249a.7\]]la snang ba chen po byung nas sgo grol bar 'gyur ro/_/som nyi med par ji ltar 'dod par 'gro'o/_/dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/_/yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa'i rgyal po gdul dka' ba 'dul bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje rnga bo che sa 'og gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba don yod pa lha ma yin gyi gtso bo skyes bu dpa' bo rnams dbang bskur ba 'di las gzhan pa med do/_/rdo rje rnga bo che sa 'og gi phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba las don yod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de 
[\[249b.2\]]nas rdo rje sa 'og las/_/gsungs pa'i dbang bskur rab bshad bya/_/sa 'og dkyil 'khor gsang ba yi/_/rnga yi sgra dbyangs bri bar bya/_/de nas rus sbal phyag rgya bzhag_/yungs kar dkar po'i steng du'o/_/mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas su/_/phra ba'i ras kyis brgyan pa 
[\[249b.3\]]yi/_/bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa/_/rin chen sman gyis yongs bkang la/_/gtor ma g.yas bskor byin nas su/_/phyag rgya'i steng du gzhag par bya/_/sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis/_/dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya/_/lha dag spyan drangs byas nas su/_/ji ltar 
[\[249b.4\]]rigs pa'i mchod pa bya/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su/_/sdig pa yang ni bshags par bya/_/de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing /_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu/_/grub pa'i rdo rje'i chu yis su/_/de nas dbang bskur ba ni bya/_/ji lta ba yi dbang bskur la/_/de lta 
[\[249b.5\]]bu yi bum pa dgod/_/gang gi dkyil 'khor cho ga la/_/phyag rgya gtor ma'i cho gar bshad/_/dbang bskur phyir ni 'bad pa yis/_/phyag rgya bcings la gnas par bya/_/sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas su/_/dngul chu'i bya ba spang bar bya/_/mdo sde'i rjes 'brang chog yis/_/
[\[249b.6\]]mchod rten gyi ni las bya'o/_/grogs rnams kun dang rnam grol te/_slong mo za zhing mnyam gzhag pas/_/myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/phyag na rdo rjes byin gyis rlob/_/'phags pa rdo rjes 'og gi sgrub par byed pa'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[249b.7\]]'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyis zhabs la rjed pa/_khro bo chen po rdo rje sa 'og gi bris sku'i cho ga brjod par bya'o/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu ba lang gi chus bkrus te/_yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong la gnas pa'i thags mkhan gyis btag bar bya'o/_/ras 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]su gyur pa dang sngags pa'i khru do pa'i srid la zheng du khru gang dang sor brgyad pa la ri mo mkhan yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang ldan pa la bsrung ba byas te/_mchod yon phul la bcom ldan 'das ut+pa la sngon po'i kha dog can khro bo spyan dmar po ya sos ma mchu 
[\[250a.2\]]mnan pa/_gnas gsum g.yo ba/_khro gnyer bsdus pa/_gdu bu dang /_ska rags dang /_rkang gdub dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rin po che'i cod pan gyis spras pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs can mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba gdu bu dang /_'khyil 
[\[250a.3\]]pas rna ba brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng du pad+ma'i skyil klung gis bzhugs pa chos 'chad pa'i tshul can bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/lag pa g.yas par rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'o/_/gnyis par lcags kyu'o/_/g.yon par pad+ma'i mdzod kyi nang du yid bzhin 
[\[250a.4\]]gyi nor bus gang ba 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yon pa'i gnyis pa lha ma yin bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du pad+ma chen po'i steng na bzhugs pa 'gran zla dang bral ba gcig pu'o/_/g.yas pa'i lag pa'i 'og tu sgrub byed pad+ma'i steng du pus mo btsugs pa pad+ma'i sdong bus brgyan 
[\[250a.5\]]pa'i lag pa can bri bar bya'o/_/de nas sngar bshad pa'i gnas rnams su rjes su mthun pa'i rab tu gnas pa dang mchod pa byas la ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten gyi mdun du 'bum phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/dpal gyi sgor bris sku bzhag 
[\[250a.6\]]par bya'o/_/ji ltar 'dod par ro/_/dpal dang ldan pas ba lang gi pags pa'i stan la gos dmar po gyon te/_dug dang khrag bsres la mi'i rus pa'i lag pas bcus shing brgya phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o/_/bu ga'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[250a.7\]]bcom pa dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_bud med kyi grong du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor rnams bka' bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgyas lha thams cad 'gugs par byed do/_/'di lta bus gang ji ltar sems pa'i bsam pa dang /_gang ji ltar 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]sems pa'i las dang /_gang ji ltar sems pa'i cho ga thams cad bka' bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro/_/bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig klu'i rgyal po bris nas de'i mdun du bris sku bkram ste/_rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la/_stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/klu'i 
[\[250b.2\]]rgyal po de 'ongs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_nga'i bka' bzhin du gyis shig ces brjod do/_/des ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad kyi khang pa rnams su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de dag la 'di dag thams cad gyis shig ces bka' bsgo ba nyan no/_/
[\[250b.3\]]de bzhin du lus ngan rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_srin po rnams dang /_byar 'dab rnams kyi gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa thams cad bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci bsgo ba nyan no/_/grog mkhar bdun gyi rtse mo'i sa bsdus te/_de las 
[\[250b.4\]]nam mkha' lding byas la ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi drung du bris sku bkram ste/_dgon pa'am gzhan gang yang rung bar de'i steng du bsdad la stong phrag brgya bzla'o/_/de'i steng du 'gro'o/_/sred med kyi bu chen po'i stobs su 'gyur ro/_/sprul pa chen po byed do/_/thams cad grub 
[\[250b.5\]]pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad pa lta bur tshe dpag tu med pa dang /_'chi ba la dbang thob pa dang /_'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba dang de nas yang shi 'phos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i 
[\[250b.6\]]bshes gnyen gyis rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud kyi sprin chen po 'bebs par byed cing rkang 'og thams cad kyi nang du rig pa dang spyod pa dang /_rin po che'i 'byung khungs thams cad kyi gtso bo dang /_mchog ster ba dang /_'khor lo 'dzin pa ltar 
[\[250b.7\]]gcig tu dpa' ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas lha ma yin thams cad kyis mchod pa mchog tu gsang ba'i bris 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]sku bshad par bya'o/_/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i kha tshar ma bcad cing skra med pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas kha dog ma 'dres pa snod gsar par bzhag la kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa/_sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir 
[\[251a.2\]]thogs pa can sprin gsar pa lta bu mchu sbyar ba dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can g.yas par dgra sta dang yang rdo rje'o/_/g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis dpal gyi sgo'i bu ga gsal bar byed pa g.yon pa'i gnyis par ltos 'gro chen po bskyil 
[\[251a.3\]]ba'i zhags pa 'chang ba'o/_/'og tu gzigs pa/_zhal mche pa gtsigs pa drag po'i gzugs can ma mos par gyur pas bri bar bya'o/_/rnam par bral ba'am stong pa'i phyogs me tog dang 'bras bu ldan pa'am bu ga'i sgor 'bum phrag drug bzla'o/_/de'i sngon du ji ltar bris sku de gdug 
[\[251a.4\]]pa can 'ga' yis kyang ma mthong ba de ltar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing gis sa bsregs la phyogs der yungs kar dkar po la rdo rje khro bos yongs su bsngags te gdab par bya'o/_/de nas skyes pa'i sa bon de gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la me sbar te/_rdo 
[\[251a.5\]]rje'i rnam pa'i thab khung du yungs kar de dang tsan+dan dmar po bsres la stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o/_/nyi ma bzhi pa la lha ma yin gyi grong na gnas pa'i bud med las dro ba dang ldan pas nges par 'ongs nas ston par 'gyur ro/_/de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jug par mi bya'o/_/de 
[\[251a.6\]]rnams dang smra bar mi bya'o/_/nyi ma lnga pa la sreg blugs byas pa'i mthar 'khrul 'khor thams cad la du ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bud med de dag 'ongs te/_skyes bu dpa' bo byon par zhu zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang 'jug par mi bya'o/_/sreg blugs byas pa 
[\[251a.7\]]dang nyi ma drug pa la khang pa thams cad la du ba 'thul bar 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor gyi gnas su ki Ti ki Ta zhes sgrog par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bud med de rnams mig mchi mas gang bzhin du grub pa'i rdzas dang /_rin po che thams cad bzung nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi phyag rgya 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]bstan la blang bar bya'o/_/gal te mi 'dod na yang nyi ma bdun pa la sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gang sngon du zhugs pa de thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung ba dang 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/cho nges 'debs shing nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag la mi 
[\[251b.2\]]'jigs pa byin la phyi nas 'jug par bya'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las lha ma yin gyi bu mo la drag shul spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rim par phye bar gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can 
[\[251b.3\]]phyag bzhi pa/_lha ma yin chen po gzhan len gyi mgo la phyag gnyis kyis rdo rjes bsnun nas gsod par mdzad do/_/phyag g.yas par chu srin gyi mche ba'i rnam pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo lcags kyus me tog 'don pa ltar bsnun pa'o/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/_/de'i mdun du 
[\[251b.4\]]rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la me rab tu 'bar la/_me tog dang 'bras bu ldan par rdo rje rtse mo drug pa nyi ma gcig tu phaT kyi yi ge dang ldan par bsreg par bya'o/_/de bsregs pas lha ma yin thams cad kyi rigs kyi bud med cho nges 'debs shing skyabs med par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams dang lhan 
[\[251b.5\]]cig tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de na lha mo g.yon phyogs pa zhes 'jig rten du grags pa'i rnam pa sba tshil dang /_tsha ba gsum dang lugs phye bsres pa las gzugs brnyan byas la rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la me sbar te/_rdo rjes snying gar gzer la ji srid langs kyi bar de srid du bsro 
[\[251b.6\]]bar bya'o/_/gal te mi ldang na rdo rje'i rnam pa'i thab khung du shing de nyid la me sbar la dum bur gtubs te sbyin sreg bya'o/_/'khrul 'khor thams cad la du ba des reg pa tsam gyis ltung ste/_slar 'byung ba'i mthu med par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba chen po 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang /_
[\[251b.7\]]cho ga mi shes pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa ma sbyangs pa dang /_dam tshig med pa la sbyin par mi bya'o/_/bsod nams byas pa dang /_bu ga'i 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa dang /_spro ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_kha na ma thob med pa'i yid dang /_pha dang ma la gus pa dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]sems bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam pa mi phyed pa dag la sbyin par bya'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyi gtsug tu bri ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rim pas phye bar 
[\[252a.2\]]gyur pa ni/_hA yang tsa'i dbus su yungs kar skya bos stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o/_/de nas bud med rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lag pa yongs su bzung nas 'jug par byed do/_/yang na gang 'dod pa de ster ro/_/'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ri 
[\[252a.3\]]bo dang bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par 'joms par byed do/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las rdo rje nying khu'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas 'dir rtog pa gzhan yang bshad par bya 
[\[252a.4\]]ste/_lo ma dang nas kyi bza' ba dang /_slong mo'i zas za zhing sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o/_/bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la rdo rje khro bo tshon gang khro gnyer bsnyer zhing mchu bsdams pa 'jigs par byed 
[\[252a.5\]]pa/_rdo rje 'phyar ba'i lag pa can/_g.yon pa'i mdzub mo sdigs mdzub tu byas pa de nas zla ba cher gzas bzung nas mi mthong ba na dur khrod du tsan+dan dmar po'i stan nam/_chu bo'i 'gram gyi 'jim pa la gzhug par bya'o/_/de la rgya chen po'i mchod pa byas nas de'i mdun 
[\[252a.6\]]du rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la sor drug pa'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa byas te dri dang /_me tog gis mchod la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa dang /_gtor ma byas te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bzhi'i steng du bzhag la/_lo ma gsum gyis dgab par bya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du dur 
[\[252a.7\]]khrod kyi sol bas rdo rje bris la lag pa des bkab ste/_de nyid ji srid sa mi 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pas de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje de nyid lag par bzung bas bu ga thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor 'joms par byed do/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/de nas bud med rnams phyi rol du dgug par 'dod na dpal gyi bu ga'i sgor rdo rje khro bo de nyid bzhag la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar te/_rdo rje de lag pa g.yon par bzung la g.yas pa ma yin pa'i lag pas yungs kar skya bo rnams stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg 
[\[252b.2\]]bya'o/_/de nas bud med rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lag pa nas bzung ste 'jug par byed do/_/yang na gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pas ri mo mkhrang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 
[\[252b.3\]]'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las rdo rje sgrub par byed pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//sman 'di sgrub pa pos ci nas kyang bsgrub par bya'o/_/bgegs rnams dang log par 'dren pa med par byed do/_/zla ba shar ba dang /_
[\[252b.4\]]dbang po lag pa dang /_sing g+h+ri dang /_b+h+yA g+h+ri dang /_lag pa bzhi pa dang /_b+ha ra ha karni ka dang /_ga dzA da ka dang /_ra tsa ni dang /_ru rta dang /_gur gum dang /_dung gi phye ma rnams glang po'i gcin gyis sbrus la/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i ril bu bya'o/_/dri dang /_me tog 
[\[252b.5\]]dang /_gtor ma dang /_bdug pa rnams gnas rnams su bzhag la chu 'chag pa dang /_dri ma 'dor ba na ras kyis bcing bar bya'o/_/dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/_/gzhan du na log par 'dren pa rnams zhugs te ma rung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[252b.6\]]bshad ma thag pa'i sman gyis log par 'dren pa la sogs pa thams cad rnam par nyams nas phan tshun lta zhing 'di skad ces/_'di ni ji srid sman yod pa de srid 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes smra zhing phyogs dang nye ba'i phyogs rnams su 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad gcig gi 
[\[252b.7\]]khongs su bgegs ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang rig pa 'dzin pas dus gsum du nye bar byugs na de la 'ga' zhig gis kyang 'jug par mi nus so/_/bA la ka dang /_sA ri ba dang /_lo bra ma dang /_lA ngag li dang /_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]sgog pa dang /_byi ba'i spu rnams sbyar ba'i bdug pa 'bad pas byas na bu ga'i sgor 'gro ba na thigs pa zhi bar byed do/_/ut+pal sngon po dang /_dri zhim po'i mar dang /_ru rta dang /_sa ra bi dang /_tsan+dan dang /_bo la ka dang /_ba lang gi gcin gyis sbrus pa'i sman 
[\[253a.2\]]gyis dug 'joms par byed cing dpal gyi sgo'i drod gsher las skyes pa 'joms par byed do/_/chu shing dang /_gla sgang dang /_bA Na dang /_koSh+Tha dang /_u dum bA ra dang /_ba la dang /_a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_shu dag dang /_ge ri kar+N+Ni ka dkar po ste/_'di rnams sbyar bas 
[\[253a.3\]]thams cad kyi gnyid dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_mun pa 'joms par byed do/_/shi b+ha any+dza ba'i sa bon dang /_ut+pal dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_ga bur rnams mnyam por sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis gnyid med par byed do/_/ka ra dang /_rta'i kha chu dang /_nA ga ge 
[\[253a.4\]]sar dang /_sa ri pas mig sman byas la khro bo bzlas pas nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor zlog par byed do/_/rma bya'i gtsug phud dang mnyam por sbyar la/_na le sham dkar po dang btags te lan bdun bzlas pas rtsod pa zlog par byed do/_/sems rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang /_
[\[253a.5\]]brtse ba dang ldan pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_ring du mthong ba gang gi khyim du cho ga dang ldan pas sman bzhag nas khro bo rdo rje sa 'og la mchog tu gus par gyur na/_des rkang 'og gi dpal gyi sgo 'grub par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom med do/_/ya ba'i me tog dang /_rgya sran gyi phye 
[\[253a.6\]]ma dang /_yungs kar dang /_bA la dang /_ing gu rnams srang re re si ta dang lhan cig bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas bkres pa'i 'khrul 'khor zlog par byed do/_/a pa mA rga'i sa bon dang /_bi dza ak+Sha'i sa bon dang /_u dum bA ra'i ril bu la lan bdun bzlas 
[\[253a.7\]]na bkres pa sel bar byed do/_/glang po'i rna ba'i pa la sha'i khu ba blangs la rdo rje'i gdong skyes dang /_rdo rje'i 'o ma dang mnyam por sbyar la til mar dang bskol te sbyin rnams thams cad la mar khu'i mchog des byug par bya'o/_/rdo rje ljon pa'i khrag dang ni/_/de bzhin rdo rje sdong bu'i 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bcud/_/se ba la yi bcud dang sbyar/_/gser gyi mar dang btso bar bya/_/thog mar de dag bcangs nas su/_/mkhas pa yis ni 'bad pas bsdad/_/'bru mar gyis ni lus byugs nas/_/sbyin gyi steng nas 'gro bar bya/_/ing gu bi la'i mar khu dang /_/kha ba 
[\[253b.2\]]yi ni nas dag ni/_/rta yi dri dang mnyam bsres nas/_/rta yi gcin dang bskol bar bya/_/'di dag gis ni lus byugs na/_/sbyin gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las sman dang rtsi'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de 
[\[253b.3\]]nas seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bu gar 'jug par bya'o/_/mkhas pas mtshan ma mtshon par bya ste/_dpal gyi sgor rkang bzhi pa dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_bud med dang /_grub pa'i rdzas kyis yang dag par khyab pa dang /_bu ga gang dag shang shong can/_/la la 
[\[253b.4\]]rdo bas khyab pa ni/_/de ni rad rod can zhes bya/_/sa ni 'bar bas chu skems shing /_/phyi rol bshang ba'i dri mnam zhing /_/keng rus kyi ni rus pas khyab/_/gdug pa'i rdo ba dag gis gang /_/de ni rad rod can du bstan/_/'ga' zhig 'jim pa dag gis khyab/_/
[\[253b.5\]]la la rdo dang chu yis gang /_/dri mi zhim pa'i shing mang ba/_/rad rod 'jigs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/bshad dang ljan ljin dri mnam zhing /_/kha cig na ni sbrul gyi dri/_/pags pa dang ni bya yis khyab/_/de ni nges par ce sbyang gnas/_/yang na rdo rje sa 'og las bstan 
[\[253b.6\]]pa'i ji lta bus rnam pa'i sgo mkhas pas phyi rol du brtags nas 'jug par bya'o/_/yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas/_/khro bo'i dam pa legs par bzlas/_/dbang bskur bas ni dbang bskur la/_/blo dang ldan pas bsrung bar bya/_/'di yi tshul gyis dpa' bo yis/_/
[\[253b.7\]]sa 'og mtho ris dpal gyi sgo/_/der ni som nyi med par 'jug_/de yis 'dod 'bras thob par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo de yis cher spro bas/_/gtong dang brtse ldan gtsang ba dang /_dregs med mngon pa'i nga rgyal bral/_/'jigs bral khyad par 'phags pa'i yid/_/
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]me 'od dang ni ltas chen po/_/mthong nas zug rngu med pa'i sems/_/rdo rje lta bur brtan pa yis/_/bsgrub par dka' yang bsgrub par bya/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las 'khrul 'khor brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[254a.2\]]dpal gyi sgor 'jug pa'i rim par phye bar gyur pa ni/_'khrul 'khor gyi ni drung 'gro ba/_/shin tu myur dang bul min par/_/rkang pa 'jog cing 'bad pa yis/_/kun nas 'khrul 'khor blta bar bya/_/gang tshe 'khrul 'khor g.yo ba dang /_/'gul ba dang ni ldeg 
[\[254a.3\]]pa'am/_/yang na mtshon cha thogs pa ste/_/mda' dang shag ti dbyug gu dang /_/ral gri 'khor lo mtshon cha yi/_/'khrul 'khor gyis ni gang mthong zhing /_/gri gug spu gri'i so dag dang /_/de bzhin lug las sogs 'gro ba/_/de lta'i rnam pa mthong na ni/_/phyag 
[\[254a.4\]]rgya legs par bcing bar bya/_/yungs kar skya bo nyid dam ni/_/thal ba la yang khros pa yis/_/khro bo lan bdun bzlas nas su/_/'khrul 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsnun/_/gdon mi za bar de ltung ngo /_/lha yi khang par 'jug par bya/_/gang dag lha chen por 
[\[254a.5\]]gyur pa/_/der ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gtor ma mthong /_/ji ltar bkres kyang mi bza'o/_/de nyid du ni nges mthong ba/_/skad cig tsam yang mi 'gul zhing /_/de tshe de ni mi smra ste/_/lha min stong gis rgyas btab pas/_/de mthong nas ni rus sbal gyi/_/rgya ldan lan bdun 
[\[254a.6\]]bzlas pas g.yo/_/de ni rang bzhin dang ba yis/_/gus dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/_/legs par byon tam dpa' bo rnams/_/ci bde bar yang 'jug par mdzod/_/grub pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba rnams/_/rin chen rnam pa du ma dang /_/dngul chu dang ni bcud len 
[\[254a.7\]]dang /_/nor bu rnams dang bud med dang /_/gzhan yang nang na gang ba yi/_/ral gri dang ni mtshon cha rnams/_/de dag gi ni lag pa nas/_/bzung nas ji ltar bde bar ston/_/phyag na rdo rje'i byin brlabs kyis/_/der ni ji ltar 'dod par bya/_/der ni ji tsam 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]sdod kyi bar/_/lha min bu mo rnams dang rtse/_/de rnams kyis bstan lam nas ni/_/ci bde bar ni nges par 'dong /_/lha min grong du bde bar 'gro/_/ji ltar bde bar slar yang 'ong /_/gang dag der ni sngon song ba/_/rdo rje sa 'og gis gzir bas/_/gal te 'ongs
