[\[254b.2\]]par ma gyur na/_/der ni rmongs nas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/des na sngon rgyu zhugs rnams la/_/blo gros ldan pas gzir mi bya/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las dpal gyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas dpal gyi sgo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i 
[\[254b.3\]]rim par phye bar gyur pa ni/_dpal gyi sgo yi phyir gnas pa'i/_/mtshan nyid mthong nas shes pa yis/_/smra spangs slong ba za ba dang /_/'khrug pa med pa'i sems ldan pas/_/blo gros can gyis 'bum phrag gsum/_/dpal gyi sgo la brten te bzlas/_/'bum phrag 
[\[254b.4\]]dang po bzlas pa yis/_/'khrul 'khor rnams ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/gnyis pa yis ni sa g.yo zhing /_/du ba chen po 'khrug par 'gyur/_/gsum pa yis ni dro ldan pa'i/_/rgyan dang ske rags grol ba yis/_/lha min bu mo nges par 'ong /_/khro bo me yis bsros 
[\[254b.5\]]pa na/_/bskal pa'i me snyam sems pa yis/_/ca co 'don zhing rnam par 'bros/_/der ni zhi bar bya don du/_/tsan+dan ldan mar sbyin sreg gis/_/de yi lus ni rnal mar gnas/_/bsam pa thag pas 'dud par 'gyur/_/dpal gyi sgo der nor rnams dang /_/ral 
[\[254b.6\]]gri ldong ros mig la sogs/_/dngul chu bcud len bzang po dang /_/bud med stong phrag brgya rnams gnas/_/bdag gi bdag po khyod kyis mdzod/_/mtho ris sa 'og bzang po ste/_/gal te der ni mi 'jug na'ang /_/ji ltar bzhed pa de bzhin mdzod/_/ral gri grub pa'i 
[\[254b.7\]]mig sman sogs/_/de yi mdun du bzhag nas kyang /_/rdo rje khra bos gzir bas na/_/yid la gcags bzhin ster bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dod pa de bzung ste/_/de ni btang ba nyid du bya/_/der ni dkyil 'khor bsdu byas te/_/lha dag mnyes par byas nas su/_/
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]khro bo de yang gshegs su gsol/_/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ci bder 'gro/_/go cha chen po gyon pa yis/_/blo dang ldan pas dbang blangs te/_/ser sna khro dang 'gyod pa dang /_/phrag dog la sogs dor nas su/_/rtag tu spro bar 'gyur pa yis/_/bya ba byas 
[\[255a.2\]]na legs par 'grub/_/'di ni bcom ldan rdor 'dzin gsung /_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las dpal gyi sgor drag shul spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas mtshan nyid gzhan gyis rim par phye bar gyur pa ni/_sngon du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas 
[\[255a.3\]]la/_de nas bu ga'i sgor lus dri zhim pos 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzla'o/_/de nas bu ga'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/de nas the tshom med par gyur pa'i yid kyis sgo drung du/_sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad byas la 'jug par bya ste rang 
[\[255a.4\]]gi khyim bzhin no/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis bsgrags pa'i gsang ba chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can thams cad kyi phyir sa 'og gi gsang ba chen po'i dpal gyi sgo bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje 'khor lo de bzhin du/_/rtse gsum ku mud pad+ma dang /_/
[\[255a.5\]]bkra shis dang ni dung nyid dang /_/chu srin du ni mtshon par bya/_/rdo rjes gnod sbyin rnams su 'gro/_/'khor los srin po rnams 'gro ste/_/klu yi khang par rtse gsum gyis/_/rkang 'og tu ni ku mu das/_/lam po cher ni pad+mas 'gro/_/bkra shis khyim gyis mdzod khyim dong /_/
[\[255a.6\]]chu srin gyis ni bud med khyim/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim par phye bar gyur pa ni/_mun pa las ni 'das pa na/_/gang tshe sgron ma'i 'od gsal ba/_/de ni 'khrul 'khor 
[\[255a.7\]]gnas zhes bya/_/gnas der blo ldan 'gro mi bya/_/'khrul 'khor gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje 'phyar ba sbyar bar bya/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/_/g.yon pa'i steng du sbyar bar bya/_/lte ba'i gnas su khu tshur gyis/_/gar gyi sbyor bas bskor bar bya/_/lag 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]pa g.yas pa bsgreng nas su/_/g.yon pa la ni bsnun par bya/_/steng du lag pa 'og tu blta/_/phyi ru 'di yis bsnun par bya/_/yungs kar dang ni thal ba yis/_/bsnun pas sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/_/'khrul 'khor lhod pa nyid du 'gyur/_/slar yang de yis bsnun pa 
[\[255b.2\]]yis/_/gdon mi za bar ltung bar 'gyur/_/rkang pa mnyam par gnas byas nas/_/lag pa g.yon pa snying gar bzhag_/gnas de phyi ru gar byas te/_/gang yang rung bas bsnun par bya/_/hU~M dang ldan pa'i khro bo yis/_/phye mar gyur nas sa la ltung /_/rdo rje 'phyar 
[\[255b.3\]]ba'i cho ga yis/_/sa la ltung ba'i 'khrul 'khor rnams/_/slan chad der ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'khrul 'khor med pa'i bu gar shes/_/nam mkha'i 'khrul 'khor gang bshad dang /_/gang yang dug gi rlung 'byung ba/_/de yang cho ga 'di yis su/_/mthong ba tsam gyis 
[\[255b.4\]]ltung bar 'gyur/_/dam tshig shes pa bla ldan des/_/yang na lha yi gnas mthong na/_/'phyar ba'i phyag rgyas legs bsnun zhing /_/bskor zhing rab tu 'phen pa yis/_/'byung po rnams ni dgug par bya/_/de bzhin dam tshig nyid kyang bstan/_/sgrub pa dbang bskur 
[\[255b.5\]]ldan pa dang /_/las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/_/de nyid 'di ni bstan par bya/_/gzhan du na ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/dpal gyi sgo yi sman rnams dang /_/dngul chu grub pa'i mig sman sogs/_/de bzhin bud med rnams dang ni/_/de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur/_/gter dang 
[\[255b.6\]]gser 'gyur bu ga'i sgor/_/dbang du byed pa'ang de bzhin du/_/dbang bskur med pa'i blo ldan gyis/_/mthong yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi cho ga dang /_/rdo rje sa 'og dkyil 'khor du/_/ji ltar zhugs par gyur pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor bsrung ba byas nas 
[\[255b.7\]]su/_/bla ma la ni yon phul te/_/dri dang me tog mchod pa bya/_/rdo rje chu yi chus bkang nas/_/phra ba'i ras kyis mgrin bcings pa'i/_/bum pa ldan pa'i gzhan dag gis/_/mtshan nyid de yis dbang bskur bya/_/de nas rus sbal phyag rgya bcing /_/byin brlabs phyag 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]rgya'am de bzhin du/_/lha min phyag rgyas rjes gnang ni/_/bla mas byin pas don kun 'grub/_/lha min rnams dang 'khrul 'khor rnams/_/sgyu ma yis ni brgyan pa rnams/_/'byed dang rab tu 'byed pa ni/_/rig pa 'dzin pa de yis 'grub/_/'khrul 'khor 
[\[256a.2\]]gyis min dug gis min/_/chu yis ma yin mes kyang min/_/glang po sogs min lto 'phyes min/_/de la 'khrul 'khor bzhis kyang min/_/ral gri dbyug gu mu saN+Da/_/chu bo any+dza ga sprul min/_/gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs pa/_/gsang ba'i mtshams na rten 
[\[256a.3\]]rnams kyang /_/dbang bskur dam tshig dag gis ni/_/byin brlabs de la bsnun mi 'gyur/_/de yi mthu yis cung zad cig_/bzlas pas 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms/_/de ni rig pa 'dzin pa yis/_/rigs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_/des na 'bad 
[\[256a.4\]]pa thams cad kyis/_/dbang bskur ba ni sbyar bar bya/_/don kun grub pa thob 'gyur zhing /_/de la lhas kyang byin gyis rlob/_/dman pa'i bya ba dor bar bya/_/mngon spyod kyi ni las kyang spangs/_/'bebs dang dbang du bya ba dang /_/gdon gyi las kyang dor bar bya/_/
[\[256a.5\]]blo dang ldan pas rgyun du bzlas/_/nyon mongs bral ba'i snyoms 'jug gis/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las rig pa 'dzin pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje sa 'og gis byin gyis brlabs pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[256a.6\]]bshad par bya'o/_/dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'khod la/_grong gi mtha' ma/_grong khyer gyi phyogs kyi mthar rdo dang /_rus pa dang /_gseg ma dang /_dman pa'i sol ba dang /_thal ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_so phag dang /_gnod sbyin la btsugs pa'i shing dang /_
[\[256a.7\]]mgal du ma rnying pa dang /_chu 'jag pa dang /_kham phor gyi phung po dor te/_bkra shis kyi nyin par bsrung ba byas la kha dog lngas khru bzhi pa/_grwa bzhi pa/_sgo'i mtshams su sgo khang dang /_dkyil 'khor dbus zlum por gnas pa/_gnas g.yas bskor du'o/_/phyogs 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bral gyi mtshams su zlum po ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/cher brtags te ri mo rdo rjes byin gyis brlab bo/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyi gnas rgya mtsho chen po bri bar bya'o/_/blo gros dang ldan pas dpal gyi sgo bri bar bya'o/_/rin po che'i rnam 
[\[256b.2\]]pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_'khrul 'khor gyi gnas dang /_sman dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_grub pa'i rdzas dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_bum pa gang ba ste/_de rnams kyi gnas rnams thig gis gdab par bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 
[\[256b.3\]]'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i g.yas su lag na rdo rje'o/_/de dang nye bar khro bo rdo rje sa 'og lag par rdo rje dgra sta can gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi drung du byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros rnga yab 
[\[256b.4\]]'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'og tu chung ma dang bcas pa'i dbang phyug gi mdun du khyu mchog dang ldan pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas shar gyi sgor 'phar ma dang po la sman thams cad dang /_dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_rgyan dang /_gzhon nu ma la sogs pa 
[\[256b.5\]]gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas lho'i sgor lha ma yin brgyad gzhag par bya ste/_stobs can dang /_stobs can gyi bu dang /_bde mchog dang /_gzhan len dang /_dus kyi mu khyud dang /_thags zangs ris dang /_rab sim dang /_dbyig za'o/_/de nas nub kyi sgor 
[\[256b.6\]]'khrul 'khor stong sum cu gzhag par bya ste/_de la 'khrul 'khor brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri'o/_/srad bu dang /_gri gug dang /_bud med dang /_seng ge dang /_lug dang /_mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu dang /_chu rgyun dang /_sbyin dang /_gnyid kyi 'khrul 'khor 
[\[256b.7\]]rnams so/_/de nas byang gi sgo'i 'phar mar bu ga brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/_lug gi gdong dang /_chu srin gyi gdong dang /_glang po che'i gdong dang /_lto 'phye'i gdong dang /_byi ba'i gdong dang /_skyes bu'i gdong dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa dang /_ma 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]byas pa'i gdong gi rnam pa rnams so/_/de nas mtshams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu sgo bral bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/me'i mtshams su me'i thab khung ngo /_/rlung du chu'i thab khung ngo /_/bden bral du bdug spos kyi thab khung ngo /_/dbang ldan du sbrul 
[\[257a.2\]]gyi rnam pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas de rnams spyan drangs la/_rdo rje khro bo 'bebs pa chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/bum pa rtsa ba nag po med pa bzhi ljon pa lnga dang /_sman lnga dang /_rin po che lnga dang ldan pa la ras phra ba dri zhim pa skra med pas mgul pa bcings te/_
[\[257a.3\]]mtshams bzhi po rnams su rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la/_yungs kar gyis byin gyis brlabs te gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i chu dang /_phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_dril sogs pa dang /_lha bshos dbul bar 
[\[257a.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas sna tshogs pa'i ro dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bras kyi rgyal po'i 'bras bu legs par sbyar ba chang dang sha med pa'i lha bshos dang /_gtor ma yid du 'ong ba dam pa rgya chen pos 'byung po thams cad la phyogs dang mtshams rnams su byin la nye reg bya'o/_/cho ga 
[\[257a.5\]]bzhin du phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba byas la/_khro bo'i rgyal po dpa' bo gcig pa rdo rjes 'og rjes su dran pas bzlas par bya'o/_/skyes bu dpa' bos byin gyis brlab pa'i don gyi phyir lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya'i 'og tu son par rkang mthil nas spyi gtsug gi bar du go chas 
[\[257a.6\]]byin gyis brlab bo/_/ji ltar mi 'bab na de nas dri bzang po dang /_bdug spos kyis bdugs la ras dkar po phra bas gdong g.yogs te/_lag pa rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya sbyar la/_las kyi gru la rkang pa gnyis bzhag ste yon phul la/_rna ba dam tshig gis byin gyis brlabs pas 
[\[257a.7\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnams kyi dam tshig phye ba rnams dang /_dam tshig mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta bu'i dam tshig thos nas me tog dor bar bya'o/_/gang gi steng du lhung ba de'i lha'i rigs so/_/
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]thog mar phyag rgya bcings pas byin kyis brlabs nas de la yon 'bul bar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor bsdus te/_cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dang sngags lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor mthong nas dam tshig dam pas 
[\[257b.2\]]byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_gsang sngags thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_legs par bgrod pa dang /_'dod pa'i don thams cad kyi dngos grub thob pa dang /_'dul ba rnams la rab tu sbyor ba dang /_rgyud rnams kyi 'gog pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_ston pa 
[\[257b.3\]]dang /_byed pa dang /_bskyod pa dang /_phur bus bsnun pa dang /_'byed pa dang /_rgyud thams cad kyi don thob pa dang /_sgrogs pa dang /_dpyod pa dang /_zlos pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_rnal 'byor du byed pa dang /_gdug pa thams cad la drag shul spyod pa dang /_gzhon 
[\[257b.4\]]nu ma rnams dang /_'khrul 'khor rnams 'byed pa dang /_gcod pa dang /_sgrub pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du don thams cad grub pa rnyed pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya bas 
[\[257b.5\]]'og gi rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang las rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba ni rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing las rdo rje byas la 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya ba la mchod pa bya ste/_lag mthil du bzung la ji srid tsi Ti tsi Ti zhes 
[\[257b.6\]]sgrogs kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/sreg par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bud med rnams mchod yon bzung nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khrul 'khor med par 'jug par byed do/_/gang 'dod pa'i 
[\[257b.7\]]rdzas de la ster ro/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i lha lha yis phyag byas shing mchod pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i bdag po dpal dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ma bsgrubs kyang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi bu mo la dmigs te/_bu ga'i sgor stong phrag brgya 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi bu mo bskyod par 'gyur ro/_/nad mi bzad pas bzung nas stong phrag brgya po yongs su rdzogs par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi 'ong na dug dang bsres pa la yungs kar skya bos sbyar ba'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad seng ldeng gi sol 
[\[258a.2\]]ba la bya'o/_/'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi 'ong na ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar pos sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje la bsnun pas ci nas kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas skyes bu dpa' bo'i lag pa nas bzung nas 'jug par byed do/_/rdo rje lag par bcangs la 
[\[258a.3\]]'jug par bya'o/_/yang na rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la 'khor lo byas la dur khrod du nim pa'i sol ba la tsha ba'i mar khu dang bsres te/_swA hA'i yi ge dang ldan pas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o/_/de nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dug dang /_khrag dang /_yungs kar skya bo 
[\[258a.4\]]bsres te/_stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs byas pas bu ga'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu ga'i sgor ba glang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la/_steng du dris byugs te/_de nas rdo rjes des de'i steng du rdo rje bri bar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yas par bzung la yungs 
[\[258a.5\]]kar la cung zad cig bsngags te stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o/_/ci bde bar rdzas bzung nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de gzung bar bya'o/_/gal te mi 'dod na de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jug par bya'o/_/yang na gter 'don par 'dod pas lcags las byas pa'i phur bu bzhi 
[\[258a.6\]]la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_phyogs bzhir btab la gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas der gter 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_oM 
[\[258a.7\]]badzre badzri Ni/_badzrot+ta re/_badzra bi dza ye/_badzrA pa ra dzi ti/_badzra pA tA li ni hU~M phaT hU~M phaT sbA hA/_rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la sor brgyad pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa byas te/_tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa sor bcu drug pa'i stan byas la de'i steng du rdo rje bzhag la gso sbyong dang ldan 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]pas thams cad la tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin du byas te/_dpal gyi sgor gzhag par bya'o/_/lo ma dang nas zan dang /_slong ba za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams rang nyid 'ongs nas 'jug par byed do/_/gal 
[\[258b.2\]]te de rnams ma 'ongs na las gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/_yungs kar skya bo dang /_dug dang /_khrag bsres pas stong phrag brgyad bzung la re re la yongs su bzlas te rdo rje la bsnun pas de nas 'ongs te/_lag nas bzung nas 'jug par byed do/_/skyes bu dpa' bos las 
[\[258b.3\]]su gyur pa gzhan yang dug dang khrag bsres pas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs byas pas de nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje bzung la 'jug par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/de nas las gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/_lo ma la sogs pa za zhing dus 
[\[258b.4\]]gsum du khrus byas la mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyis 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la mthe bong tsam gyi rdo rje cha shas bcu drug pa rtse mo gsum pa byas te/_tsan+dan dmar po'i khri la rdo rje de gzhag par bya'o/_/me tog dmar po dang dri la sogs pa rnams 
[\[258b.5\]]kyis mchod de/_gtor ma byin la nyin mtshan du gso sbyong dang ldan pas ka ra bI ra'i me tog gis rdo rje la brgyad brgyar bsnun par bya'o/_/de nas rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur te/_/rdo rje la tsi Ti tsi Ti 'byung ba dang /_bu gar du ba'i sdong bu 'byung ba dang gzhon nu ma rnams 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[258b.6\]]ro/_/gang gi tshe zhugs shig ces smra na/_de nas 'jug pa'i dus su nyin mtshan du gso sbyong la gnas pas ltas brtag par bya ste/_gang gi tshe rdo rje la tsi Ti tsi Ti zhes sgrogs na 'khrul 'khor rnams 'byed pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe du ba 'byung bar mthong na de nas 'khrul 'khor thams 
[\[258b.7\]]cad 'jig pa yin no/_/de nas rang gi khang pa bzhin du 'jug par bya'o/_/gang 'dod pa'i rdzas des ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi 'dod na bu ga'i sgo de nyid du arga'i yam shing ngam/_seng ldeng gi yam shing la me rab tu sbar te yungs kar skya bo rnams dang /_rang gi khrag bsres 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]la stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nu ma rnams 'ong ngo /_/'ongs nas kyang lag nas bzung ste 'jug par byed do/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas rnams ster ro/_/gzhan du na bud med de rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor 
[\[259a.2\]]gdab par bya'o/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las rgyas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po des sa 'og chen po'i cho gar gyur pa ni/_gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la ba lang gi gcin gyis bkrus te gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i thags mkhan gyis nag 
[\[259a.3\]]po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa'am yang na nya la rnam par bral ba'i phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ste/_dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la/_rgya chen po'i gtor ma dang lha bshos byas te/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho 
[\[259a.4\]]gang las lhag pa ji tsam 'dod pa'i tshad kyi bris sku 'tsham par byas la/_de la rin chen dang /_sman dang /_'brus byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pas mchod yon sbrengs la/_gtor ma dang lha bshos rgya chen po byas te/_ji ltar 'byor pa'i dge slong la gya nom pa'i bza' bas tshim par 
[\[259a.5\]]byas nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu smon te/_yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i ri mo mkhan la bsrung ba byas la dpa' bos rin thang nges pa mi bzung bar yon byin te/_kha dog ma 'dres pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po dpa' bo gcig pa rdo rje sa 'og chen po bri bar 
[\[259a.6\]]bya'o/_/bai DUr+ya sngon po dang sprin chen po 'dra ba/_sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi ska rags byas pa/_dga' bo dang stobs kyi rgyus rna ba brgyan pa/_a shi bi shas lag pa dang rkang pa brgyan pa/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_spyan 
[\[259a.7\]]gsum pa 'jigs byed chen po Ta Tas bzhad pa mche ba gtsigs shing 'bar bas 'khrugs pa thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi tshogs can phyag bzhi pa/_phyag g.yas par 'od zer chen po'i dkyil 'khor can gyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o/_/gzhan par chu srin gyi gdong gi rnam pa'i lcags kyu'i 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sor mos me tog gi sdong bu ltar 'gugs pa'o/_/g.yon par lto 'phye chen po bskyil ba'i zhags pa'o/_/gnyis pa'i 'og tu son par bgegs rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams la bsdigs pa'o/_/'og tu rgya mtsho chen po bri 
[\[259b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/de'i dbus su ri bo chen po'i steng du pad+ma chen po la bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/rgya mtsho chen po de'i nang du lus phyed nub pa'i 'og tu lta ba'i lha ma yin chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi drung du pad+ma'i gdan la 
[\[259b.3\]]bzhugs pa dang /_khro bo'i gdan la bzhugs pa steng du phyag brkyang nas khro bo chen po dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'od dpag tu med pa dang /_mi bskyod pa dag bri bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i bris sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pus 
[\[259b.4\]]mi smra ba'am/_grogs bzang po dang bcas te/_ri bo'am sgra med pa'i phug rnying pa'am/_shing gcig pa'i gnas ji ltar rnyed par lo ma dang /_'bras bu dang /_'o ma dang /_slong ba za zhing sdig pa bshags la bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_chos la dga' bas bris sku 
[\[259b.5\]]rab tu gnas pa bya ste 'bum phrag bcu bzla'o/_/cho ga 'dis hUM zhes brjod pas ri rab kyang phye mar rlog cing rgya mtsho yang skems so/_/lha'i gnas rnams ltung bar byed do/_/de lta bus sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste/_dpal gyi sgo'i sgor bris sku bzhag la stong phrag bcu bzla'o/_/gang 
[\[259b.6\]]de'i nye bar gnas pa rnams der 'ong ngo /_/thams cad la bka' bsgo bar bya'o/_/dngul chu dang /_bcud len dang /_mig sman dang /_grub pa'i rdzas la sogs pa ster ro/_/sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/sgra med par byed do/_/chu rgyun 
[\[259b.7\]]skems par 'gyur ro/_/'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mar dang 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg gis zhi bar byed do/_/mar dang 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gis stobs 'phel par byed do/_/mar dang tan tu le'i sbyin sreg gis 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]nad chen po zhi bar byed do/_/dug dang khrag gi sbyin sreg gis log par 'dren pa rnams gsod par byed do/_/nim pa'i lo ma'i sbyin sreg gis skrod par byed do/_/byi ba'i spu dang rang gi khrag bsres pa'i sbyin sreg gis lha ma yin chen po'i bu mo 'gugs par byed do/_/
[\[260a.2\]]sre mo'i spu'i sbyin sreg gis klu rnams 'gugs par byed do/_/'di'i cho gas rtog pa gzhan du bshad pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu 
[\[260a.3\]]gcig pa'o//_//de nas 'khrul 'khor 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba'i rim par phye bar gyur pa ni/_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_glang po'i dbang po dang /_rta dang /_khyu mchog dang /_lug dang /_bse ru dang /_dom dang /_spre'u dang /_phag dang /_ma he dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[260a.4\]]te 'khrul 'khor bcu gcig sprul pa legs par sbyangs pa/_sa 'og gi sgo gtan gyi 'khrul 'khor bsdams pa la khu tshur 'phyar bas bsnun par bya'o/_/rdo rjes bsnun pa ltar 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/'ug pa bya rog bya rgod dang /_khra dang lo ma brgya pa dang /_/mkha' lding bzhad dang 
[\[260a.5\]]gtsug phud can/_/'khrul 'khor 'di dag rab grags pa/_/sa chen po la bsdigs pa yis/_/the tsom med par bsnun par bya/_/ral gri mu saN+Di sgo glegs/_/'khor lo sbrul dang dbyug gu dang /_/skyes bu gzhu yi lag pa dang /_/spu gri zhags pa 'dzin pa la/_/mda' 
[\[260a.6\]]chen blo gros ldan pas bsnun/_/rlung gi 'khrul 'khor me'i 'khrul 'khor/_/bkres dang gnyid dang 'dar ba dang /_/mgo nad dang ni mig nad la/_/'khor lo'i gur gyis bsnun par bya/_/bzhi pa'i 'od li chu bo'i rgyun/_/dug gi rlung dang mun nag dang /_/chu srin rus sbal byi 
[\[260a.7\]]ba dang /_/sbal pa sdig pa de bzhin du/_/ka ka ru yis gcod pa la/_/rdza rnga brdung ba'i skyes bu yis/_/rdo rje bsdigs pas bsnun par bya/_/gar gyi sbyor ba'i de nyid kyis/_/gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor du ma ni/_/rlung dang me ru rab grags pa/_/sa dang chu yi zug rngu dang /_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]nam mkha' dug dang lhan cig pa/_/thams cad rkang 'og rdo rje yis/_/gar gyi sbyor bas bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje khu tshur gyis ni bsnun/_/bsnun pas 'khrul 'khor thams cad ni/_/gdon mi za bar ltung bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma dang ni 
[\[260b.2\]]rdor 'dzin yang /_/dpal ldan gyis bsnun g.yo 'gyur na/_/phal pa'i 'khrul 'khor smos ci dgos/_/lha min bu mo rnyed dka' min/_/ral gri 'khor lo dbyug gu sogs/_/'od li a dza ga ra dang /_/gsang ba'i mtshams kyi sgo glegs dang /_/bung ba'i phreng ba de 
[\[260b.3\]]bzhen du/_/drag po'i sgra dang gad rgyangs che/_/tshar gcod pa ru gang gyur pa/_/phyi rol du ni cho ga des/_/ji ltar 'joms pa de bzhin bsnun/_/khros pas mche bas mchu mnan te/_/sa 'og bzlas pas bsnun par bya/_/khron par 'jug pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni/_/
[\[260b.4\]]de ni 'og gi 'khrul 'khor bshad/_/dpal gyi sgo ni gang tshe mthong /_/bzang yang mtshan nyid nyams pa dang /_/sra ba'i mtshams dang sbas pa dang /_/ri mo yis ni yongs bres pa/_/de la sa ga'i cho ga yis/_/lag pa steng du byas nas su/_/rdo la brgyad brgya bzlas 
[\[260b.5\]]nas kyang /_/mtshams la drag tu brdeg par bya/_/bsnun pa tsam gyis 'khrul 'khor de/_/gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur/_/bya rog mchu dang dbyug gu dang /_/thob 'ching ba'ang de bzhin te/_/rus sbal phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/_/g.yas las gzhan pas reg par bya/_/
[\[260b.6\]]phur bu bcing bar byas nas su/_/bya rog mchu la gzer bar bya/_/g.yon brkyang pa 'am mnyam pa yis/_/g.yas pa yis ni de bskor ro/_/'khrul 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnyed 'gyur/_/de ni myur bas gdon par bya/_/de nas pus mo g.yas bskums te/_/rkang pa 
[\[260b.7\]]g.yon pa brkyang bar bya/_/tho bas phur bu la bsnun pas/_/mtshams kyi 'khrul 'khor bskyod par 'gyur/_/rdo rje khro bo de ma thag_/gsang sngags bzlas pas gdon par bya/_/der ni du ba 'byung ba na/_/rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis byas yin/_/ge sar rgya spos ru rta 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]dang /_/pu nar na ba khyab 'jug gnon/_/de dag rnams las bdug pa bya/_/rlung gi 'khrul 'khor bzlog par 'gyur/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa rgyal ba zhes bya 
[\[261a.2\]]ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i rgyud chen po bka' stsal lags na/_bdag kyang rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la sman pa'i slad du bshad pas bcom ldan 
[\[261a.3\]]'das la zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar gnas par bgyi/_ji ltar rig pa bsgrub par bgyi/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag pos rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje khro bo khyod kyis sems can 
[\[261a.4\]]thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rig pa 'dzin pa 'grub pa'i rgyu dris pa legs so legs so/_/rig pa 'dzin pas ji ltar rig pa bsgrub pa rdo rje khro bo nyon cig_/de la re zhig dang por rig pa 'dzin pas bslab pa'i gnas lnga yongs su bzung la byang chub kyi sems bskyed de/_byams pa chen 
[\[261a.5\]]po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa de'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'dul ba ngas bshad par bya'o/_/dang por re zhig bzlas pa'i phreng ba yongs su bzung ste/_nor bu dang /_bu yis 'tsho ba dang /_drag po'i ril bu dang /_tsan+dan 
[\[261a.6\]]dmar po dang /_rdo rje'i mig rnams las drag po'i mig khyad par du 'phags pas de brgyu ba'i sngags su gyur pa ni/_na mo badzra pA Na ye/_o~M ki ri ki ri rauM dri Ni swA hA/_sngags 'dis phreng ba brgyu bar bya'o/_/de nas slob dpon las gnang ba nod de/_slob dpon la phul du byung ba'i yon 
[\[261a.7\]]phul la sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i bya ba dang ldan pas sngags bsgrubs pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs rnams kyis bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na tshig tsam yang sbyin par mi bya na/_sngags 'grub pa lta ci smos/_de lta 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa la sngags 'grub pa gsang ba bshad par bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pas zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_mngon spyod dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_gsod pa dang /_bskrad pa rnams bsgrub pa'i don du gnas yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/de la re zhig gnas 
[\[261b.2\]]su gyur pa ni ri'i rtse mo dang /_shing gcig pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten rnams su bum pa rtsa ba nag po med par nor bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang la bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du brgyad brgya bzla'o/_/oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT 
[\[261b.3\]]'khrul 'khor gyi gnas su sngags 'dis bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas sa'i phyogs su bum pa la khro bos bsngags te thams cad la bsang gtor bya'o/_/chu'i rgyun ma chad pas thams cad la bskor bar bya'o/_/dug dang /_khrag dang /_yungs kar bsres pas arga'i shing la me sbar 
[\[261b.4\]]la stong phrag brgyad bsregs la 'di skad ces kho bos gnas 'di yongs su bzung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa de'i rig pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang glags lta ba 'jug pa'i go skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dod par sems pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[261b.5\]]cho ga gang bsgrub na de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ba lang gi 'o ma dang /_nas dang /_lo ma dang /_slong ba za zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs pas 'bum phrag gcig bzla bar bya'o/_/sngags kyi mthar gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsgrub pa 
[\[261b.6\]]'di gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ba de bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes brjod la/_de nas rje btsun sangs rgyas kyi mdun du nag po'i brgyad pa'i nyin mtshan gso sbyong dang ldan pas dgongs ka'i dus su ji ltar nus pas mchod pa bya ste/_ku sha'i chun po'i steng du bsdad la de bzhin 
[\[261b.7\]]gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs te rig pa khor mor ji srid gnyid ma byung ba de srid bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas der ku sha sdom pa la nyal te gnyid kyi mtshan mo'i thun tshod phyi ma la lha de nyid grub pa yang bka' stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi gsung na nyi ma phyi ma la de bzhin du mchod pa'i cho 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gas bcom ldan 'das spyan dang lhan cig pa mchod de/_sna ma'i me tog la brgyad brgya yongs su bzlas la phyogs bzhir gtor te/_ji srid gnyid ma byung ba de srid kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o/_/nges par gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas the tsom med par slar yang sngar 
[\[262a.2\]]bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du gsang sngags chen po 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni mngon spyod la stegs bu gru gsum pa bya'o/_/rgyas pa la gru bzhi'o/_/zhi ba la zlum po'o/_/sgrub pa chen po la pad+ma'i rnam pa'o/_/dbang 
[\[262a.3\]]du bya ba la lcags kyu'i rnam pa'o/_/rig pa dang lhan cig tu dri zhim po'i me tog dang yam shing bsreg par bya'o/_/mngon spyod la dur khrod kyi shing la tsha ba gsum dang /_skye tshe dang /_yungs kar dang /_lan tshwa dang /_thal ba dang /_khrag la sogs pas khro bo la sreg blugs bya'o/_/
[\[262a.4\]]zhi ba la sman gyi ljon pa'i yam shing gis so/_/rgyas pa la 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis so/_/zhi ba la me tog dang dri dkar pos so/_/rgyas pa la me tog dang dri ser pos so/_/mngon spyod la me tog dang dri dmar pos so/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa'i 
[\[262a.5\]]sngags kyis thun gsum du las bya'o/_/sgrub pa chen po la dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pas las bya'o/_/zhi ba la skyil krung gis so/_/rgyas pa la tsog pus so/_/mngon spyod la rkang pas rkang pa mnan pas so/_/zas mi za bar sreg blugs bya'o/_/sgrub 
[\[262a.6\]]pa chen po dang zhi ba la hU~M gi yi ge bzla'o/_/mngon spyod la phaT kyi yi ge'o/_/zhi ba la srod kyi thun la'o/_/rgyas pa snga dro'i thun la'o/_/mngon spyod nyi ma gung ngam nam gung gi dus su kha ltor bltas te las bya'o/_/sgrub pa chen po dang zhi ba la kha shar du phyogs pas so/_/rgyas pa la 
[\[262a.7\]]byang du phyogs pas so/_/dbang du bya ba la byang du phyogs pas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha la mchod pa byas te rgyas pa'i las bya'o/_/dur khrod dang /_rtags gcig par dbang du bya ba dang mngon spyod do/_/zhi ba la sogs pa la me sbar te bya'o/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]der me bzang por gyur na de nas las 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/thog mkho nar sngags kyis lha spyan drangs te phyis bcing bar bya'o/_/thog mar de ltar ma byas na rig pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/spyan drangs nas dri'i chus gang ba'i snod du me tog dkar po dang ldan pa la sangs rgyas 
[\[262b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs te/_gsang sngags brgyad brgya bgrang bar bya'o/_/sgrub pa chen po 'byung ba'i mtshan ma rnams 'byung ste/_glo bur du dung gi sgra'am/_'brug gi sgra thos pa dang /_dri zhim po byung na de nas rig pa'i lha 'ongs par shes par bya'o/_/gal te ma 
[\[262b.3\]]'ongs na bcom ldan 'das spyan dang lhan cig pa la sngar bzhin du mchod yon bzung ste brgyad brgya bzla'o/_/'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/byon pa dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_phyogs bcings la gtor ma dang lha bshos dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas mig sman dang ldong ros la sogs pa 
[\[262b.4\]]rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/sngon du sbyangs te phyis bsgrub par bya'o/_/mig sman dang ldong ros la sogs pa rnams la nyin mtshan du 'o mas bran zhing gzhag go/_/de nas bton la ji ltar nus pas dge 'dun la dga' ston bya'o/_/skar ma rgyal la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[262b.5\]]spyan sngar mchod pas mchod la ras dkar po ma nyams pas g.yogs te/_bsod nams mchod la brtag par bya'o/_/brtags pa na sngon gyi mtshan ma byung na las 'grub par shes par bya'o/_/mtshan ma gzhan yang sil snyan gyi sgra dang /_dung gi sgra dang /_rgyal ba'i sgra byung 
[\[262b.6\]]na sil snyan gyis sgras rig pa 'dzin pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba'i sgras mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dung gi sgras dbang du byed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rdzas btags te ming med kyis ri lu lnga bya'o/_/ras ma nyams pa'i steng du bzhag ste/_grib 
[\[262b.7\]]ma la bskam par bya'o/_/de nas a shwat+tha'i shing gi steng du bzhag nas zhag bdun du lhag par gnas par bya'o/_/de nas thog ma sgrub pa'i nyin mo snga dro'i tshe yongs su ltung bas bsnun pa la lan stong phrag gcig bsngags te de nas phye ma red sgrub pa la 'jug par bya ste/_a shwat+tha'i lo ma 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bzhi g.yas bskor du bskor ba la bzhag ste gsum gyis dgab bo/_/a shwat+tha'i lo ma rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas nas blang bar bya ste/_ljon shing gzhan gyi grib mas ma phog pa dang /_lha'i khang pas ma phog pa dang /_dur khrod du skyes pa rnams kyi a shwat+tha'i lo ma yongs su 
[\[263a.2\]]gzung bar mi bya'o/_/de dag las gzhan gnas bsngags pa'i a shwat+tha'i shing gi lo ma rtse mo dkar po rnams kyi steng du grub pa'i rdzas cha gsum du byas te/_bla ma dang bdag nyid dang lhan cig pa rnams kyi'o/_/rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang ral gri rnams su blos brtags nas de dag thun 
[\[263a.3\]]tshod lngar yongs su bskams te/_de nas ba lang gi lci ba'i tshogs kyi dbus su bcug la zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzhag go/_/de nas bton te ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la de nyid du zhag bdun lhag par gnas par byas te yongs su ltung bas bsnun pa la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas 
[\[263a.4\]]la de nas sgrub pa la 'jug go/_/mig sman de dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_lo dra rnams bsres la bcom ldan 'das spyan ma'i snying po stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te/_sgrub pa'i dus su mig la byugs pas gnyid mi 'byung ngo /_/gzhan yang sman du gyur pa ni a 
[\[263a.5\]]pa mArga dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_shu dag skya bo dang /_ru rta dang /_rgya spos dang /_gi wang dang /_gur gu ma dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_thog mar ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten gyi mdun du zhag gsum du smyung bar byas te rdo rje go cha'i sngags stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags so/_/
[\[263a.6\]]de nas sgrub pa'i dus su ba lang gi gcin dang btags te lus la yongs su bskus nas sgrub pa la 'jug go/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_log 'dren thams cad kyis rgyang nas 'od dang ldan pa'i me'i phung po ltar 'bar bar mthong ste/_mthong nas 
[\[263a.7\]]phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rigs rnams mtshungs bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe rig pa 'dzin pas rdzas grub par gyur na de nas sngon bzhin bcom ldan 'das spyan ma'i sngags kyis me tog dkar po la brgyad brgya bzlas 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]la rdzas kyi dbus su bcug pas rdzas brtan par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na dngos grub 'phrog par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gsang sngags grub par ma gyur na rig pa 'dzin pa des 'di ltar bya ste/_rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo'i 'gram du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 
[\[263b.2\]]snying po can gyi mchod rten khru gang pa brgyad brgya byas la mchod rten re re la ji ltar nus pa'i dri dang me tog dang bdug spos phul te/_dus gsum du byang chub kyi sems bskyed la sdig pa bshags te re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad dam brgyad brgya bzla'o/_/gal te mtshan ma ma byung na cho ga 'dis 
[\[263b.3\]]mchod rten stong phrag gcig byas te de'i nub phyogs ma yin pa'i mchod rten 'bar na las kyi sgrib pa zad par shes par bya'o/_/de nas gang ci bsgrub pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa chen po brtsams nas las gzhan dbab pa dang /_gsod pa la sogs pa rnams mi bya'o/_/
[\[263b.4\]]gal te byas na rig pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/long ba dang /_sgur po dang /_rlig rlugs dang /_'on pa dang /_sen mo ngan pa dang /_sha bkra can dang /_lus zha ba dang /_sbo ga nag pa rnams kyis sgrub pa chen po 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gza' la sogs pa 'grub 
[\[263b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mi gang sangs rgyas dang /_chos la dad pa dang ldan pa dang /_'dud pa dang ldan pa dang /_sen mo zangs kyi mdog can dang ldan pa dang /_pha ma la gus pa dang /_bla ma la sri zhu che ba des thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pas sngags sgrub pa sngon 
[\[263b.6\]]bzhin sgrub pa dang ldan na tshe'i dus byas kyang gang 'dod pa sems shing shi bas de shi ba tsam gyis de dang der skye bar 'gyur te/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'am/_yang na rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sam/_dbang phyug chen po'i rigs sam/_gdol pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 
[\[263b.7\]]rigs de lta bu'i rim pa gang 'dod pa'i bsam pas sngags bsgrubs pas de lta bu'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa chen po la 'bad pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas rdo rje dang /_'khor lo dang /_rtse gsum dang /_dbyug gu dang /_zhags pa dang /_mdung thung dang /_dbyug tho dang /_
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pad+ma dang /_dung dang /_lcags kyu dang /_spyi blugs la sogs pa rnams la rkang pas brdzi bar mi bya'o/_/sa la bris pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/'di ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'i rdo rje dang /_khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang /_lha chen po'i rtse gsum dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[264a.2\]]dbyug gu dang /_chu lha'i zhags pa dang /_gzhon nu'i mdung thung dang /_stobs sha'i dbyug tho dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pad+ma dang /_rdo rje lcags kyu'i lcags kyu dang /_tshangs pa'i spyi blugs te/_phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub gang thob par 'dod pa bdag nyid 
[\[264a.3\]]kyis rdo rje la sogs pa de dang de dag phyag rgya chen po'i rkang pas brdzi bar mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags bsgrub pa na rig pa'i lha dngos grub mi ster na des las 'dis rig pa mnyes par bya ste/_dri thams cad kyis rig pa'i lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la/_
[\[264a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi drung du bzhag ste zhag gsum du smyung bar gnas la nag po'i brgyad pa'am/_nag po'i bcu bzhi la spyan dang lhan cig pa'i rig sngags kyis sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad de'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar brdeg par bya zhing /_mar nag 
[\[264a.5\]]dang mar bsres pas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs byas la de nyid du 'khod de/_ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa de rangs pas gnyid log pa dang /_ston par 'gyur ba'am rjes su gdams pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma 'ongs 
[\[264a.6\]]na nyi ma phyi ma la de bzhin du gtor ma'i cho ga byas te rdo rje khro bo dang lhan cig tu stong phrag brgyad bzla'o/_/de nas rig pa'i lha de nyid khro bo dang lhan cig tu rmi lam du mthong nas chad pa dang /_lhag pa dang phyi mo dman pa dang /_yi ge gzhan du gyur pa yang ston par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[264a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par gyur na de nas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pa dang po la las 'di mi bya la ji srid lan bdun bsgrubs kyang ma grub na de nas las 'di bya'o/_/de nas rdzas sgrub pa'i dus su gyur na de'i mthar srod dman ma gung dang /_nyi ma shar ba na rig pa 'dzin pas 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]rmi lam lta bur gsang sngags gang 'dod pa yid la sems shing bzla bar bya'o/_/gzhan du na log par 'dren pa rnams zhugs par gyur nas rig pa'i lha mngon du mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi gos la reg par mi bya zhing bgo ba gsum byas te/_gcig gyon la khrus bya'o/_/gnyis 
[\[264b.2\]]pas bzla bar bya'o/_/gsum pas mtshan mo gyon par bya'o/_/skyil krung gis gnas te rig pa'i lha'i mtshan ma mthong nas til dang mar bsres pa'i sreg blugs bya'o/_/rig pa'i stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/til med na dan tu la dang /_sran ma sha dang /_mud 
[\[264b.3\]]ga rnams kyis bya'o/_/nya dang sha dang chang btung bar mi bya ste/_nyes pa des log par 'dren pa rnams kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ba dang ldan pas byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed par 
[\[264b.4\]]bya'o/_/dam tshig shes par gyur pas 'di ltar byas na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pas sngar bshad pa bya'o/_/rtag tu lha thams cad la bdug pa dang /_lha bshos kyi 'bras chan rang gi lag gis dbul bar bya'o/_/zlos pa na kha shar du 
[\[264b.5\]]phyogs te bris sku bris pa'i sngon du bzlas par bya'o/_/bris sku'i tshad chen po khru bcu pa'i ras la'o/_/de'i phyed dang phyed la 'bring dang tha mar 'gyur ro/_/skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pas sngar bshad pa rnams bya'o/_/gal te brgya la rdzas sam/_gos sam/_rgyan 
[\[264b.6\]]ster na de gzung bar mi bya ste/_'bras bu tsam bzung na yang gsang sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/chu nyung dus bkru bar mi bya zhing rkang pas me la reg par mi bya la sen mos sa la ri mo bri bar mi bya zhing /_lha'i khang pa'i grib ma la 'gom par mi bya ste/_'di lta bu'i yon tan 
[\[264b.7\]]dang ldan zhing de dag dor ba'i sngags pas myur du rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las rig sngags kyis 'dul ba zhes bya ba rdo rje khro bos yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//de ru 'bad pas 'jug pa na/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]dam pa rnyed pa yis/_/bstan bcos las ni nges bzhin pa'i/_/phyogs kyi cha ni rab bshad bya/_/shar na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing /_/dbang ldan du ni pa lak+Sha/_/lho ru yang ni a shwat+tha/_/nub tu de bzhin pa lak+Sha/_/byang du ljon shing ma du ka_/gnas rnams su 
[\[265a.2\]]ni gdon mi za/_/gang dag tu ni shing med na/_/de la yang ni mtshan bzang po/_/shar na gzhan pa'i lus gcig ste/_/lho ru yang ni bzhi ru 'gyur/_/nub tu gsum du bstan pa ste/_/byang du gnyis su bsgrags pa'o/_/mdzes pa'i bu mo rtag tu gnas/_/grub pa'i rdzas dang 
[\[265a.3\]]dngul chu ni/_/lha yi byang na rtag tu yang /_/dngul chu ru ni shes par bya/_/dbang ldan du yang dngul chu ste/_/dbang por rdzas ni de bzhin no/_/chu lhar rtag tu rdzas bzang po/_/grub pa'i rdzas ni bla na med/_/bden bral du ni ral grir 'gyur/_/gshin rjer de bzhin mig 
[\[265a.4\]]sman nyid/_/rlung gi phyogs su rtag gnas pa/_/yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o/_/lha nyid kyi ni mdun du yang /_/'bab stegs can gyi rdzing bur bstan/_/khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ni nang na yang /_/grub pa'i rdzas la the tshom med/_/lho yi sgo ru gang gyur pa/_/lho yi phyogs su 
[\[265a.5\]]mngon phyogs pa/_/de na rdzas rnams thams cad de/_/lha yi khang par rnam par bstan/_/dbang po'i phyogs su mngon phyogs pa/_/de nas rdzas rnams kun bsdus pa'o/_/byang du phyogs te legs gnas pa/_/bris skus bkab pa'i rdzas su bshad/_/nub tu phyogs 
[\[265a.6\]]te legs gnas pa/_/de na yang ni bsgribs nas gnas/_/rig sngags bklags pas 'grub 'gyur te/_/'jig rten gsum shes bla na med/_/rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/lha yi gnas su rnam par bstan/_/shar nas shar du mngon phyogs pa'i/_/'khrul 
[\[265a.7\]]'khor du ni rnam par bshad/_/lho ru mngon par phyogs gnas pa/_/lho yi phyogs kyis rnam par bstan/_/nub kyi phyogs su mngon phyogs pa/_/nub kyi phyogs par rnam par bstan/_/'di yis byang du bshad pa dang /_/dbang ldan gyi yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]kyi yang mtshan nyid ni/_/bstan pa 'di la the tshom med/_/'di ltar shes pa'i mkhas pa yis/_/phyogs kyi 'khrul 'khor mtshon par bya/_/sngon bzhin legs par shes pa yis/_/rdzas rnams kyang ni blo ldan gyis/_/de 'dra'i phyogs su 'khod nas ni/_/de 
[\[265b.2\]]yis lam ni blta bar bya/_/gnyis pa yi ni lam gyur pa/_/'khrul 'khor med pas brtag mi dgos/_/gsum pa yang ni shes bya ste/_/bzhi pa yang ni mtshungs pa'o/_/lam ni rnam pa bzhir bshad pas/_/'dod ldan la ni 'bras bu ster/_/dang po ru ni mi dpyad 
[\[265b.3\]]par/_/bza' bar bya ba ma yin no/_/gnyis pa ru ni bza' bar bya/_/gsum pa la yang de bzhin no/_/bzhi par yang ni bza' bar bya/_/de dag 'khrul 'khor med par bstan/_/phyogs kyi cha ni thams cad du/_/yongs su gang bar shes par bya/_/
[\[265b.4\]]phyi ma yi ni cho ga yis/_/tshong 'dus ze 'bru rgyu ba'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//
[\[265b.5\]]phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mgon po la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/_sbyor ba bcu po gnyis po 'di rnams gang la gang byung ba dang /_bu ga thams cad 
[\[265b.6\]]kyi 'khrul 'khor nam med par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin te dbyar zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]nag po'i bcu bzhi la gza' phur bu'i nyi ma dang skar ma rgyal 'dzom pa la nges par bu ga'i sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]gnam stong la phur 
[\[265b.7\]]bu'i nyi ma dang rgyu skar sa ri 'dzom pa la nges par bu ga'i sgo grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu ma rang nyid 'ongs nas 'jug par byed do/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]nya la phur bu'i nyi ma dang skar ma bra nye 'dzom pa la bu ga thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor med par 'gyur ro/_/dgun zla 'bring po 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]nag po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu'i nyi ma dang skar ma rgyal 'dzom pa la 'khrul 'khor thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dgun zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]nag po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu dang skar ma gro bzhin la bu ga thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor med par 'gyur ro/_/dgun zla tha 
[\[266a.2\]{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]dkar po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu'i nye ma dang skar ma rgyal 'dzom pa na 'khrul 'khor ma lus pa grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ston zla ra ba'i nag po'i tshes brgyad la phur bu'i nyin par dang skar ma nam gru 'jom pa na bu ga'i sgo thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyar zla 'bring po'i nag po'i 
[\[266a.3\]]bcu bzhi la phur bu'i nyin par dang skar ma rgyal lam nam gru 'dzom pa la bu ga thams cad nges par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/grong gi mi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'jug par bya'o/_/ston zla ra ba'i nag po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu'i nyin par dang skar ma phal gu ni 'dzom pa na nges par bu 
[\[266a.4\]]ga'i sgo grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis rje btsun 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i don dus 'og gi gsang ba chen po smras pa'o/_/sngags dang sbyin sreg rnam par spang ngo /_/sa 'og gi gsang ba chen po yongs su rdzogs so//_//'phags 
[\[266a.5\]]pa phyag na rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba ji snyed pa yongs su rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /_sgra sgyur gyi mkhas pa sgra'i gtsug lag lam rmongs pa gsang sngags 'dzin pa kun dga' rgyal 
[\[266a.6\]]mtshan dpal bzang bos dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur//_//lha min dbang po'i sgo glegs 'joms byed pa/_/gsung rab dam pa dpal ldan kun dga' yi/_/rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur 'di la sgra nyams pa/_/gang lags de la mkhas rnams bzod pa mdzod/_/
[\[266a.7\]]sa 'og 'khrul 'khor bde legs rin chen gter/_/gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dam pa'i bka'/_/gangs can 'gro la phan pa'i blo gros kyis/_/bsgyur ba'i bsod nams 'dzin bcas rnams la byin//_//
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]{D745}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+g+ma tA rA b+han+nA ri kA nA mA Sh+Ta sha ta kaM/_bod skad du/_rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan yid 'ong po Ta la/_/sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras/_/
[\[266b.2\]]sna tshogs ljon pa 'khri shing bkram/_/'dab chags du ma sgra 'byin pa/_/'bab chu sna tshogs lhung lhung sgrogs/_/ri dwags mang pos kun tu dkrig_/me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis/_/kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste/_/sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/_/rkang drug pa rnams glu sgra 'byin/_/mi'am 
[\[266b.3\]]ci rnams dbyangs snyan len/_/glang po myos pas rab tu gtams/_/grub pa rig 'dzin tshogs dang ni/_/dri za rnams kyis glu blangs pa/_/thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams kyis/_/rtag tu legs par bsten pa na/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang /_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyang ste/_/
[\[266b.4\]]'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams dang /_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i tshogs gzhan dang /_/rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba'i/_/sems can kun la phan brtson pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/_/bzhugs te de nas dpal dang ldan/_/pad+ma'i snying 
[\[266b.5\]]po'i gdan bzhugs pa'i/_/dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/_/byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis/_/lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/_/de yi chos ni ston par bzhed/_/lag na rdo rje stobs chen po/_/der ni nye bar 'ong nas su/_/mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa/_/des ni spyan ras gzigs la zhus/_/glang po sbrul dang seng ge me/_/glang po stag 
[\[266b.6\]]dang chus dkrigs par/_/'phyan pa'i sems can 'di dag rnams/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/_/'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/_/chags sdang gti mug rang bzhin las/_/gang gis sems can grol byed pa/_/thub chen bdag la de gsungs shig_/dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/_/
[\[266b.7\]]'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs/_/phyag na rdo rjes rtogs byed pa/_/snyan pa'i tshig ni gsungs pa'o/_/nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/_/skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/_/smon lam dbang gis byung ba ste/_/bdag gi bka' yis 'jig rten ma/_/snying rje che dang ldan pa yis/_/'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo/_/nyi ma shar ba 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]dang 'dra ba/_/zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od/_/lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/_/'di rnams sgrol zhing snang bar byed/_/'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/_/lha mo ut+pal sngon po'i phyag_/ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/_/'gro ba yang dag bsrung don du/_/rgyal po rnams kyis 
[\[267a.2\]]bdag bskyed pas/_/'brog dgon mtshon cha ltung ta_ba dang /_/sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa'i tshe/_/ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni/_/bdag gis rtag tu sems can bsrung /_/sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/_/des na bdag la 'jig rten du/_/thub pa'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar 
[\[267a.3\]]sgrogs/_/de nas gus bcas legs gnas shing /_/thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/_/'bar bzhin bar snang la gnas te/_/'di skad tshig ni gsol bar gyur/_/gang zhig rgyal dang sa bcu yi/_/dbang phyug mgon po byang chub sems/_/rdzu 'phrul che rnams sngon bsgrags pa'i/_/sdig kun 'phrog cing bsod nams dang /_/bkra shis grags pa 
[\[267a.4\]]'phel byed pa/_/nor dang 'bru dang dang dpya nyid dang /_/nad med 'byor pa 'phel bar byed/_/tshe dang nad med bde skyed pa/_/sems can thams cad bde 'thob cing /_sems can kun gyi dpal dang ni/_/shis pa 'jog cing rnams spel ba/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gsungs shig_/sems can rnams la byams mdzad nas/_/thub pa chen po de sgrogs shig_/
[\[267a.5\]]'di skad zhus la bcom ldan 'das/_/spyan ras gzigs ni rab tu bzhad/_/byams pa 'phro ba'i spyan ras kyis/_/phyogs rnams kun tu rnam gzigs nas/_/bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan pa yi/_/g.yas pa'i byag gi bskyod mdzad nas/_/de gsungs shes rab shin tu che/_/legs so legs so dka' thub che/_/sems can kun la 
[\[267a.6\]]gcig tu brtse/_/skal ba chen po'i ming rnams nyon/_/mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa/_/nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur/_/nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/_/dbang phyug yon tan thams cad ldan/_/dus min 'chi ba nges par bsregs/_/shi ba bde ba can 'gro ba/_/de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/_/lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/_/
[\[267a.7\]]'dir khyod rjes su yi rang byos/_/legs par bsdams pa mchis par mdzod/_/oM lo tsa ni su lo tsa ni/_ta re/_tA rod+b+ha be/_sar+b+ba satwA nu kam+pe ni/_sar+b+ba sa twot+ta ri Ni/_sa ha sra b+hu dze/_sa ha sra ne tre/_oM na mo b+ha ga tI a ba lo ka ya/_a ba lo ka ya/_mAM sar+b+ba sa twA~M sh+tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM sid+d+he su sid+d+he/_su ga tAt+na dze maM trAM kr-i bA ni r+m+ma le/_sh+yA me d+yA ma rU be ma hA 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]pra dz+nyA+e pra ba re ba ra be b+hA Shi te/_oM a pa rA dzi tA ma hA rau drI bi shwa rU bI ma hA ba lA/_oM saHshrI tad+ya thA/_oM dge ba ma ni gzi brjid che/_/'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/_/mtsho ldan ma dang spyan yang sam/_/shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/_/brtan sbyin gso sbyin ma swA hA/_/oM yig 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/_/sems can kun la phan brtson ma/_/
[\[267b.2\]]g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo/_/lha mo shes rab phar phyin ma/_/'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/_/gang ma rnga chen dung can ma/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma/_/zla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che/_/mi pham ma dang gos ser ma/_/sgyu ma chen mo dkar chen mo/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo/_/drag mo chen mo gtum chen mo/_/sdang ba'i sems 
[\[267b.3\]]can rlag byed ma/_/rab tu zhi ma zhi gzugs ma/_/rnam par rgyal ma 'bar 'od ma/_/glog gi phreng ma rgyal mtshan ma/_/ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/_/rmug byed rengs byed nag mo dang /_/dus mtshan ma dang mtshan spyod ma/_/srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/_/zhu ma dge ma su sgrol ma/_/tshangs rig ma dang rig byed yum/_/gsang len ma dang phug gnas ma/_/
[\[267b.4\]]bkra shis bde byed zhi byed ma/_/skyes pa rig byed yid mgyogs ma/_/thod pa can ma shugs chen ma/_/mtshams ma bden ma gzhan las rgyal/_/ded dpon chen mo snying rjes 'jug_/nyams la lam ni rab ston ma/_/mchog ster 'chos byed ston pa mo/_/bud med gzugs la dpag med gnon/_/grub ma ri khrod rnal 'byor ma/_/gdol ma 
[\[267b.5\]]nges ma bdud rtsi ma/_/nor can bsod nams skal chen ma/_/skal bzang ma dang grogs ston ma/_/gshin rje skrag byed 'jigs byed ma/_/drag shul drag shul dka' thub che/_/'gro la gcig tu phan brtson ma/_/skyob ma gus la mnyen gshin ma/_/zhi ma phra mo ngag dbang phyug_/rtag ma kun gyi mar gyur ma/_/don kun sgrub byed bzang 
[\[267b.6\]]po ma/_/sbas ma ma ma nor sbyin ma/_/'jigs med gau ta mA rab bshad/_/dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang sras mo/_/yon tan mtha' yas sgrol ma'i mtshan/_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/_/oM tA re kr-i pA ba laM ba ni/_mai t+yAt+ma ke shri ba NI ye swA hA/_mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/phan par 'dod pas bsgrags pa ste/_/gsang ba las ni mchog 
[\[267b.7\]]tu gsang /_/lhas kyang rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/skal bzang skal ba can du byed/_/sems can thams cad bde bar 'jug_/sdig pa kun 'phrog bsod nams te/_/nyes pa thams cad 'joms byed pa'o/_/blo ldan gang zhig gtsang byas nas/_/mnyam bzhag dus gsum klog byed pa/_/de ni mi ring dus nyid du/_/rgyal srid dpal ni thob par 'gyur/_/sdug 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]can rtag tu bde bar 'gyur/_/dbul po rnams ni nor ldan 'gyur/_/'dir ni blun po shes rab che/_/yid gzhungs can 'gyur the tshom med/_/bcings pa 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/_/tha snyad las ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/dgra bo rnams ni bshes su 'gyur/_/rwa can dang ni mche ba can/_/bgrod dka' dog dang 'thab mo yang /_/sna tshogs 
[\[268a.2\]]'jigs pa 'khrugs pa'i tshe/_/mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis/_/'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur/_/dus min 'chi las sgrol bar byed/_/snyan grags rol mo 'thob par 'gyur/_/de gcig pus ni bdag nyid che/_/mi rnams skye ba 'bras bur bcas/_/gang zhig mi ni sngar langs nas/_/'di nyid sgrogs par byed pa de/_/dus ring por yang 
[\[268a.3\]]tshe dang ldan/_/mi yi dpal yang rnyed par 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/de bzhin dri za lus srul po/_/sha za srin po 'jigs rung dang /_/ma mo drag po'i sems ldan pa/_/gnon po mkha' 'gro ma yi dwa gas/_/skem byed smyo byed gza' de bzhin/_/ro langs sems sgyur sbod gtong gang /_/gdug pa'i sems ldan gzhan gyis kyang /_/
[\[268a.4\]]grib ma yang ni 'gong mi nus/_/slar yang de yi smos ci dgos/_/sems can gdug pas gsod mi 'gyur/_/grib gnon dang ni brjed byed nyid/_/gshed byed byad ltem la sogs dang /_/nad rnams kyis kyang theb mi 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min 'thab pa yang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos nyams su myong /_/longs spyod dbang phyug yon tan ldan/_/
[\[268a.5\]]bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/_/blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/rigs dang ldan zhing mthong na dga'/_/gnyen dang ldan zhing smra mkhas che/_/bstan bcos kun la 'jigs pa med/_/dge ba'i bshes la yang dag bsten/_/byang chub sems kyi rgyan dang ldan/_/rtag tu skye ba gang gang du/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang mi 'bral lo/_/rje btsun ma 
[\[268a.6\]]'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so//_//zhes pa 'di ni rje btsun bla ma rig pa 'dzin pa chen pos ne pA la'i yul nas byung ba'i rgya dpe stsal nas gser gyi kAR+ShA pa Na'i gnang skyes dang bcas te sgyur cig ces mnga' ris stod nas bya ma rta'i lam brgyud de bka' 
[\[268a.7\]]pheb pa bzhin si tu pa bstan pa'i nyin byed kyis dpal gdong gi lo tha skar can gyi yar tshes brgyad kyi nyin mdo smad sde dge'i mnga' ris thub bstan chos 'khor gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba ste/_sngar bsgyur ba rnams dang mi mtshungs pa dang lhag pa 'ga' zhig 'dug kyang tshig don gyi char 'di nyid legs tshang phul du byung bar rtogs so//_//
